Product: Yanlin Adjustable Multi-Function Barbell Rack Stand, Max Load 550lbs,Squat Rack Dipping Station Dip Stand Fitness Barbell Free Bench Press Stands Press Equipment Home & Gym Dip Stands
Name: Jack Trader
Review:
Received this yesterday. Pretty easy to put together although I did use my own tools as another reviewer mentions the supplied wrenches are very basic.

I went for the Classic-A Version with the brace between the two posts. When the posts are extended it is extremely wobbly. I'll probably make some adjustments where I can but basically the inner arm is just way too small for the gap it fits in. However this doesn't stop me from using it as intended, it's a good product but can be improved.

Another issue is when the rack is up against the wall I can't easily fit on my larger weights. Not too much of and issue as they typically stay on the barbell and I can just about fit my 5kgs on the rack without having to move it away from the wall. It would be nice if the design would make the weight holders be on the front instead.

What I do like about this particular one is it does have a very small footprint taking up only about half a metre when it's up against the wall and this was the main selling point for me. If I had the space I would get a full sized one instead. If the arms were more sturdy this would be a 5 star.

Product: Yanlin Adjustable Multi-Function Barbell Rack Stand, Max Load 550lbs,Squat Rack Dipping Station Dip Stand Fitness Barbell Free Bench Press Stands Press Equipment Home & Gym Dip Stands
Title of Review: Shakey as anything. Not confident it is safe to use. .
Name: marky
Review: Arrived quickly and easy assembly with my own spanners. But after assembly it is immediately obvious the top half of the upright pillars is a very loose fit into the bottom half so there is a LOT of left-right and front-back movement. Really not very steady. Don't think it is safe to use. Disappointed.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Cheap quality - not robust - dent easily - warp
Name: JT
Product Description: Size Name: 40 TILES (160 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review:
I purchased these for my garage floor (we don't park a car in it, just store stuff). Picture attached after laying the tiles and it looks good. However:

(read UPDATE below before buying)

Pro's:
- Easy to lay
- Comes with nice sticky fixers to hold it down firmly
- Easy to cut

Con's:
- The tiles do not join together anywhere as neatly as my previous tiles did (which I removed to fit these new ones). You can see gaps between the joins, some larger gaps than others
- The tiles are quite thin, in comparison to the tiles I removed they are about 60% of the thickness
- The biggest issue I can see is the durability of the tiles. The 2 attached pictures show the marks caused after 1 night of a very light set of aluminium ladders, and the other picture is from a bike wheel. These indentations have not come out. The picture in the listing shows a set of weights on the tiles, in real life that would leave a dent which would never come out. Again, to compare against the previous tiles I had, the old tiles never marked, these do instantly. Big problem if you are using them anywhere where items may be pressing against them.

In summary, they look 'ok', I will keep them for a year or 2 then replace them with some thicker tiles. Next time I will research more and look at the thickness. Obviously thicker tiles will cost more, but if I'm replacing them after a year I wish I had just spent more to start with.

UPDATE: After 6 months these tiles have warped (see photos). When they warp they never go flat again, and become a trip hazard. Very very poor quality. Avoid these and look elsewhere for tiles, unless you want to replace them after 6 months.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Any more than 4x4 it doesn‚Äôt form naturally
Name: Craig morrison
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: It‚Äôs decent enough -  hard wearing and comfortable on feet on a garage floor. I have found problems that if your attaching more than 4x4 mats then they struggle to hold shape as demonstrated in photo. I‚Äôve tried everything and reattaching at different mats.This is the best I‚Äôll have to settle with so slightly disappointed

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Kat
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: As you can see this flooring looks great, it is high quality and great for my home gym, I went for tile flooring so if one did get damaged I could easily replace. So far I have had no issues and I am very pleased with my purchase. Fast delivery I would highly recommend

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Dec-wrec26
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review: Wanted them to out a lay-z spa on and perfect for the job

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Very easy to install, feel great to step on those in the garage.
Name: Leon V
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review:
This was a piece of cake to put down as a floor for my garage, feet are warm now floor is soft and what falls on it wont crack no more.
Some tiles needed cut to meet the wall, the rubber is good thick and it will cut but get a good knife.
Each tile comes with 2 edges, plenty enough lots of spares to make some good finish.
Two things I classify as bad but they are no problem for the garage.
1. Some tiles are less black than others, maybe check and use the same batch on the same area of the tiles.
2. Sometimes the tile wont snug fit leaving a small tiny gap between the jigsaw puzzle like connection seam. Again might be a batch thing, so check the packs, I found they will post some 4 pack and some 8 pack sets, check them out and match them. What works is a bit of shuffle and it comes together ok.
Having said that, you wont notice those things now, the floor has settled and it looks good, works good, hope it stays good.
So all good.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Take time piecing together for best fitting
Name: alexander reid
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: After reading some good and some not so good reviews, I went for this product because of price and ease of laying in my floor space in the attic, that I have turned into a small fitness area and I‚Äôm absolutely delighted with the results. I will say take your time in finding the best fit by lining up the the slight pattern and they will fit nice and tight with no gaps like I‚Äôve seen in other reviews. Will also add I never had to use the two side sticky pads on the main sections but only on the sections I cut into smaller pieces. All in all I‚Äôm delighted

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Daniel edwards
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: After looking at lots of options for my home gym this was the most cost effective, functional and had the best design compared to rubber flooring and other foam flooring. As imagined they were easy to assemble and cut to fit, I didn‚Äôt bother with the free adhesive stickers and went for some spray on the floor as well as thick tape under over the interlocking sections as a double secured method but these are sturdy tiles and probably didn‚Äôt need the overkill. After under ordering I placed a second order and messaged to request the delivery asap, having to change the address. The seller responded straight away and got these out in time, very helpful overall and happy with the finished product in grey.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Fantastic to use under an above floor swimming pool
Name: Kelly
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Above and beyond customer service. They kindly gave me a call to go over my questions and were really helpful.We have used them to go under a 10ft pool and they make the bottom of the pool so much more comfortable. We no longer feel the hard concrete slabs or the joins of the slabs. Work a treat for what we wanted.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Peter Mann
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: This product is better than I thought it would be. I bought this as a base to lay guitars on while working on them to set them up and to photo/video them. The pattern is extremely good for this purpose and looks a lot more expensive than the actual cost - it looks really slick. Having got them I can see how you could even put a lot of them together to form a pretty good background for (for example) an interview video. They are so light that with velcro you could easily attach them to a piece of wall and use as a backdrop. It's not often you are surprised by the quality of a product, but this is one of those times. I'd think they would be great for the intended purposes also, BTW. Tempted to put some in the shower room for when I step out of the shower.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Just the type of flooring any gym needs
Name: M. Bruton
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I was looking for some floor tiles for my homemade gym in the spare room. I like working out in my bare feet so needed something nice and spongy and these fit the bill. They are easy to fit together, they come with stickers to stick them to the floor but I didn't need to use them. I can't wait to smash a workout later.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: DMA
Product Description: Size Name: 36 TILES (144 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: We had these foam tiles in our awning this summer, laid on 18mm ply. They were extremely fast to put down and quite durable. I stuck the outside tiles down with double sided velcro, which held them in place. They can be reused next year and store easily. They are also easy to vacuum and mop and are so comfortable to walk on bare foot. We are ery happy with this purchase.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: P. Winchcombe
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Very disappointed with these matts. They have an almost shiny surface which means your feet slip on them when doing planks or press ups. Compared to other matts I have bought they lack any firmness, very soft in comparison and I seriously doubt if they will wear well.  They are at least soft when kneeling but not many exercises are done in a kneeling position.  Should have gone with my more expensive previous buys, now I have to spend twice

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Purchased for laying under a treadmill - do the job nicely.
Name: Ms. Pj Hawcroft
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I got these to put under my treadmill in a carpeted box room. I am worried that the silicon oil might drip down to the carpet and also I don't want the carpet to get damaged or deeply dented. I also thought these might help with soundproofing the space a little, cutting down on creaking and clonking from the machine.They are very easy to set up and slip together. I will need to trim mine down a bit as they are very wide but this isn't hard to do as they are about 6cm deep so a stanley knife and a cutting board or some thick card should let me do that.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: A Aman
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I ordered this product to use it on wooden flooring. It was a nightmare as I kept slipping. I then realised it was not for me so I requested a refund but their condition is to receive the product in its original packaging and would only sanction a refund if it's sent in its original condition. This is not always possible especially with such big product. I have literally lost approx. ¬£33 for a very bad quality exercise mat that I can't even return without meeting their stringent conditions.!

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Disappointing product, not in the least bit comfy!
Name: R. Macrae
Product Description: Size Name: 16 TILES (64 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I was  very disappointed in this product. It‚Äôs advertised as Comfy Mat however it‚Äôs not in the least bit comfy. It‚Äôs very hard underfoot, and a bit slippy. It‚Äôs the opposite of comfy, and not aligned to the product description on Amazon. I was also forced to pay the return postage charges of over ¬£15. This was not refunded to me despite my dissatisfaction with the product. You expect better than that when purchasing via Amazon.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Extra Floor Protection from a Power Tower
Name: Gawain
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review:
We've been using these since January, placed beneath a power tower for a little extra protection for the floor. We also store dumbbells and kettlebells on it. The power tower has left permanent indents, but that was clearly expected, especially since it's been a few months in the same position now.

I bought 10 tiles just in case we wanted to use more for a general workout space, but the boss said no, so the extra have mostly been put to the side. I've tried to use them as a replacement for a general workout mat on a couple of occasions, but they don't fit together securely enough for many activities (press-ups, mountain climbers, burpees, etc); they simply pull apart. They do supply double sided adhesive pads for more permanent placing which would likely help under the right circumstances.

Generally pretty happy with them though. They do the job great for their intended purpose.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: David A (UK)
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: These are ok, but overpriced for what they are.They go down on the garage floor easily enough and are good under the paddling pool.  However anything remotely heavy (e.g. gym equipment) and/or pointy (e.g. a chair leg), will indent / cut right through this - permanently.  So a gym floor that gets destroyed by average home gym equipment, means it is not really fit for purpose.  Heavy duty rubber mats would be much better (which are much more expensive) - these are just foam, but even still are over priced for what they are (should be around half price).  They wont be looking nice for very long.In my garage gym, I have used carpet cut outs and bits of wood on top of the mats, to prevent anything from going down on to them (leaving the mats serving little purpose tbh).

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Gee
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Orange
Review: Because I have a small area to work with, I had to purchase 10 mats despite only requiring 9 of them.  What I did not anticipate was the mats bring slippery against the wooden flooring once placed down.  Doing Pilates, Yoga, Resistance training is fine but trying workouts like Zumba is dangerous which I soon discovered as I hurt my knee.  I expected the mats to be non-slippery rubber on my wooden flooring.  You are provided with 9 double-sided sticky pads - however, I have not used them as my concern is the sticky residue left behind on my wooden flooring.  However, I have now found several methods to remove the residue so will now try the sticky pads and see how I get on. Putting that aside, the edge pieces are thin. This is because the edgings are a bit loose.  I have a resolution for that. The mats are nice to work on as well. I will be sure to come back and let you know how I get on.  Meanwhile 3* but I am hoping to change that to 5* when I return.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Mr M P Barry
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review: This is a very good interlocking mat which I have used to create a safe gym space in the rear of a garage. Two packs have provided a generous area that now holds a rowing machine, static cycle and a multi gym. The matting is stable on a concrete floor and I have not used the sticky pads provided but they might be useful in some situations. The cushioning is just the right level of firmness for this use. A very good buy and is absolutely fit for purpose.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Extremely poor quality and wrong colour sent. Avoid.
Name: Mr Daniel L Geraci
Product Description: Size Name: 36 TILES (144 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review: Extremely poor quality. Many of the tiles don‚Äôt fit together well (previous ones I‚Äôve purchased fit together tight and snuggly). Some of the tiles have marks on them which look like they are wet, but they aren‚Äôt and it‚Äôs a permanent mark. The tiles dent and pull apart easily, even from leaving something light on top briefly. The edging doesn‚Äôt fit and you need to cut to size. The pattern on some of the tiles are also wonky, so it doesn‚Äôt look great when all connected. I was also sent the wrong colour with a return or replacement refused. Terrible quality and won‚Äôt last long. I would find an alternative.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Jason Pratt
Product Description: Size Name: 48 TILES (192 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: I don't get it. I saw so many reviews on how hard it was too put down, that they didn't fit together well and how it lifts etc etc. Look!! It's simply down to what surface you lay it on. I had a new concrete flat base layed first so that I could use these foam tiles. First they arrived for days early so I was well happy. And it took me only half a day of careful laying and cutting in for corners. I have used it since and it doesn't move around our lift. They are perfect.Maybe if you don't cover a room wall to wall you may have issues with it moving that I can understand. But for me. No issues. So glad I got them.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: colin a groome
Product Description: Size Name: 48 TILES (192 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: The order was delivered on time, easy to lay and looks great. I bought them to finish off my indoor gym area. I purchased sufficient for 192 sq feet and the amount I bought fits the area perfectly. I use the area for weight training and cardio which involves a considerable movement in differing directions on the mats at various speeds. For this, the matted area is comfortable and there is no movement. I haven‚Äôt rated the durability of the product for obvious reasons, but I‚Äôm sure they will last  the pace. I haven‚Äôt needed to use the sticky pads which come  with each set as the mats sit securely on the base wood floor. So far, a great product.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Easy to assemble for home gym.
Name: Miss Ali
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I have bought 12 of these blocks to cover the floor for use of the home gym and it was very easy to assemble and in future I can use it for my kids or move it to the shed when I place gym there it's very versatile. It's also fairly thick material and absorbs a bit of noise as when I'm dropping weights. I would say this is very cheap product but at the same time highly qualitative.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: bernie r
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Wanted to convert part of my dining room into a home gym. These stop the floor getting damaged. They supply stickers to fit the tiles to the floor but I don‚Äôt want to have to deal with the sticky bits when it take them up. So I put up with a certain amount of movement. Overall very happy with the end result. Easy to fit together but not sure they will last for years.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Miss Hannah F Peace
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Arrived quickly and easy to put together. I bought double sided carpet tape to stick mine to the flooring which has helped keep them in place so far. Good thickness and seems fairly sturdy. They have shown signs of denting where my weights are left but so far seems to bounce back fairly well. My only gripe would be they aren't grippy as i was hoping. I do a lot of HIIT workouts, so burpees, mountain climbers, planks etc and my shoes just don't grip AT ALL so i still have to use a workout mat on top so my feet don't just slide away. Disappointing from that perspective but otherwise do the job. If you do lots of those kind of movements may not be the right choice.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Use it for skipping rope on carpet
Name: Karsel
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Easy to assemble, takes a couple of minutes to put together. I use it on the carpet to jump rope. I bought it for two purposes, one is to reduce the impact on the wood below the carpet and second is to provide a flat surface as my carpet has a lot of threads. I dont hear the wood breaking sound anymore. It can be a bit slippery but doesn't move much on the carpet. Material is OK, not great but does the job. Just need to wait and see its durability in long run.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review:
We ordered 5 packs - what they don‚Äôt tell you is that the pattern on the mats does not in any way match up! Therefore looks a mess! We opened all the pack to try and piece them together thinking that they were in a batch‚Ä¶. But no!!!

As we opened them, we couldn‚Äôt return them so have ended up putting them down as underlay and are having to buy different ones‚Ä¶. Without a pattern this time!! Can‚Äôt believe no other review have noted this!

Wouldn‚Äôt recommend! Total waste of money!!

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Lilian
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Orange
Review: The tiles are too thin and they separate and fold over with the smallest of movements. Refund was requested but you have to pay for postage and it costs more than half the price of the mats. Talk about a regretful purchase.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: The Turnip Queen
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I am using these on the kitchen floor of our flat because the floor gets icy cold in the winter. These instantly warm it up and help insulate the floor too. A good cheap solution. Also great for my toddler as when they fall, it's a softer landing! Only gripe is that there is not enough edge options. They only work if you lay them out in a square or rectangular way.  Pretty sure I can cut these down and get them to perfectly fit my kitchen. Wish they came in a thinner size so i could use them in my bathroom. Be warned though: if they get wet and are not dried underneath, you have a chance for the whole tile to slip.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Eugene H
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: With these simple jigsaw-like tiles I converted my extremely rough and uneven floor of the garage in to reasonably soft and warm work out place. It is soft enough to feel comfortable when you lay down on the floor and do any kind of exercises, but you are not sinking when you walk or doing push-ups on it, so it is perfect balance. Obviously on the rough terrain like I have you cannot get perfect match between tiles, but it is really good in places where the floor is even. As you can see on the pictures, I got two different colours, they are of the same shape so you can easily mix and match. I started with yellow for the workout area, then bought some more for the walk-through area and most likely will buy more to protect bottom of Intex pool and make it cleaner around so no dirt and grass go inside.To summarize, it is great versatile product which can be used in many different areas.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Rob 123
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: This is my first product review but credit where credit is due it deserves one. I must admit that I wasn‚Äôt expecting great things because of the 1cm thickness and the fair price but I am very impressed. I ordered 10 which came in a pack of 6 and 4 to in the same delivery packaging. I spent sometime trying to match the pattern which isn‚Äôt exact but came to realise that they are probably different batches which like wallpaper and carpet can play a factor. They do fit together perfectly and are easy to pull apart. After I got over my OCD and accepted why I had purchased them I started to look more at the quality and durability which is fantastic. I did an over night test and put 10kg 15kg 30kg of Olympic plates and 18kg of HEX Dumbbells  on each mat to see if they dented. The plates never left an imprint but the dumbbells did, probably due to the shape. I was amazed that after a few hours the mat had sprung back which I was very surprised to see. Definitely worth the money, and I would highly recommend this product.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: I got two sets and I am not disappointed
Name: John Birtchet-Sharpe
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: (review for the black mats )Setting up a home gym in the garage , and these suited the task well , I cant add anything for Durability as I just installed them this week, would have to revisit in a year . but so far I am Happy with the product... one word of warning .. when training (or kids playing) on them where no shoes or plimp soles  .. running shoes do not have alot of traction on the surface of these mats.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review: Not square resulting in gaps of 10mm+ in some areas when only filling a 12x12 area, to make things worse the black comes with a smooth finish where as the blue comes with a much rougher finish resulting in gorilla tape sticking to the black but not the blue, so cant even hide the massive gaps, not worth the hassle, i shouldve just waited and got something better

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Useful in pandemic,l but not the best for grappling
Name: Brendan
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Not the best for Brazilian jiu-jitsu or grappling. I bought these for some rolling training and although I can train pretty alright on these I have to tape them together otherwise they come apart. They are so thin as well that you have to go from knees there is no way you could go from standing and perform throws or anything like that. For pandemic use they do the job hence the decent score.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: hannah
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: Im pleased with these, they make a very hard floor much softer for baby tumbles. They also keep the room much warmer! They clean well and don't slip around so ive not needed to use the sticky pads. I need to order more to fill the full room.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Reasonable quality. Wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs great but then not awful either
Name: Faz R.
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review:
It‚Äôs an OK product but there are a number of design flaws in my opinion.

The pattern doesn‚Äôt match up to the tiles so you see where the tiles are joining up.

Some tiles don‚Äôt join up correctly so there are some uneven bits where the tiles join.

Finally make sure you don‚Äôt go off the sellers description to order what you need.

I had to order 2 additional packs as the maths just didn‚Äôt add up for the room.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Not fit for purpose, invest in more suitable material
Name: Mr Michael A Stirzaker
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review:
These are a pretty low quality product.

They are easy to put together, but the quality of the tiles is poor and if you try to lay more than 4 in a square you'll soon find that they are quite the correct shape and will creep apart. This wouldn't be bad if the foam was a better quality, so the 'teeth' don't hold the tiles together.

The far too soft material also means you can't put any lateral pressure on the flooring without it bending and lifting.

I'll be replacing it with something more suitable soon (only had it down a couple of months).

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Very easy to fit and very hard wearing. Great tiles.
Name: M. Smith
Product Description: Size Name: 16 TILES (64 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review:
So easy to fit together and very hard wearing.
We got these to make a stream/river in the garden for the kids in summer.
The tiles have very good weather resistance and we still have a river in our garden.
The blue colour we got is very vivid and has not discoloured out in the sun.
If you have tricky areas to fit these they are very easy to cut and shape with quality scissors or Stanley knife if you are careful.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Jason K
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: I ordered these exercise mats, to be able to workout outside, they are great value for money, clip together really quickly and easy to clean.They're very comfortable and excellent for all types of workouts, they also seem very durable  time will tell.I ordered 6 mats, these can accommodate me lying down and turning and I'm 6ft tall.They arrived earlier than expected, in great condition and I'd definitely recommend and order again.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Ron Little
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: As you can see by the photos quite dented from just a 17kg weight placed overnight. I've had to put other matting underneath. They're a bit thin and not ideal for heavy weights. OK as yoga mats. They've been ever cleaned or finished with something similar to furniturw polish also. They're very slippy underfoot and it carries across  onto other flooring making that slippy too.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Emma Bainbridge
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I ordered a set of 4 initially even though I knew I needed more. They easily fitted together. I put them in a square & it‚Äôs big enough to go under my cross trainer. I‚Äôve already ordered another set of 4 to put under my weight bench. They are cushioned sufficiently without being too thick so that you‚Äôll be tripping over the edges. Good product at a reasonable price.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Craig
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: I‚Äôve used this for my home gym and are good for overlaying over carpet to protect it. Sweat is easily cleaned up from them and doesn‚Äôt become slippy like I‚Äôve seen other comments saying. I will say if you‚Äôre doing a lot of moving on then then they do come apart fairly easily

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Steven
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Although in other reviews I do notice some people say the mat does move around before buying, I thought I give it a try anyway but in my own experience I find the mat once assembled do detach and does not fit well together especially the side. I use it with my boxing training so I do move around a lot so the mat do detach after a few movements. I got 8 mat so only a small area .

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: debra case
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Disappointed really as the description is a bit deceptive.  Says 16 square feet wich I stupidly assumed was massive but it turns out its not even 2meter squared so I could of bought cheaper elsewhere.. so annoyed with myself , quite expensive for what you actually get unfortunately

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Good basic padding but not suitable for any weight
Name: Osevon
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: These looked OK on spec, but in reality they cannot handle any weight at all otherwise they compressNot saying they aren't OK for a basic mat, but I have 3 layers under 67kg on a bar and they compressed to nothing in minutesThe 22kg bar has also compressed a single layer.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Alister
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: We bought these as an insulation for our hottub against the cold British patio it would be sat on.  Three packs (four tiles in each) have provided three layers of matting for our small four person CosySpa inflatable hot tub, and it means when in the tub, the floor isn't hard - as for the purpose, it's hard to measure properly, but it is not apparent that heat is being lost through the flooring, so I'd say they do the job.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Matt K
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review:
These are the second set I have purchased to expand an exercise area. They provide great cushioning and are easy to assemble/link.

The additional edging pieces give a neat finish (though you may need to adjust some of the edges to fit an irregular floor space with a stanley knife) and two-sided adhesives are provided to fix the mats to the floor if required.

At the beginning of lockdown, the price went up too much for the product IMHO. Since then, the price has lowered down closer to pre-Covid and are well worth considering.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Michael
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: The flooring is absolutely fantastic and has actually helped me want to train turning my garage into a more inviting area.  I have left weights on the floor over night which left marks the next day but disappeared of the hours later.  The seller was really helpful too when I had a query regarding fitting to awkward room layout

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 24 TILES (96 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: Exactly what I was looking for! Created a small gym in my garage and these tiles are the basis for a treadmill, spin bike and weights. Soft underfoot yet far sturdier than I anticipated. Really pleased with the colour too having opted for grey as opposed to black which was my original plan. So easy to put together and joins are fine. Didn‚Äôt use the sticky fixings provided in the end as no need to.  Hopefully will deaden some of the noise from the treadmill! Can‚Äôt comment on durability but don‚Äôt foresee it being a problem from what I‚Äôve seen so far.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Good for a basic gym or play area
Name: Martin W
Product Description: Size Name: 36 TILES (144 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: Good forna basic gym but for me not really durable enough for my gym/garage.My son lubed his bicycle and it dripped on the tiles and marked them with and oily mark.I stuck the nose of the car in to do some maintenance and it compressed the tile and permanently deformed it.That said feels good under foot, warmed the room up and feels good to work out on.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Suzi q
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Ordered to put under my gym equipment they are ok but I was disappointed one was damaged and I was surprised on the size they didn‚Äôt cover much but that was my fault for not measuring first and perhaps I should get a better quality

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Not so snug a fit after 10 uses
Name: M. Russell
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: Quick delivery, I like the colour and the comfort / support they offer. However, the snug fit experienced within the first week soon deteriorated. Now, two months later, the jigsaw just isnt such a great jigsaw anymore. Pieces lift and move , so I have to keep adjusting them during a workout. 10 times within a 20 minute workout, on average. I think I need something more expensive and durable.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: J. Thompson
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Great size product, fitted really easily, delivered fast. The one thing with them is they mark easily from 'heavy' items being placed on them. I had a mop bucket with water in giving them a clean at it's left the bucket 'ring' in the foam. However, they look great and would recommend. If getting for a home gym I might think about going for a 20mm mat instead.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Terrible tiles. They do not stay attached to each other. Tried to use them for a workout and they separated causing me to fall. They are advertised for a variety of uses but if you want to exercise on them then I wouldn‚Äôt bother with them. Wanted to post back to return but not bothered as I have to pay postage for a large package.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Wj
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Hi the mats are all what we was looking for to put under kids pool they are comfortable easy to assembled and put away with there jigsaw style interlocking placements my 4yr old can do it.I would highly recommend if this is what you're looking for

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Hajni
Product Description: Size Name: 16 TILES (64 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: So I have waited quite a bit of time to post this review but I wanted to see how durable the foam mat is mostly in an outdoor setting. For me biggest surprise the mats are still in a great condition despite I‚Äôve been using them in the mud practically. Very easy to assemble them and to clean them as well. I am so happy I‚Äôve bought them. Couldn‚Äôt do my sessions without them! :)

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Daniela Serrano
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I'm happy with them. They are very comfortable and I feel my knees more safe now that I use them than before. What I don't like it's more than once I almost drop meanwhile I was doing cardio because the adhesives don't keep the tiles stick on the floor and these one suddenly moves. I guess I'll have to buy more adhesives to keep myself safe. Apart from that, I can say they are good.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Trevor Pharaoh
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Fitted together easily and protects the floor under my weights and work bench. Time will tell how long it will last but happy at present. Does cause your feet to become slippy after standing on the mat with bare feet or when wearing socks, more prevalent on laminate floors.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Nicole
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: We put this flooring down in our garage and whilst it is soft and cushioned to walk on, it has easily started to bump in places and become detached from the other pieces. We need to replace it already and only been down 1 year.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Cookie
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: Bought these mats to put under an Intext pop up pool.  They arrived on the date expected and were easy to assemble. So far they have been an excellent base for the pool, creating a softer base for the swimmers as well as some protection for the pool.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 48 TILES (192 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: The foam mats are a perfect, easy solution for gym flooring. I have small studio and used these mats to cover the entire floor. Really easy to lay out and my room isn't a perfect rectangle and they are very easy to cut to size. They offer a comfortable service to lie on but also firm enough for resistance exercise. I have also been very kindly sent additional sticky tabs to secure the flooring as I have recently added a rowing machine to my studio and stupidly got rid of the ones that came with the original order. They did this for me free of charge and sent immediately. I had a nice chat with the sales person (who's name sadly I didn't take not of). In a time when social distancing is in place and limited contact with the outside world friendly customer service and a kind gesture is greatly appreciated!

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Kalin B.
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: So the level of protection is not too bad if you are really careful while placing your dumbbells, weights or whatever stuff you are using down on the floor. My advice is to wash all these before assembling as there was something slippery on it, which unfortunately I picked on my sox and spread in the corridor as well as in the rest in the rooms. It took a week of washing the floors to get rid of it completely.I should have gone for a proper rubber mats.Too late now apparently

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Mike Pinder
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I will start on a positive note, fantastic service. Received within one day of order absolutely amazing. Now onto the not so good. These tiles are rubbish absolutely no durability at all.first day using my weights and my dumbbell went thru the mat.they look good but give it a couple of months and they will be in bits. Now onto my biggest issue. I contacted the supplier to ask why I have paid double the price as I never realised there was a bar that I could buy in bulk I needed 24 so ordered 4x6 tiles which plus vat was over ¬£119 if I was to buy them in bulk it would of been ¬£56 . Still never received an email back or any kind of refund. Please avoid

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: hannah brown
Product Description: Size Name: 12 TILES (48 Square Feet)Colour Name: Beige
Review: Sturdier than I expected. I've put this down in a section of my garage that I'm using as a gym... My first concern was that the parts would separate when doing cardio which hadn't happened, and also it has not been dented by throeing an Olympic bar around on it. Don't get me wrong, I'm sure it won't last forever being used as heavily as it is but I'm pleasantly surprised.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Not for any form of gym exercises
Name: Brian M
Product Description: Size Name: 8 TILES (32 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Works fine if it's used as a base for an exercise bike but used as a mat for hiit workout then it simply breaks away.Used as a base for a home gym and my dumbells have already ripped it. Very expensive for just a bit of foam, better to get proper rubber instead.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Kealey
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I made a mistake by thinking 4 pieces would be enough for a hot tub, so I had to purchase another 6. Costing around ¬£50 for a small area to be covered - abit pricey for what they are. The second lot of mats were darker in colour also. But overall they are good foam mats.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Fab Mats, and even better Company you won't be disappointed
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: We ordered 1 set of mats & then another 2, they have transformed our home garage to a gym, the navy mats against a grey floor look fab. Heavy duty and great quality.After ordering 3 & laying down the mats we wanted more, sadly no stock in navy blue, after I contacted MOHAJER LTD, Alistair & Rich got in touch, found 2 extra packets in the warehouse, and made up a packet of new singles, & sent them out to us the same day after a paypal payment, Where do you get service like that these days. Can't wait to lay down the extra mats, what Fab team, delivering a 1st class service to their customers during unprecedented times. Thanks guys

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Luke Living
Product Description: Size Name: 10 TILES (40 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: I put 12 of these down in my kitchen to save my knees and my floor from all of the lockdown exercise. They fit together very well, and offer great support when jumping and landing. The limitations come into play if you're doing things like GRIT/HIIT or any high impact, high octane classes. They can come apart if your foot lands in the wrong place. I am going to try gorilla tape like someone else has suggested

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Set up for Turbo Trainer in Garage
Name: MK Andrew
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: I used this to set up a turbos trainer in my garage for winter training.  I bought this as it covered more area and was far cheaper than some specialised training mats for cycling.  It has done the job for me and helps absorb some of the vibrations / noise from my on wheel trainer.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Marisa Rose
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Disappointed with the mats read the reviews before buying which were goodThey were easy to put together but when using they kept coming apart from each other plus they kept slipping on my wooden floor so tried then on my mat and they still slipped and came apart very annoying when your trying to exercise

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: samantha83
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Orange
Review: Perfect for our cross trainer to protect the laminate flooring. Does he job I brought them for. Nice thickness as described. I like the extra touch of the straight sides to hide the ‚Äòjigsaw‚Äô teeth. Would have been good if here was consistency in price regarding colour. Orange were significantly cheaper but wouldn‚Äôt have been my first choice of colour. However as they are functional I let the colour slide.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: ritchiec
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Product is good for comfort, just the right amount of give. Easy to assemble & take apart for storage.My only complaint is the finish on the surface. Despite the ridges on it, the surface is very smooth & slippery. When doing ab exercises for example, I find myself sliding all around the mat rather than being in one place.Overall though it‚Äôs good value for the price

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: They are not for heavy use.
Name: BlacKShadoW
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: The product is exactly as in the good quality description, the pieces blend perfectly and look very good.Everyone should know that they are not made for heavy use, in this case to drop weights on them, or to leave heavy weights on them.As can be seen from the pictures posted by me, visible traces remain, which after a few days I noticed that they disappear almost completely if the object that left traces is removed.My final conclusion is that for the money you pay it is worth it, taking into account that if you were to buy something of intense use that those in the gyms would have to pay triple if not even more for the same area.I will definitely order again in the future.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Good but keeps unlocking from each other
Name: Alexander Neretin
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: They always unlock so to keep them together had to use duck tape on the bottom side to fix those is place. After that works perfect but you obviously can‚Äôt unlock them to store . Too thin so if you want them to keep in place buy 3 times thicker.Overall product Is sturdy, no complaints.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: joanne wright
Product Description: Size Name: 20 TILES (80 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black

Title of Review: Perfect well priced flooring for your gym needs
Name: P W Evans
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Blue
Review:
These were spot on for what I needed.

I wanted an area I could do my core work outs and some yoga.

They fitted directly onto my concrete garage floor and they made it feel incredibly soft.

They fitted together perfectly and it took me about 15 minutes to do the area you can see in the picture.

I have just ordered 6 more to finish off and I will order a other 20 for when I do my little girls play area.

Delivery was also prompt and they were packaged as expected.

Overall if I could give these 6 stars I would.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: Ken
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: I got these to replace some existing interlocking mats I had.  I had been using them so much I decided I would try to replace them with some premium mats that would not slide around as much as I am exercising.  These seemed to be the best I could find but they are thinner and less durable than my old ones and they slide around more.All in all quite disappointed, they are going in the bin as I will go back to using my old ones.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: charlie

Review: Used for placing under a paddling pool

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: Fantastic mats for my home gym at an Affordable price. Great below my treadmill
Name: Alex MacKenzie
Product Description: Size Name: 6 TILES (24 Square Feet)Colour Name: Navy
Review: I spent a lot of time looking for the right mats for my home gym. With the lockdown, a lot of these products were low or out of stock. I'm using this to do floor exercises, free weights and to put below my treadmill. The noise and vibrations from my treadmill are completely go, it's fantastic. I thought I would need a treadmill specific mat for that but this does the job superbly. The treadmill will leave a mark in the mat of course but I'm not moving it so that is fine. So far the weights (up to 20KG) haven't left any "dents". It's provided with 3M double sided sticky pads but I've put this on concrete in my garage so didn't need them. I have 16 tiles and they interlock well into each other and haven't moved at all so far. I also love the fact they came with borders included unlike many competitors where you need to buy this separately. This is perfect for my home gym but would work great for a kids play area too. It's really to sit or kneel on.  Finally, I had to contact the seller for questions and a specific request and the service was class. Highly recommended product and seller.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Name: ANGELA BARKER
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Black
Review: Purchased these mats to use under gym equipment in my newly built garage. A little thinner than I had expected, but perfect for what I needed them for. Still not quite decided how I want to position everything, so have slotted together and then unslotted a couple of times with absolutely no adverse affect on the mats. Would definitely recommend. My only regret is that I bought all black, I now wish I‚Äôd mixed and matched two or more colours to make the floor a bit more fun.

Product: ComFy Mat Foam Exercise Mats, Gym Flooring Mat, Interlocking Puzzle EVA Floor Tiles, Non slip Rubber Cushion For Home Workout, Yoga matting, Bonus Adhesives,24"X24"(60cmX60cm)
Title of Review: would have loved to give it a five however
Name: Amazon Customer
Product Description: Size Name: 4 TILES (16 Square Feet)Colour Name: Grey
Review: I'm happy with the size, I can use it bare foot or in trainers and I only need to wipe i down with a basic cleaning wipe without any damage which is perfect which is perfect and easy to move out of the way when I need to turn the living room back into...a lounge. However putting the ends on it was difficult to make all the ends fit without leaving loss edges and theirs not enough Velcro stickers to seal those down. on top of that the ones I got I found out very quickly that their is no option for too many or not enough, theirs not, just right. I measured out the space and ended up with one short and have to by four more. It's a perfect by but it would have been nice to have a custom number order order made to measure rather than a set number.

For that this is perfect and tick the box. They are easy to assemble and they are a good size, they came well packed and quickly.It‚Äôll leave marks on then with time which does not bother me.  Now people looking for a more serious solution, ie proper home gym keep in mind this does lot look like a permanent solution, equipment  will leave marks... in any foam title, if you are bothered by that then maybe you would like to find a product more similar to the gym, usually they are rubber.I‚Äôm happy with the purchase, though it could have been cheaper thinking that they are only 4 squares so it‚Äôs quite a small surface you‚Äôll cover.

Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Name: Richard Kelly
Review:
I've mounted my Cross Trainer on top of this mat. It fits fine and has helped to equal out the very slight wobble that that trainer has developed on the laminated wood flooring.

It's thick, roughly the size of 2 normal sized yoga mats laid side by side and is pretty thick. No problems so far, the initial unpleasant smell that the mat gave off dissipated quite quickly.

I'll update if I notice any problems with the mat.

Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Name: FamilyLife
Review:
This is a great thick fitness mat, Me and my wife do weights and exercises at home and always suffer with our wooden flooring being hard.

Its perfect for those exercises such as sit up were I need to lay down and often found the flooring hurt my lower back. Another great thing about using a mat is preventing damage to your own floor.

I did not slip when using this thanks to the double sided slip free design.

Overall I am very happy with this.

Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Title of Review: HIIT and Yoga cannot fault it
Name: Mrs. A. Wright
Review: I absolutely love this mat. It is quite heavy and though it could be carried to lass its size and wight make me feel its just  little big and heave to take so I will definitely use for home exercise and of course on line classes. It is big enough to take 2 if needed but  I only occasionally work with and one so usually have it all to my self. It is quite thick and I find it comfortable to lie on. It is roomy enough to take my full body and when doing exercises such as mountain climbers it does not slip or  moves at all I have  used it for a HIIT class and some separate Yoga exercises and I cannot fault it

Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Title of Review: Good exercise mat, but quite pricey
Name: S. P. Long
Review:
This is a padded mat designed for exercise - you can put it under weights and the like to prevent damage to the floor, or underneath a cycling trainer to deaden noise.

It's quite large - 6' x 4' - so a lot bigger than most cycling trainer mats. The quality of the mat looks good - it's decently thick and still nice and flexible. It is packaged really well - it includes three reusable velcro straps to secure it and a drawstring bag for storage. It even includes a skipping rope!

It's quite pricey for what you get, but the quality looks good, so it's not particularly overpriced.

Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Name: ReviewTime...
Review: This large exercise mat is really good quality made for a long time use. Is 7mm thick with shock absorbent provides your palms, knees, wrists, ankles with better cushion and comfortable landing, preventing exercise injury. The non-slip top provides high durability and cushion, creates the perfect combination of heavy-duty toughness, comfort, and stability. This fitness mat has an excellent performance in tear and impact protection. Works great on most floor surfaces. You won't need to worry about disturbing the rest of the neighbors, you can exercise at any time without restriction because this mat very good reduces noise and vibration. Worth to spend at this moment 98.89 price for sure.Highly recommend!
