Product: Large Exercise Mat Fitness Mat for Home Gym Thick 183x123x0.7cm innhom Workout Mat for Fitness, Floor Exercises, HIIT, Cardio, Gym Work, Equipment Heavy Duty Rubber Flooring for Gym
Title of Review: Tough, non slip and big enough for tall person
Name: Benson
Review: Video Player is loading.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Definitely worth the money , but issue with the arrival
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
The product itself is very well made , very strong and sturdy , and relatively easy to assemble I will say however the logic in how each part is assembled separately then joined altogether isn‚Äôt necessarily the best way how they‚Äôve ordered it in the manual , the performance and durability of the product is very good and have no doubt it would be very easy to dissemble and reassemble for moving house or whatever the purpose and the bolts and other finer parts would hold up easily

However the way it was package was not very clever, unnecessary amounts of cello tape plastered everywhere for no reason and the zip ties holding the same parts together were done up too tight that trying to cut with scissors or a knife actually proved to be pretty difficult and the easiest way to undo the zip ties was to force the parts in opposite directions

Also after ordering the product I was not given an estimated time of arrival or any indication that my product was on the way nor was I able to cancel the order manually how you usually would, it wasn‚Äôt until I rung up to investigate the situation further that a customer support representative who was very helpful managed to get the product shipped out to me within 48 hours of me contacting Amazon directly and is the reason for my 5star review

Overall I would definitely recommend the product as it is very good quality and worth the extra money in comparison to other similar products based off the reviews I‚Äôve seen, the assembly and performance is also brilliant and doesn‚Äôt require you to be a genius to assemble, and the support service was excellent , the only thing I would make anyone aware of who is considering purchasing is the arrival of the delivery as there is no clear indication of when it will arrive

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: kurt
Review: Got really out of shape this past year,bought this not to body build really (don't get me wrong who doesn't wanna look better) but more for my mental health.Been eating way more protein and trying to do a few dips,push ups and pulls up 4 days a week and its been helping alot,price was spot on,im rubbish at assembling things but had no issues with this,it's very sturdy takes my weight no problem at all,i have hard wood floors and was worried about it scratching them but it has rubber feet so it's fine.If your like me and struggle with depression,get this,you can do it,set realistic goals,even if it's only to use it once or twice a week,commit a block of time to work out and do your best to stick to it,also try drink alot more water and get some decent vitamins,i recommend fish oil, d3,c,zinc.Thanks again.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: duggs
Review: Does the job well!Good sturdy item, went together fairly easily.At first I found the arm pads too far apart and struggled to hold myself up enough on them to leg raise. Persevere though as you get stronger shoulders this is no longer a problem! I would recommend this item.I have been using it for 3 weeks every other day and can really see the difference.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Great power tower at a great price
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The power tower was exactly what I was looking for. I'm 6'2" and there is a taller setting available. I don't have any more height in the garage though. The right hand press up grip started to creak and visibly move after a week or so use. I contacted sports royals and they sent out the replacement part promptly and free of charge. It's working properly now.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Best packaging and assembly experience ever!
Name: Vec
Review: I don‚Äôt tend to write reviews, but the packaging and assembly on this product was the best ever. Often metal parts can bash each other and chip paint. These were so securely individually wrapped there was no risk. Also I often find screws and washers can get lost as the boxes or bags they come in can be ripped. Not the case here! The small parts were in an almost indestructible plastic blister pack. It took quite a while to cut open but it was clear everything was in place and complete.Having assembled many flat packs of workshop tools, gym equipment and wardrobes this was by far the best experience and highest quality experience ever. Many household names could learn a lot from this brand.Next time I buy gym equipment I will check for SportsRoyals first. Cannot praise it highly enough.Product is strong and sturdy even for a heavier chap. Also height adjustable. Great product!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Lord Lucan
Review: I don‚Äôt normally write reviews but due to purchasing this power tower feel it needs to be mentioned. Firstly I did plenty of research on other products available....after reading reviews I looked at what the negatives were....mainly that the product displayed was not the same frame size as seen on the photos.....this one had no reviews when I first looked at it but I did read the small print & it stated that the frame was 5.5cm Thick which being 228lb felt I needed a strong tower to take my weight.....I took the plunge & purchased it as it was sold by amazon & they are very good with customer service if anything was to be misold......it came within 2 days & I also noticed that it did in fact have reviews which appeared after I made the purchase to which most were positive.....some said that the only problem was when putting it together the instructions were not very clear as to where the screws went or where to put the washers.....I am no genius & managed to erect this on my own within an hour....to make it simple I removed the nuts/bolts/washers/handles & tools from the sealed packaging exactly as they were in the packaging.....the instructions give a size & description of what one goes where which made it so much easier just needs done concentration.....had no problems except one screw was threaded so just simple cut the end off & it was fine...now for the most important bit...the tower is extremely strong & robust almost as good as a gym product....it takes my weight comfortable & fits perfect in my garage.....I am getting no rewards for this review just felt that for such a good product it deserved the time to write this so as someone else can be happy with purchasing the correct power tower & not get fooled into buying one that states a different product delivered to the one advertised.....if you really want a good product then I would highly recommend this one

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Esen
Review: I ordered this item and don‚Äôt do the same mistake that I‚Äôve done.. the right hand bar fits only on the right stand and left on the left stand... before you think it‚Äôs made wrongly double check! üòÇ

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Stefan Kourdov
Review:
I bought this station about a year ago. It was that COVID time, when coming up with a gym alternative was a priority. So I went through the anxiety of reading the reviews on all power towers. Finally chose this one because I liked the price:ratings ratio.

After 12 months of using it, I can verify that this is a wonderful product! I do weighted dips and chin ups, and the tower is nice and stable no matter how hard I push it (seriously - I have loaded it with a combined weight of 140 kg, and it takes it like a champ). I would not try muscle ups on it, but I have done front and back levers, and it holds perfectly. I have used it with a pulley system as well, and it does the job (the weights on the pulley sometimes swing towards the base, but I could not call that a design flaw of the tower itself). I have not even had to tighten the bolts thus far.

The only two ‚Äúproblems‚Äù for me are:
1. The width of the bar - the supports are exactly where my hands should be when doing pull ups. Going outside of them is a bit too wide for me, going inside is a bit too narrow. As a result, I have focused on the chin ups (and made a good progress on those) for which it is perfect. This is probably specific to my anatomy, but I should mention it.
2. There is no way to use Olympic rings on it. I have tried many options, and I have been unable to find any that would feel comfortable. Obviously it was not designed for rings, so this should not bother most people, but just a heads up to other ring lovers out there.

In summary, I would buy this five times over again! It has not only helped me stay strong during lockdown, but has also helped me add a good amount of weight to my chin ups and dips. Hope you enjoy it as much as I have!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Sturdy, small footprint ergonomically adjustable station
Name: Annonymous
Review: Bought this based on Amazon reviews. Use it in my garb where ceiling is about 3.5m high so I can have the pull up bar on the highest setting. It is sturdy yet light enough to move about in the garage. Allows you to achieve great form on pull ups as bars either side and ahead restrict sway. Ab work outs are very ergonomic and comfortable with tailored back adjustment and tilted arm pads securing you into the position. This tilt does make the dip station quite wide but you just do wide dips and get good at them. Press bars a real bonus and the foot print of this station is easily within 1m2 so one of the smaller foot prints on Amazon but still sturdy.massembly was really easy but definitely hand tighten everything first. My dip bars needed some serious wrenching to get tight and prevent wobble but it's do able. My wife and kids also use this station thanks to its adjustability. Overall good value for money and excellent aftersales care too.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jay72
Review: I did a bit of research and decided to buy this pull up station. Its very well built and designed well. It's easily put together by one person. Instructions are good and all the tools for constructing it are supplied.It's a solid peace of equipment.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Gawain
Review:
I bought this back in January (after the December 2020 purchase must have gotten lost or something), as a late Christmas present for my girlfriend. She asked for something like this by the way; I wasn't hinting at anything!

Anyway, while it's mostly been collecting dust, it has had some use from the both of us. Me being 6 foot 2 and 90kg, and her being smaller and lighter. It easily supports each of us, it's incredibly sturdy, and it was simple enough for me to put together on my own (that means it's super simple!).

We've just moved it into a more spacious room so it "may" get more regular use soon, but it's certainly a solid structure and well worth the price; even more so for those who would make good use of it!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Risky
Review: I bought this because it took the heaviest weight load of 400lbs body weight. I'm not 400lbs but the extra capacity is necessary just in case you want to test yourself with one handed chin ups. The bar mustn't bend and the framework is strong enough. The length you can extend the station proved enough for a full range.One caveat, the instruction manual needs to be updated, according to the instructions I had two incorrect bolts that were too short for the arm rests. When I assembled it regardless of instructions it was right length for the bottom part of the screw holes. Apart from that it was a smooth 45 minutes to assemble.I docked value for money because it was ¬£15 less for 1 week after purchase. Sour grapes from me.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Elle T
Review: One of the bolts was missing when opened the package. Problem was sorted and seller was massivly supportiveand gave best cooperation. The best buy of the year - thats for sure !! There are no days when my son is not using it.Absolutely love it !!!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jay C
Review: Received today and o server straight away that two of the MT10*55 nuts are missing.  As you can see in the photo these parts arrive in a pre-sealed plastic casing, so I‚Äôve definitely not lost/ misplaced them. Disappointing, it means I cannot immediately secure one of the arm dip handles.Edit: changing to 4 stars. The instruction manual that I received was in fact for a previous design version of this same product. So in fact the parts received correct, the instructions were not. I never heard back from the manufacturer though, had to work this out myself. Product appears to be sturdy in its 1st week of use.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Stable, smart tower for home gym
Name: Jackal
Review: Used my own tools to assemble and to make sure I got the dip handles tight (another review showed them wobbling a lot but I managed to get mine tight). Little bit of movement when in use but the base is very stable and it is plenty solid for me (11 stone). Really like the dips, press up handles and knee raises. Pull ups are decent too (although I need to up my game there) - you can adjust the bar height which is great if like me you aren't tall. My grips slip a little on the pull up bar but that's minor and easy fixed. It also looks pretty smart. All in all I would recommend this for a home setup.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: You get what you pay for...
Name: Demiro
Review: Not good not bad, I guess you get what you pay for. Not really stable nor robust, also a bit to wide for me doing pull ups. Anyway, it kinda does is job.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: easily assembled, sturdy, and well designed
Name: William Moffatt
Review: as advertised, this is a solid peice of equipment, well made, easy to assemble, and looks good.There's a youtube video showing you how to assemble it, but that's unnecessary because the printed instructions are excellent and it's simple anyway - the only possible area of confusion is well described and the parts are labelled appropriately anyway (the arm rests tilt slightly inwards, to give your forarms a better position, so the left and right sides are mirrored rather than identical)

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: AaG
Review: Be aware when you check the contents that the instructions list 4x M10 55 nuts and bolts for the arm support. However the design has been changed so that you now only need 2 nuts for these bolts. Just haven‚Äôt changed the instruction manual to reflect this.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Justin smith
Review:
To be totally honest I bought this off the back of great feedback from other customers and also the fact covid stopped me from going up the gym, but was still very sceptical about how sturdy it would be.

After arrival it was very easy to assemble, even the worst diy dads in the land can assemble this. As long as you have half a brain, just follow the instructions (which are very clear) you can't go wrong.

I use it for pull ups and dips and I can honestly say it does not creak or move atall when doing so. It is by no means as good as gym grade equipment (which would be at least another 300 to 400 pounds) but it serves a purpose through times like these when you can't go up the gym. Don't let covid stop them gains!

Great value for what it is.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Mark
Review:
Looks nice in photos, but I can't tell in reality because it didn't come with the necessary M10-55 bolts & nuts.

Annoyingly, Amazon have also fudged something with the 'contact seller' option in your orders which conventionally allowed you to contact the seller with no fuss. It doesn't exist anymore. You can only leave 'feedback'.

Irritated with it all at the moment.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Bristol Bill
Review: Arrived a week or so after order.  Easy to put together (tip: the spanner supplied works fine - but it's much easier and quicker to use a socket set and ratchet, if you have one; you'll also get the bolts much tighter).  It's surprisingly light, but quite sturdy.  Instructions and YouTube videos were very clear.  There's now a newer YouTube instruction video than the one linked to in the instruction document.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Valdas B
Review: Number 17 missing parts of the screw.How I am supposed to assamble it with main parts missing?

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Took a punt on this, but very happy! I was scared it might not fit in my shed, but it fits in great and actually goes lower than stated for storage. It‚Äôs sturdy and fairly easy to setup. My tip is to not tighten the screws too much until it‚Äôs all in place. I‚Äôm very pleased with it üëç

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Dumitrita
Review: Isn‚Äôt very steady, and doesn‚Äôt look safe and strong. Quite a good thing but definitely not as described. My husband with his 85kg when working out it kind of bends. Quite thin metal

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Easy to assemble, good for most exercises
Name: Max
Review: Really easy to put this together. I'm not a handy person by any stretch of the imagination, but I found this really easy to assemble. It looks good, hasn't worn away at all, and is a good for various different exercises.The product is light, not dense, so full bodyweight exercises can't be done at an angle otherwise you will pull the whole stand over onto you. Otherwise, it works really well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Excellent purchase, really well made and goes together easily with all the tools being provided.I‚Äôm 6‚Äô1 and 14 stone and it works perfectly.Some bolts needed doing up pretty tight to avoid any wobbling, but that was not a problem.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jason Blackham
Review: Easy to assemble. Quite sturdy, though I imagine if you set the bar at its highest, it would be less so. Flexes a little when doing chins or dips and I‚Äôd say that flexing costs a rep or two. Well that‚Äôs what I like to tell myself, anyway. Chinning bar hand grips are fairly wide, which is fine, though one of the grips has slid inwards a little and has set in that position. Not great for supinate chin-ups as the cross beam gets in the way of my knees. May be able to mitigate that by setting it higher, but I‚Äôm not too bothered about them. Press-up grips are a nice bonus.Over all, a good purchase.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Federico
Review: Very happy with this. Extremely useful, sturdy and of good quality. Relatively easy to assemble. I have it indoors and the space it takes is minor. Also, it doesn‚Äôt look bad so I didn‚Äôt feel the need to put it in the garage (I placed it in the Conservatory).

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: SS
Review: Assembled (one-person) easily done if you follow instructions (Note: the fixtures are numbered on the plastic casing so tear carefully) ... all items including all screws etc supplied OK. It's strong & tall enough for most adults I'm 11-stone (very easy to use) > came on time, packaged well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Missing the Nuts from the packaging to assemble. Currently sitting in pieces on the floor.
Name: Rik
Review: Missing the nuts to assemble. Clearly missing in sealed packaging. This isthe second one I have had delivered. First was damaged. This second one is urrently sitting in pieces on the floor. Contacted serller through Amazon. Will update when I see how they respond...Rik

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Thomas S.
Review: Bought this product a few months back, excited to get it installed in my gym. Step of the instruction (see photo) clearly shows two holes to attach the arms. In my photo of the actual product, you‚Äôll see only one screw place on the side and another that is completely impractical. The arms are lose when fitted and therefore you can‚Äôt exercise. Would welcome feedback from the seller or else I‚Äôd recommend to anyone.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Amazing quality and value for money
Name: Callum
Review: Easy to assemble and really heavy duty. I'm 6 foot 6 inches and around 280lbs and this is the best pull up and dip station that I've found in years. Works perfectly when for a workout before a long shift rather than going to the gym

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Name: Harry
Review: From the day I assembled this, it shook around. They also have some weird pull up bars that slant at the end for 'wide arm pullups' however they don't have any straight pull up areas, only chin up ones. This makes it very annoying. I also struggle to hang rings on this as it shakes around so much.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Screws missing couldn‚Äôt even put it together, gutted
Name: Sam Preece
Review: Had screws missing so couldn‚Äôt assemble product, very poor

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: nicholas arnold
Review:
The chin up bar is to close to the main support meaning you hit your legs on it when you do chin ups, so I had to remove it to allow me to be able to use it effectively. If you had abs extra 100mm on the length of the bars holding the chin up bar this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue.

Considering the price I was disappointed with the sturdiness of the dip bars as well.

If I could do it again I wouldn‚Äôt I would just of bought a dedicated chin up bar and a dedicated dip bar. As this does neither very well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alisherkhon
Review: It‚Äôs a really valuable product if you don‚Äôt have enough time to go gym and want to do some exercises at home. Feels good. Looks good. Very functional as well.However it would be much better if they could make the pull up bar and dips handle little bit thicker. it would be much easier and less painfull for your hands to grab the handles while you do more reps.But once again it‚Äôs a good product. Recommended üëçüèª

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: A very solid and versatile piece of kit.
Name: A. Garrod
Review: After a slight hiccup with the instructions which was quickly resolved by the supplier, it was straightforward and quick to assemble.It really is very solid and appears to be good quality. A good alternative to a multi gym if you're happy to use your own body weight. Makes it a lot easier to move around.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Conveniently packaged, and a fair quality for the price offered
Name: Dilan Taylor
Review:
The kit was quickly dispatched and set up in around 45minutes- there's a spanner/wrench included so other than a knife to take the packaging apart putting all the parts together was easy

The rig feels strong, not as strong as the heavy-duty ones I'm used to at the gym- but I don't feel like the bar is going to bend/come apart which, to be honest, is what I was expecting at such a low price!

Thumbs up!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jane conroy
Review: Can‚Äôt believe how good this machine is,it‚Äôs very easy to put together ,very sturdy ,can even put a trx on and doesn‚Äôt move!....it‚Äôs definatley good if you want to seriously tone stomach and arms ,it works everything ! Worth every penny, glad I shopped around and spent that bit more on this .

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Al
Review: Assembly is straightforward. The dip bar and pull up bar feel secure and the unit is light enough to move around without too much difficulty.My only gripe is that when I reduced the height to do pull ups with better ceiling clearance then I kept bashing my knees on the support bar.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: DarthObvious
Review: Great power tower very stable and very big best check your dimensions I have to have it on the lowest height setting for it to fit + my head, am considering putting it outside with a tarp to protect it from the weather but it's very sturdy I am 6ft and 80kg and no problems!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alexandr Papp
Review:
I'm 93 kg, 191cm tall. Perfect for all excercises. Have not done skipping though...

I love the product, just got annoyed a bit when the bolts were different from the instructions. Apparently all good! Message from supplier: "Our product parts have been upgraded, so they are somewhat different from the instructions, but there is no problem with the screws"

Old comment: 2 nuts missing for the (17) M10*55 bolts...can this sent please

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Mashud
Review:
It looks like a good piece of equipment however it has two issues

1. The telescopic arms I received are not matching as per picture. This means I cannot complete assembly

2. The instructions are a bit outdated and makes it look like you are missing some M10 55 (part 17) but you are not.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: pal
Review: Good sturdy frame easy to put together we have it outdoors and its been fine. Little bit of rust around screws  but its doing the job we wanted it for.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Dr Siddiqui
Review: Easy to assemble, solid parts and stable. Left and right markings on the side arms were in the wrong order, so had to reassemble some parts again - not too difficult though. Highly recommend.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alex
Review: The right arm support (as you workout) flexes on load but doesn't move once it's taken the weight, it's oversize bolt holes as opposed to being weak. Feels sturdy enough otherwise. It does smell a bit when it first arrives, I've left it outside to air and get washed when it inevitably rains. The pull up bar could do with being an extra 4-5 inches further out from the back, it's a bit cramped against the back support. No issues for height or weight for my my 6ft+ frame.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: lai song man
Review: Had to have 2 people to assemble it, it is quite easy and can hold alot of weight especially people who are tall too. If you want to become stronger and fitter definitely buy this product as its not bulk and fits nearly anywhere.

Name: Stevie
Review: Bought this for our home gym, great bit of kit.Use this for dips, leg raises, pull ups and press-ups.Sturdy, takes my weight and I'm 18 stone. Was at a good price and well worth the money.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Problem sorted by great customer service
Name: Mrs. Chantal Wright
Review: One if the parts was wrongly drilled but I contacted the customer care service on the instruction leaflet. New part arrived within a week. Very happy with product. Solid piece of kit. My son loves it.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: AV
Review: Missing bolts and nuts. Not possible to assemble.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Arnie Ward
Review: Chinese made.  Well packaged with all the tools you need for assembly.  With this and a set of barbells you have all you need for a home gym.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: F.N
Review: Good so far. Box seemed second hand and the package inside with the bolts was opened and taped together but otherwise it's fine

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Review: Instructions were terrible but thankfully I was able to put together on my own. Definitely not gym steady but seems fairly robust for home use.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Review: Decent sturdy piece of equipment for the price.Very easy to assemble with easy to follow instructions.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: BB
Review: Setting up straightforward...well you know how it is with these kind of things, but yes once I was into the swing of it.  Well made, sturdy.  Excellent value for money.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Name: lisa r.
Review: Excellent sturdy piece for big strong boys \men.. well worth the money .. a Defo must have .. thank you Amazon üëå

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS

Review: This product was easy to set up take me less then 30mins. I have used this product every day for 5 months still looks new. Highly recommend this product

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: If you can pull or push your own body weight then there's not much better on the market than this. Very easy to put together, very sturdy, and comfortable to use. The height of the pull up bar can be adjusted as can the reach of the back cushion for the leg raises (moves in and out). Great addition to my home gym.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Stefan Kourdov
Review:
I bought this station about a year ago. It was that COVID time, when coming up with a gym alternative was a priority. So I went through the anxiety of reading the reviews on all power towers. Finally chose this one because I liked the price:ratings ratio.

After 12 months of using it, I can verify that this is a wonderful product! I do weighted dips and chin ups, and the tower is nice and stable no matter how hard I push it (seriously - I have loaded it with a combined weight of 140 kg, and it takes it like a champ). I would not try muscle ups on it, but I have done front and back levers, and it holds perfectly. I have used it with a pulley system as well, and it does the job (the weights on the pulley sometimes swing towards the base, but I could not call that a design flaw of the tower itself). I have not even had to tighten the bolts thus far.

The only two ‚Äúproblems‚Äù for me are:
1. The width of the bar - the supports are exactly where my hands should be when doing pull ups. Going outside of them is a bit too wide for me, going inside is a bit too narrow. As a result, I have focused on the chin ups (and made a good progress on those) for which it is perfect. This is probably specific to my anatomy, but I should mention it.
2. There is no way to use Olympic rings on it. I have tried many options, and I have been unable to find any that would feel comfortable. Obviously it was not designed for rings, so this should not bother most people, but just a heads up to other ring lovers out there.

In summary, I would buy this five times over again! It has not only helped me stay strong during lockdown, but has also helped me add a good amount of weight to my chin ups and dips. Hope you enjoy it as much as I have!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Sturdy, small footprint ergonomically adjustable station
Name: Annonymous
Review: Bought this based on Amazon reviews. Use it in my garb where ceiling is about 3.5m high so I can have the pull up bar on the highest setting. It is sturdy yet light enough to move about in the garage. Allows you to achieve great form on pull ups as bars either side and ahead restrict sway. Ab work outs are very ergonomic and comfortable with tailored back adjustment and tilted arm pads securing you into the position. This tilt does make the dip station quite wide but you just do wide dips and get good at them. Press bars a real bonus and the foot print of this station is easily within 1m2 so one of the smaller foot prints on Amazon but still sturdy.massembly was really easy but definitely hand tighten everything first. My dip bars needed some serious wrenching to get tight and prevent wobble but it's do able. My wife and kids also use this station thanks to its adjustability. Overall good value for money and excellent aftersales care too.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: kurt
Review: Got really out of shape this past year,bought this not to body build really (don't get me wrong who doesn't wanna look better) but more for my mental health.Been eating way more protein and trying to do a few dips,push ups and pulls up 4 days a week and its been helping alot,price was spot on,im rubbish at assembling things but had no issues with this,it's very sturdy takes my weight no problem at all,i have hard wood floors and was worried about it scratching them but it has rubber feet so it's fine.If your like me and struggle with depression,get this,you can do it,set realistic goals,even if it's only to use it once or twice a week,commit a block of time to work out and do your best to stick to it,also try drink alot more water and get some decent vitamins,i recommend fish oil, d3,c,zinc.Thanks again.

Name: Lord Lucan
Review: I don‚Äôt normally write reviews but due to purchasing this power tower feel it needs to be mentioned. Firstly I did plenty of research on other products available....after reading reviews I looked at what the negatives were....mainly that the product displayed was not the same frame size as seen on the photos.....this one had no reviews when I first looked at it but I did read the small print & it stated that the frame was 5.5cm Thick which being 228lb felt I needed a strong tower to take my weight.....I took the plunge & purchased it as it was sold by amazon & they are very good with customer service if anything was to be misold......it came within 2 days & I also noticed that it did in fact have reviews which appeared after I made the purchase to which most were positive.....some said that the only problem was when putting it together the instructions were not very clear as to where the screws went or where to put the washers.....I am no genius & managed to erect this on my own within an hour....to make it simple I removed the nuts/bolts/washers/handles & tools from the sealed packaging exactly as they were in the packaging.....the instructions give a size & description of what one goes where which made it so much easier just needs done concentration.....had no problems except one screw was threaded so just simple cut the end off & it was fine...now for the most important bit...the tower is extremely strong & robust almost as good as a gym product....it takes my weight comfortable & fits perfect in my garage.....I am getting no rewards for this review just felt that for such a good product it deserved the time to write this so as someone else can be happy with purchasing the correct power tower & not get fooled into buying one that states a different product delivered to the one advertised.....if you really want a good product then I would highly recommend this one

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: duggs
Review: Does the job well!Good sturdy item, went together fairly easily.At first I found the arm pads too far apart and struggled to hold myself up enough on them to leg raise. Persevere though as you get stronger shoulders this is no longer a problem! I would recommend this item.I have been using it for 3 weeks every other day and can really see the difference.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jay72
Review: I did a bit of research and decided to buy this pull up station. Its very well built and designed well. It's easily put together by one person. Instructions are good and all the tools for constructing it are supplied.It's a solid peace of equipment.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Great power tower at a great price
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The power tower was exactly what I was looking for. I'm 6'2" and there is a taller setting available. I don't have any more height in the garage though. The right hand press up grip started to creak and visibly move after a week or so use. I contacted sports royals and they sent out the replacement part promptly and free of charge. It's working properly now.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Best packaging and assembly experience ever!
Name: Vec
Review: I don‚Äôt tend to write reviews, but the packaging and assembly on this product was the best ever. Often metal parts can bash each other and chip paint. These were so securely individually wrapped there was no risk. Also I often find screws and washers can get lost as the boxes or bags they come in can be ripped. Not the case here! The small parts were in an almost indestructible plastic blister pack. It took quite a while to cut open but it was clear everything was in place and complete.Having assembled many flat packs of workshop tools, gym equipment and wardrobes this was by far the best experience and highest quality experience ever. Many household names could learn a lot from this brand.Next time I buy gym equipment I will check for SportsRoyals first. Cannot praise it highly enough.Product is strong and sturdy even for a heavier chap. Also height adjustable. Great product!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Definitely worth the money , but issue with the arrival
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
The product itself is very well made , very strong and sturdy , and relatively easy to assemble I will say however the logic in how each part is assembled separately then joined altogether isn‚Äôt necessarily the best way how they‚Äôve ordered it in the manual , the performance and durability of the product is very good and have no doubt it would be very easy to dissemble and reassemble for moving house or whatever the purpose and the bolts and other finer parts would hold up easily

However the way it was package was not very clever, unnecessary amounts of cello tape plastered everywhere for no reason and the zip ties holding the same parts together were done up too tight that trying to cut with scissors or a knife actually proved to be pretty difficult and the easiest way to undo the zip ties was to force the parts in opposite directions

Also after ordering the product I was not given an estimated time of arrival or any indication that my product was on the way nor was I able to cancel the order manually how you usually would, it wasn‚Äôt until I rung up to investigate the situation further that a customer support representative who was very helpful managed to get the product shipped out to me within 48 hours of me contacting Amazon directly and is the reason for my 5star review

Overall I would definitely recommend the product as it is very good quality and worth the extra money in comparison to other similar products based off the reviews I‚Äôve seen, the assembly and performance is also brilliant and doesn‚Äôt require you to be a genius to assemble, and the support service was excellent , the only thing I would make anyone aware of who is considering purchasing is the arrival of the delivery as there is no clear indication of when it will arrive

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Mark
Review:
Looks nice in photos, but I can't tell in reality because it didn't come with the necessary M10-55 bolts & nuts.

Annoyingly, Amazon have also fudged something with the 'contact seller' option in your orders which conventionally allowed you to contact the seller with no fuss. It doesn't exist anymore. You can only leave 'feedback'.

Irritated with it all at the moment.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Risky
Review: I bought this because it took the heaviest weight load of 400lbs body weight. I'm not 400lbs but the extra capacity is necessary just in case you want to test yourself with one handed chin ups. The bar mustn't bend and the framework is strong enough. The length you can extend the station proved enough for a full range.One caveat, the instruction manual needs to be updated, according to the instructions I had two incorrect bolts that were too short for the arm rests. When I assembled it regardless of instructions it was right length for the bottom part of the screw holes. Apart from that it was a smooth 45 minutes to assemble.I docked value for money because it was ¬£15 less for 1 week after purchase. Sour grapes from me.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Justin smith
Review:
To be totally honest I bought this off the back of great feedback from other customers and also the fact covid stopped me from going up the gym, but was still very sceptical about how sturdy it would be.

After arrival it was very easy to assemble, even the worst diy dads in the land can assemble this. As long as you have half a brain, just follow the instructions (which are very clear) you can't go wrong.

I use it for pull ups and dips and I can honestly say it does not creak or move atall when doing so. It is by no means as good as gym grade equipment (which would be at least another 300 to 400 pounds) but it serves a purpose through times like these when you can't go up the gym. Don't let covid stop them gains!

Great value for what it is.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: easily assembled, sturdy, and well designed
Name: William Moffatt
Review: as advertised, this is a solid peice of equipment, well made, easy to assemble, and looks good.There's a youtube video showing you how to assemble it, but that's unnecessary because the printed instructions are excellent and it's simple anyway - the only possible area of confusion is well described and the parts are labelled appropriately anyway (the arm rests tilt slightly inwards, to give your forarms a better position, so the left and right sides are mirrored rather than identical)

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jay C
Review: Received today and o server straight away that two of the MT10*55 nuts are missing.  As you can see in the photo these parts arrive in a pre-sealed plastic casing, so I‚Äôve definitely not lost/ misplaced them. Disappointing, it means I cannot immediately secure one of the arm dip handles.Edit: changing to 4 stars. The instruction manual that I received was in fact for a previous design version of this same product. So in fact the parts received correct, the instructions were not. I never heard back from the manufacturer though, had to work this out myself. Product appears to be sturdy in its 1st week of use.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Elle T
Review: One of the bolts was missing when opened the package. Problem was sorted and seller was massivly supportiveand gave best cooperation. The best buy of the year - thats for sure !! There are no days when my son is not using it.Absolutely love it !!!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Stable, smart tower for home gym
Name: Jackal
Review: Used my own tools to assemble and to make sure I got the dip handles tight (another review showed them wobbling a lot but I managed to get mine tight). Little bit of movement when in use but the base is very stable and it is plenty solid for me (11 stone). Really like the dips, press up handles and knee raises. Pull ups are decent too (although I need to up my game there) - you can adjust the bar height which is great if like me you aren't tall. My grips slip a little on the pull up bar but that's minor and easy fixed. It also looks pretty smart. All in all I would recommend this for a home setup.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: AaG
Review: Be aware when you check the contents that the instructions list 4x M10 55 nuts and bolts for the arm support. However the design has been changed so that you now only need 2 nuts for these bolts. Just haven‚Äôt changed the instruction manual to reflect this.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Gawain
Review:
I bought this back in January (after the December 2020 purchase must have gotten lost or something), as a late Christmas present for my girlfriend. She asked for something like this by the way; I wasn't hinting at anything!

Anyway, while it's mostly been collecting dust, it has had some use from the both of us. Me being 6 foot 2 and 90kg, and her being smaller and lighter. It easily supports each of us, it's incredibly sturdy, and it was simple enough for me to put together on my own (that means it's super simple!).

We've just moved it into a more spacious room so it "may" get more regular use soon, but it's certainly a solid structure and well worth the price; even more so for those who would make good use of it!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: You get what you pay for...
Name: Demiro
Review: Not good not bad, I guess you get what you pay for. Not really stable nor robust, also a bit to wide for me doing pull ups. Anyway, it kinda does is job.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Took a punt on this, but very happy! I was scared it might not fit in my shed, but it fits in great and actually goes lower than stated for storage. It‚Äôs sturdy and fairly easy to setup. My tip is to not tighten the screws too much until it‚Äôs all in place. I‚Äôm very pleased with it üëç

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Federico
Review: Very happy with this. Extremely useful, sturdy and of good quality. Relatively easy to assemble. I have it indoors and the space it takes is minor. Also, it doesn‚Äôt look bad so I didn‚Äôt feel the need to put it in the garage (I placed it in the Conservatory).

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jason Blackham
Review: Easy to assemble. Quite sturdy, though I imagine if you set the bar at its highest, it would be less so. Flexes a little when doing chins or dips and I‚Äôd say that flexing costs a rep or two. Well that‚Äôs what I like to tell myself, anyway. Chinning bar hand grips are fairly wide, which is fine, though one of the grips has slid inwards a little and has set in that position. Not great for supinate chin-ups as the cross beam gets in the way of my knees. May be able to mitigate that by setting it higher, but I‚Äôm not too bothered about them. Press-up grips are a nice bonus.Over all, a good purchase.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: SS
Review: Assembled (one-person) easily done if you follow instructions (Note: the fixtures are numbered on the plastic casing so tear carefully) ... all items including all screws etc supplied OK. It's strong & tall enough for most adults I'm 11-stone (very easy to use) > came on time, packaged well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Easy to assemble, good for most exercises
Name: Max
Review: Really easy to put this together. I'm not a handy person by any stretch of the imagination, but I found this really easy to assemble. It looks good, hasn't worn away at all, and is a good for various different exercises.The product is light, not dense, so full bodyweight exercises can't be done at an angle otherwise you will pull the whole stand over onto you. Otherwise, it works really well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Valdas B
Review: Number 17 missing parts of the screw.How I am supposed to assamble it with main parts missing?

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Dumitrita
Review: Isn‚Äôt very steady, and doesn‚Äôt look safe and strong. Quite a good thing but definitely not as described. My husband with his 85kg when working out it kind of bends. Quite thin metal

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Bristol Bill
Review: Arrived a week or so after order.  Easy to put together (tip: the spanner supplied works fine - but it's much easier and quicker to use a socket set and ratchet, if you have one; you'll also get the bolts much tighter).  It's surprisingly light, but quite sturdy.  Instructions and YouTube videos were very clear.  There's now a newer YouTube instruction video than the one linked to in the instruction document.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Excellent purchase, really well made and goes together easily with all the tools being provided.I‚Äôm 6‚Äô1 and 14 stone and it works perfectly.Some bolts needed doing up pretty tight to avoid any wobbling, but that was not a problem.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Missing the Nuts from the packaging to assemble. Currently sitting in pieces on the floor.
Name: Rik
Review: Missing the nuts to assemble. Clearly missing in sealed packaging. This isthe second one I have had delivered. First was damaged. This second one is urrently sitting in pieces on the floor. Contacted serller through Amazon. Will update when I see how they respond...Rik

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: A very solid and versatile piece of kit.
Name: A. Garrod
Review: After a slight hiccup with the instructions which was quickly resolved by the supplier, it was straightforward and quick to assemble.It really is very solid and appears to be good quality. A good alternative to a multi gym if you're happy to use your own body weight. Makes it a lot easier to move around.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Screws missing couldn‚Äôt even put it together, gutted
Name: Sam Preece
Review: Had screws missing so couldn‚Äôt assemble product, very poor

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: nicholas arnold
Review:
The chin up bar is to close to the main support meaning you hit your legs on it when you do chin ups, so I had to remove it to allow me to be able to use it effectively. If you had abs extra 100mm on the length of the bars holding the chin up bar this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue.

Considering the price I was disappointed with the sturdiness of the dip bars as well.

If I could do it again I wouldn‚Äôt I would just of bought a dedicated chin up bar and a dedicated dip bar. As this does neither very well.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Easy to assemble but product is not good
Name: Harry
Review: From the day I assembled this, it shook around. They also have some weird pull up bars that slant at the end for 'wide arm pullups' however they don't have any straight pull up areas, only chin up ones. This makes it very annoying. I also struggle to hang rings on this as it shakes around so much.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Amazing quality and value for money
Name: Callum
Review: Easy to assemble and really heavy duty. I'm 6 foot 6 inches and around 280lbs and this is the best pull up and dip station that I've found in years. Works perfectly when for a workout before a long shift rather than going to the gym

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Thomas S.
Review: Bought this product a few months back, excited to get it installed in my gym. Step of the instruction (see photo) clearly shows two holes to attach the arms. In my photo of the actual product, you‚Äôll see only one screw place on the side and another that is completely impractical. The arms are lose when fitted and therefore you can‚Äôt exercise. Would welcome feedback from the seller or else I‚Äôd recommend to anyone.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Al
Review: Assembly is straightforward. The dip bar and pull up bar feel secure and the unit is light enough to move around without too much difficulty.My only gripe is that when I reduced the height to do pull ups with better ceiling clearance then I kept bashing my knees on the support bar.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Conveniently packaged, and a fair quality for the price offered
Name: Dilan Taylor
Review:
The kit was quickly dispatched and set up in around 45minutes- there's a spanner/wrench included so other than a knife to take the packaging apart putting all the parts together was easy

The rig feels strong, not as strong as the heavy-duty ones I'm used to at the gym- but I don't feel like the bar is going to bend/come apart which, to be honest, is what I was expecting at such a low price!

Thumbs up!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alisherkhon
Review: It‚Äôs a really valuable product if you don‚Äôt have enough time to go gym and want to do some exercises at home. Feels good. Looks good. Very functional as well.However it would be much better if they could make the pull up bar and dips handle little bit thicker. it would be much easier and less painfull for your hands to grab the handles while you do more reps.But once again it‚Äôs a good product. Recommended üëçüèª

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Jane conroy
Review: Can‚Äôt believe how good this machine is,it‚Äôs very easy to put together ,very sturdy ,can even put a trx on and doesn‚Äôt move!....it‚Äôs definatley good if you want to seriously tone stomach and arms ,it works everything ! Worth every penny, glad I shopped around and spent that bit more on this .

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Stevie
Review: Bought this for our home gym, great bit of kit.Use this for dips, leg raises, pull ups and press-ups.Sturdy, takes my weight and I'm 18 stone. Was at a good price and well worth the money.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: DarthObvious
Review: Great power tower very stable and very big best check your dimensions I have to have it on the lowest height setting for it to fit + my head, am considering putting it outside with a tarp to protect it from the weather but it's very sturdy I am 6ft and 80kg and no problems!

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alexandr Papp
Review:
I'm 93 kg, 191cm tall. Perfect for all excercises. Have not done skipping though...

I love the product, just got annoyed a bit when the bolts were different from the instructions. Apparently all good! Message from supplier: "Our product parts have been upgraded, so they are somewhat different from the instructions, but there is no problem with the screws"

Old comment: 2 nuts missing for the (17) M10*55 bolts...can this sent please

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: lai song man
Review: Had to have 2 people to assemble it, it is quite easy and can hold alot of weight especially people who are tall too. If you want to become stronger and fitter definitely buy this product as its not bulk and fits nearly anywhere.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Alex
Review: The right arm support (as you workout) flexes on load but doesn't move once it's taken the weight, it's oversize bolt holes as opposed to being weak. Feels sturdy enough otherwise. It does smell a bit when it first arrives, I've left it outside to air and get washed when it inevitably rains. The pull up bar could do with being an extra 4-5 inches further out from the back, it's a bit cramped against the back support. No issues for height or weight for my my 6ft+ frame.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Dr Siddiqui
Review: Easy to assemble, solid parts and stable. Left and right markings on the side arms were in the wrong order, so had to reassemble some parts again - not too difficult though. Highly recommend.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Mashud
Review:
It looks like a good piece of equipment however it has two issues

1. The telescopic arms I received are not matching as per picture. This means I cannot complete assembly

2. The instructions are a bit outdated and makes it look like you are missing some M10 55 (part 17) but you are not.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: AV
Review: Missing bolts and nuts. Not possible to assemble.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Problem sorted by great customer service
Name: Mrs. Chantal Wright
Review: One if the parts was wrongly drilled but I contacted the customer care service on the instruction leaflet. New part arrived within a week. Very happy with product. Solid piece of kit. My son loves it.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: pal
Review: Good sturdy frame easy to put together we have it outdoors and its been fine. Little bit of rust around screws  but its doing the job we wanted it for.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: ParryTheKing
Review: This is definitely a value buy.Everything was packed and delivered in one box, easy to assemble (by one person) and good quality too.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: F.N
Review: Good so far. Box seemed second hand and the package inside with the bolts was opened and taped together but otherwise it's fine

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: sean mcginnis
Review: Very impressed with this purchase.It was easy to assemble, was not missing 2 nuts as the 2 accompanying bolts just screw into the frame.It is very solid, rattles a bit, but really looks and feels like it should cost a lot more.I honestly have no complaints, would definitely recommend

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: magh
Review: Absolutely brilliant bit of kit. Ordered it before the second lockdown pushed prices sky high. And it arrived like 5 days early

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Eamon D.
Review: Instructions were terrible but thankfully I was able to put together on my own. Definitely not gym steady but seems fairly robust for home use.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Mr. A. T. Brown
Review: Decent sturdy piece of equipment for the price.Very easy to assemble with easy to follow instructions.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Ian
Review: Bit of a long one to assemble, not difficult just long but the tower itself on first impressions and use is really good .. only downside would be the pull up is too wide, could have done with being around where the knobs are but apart from that it's pretty good

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: First page of instructions is wrong - you only need the 2 bolts with nuts on page 1
Name: Craig Freeman
Review: Overall seems good. Less than 5 starts because when the first page of instructions is wrong I immediately stopped putting it together. Later found I had the correct bits.The rest of the instructions are fine.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: BB
Review: Setting up straightforward...well you know how it is with these kind of things, but yes once I was into the swing of it.  Well made, sturdy.  Excellent value for money.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Arnie Ward
Review: Chinese made.  Well packaged with all the tools you need for assembly.  With this and a set of barbells you have all you need for a home gym.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Excellent quality a definite must have !
Name: lisa r.
Review: Excellent sturdy piece for big strong boys \men.. well worth the money .. a Defo must have .. thank you Amazon üëå

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: John H
Review: Attempted to assemble this. The frame connecting the dip handle to the main frame of the item in the instructions has two areas for locking screws. The product came with one, meaning the dip handles are reliant on a single screw for stability. This meant it was very unstable/loose. I have sent this product back for a full refund as it is not usable.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Unstable and backrest is too small to perform leg raises without discomfort with good form
Name: Dorian
Review: Biggest problem is that it won‚Äôt stay put. Very shaking when doing dips or pull ups and the back rest it positioned at a very awkward spot and is way too small so it makes leg raises a lot more difficult than it should be, especially with the right form. However it still does it‚Äôs job but you should take these issues into account

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: JMG
Review: Sturdy and easy to build. Really well packaged and will be used by all the family

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Gemma
Review: Sturdy, strong and easy to build. Built alone and within a short time (39yr old woman).

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Solid built and stable wide top bar good for someone taller
Name: Charles S
Review: I‚Äôm 6,1 and the top bar grip is wide enough me. (The other ones on Amazon have much narrower bars I.e 89, 92cm.) Solid built and stable. it works just fine. Would Def recommend it to a friend.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Don't buy if you have neighbours.
Name: Keir
Review: Worst power tower. Sqeaks and swings. Easily tips over. The noise is like fingernails on a chalk board. Do not buy if you have neighbours. Would return but had it too long and received missing bolts and washers.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Title of Review: Great piece of kit - easy to assemble
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I love this piece of kit. Always nervous buying online, but this has proved to be a great addition to the home gym. Very easy to put together (I'm rubbish at DIY), it's quite sturdy (a little movement when I'm swing around on it..)Overall though very very pleased with it. And a great price..

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: Bart K.
Review: 5Star Product! Ridiculous Fast delivery... 30min to put together and as a keen gym goer, this is a Proper bit of Kit! Love it! Would recommend to ANYONE...Thank you.

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: itsfatboyjim
Review: Easy to put together.Holds my weight.Feels sturdy.Allows me to do pull-ups - well, in about 6 months ;)

Product: Sportsroyals Power Tower Dip Station Pull Up Bar for Home Gym Strength Training Workout Equipment, 400LBS
Name: carl
Review: A great price and sturdy item. I'm absolutely made up with it.

Review: Adjustable Dumbbells Weights Set 20KG, CANMALCH:  Used these regularly over the last couple of months and can't really fault them for the price. Unlike the cheaper cement filled plastic, these weights are proper enamelled cast iron and appear both well made and rugged. Secondly - the fixing screw ends are metal, unlike cheaper versions plastic.  All in all it gives these weights a very professional feel. As a bonus, they even come in an (admittedly rather flimsy) plastic storage box. Finally, a big up for Canmalch customer service - who immediately resolved a delivery issue to my complete satisfaction.  For the price paid I'd unreservedly recommend.

Name: Tracy S
Review: I'm very happy with these. They are good quality and easy to assemble. The grip room is quite large, would be fine for most people.

Review: They're weights. Heavy objects held together with grippy objects. They're not easy to get wrong. I don't really push the to their limits like many, but they do what I need.

Product: CANMALCHI Adjustable Dumbbells Weights Set 20KG,30KG,50KG for Indoor Workout Dumbbell Weight Barbell Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym Equipment
Title of Review: Good but bend a little when fully loaded
Name: E. Sagor
Review: Overall I'm very happy with these and am glad I bought them.They are very versatile.  It's so much better to be able to work out with a barbell, rather than just dumbbells.The only issue I have with them is that when the bar is fully loaded, it bends at the middle and feels like it could break.  That doesn't matter to much if you put it on your shoulders for squats, but if you hold it in the middle for close grip curls or tricep extensions,  the bar bends and it feels like it is about the break.  Because some of the weights go in the middle, there is less depth of bar screwing in, so it doesn't feel secure and bends.The other issue is, you need to constantly keep tightening it as it becomes loose with a lot of weights on it.I would still recommend it, but I feel like you need to be careful with it so it doesn't break.

Product: CANMALCHI Adjustable Dumbbells Weights Set 20KG,30KG,50KG for Indoor Workout Dumbbell Weight Barbell Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym Equipment
Name: mariam katamadze
Review:
I bought 20KG set and I was excited to get it and start working out!

Although, of course I was extremely disappointed.

It is poorly made, extremely large and impossible to feel comfortable while working out.

You can not put all the weights on, as it can easily break.

I feel unprotected while working out, as weights are not safe at all because it is not adjusting safely and always coming down.

I am extremely dissapointed and not worth the money at all.

I want to return it, my return policy probably ended as i ordered month ago, and I travelled to UK, did isolation and I just saw the package.

Never ordering anything related to this, online again.

This is my first order, that I am angry and dissapointed.

I even payed more than now it is showing, as they have a discount.

Please do not be mistaken and do not buy this product.

Name: Karen
Review: I had the bands for about four months and used them once or twice per week.  I was using them one day when the 50lb suddenly snapped.  I emailed Big Trends via Amazon with a picture of the snapped band and requested a replacement band.  They emailed back to say they would in fact send me a whole replacement set of bands.  To date (a month later) I haven't received the replacement bands and Big Trends are uncontactable.  The two star rating reflects my disappointment rather than the actual bands, even though one shouldn't have snapped when I used them so seldom.

Product: Resistance Bands Set By Resist Fit-10-Level Adjustable Home Gym Equipment - Fitness Gear for Therapy Support, Stretching, Training, Gymnastics, Sports - Portable Workout Equipment with Carry Bag
Title of Review: Lacks Instruction for those who never used them
Name: aadanvers
Review: Having never used these before and not a gym goer, I thought these would be ideal to get moving while in lockdown, the bands and loops seem comprehensive with plenty of resistance levels, a very basic booklet which shows more about what they can do rather than instruct on how to use them, as with most exercises ‚Äòform‚Äô is key, if they‚Äôre not used correctly your wasting your time.  I stated that‚Äôs there‚Äôs 100‚Äôs of online videos but none are from Resist Fit themselves which is very poor in my eyes like Resist Fit Big Trends just sell this to take advantage (get rich quick scheme) of the fact a lot of us are in lockdown without putting out videos..!So I might return them and purchase from company that does have proper instruction.  In the mean time if anyone found a YouTube that does provide good instruction of the basics including form, let me know.  For anyone thinking about purchasing seek instructional vids first and go from there.  Don‚Äôt buy these if you want full and comprehensive instruction...
