Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Roy
Review: I am a 69 year old male who used a gym 20 years ago. Since then my only form of exercise was walking and DIY. I wanted to build a little body tone, but did not want to clutter up the house with barbells and dumbbells. Saw the ad for these resistance bands and though I would give them a try. They are very easy to use and you set your own pace. I have started on the 9.5kg bands and I can feel the 'burn' already.Another nice thing is that I can pack them in a suitcase when I go on holiday and they take up as much as a washbag and weight about the same as well. Go on give them a try, you will enjoy them.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: CB
Review: Bought these resistance cables to help get some exercise at home, given the inability to buy dumbbells at a sensible price.  I am far from a workout expert and still need some time to get used to them and make sure I'm using them effectively, but they are providing enough resistance to be able to do various pulls, curls and presses and tire my muscles out.  All cables are the same length and the different tensions are due to having slightly thicker rubber on the "heavier" cables.  I can't say how the "weight" is determined or whether it is accurate but there's certainly more resistance in the 50lb cable than the 10lb cable and putting multiple cables in parallel makes things a whole lot harder!  I would however suggest buying this as a heavier set vs the cheaper sets that contain fewer cables as I am already needing to use multiple cables at the same time.  It's hard to say whether the length of the cables is correct - I'm 6'3" and can do bicep curls on both arms at the same time but can't do a full shoulder press unless I do one side at a time (just stand on the cable to get the right length).  Obviously if they were longer, I'd be struggling on the curls.  Comes with a decent sized bag, a contraption to attach to the door, two ankle straps and two handles.  Cables attach using carabiners (not climbing quality but they work).  I haven't noticed any concerns in terms of durability nor do I feel they're going to snap unless I do something stupid.  Overall, they're doing what I hoped.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Lj
Review: I‚Äôm loving the versatility this product is going to add to my workout. It is abundantly clear from the get go that this offers a type of durability/stretch that normal dumbbells don‚Äôt give me. This ingenious bit of kit is the way forward. No more falling over dust gathering dumbbells or weight benches because this all in one gym fits compact in a bag within seconds. If you buy any fitness equipment this year as a New Years resolution then make this your one and only purchase and kiss goodbye to the bulky, space consuming dumbbells of the dark ages. Excellent product!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: I don't miss the gym anymore
Name: ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Review:
I had previously had a set like these from another seller that just didn't do the job.
Right of the bat, you could immediately tell a quality difference just by comparing the two.

This set was miles better and so far so good.
Even considering buying another set to double up once these get too easy.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Really good resistance bands, great selection
Name: Martin Kelly
Review: These are a good addition to dumbbells are are so versatile. There are so many exercises you can do which aren't restricted to fighting gravity like traditional weights. The booklet needs spell checking but it's quite useful. I've Googled most of the exercises I need and I bought 4 more sets of handles to I don't have to keep swapping the two handles with different bands. Stacking the bands means you can go up to 150kg of resistance which is plenty and the door hook is a useful feature of downward & forward/backward pulling moves.Update: the black band just snapped. Not happy

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Brittany
Review: I purchased these while I'm here in the UK as I forgot my ones from home, back in CA. Anyway, the resistance seems to vary considerably. For example, 50lb feels very light, compared to 20 or 30lb resistance. However, with the multiple bands, not a HUGE problem, as I have just been adding the 10lb or 20lb band when using the 50lb which then adds on a big different for resistance. The 30lb band arrived with a bend in it, that hasn't seem to come out yet, however I haven't been using that resistance much as I'm mostly combining the 50lb with lower resistance. Overall, great set, and does what I purchased it for. The handles, and bands are overall sturdy, however just the issue with the actual true resistance weight may be a little faulty. Would still recommend though!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Mr. J. Gibson
Review: I needed some exercise during the lock down. I didn't want dumbbells etc and heard about resistance bands. These looked good so decided to get a set. They really are excellent and well made. They come in a different set of colours depending on how much resistance you want. It's early days on the easiest yellow ones but I'm really impressed. They come with a set of exercises to do on an a4 sheet. I follow some exercises on YouTube which I find better suits me. Early days on the results but I'm sure they'll come. Need to get in shape for the summer üòâ.

When I received them, my wife wanted to use them straight away, and has not stopped using them. I have used them just the once and have not found a single issue with them.

You can double up the bands for extra resistance if required, and there are plenty of bands to use and stored neatly in the bag.

My son and daughter would like to use them also, so the fight is on each morning to be the 1st to use them

A great purchase.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Strong stretchy and a good workout
Name: Simone
Review:
I was intrigued when I saw these resistance bands on amazon as I have never seen or heard of them before. I enjoy the gym and own several free weights barbells dumbells and various other weighted products. So what good are latex bands?

They are fantastic!!! No more lumping around heavy weights or being restricted as to what I can lift for fear of dropping them on my head. These bands are weightless but still have the exact same effect as doing the same workouts with lumps of metal.

So they are light, safe, fun and the kids can get involved. I am not a pro weight trainer you any means in fact I would call myself a novice. These exercises are really easy to follow either with the instruction book or using YouTube.

This package includes

5 x Resistance Bands (Black: 35lbs, Blue: 30lbs, Green: 25lbs, Red: 20lbs and Yellow: 15lbs)
2 x Foam Handles
2 x Ankle Straps
1 x Door Anchor Attachment
1 x Carrying Bag
1 x Workout Guide

So is this set any good?

I will be honest with you yes it is however, it feels cheap and I am nervous about these snapping. That said I have used each band separately and I have doubled up black with blue, blue with green and red ect. They have not given any indication of snapping but they just feel low quality. The plastic end bits do not feel very secure but again I don't know why as they have not given any indication of giving way.

I do own another set of these bands that are alot better for the same price however I also own a set that is alot worse for the same price too.

I hope you found this a helpful review and it assisted you in your decision as to whether you chose to purchase this item.

Please note

I was asked to review this product as part of the amazon vine programme. Members on this programme are given products and have to review them within 30 days of receipt. For this reason I can not comment on how this item performs long term however for integrity reasons if anything changes with my product I will always look to edit my review to keep it relevant and upto date

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Instructions maybe misleading on resistance and how to use .
Name: Gabriel Stranraer
Review: Video Player is loading.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: A. Wright
Review:
iECO Fitness Resistance Bands Set

So I'm sure that I'm horribly dating my review here, but we're still right in the middle of Coronavirus and all the troubles that that entails. And like many other people, that means that I may or may not have put on some extra weight during all the long periods of staying indoors. That needs to change, but unfortunately going to a gym is still a dodgy prospect, and buying a set of weights is pricey. Enter then the resistance band. The one stop shop for simple muscle toning whilst saving both money and space.

This is a really decent set of bands. There's five different ones of varying resistance so they're suitable for people of every strength level, whether you're an experienced gym rat, or a weedy beginner like myself who needs somewhere to get started. The rubber tubing that they are made out of seems pretty strong; I certainly wasn't worried about one snapping on me at an inopportune moment. They do come with a basic instruction book, but I'd advise getting online if you want some more varied exercise options. They also come with a couple of useful accessories, including a useful door anchor which allows you to more greatly vary your training techniques. Resistance bands aren't going to build you up to the level of worlds strongest man or woman on your own, but they're a decent start.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Deenguy
Review:
I'm a fitness freak I've already got myself a set of these resistant bands and they're not the same As these ones and I will explain the differences. however I'm just going to give a quick summary they are great they do the job really well they feel quite premium which I like however they were deceptive in their look from the images and I'll go into detail about this.

overall I feel like the benefits of this product is that it does do the work it is the right resistance for each one however obviously you have to reach a certain level of stretch in order for you to fill the resistance and that's quite sad with certain resistant bands as you can't really stretch out as much as you would like to stretch it but it goes up to a total of 150 pounds which is around 85 KG which is quite good to be honest specially if you're wanting to build that muscle and get yourself started off before you move on to weights or the gym these are perfect and you can carry around in the little bag they give you as well. for those of you who don't know what certain parts of these products do the rope with the bulge at the end is for you to have when you attach it near a door and then close the doors here then you can use the resistance bands while is attached to the door. the ones that are just like a circular they attached to the resistant bands is for for example your leg or your hands if you were to just spread them out you can easily put your foot through it and use that. and of course the last one is the grip the hand grip you can use for various different activities I don't think I need to go into detail but you literally have on your hands you can do bicep curls tricep extensions however you want. the feel of the product is really good it's quality and you can tell it's quality just by feeling the rubber band.

However, now getting into the nitty gritty of the product. one thing that I really despised was the fact that the deceptive look the product had given from the beginning. of course the benefit of the fact that those parts where you can see on the image the actual weight amount for each resistance band is a benefit however when you look at your thinking yeah it's probably hard plastic right? WRONG! I thought the same too but then later realised that this wasn't the case when I had got it as I opened it up I realised that it's just the same material used for the other small items that help you grip the resistant bands and I was quite sad however there's nothing really to complain about it does the job right? Also, the fact that when you actually using the resistance band you can see that it doesn't look as appealing to use as you would think because where I mentioned that you can see the actual weight amount that's attached to the resistance band and the resistance band is inside that part where you see the weight amount if that makes sense. and it's just a cut tube in a sense. but of course it does do the job and I admire the product it has helped me quite a bit so far build my muscles and strengthen my body. I definitely recommend this product just due to the fact that it does the job but if you're going for looks and you feel like you've been deceived by just a look of it then that's up to you.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Strongly made and versatile resistance bands set
Name: The Sea-Green Witch
Review:
Resistance bands set , 11 pieces including bag

This is a very nice pack of 5 resistance straps.
All different colours depending on strength.
The strongest being 50 lbs and the weakest 10 lbs.
Each band has its strength printed on one end on the fabric bit that connects the carabiner but you will soon get used to knowing which one is the easy and which ones the harder resistances.

There is a small info leaflet to give ideas for 8 exercises and they are very simple but effective.

A draw string carry bag is provided for storage and to keep them together in your gym bag

Both ends of the bands have carabiners which are useful not only to join them to each other but you can join then to other things also to anchor them while using.
The Carabiners are quite small but thick metal and the straps dont pull on the closing bit at all during use.
The bands themselves are a stretchy silicone looking rubbery stuff. It feels really strong and whippy, the stronger ones are both thicker width and feel firmer.

The Two handle ends are seperate fabric bands with foam padded handles which you can connect to the carabiners with D rings.
There are two Foot straps that are flat material circular bands without handles and they also have D rings and Velcro fastening.
I found the D rings needed to be on the insides as you used them else they pull undone.

There is one other strap which has a small foam cylinder on it, this is not to roll the bands along as I first thought but it is a door Anchor which is a brilliant idea.
You put your resistance band through the big loop and then you put the foam roller shape through the open door and shut it with you standing on the pull-to-shut side of the door. The foam is strong enough to keep the band from pulling through and soft enough not to damage paintwork.

All the straps and handles seem strong enough to last with the joins looking robust

These are extremely versatile.

The push up exercise is challenging even on the easiest band as you double the band over.

I really like that this gives you a way of doing a full workout with resistance in a small space.

If you do floor workouts or body weight workouts and they are getting too easy or a bit boring, these bands are just right to add more challenge.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: A Decent Cable Set with a Few Weak Points
Name: Scottish Manitou
Review: A decent cable set, all things considered. The resistance cables themselves are strong and durable, and each one has its resistance clearly marked at the end. The carabiners are tough steel, although I'd have preferred them to be a little larger (so they can be fitted to even the biggest of bars/handles). The weak points in the set are the handles, ankle straps and door jam, all of which are fairly flimsy and feature stitching that isn't sufficient to stand up to heavy training. I have past experience of handles just like these tearing open during a set of heavy cable crossovers in my living room, sending cables and carabiners flying across the room at speed - luckily, no injury happened and no valuables were broken, but after that I ordered heavy-duty handles for use with my cables, to make sure an incident like that never happens again. I also use only a heavy-duty door jam too, not the wee lightweight ones that come with resistance-cable sets. If you plan to use this cable set for gentle exercise at home, using one cable at a time, the handles, anklets and door jam provided will probably be sufficient. If, however, you plan to combine multiple cables in order to train with heavy resistances, I recommend buying separate heavy-duty handles and door jam - ones with reinforced stitching and an ability to tolerate serious load.A decent set with a few weak points. Cables: strong, durable and well marked with resistance. Carabiners: strong, easy to attach/disengage, but a touch on the small side. Handles, anklets and door jam: lightweight and a bit flimsy.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Daniel
Review:
I am very impressed with these resistance bands!

They come with a nice little guidebook giving some examples of basic but effective exercises. I think this is great because it gives you an idea of the sorts of exercises you can do using these - it basically teaches you how the bands work and how to use them, so eventually you can make up your own exercises! Or you can just go on Youtube and look at the potential different options for these.

The thing I'm most impressed by is how flawlessly you can add different bands together to increase the 'weight'. I was always under the impression that the heaviest band is the heaviest you can go... how wrong I was! You can just double up and add another band to increase the weight. If that becomes too easy, go even heavier! It's honestly so versatile, it's amazing.

There's a cool little door attachment as well. You basically close your door on it and it becomes a stationary point for you to pull against... Kind of like using a cable machine in the gym. Except at home, and for less than a month's cost of a gym subscription! It also comes with 2 hand attachments for upper body workouts, and 2 ankle attachments for lower body workouts. Finally, there's a nice storage bag to store it all in.

Overall, very impressed, and highly recommend!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Helping me lose that COVID weight and get fitter
Name: Vince Marsters
Review:
For me to want to do physical exercise, it has to be enjoyable, otherwise my motivation drops. Thankfully I found the IECO Resistance bands and the enclosed exercises to be just that.

In the box you get 5 different round resistance bands with claimed resistance levels of 4.5, 9, 13.6, 18.1 and 22.7 KG (10, 20, 30, 40 and 50 UK lb), with each being a different colour. Whether they do provide this resistance, I couldn't say but I did not other reviews suggesting that the resistance is half the claimed (so a combined resistance over both arms as you use both for virtually all exercises. They have strong carabineer style clips on each end, allowing you to attach the straps easily. They do self-close making them safe to use. The stitching on the straps is good and they feel like they will last for ages. Along with the straps you get a pair of hand straps, a pair of ankle straps and a door jam/anchor. Finally you get a bag just big enough to store everything in and the instructions I mentioned above. I felt the instructions would have been better if they were printed on a larger sheet - almost like an instruction poster - as they give you loads of different exercises you can follow to target different muscle groups. Most of these exercises are suitable for all, although I did find a couple were more taxing for me as I have historic lower back troubles and bending over can cause me problems if not done carefully.

Overall, these are well made resistance bands that are gradually helping me loose that extra COVID weight I have put on so far this year. Unlike going to a gym (where I lose motivation within seconds), I am able to do these exercises at my own pace at times that suit me best. I am also finding some of them enjoyable to do, only helping me keep the motivation to carry on.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Good for total workout / body conditioning
Name: Jordy98
Review:
iECO Resistance Bands Set, 5 Stackable Resistance Bands with Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carrying Case for Working Out, Fitness Training, Yoga, Exercise Workout Bands with Handles for Women & Men

Nice set of 5 coloured exercise / workout bands for full body conditioning with varying weight resistance.

Great for working out at home, in the gym or on the go anywhere as the contents of the bag is reasonably lightweight and compact so can be easily thrown into handbag, rucksack etc

The weight resistance of the bands is from 10-50lbs in 10lb increments. If you have the upper body strength the bands can be used together. So you can get a really good workout.

The bands come with handle grips, ankle straps, door anchor and a compact carry bag with draw string handle. ( some exercises included with the bands should you be a beginner) I found the font too small personally.

I am unable to comment on price as it was not available at the time of writing this review.

I hope you found this review helpful.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Effective workout for a low price
Name: DON PAN!K
Review: I am pretty new to resistence band training, but I am a convert.  They are very versatile, cheap to buy and easy to store or carry.  This is a very cheap set, but it will do everything you need to start off.  The difference tends to be in the thickness of the tubes and the comfort of the handles.  These handles are OK - not the best - but at least they are quite short which I prefer.  The door anchor has a smaller than usual foam block - but it still works OK.  There is  weight resistence marking of the resistence value of the tubes - but you get to know the colours and the numbers don't really mean anything other than at the top end of the variable resistenceThere are plenty of videos on line that show you a range of excerces to do.  Bear in mind that the more the tubes are stretch the higher the resistence.  So it is variable - and you can adapt it to suit yourself by using one or two fit to anchor - or even wrapping around a foot.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: I like these! I'm gradually improving and it feels rewarding
Name: Bueberry
Review:
There‚Äôs so many positive things I can say about these! Okay so I‚Äôve never had upper body strength and I‚Äôm a 24 year old female. Even when I went to the gym I would almost never train my arms since I was embarrassed at how weak I am- heck even my fiance‚Äôs 10 year old brother is stronger than me and I wish I was joking. So atlseast with these I can exercise at home and there‚Äôs five different resistances. I started off with 30lb‚Äôs and within a couple of days I figured I‚Äôd go up to the 40lb for a challenge since I didn‚Äôt feel like I was working hard enough. I‚Äôm feeling a gradual improvement and I think once I move up and get used to 50lb then I might consider getting weights. But for now these are wonderful because it‚Äôs not excluded to upper body workout.

It comes with detachable handles and velcro straps so you can choose what you need and the metal clip is sturdy so I can't see them ever breaking. Out of the options I use the handles and they‚Äôre not made of cheap foam that‚Äôll rip in the future: they‚Äôre soft, squishy, and they don't become hard to hold when my hands get sweaty. However I haven‚Äôt and probably won't use the door anchor since I live in a rented flat and the doors are really thin and cheap so I can't say if it‚Äôs any good. I also like how each band is labeled with the weight in LB and KG since I can‚Äôt always remember the conversion.

I‚Äôm 5ft 3.5 so I was worried the bands will be too long once I received my stuff but, at least for the exercises I‚Äôve been doing, they‚Äôve been fine and I haven‚Äôt had any issues- I‚Äôve been doing all the basic arm exercises, plunges, and squats. I even tried pulling them really hard to see if they‚Äôd snap but it didn‚Äôt do anything so I‚Äôm confident they wont break if I end up misusing them haha.

Ps the cat isn't included

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: pappawookee
Review:
I got these as a nice way in to starting to combat my middle-aged spread without having to sign up for a gym or buy sets of weights.

SO far they seem durable, well made and there's a plethora of exercises and regimes to follow dependant on size, desired effect and ability so am sure this will keep me occupied for a long time.

Please note though that these can cause hysteria and endless comedy fopr your family members if you attach them to a wardrobe because you're too impatient to wait till said family are out to test them........they are strong enough to pull a wardrobe down on top of you!

This does have the added bonus that you have to bench pres a wardrobe off of your sad fat self as well as several hours of uncontrollable violent laughing by your daughters after they heard their dad scream like a little girl as the wardrobe toppled on top of him which I'm sure will have given them a full body workout too as they creased and collapsed giggling at their father.....

All in all a good all-round family friendly (?!) bit of kit.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: A good add on to your gym routine
Name: Mrs K
Review:
Pros:-
-They come in a handy bag that keeps all your bits together so they don't get lost.
-The bands, when put together go up to 68kg where a lot of others only go up to 58kg.
-You get hand grips, leg straps and a door attachment, which is great as it means you can use the bands for lots of different exercises.
-You can do many different exercises with these bands and there is a helpful instruction booklet with the basics in them.
-The bands have written on them what weight they are in pounds and KG.

Cons:-
-There's always a fear that with these kinds of bands that they will snap so I am quite wary of not over doing it with them.
-The booklet that has the exercises in could be bigger so the buyer knows more of what they can do with the bands.
-A lot of the exercises can be done with the door attachment. However, when the weight is increased you become very aware of the fact that this could damage the door. Also, some people recommend that you should attach the weights via the hinges so you wouldn't damage the door, but these bands do not say that this is the best option.

I hope you find this review helpful.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Judit Sz
Review:
This was reviewed by my personal trainer friend, here are his thoughts:

iECO Fitness Resistance Bands Set
- firstly resistance bands can be used on their own and in combination with free weights too for greater stimulus, volume and gain (because eg during a biceps curl bands can generate greater resistance in the middle range of motion than the dumbbell on its own and thus bands can compensate for the differences in muscle force production) studies show that subjects combining bands with weights improved their 1 rep maxes twice as much compering to those working with weights only
- they are great for warm up before jumping into heavy weights and for stretches too
- the set is reasonably priced
- handles and straps are good quality
- the different lengths of the bands will provide a full body workout as it can be used for all types of exercise and muscles
- the user guide included has plenty of exercises and show proper techniques
- the door anchor doesn't seem to seem to work as intended with my door but otherwise it's a good idea as I always find it hard to attach the bands to something

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Great bands set at a bargain price
Name: Mark Smith
Review:
This is a review of a free item I was sent for evaluation.

First Impressions:

This set of iECO Fitness Resistance Bands arrived in an eye-catching retail box which wouldn't look amiss on the shelf of a sports shop, and would make a lovely gift for someone.

Features & Description:

The bands come with a carrying pouch, which for once has ample room so you don't need a degree in space management to fit everything back into the pouch when you want to.

There are 5 bands in the set, each requiring a different amount o force to stretch them (more on that below). You also get:

An exercise poster
2 x Handles
2 x Ankle straps
1 x Door anchor

It all seems well made and should hopefully last some time.

Setup and use:

The bands are colour coded to represent the amount of force required to stretch them:

Yellow - 10lb
Red - 20lb
Green - 30lb
Blue - 40lb
Black - 50lb

You attach the handles on one end and either the door anchor or ankle straps on the other, and proceed to exercise in your chosen way.

Opinion:

This is a great set of resistance bands, and you can really feel the workout. They are ideal, especially during lockdown when trips to local gyms aren't possible, or for someone who just wants the convenience of exercising at home. Recommended.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: DHCOL
Review: I have loved using these the last month or so and has been great for keeping my fitness levels up while avoiding the gym. I like that you can but various bands together to get the resistance you want. It comes with a door hook so you can thread them through once you have wedged it between your door and frame. You can then do multiple workouts depending on what muscles you want to work out.There are ankle straps so you can do leg work outs, and handles for your hands. I wish the action was a little smoother when using the handles as they can get stiff while in use I mean they don‚Äôt rotate very freely under pressure. They could do with engineering some bearings into them on the next iteration. Obviously that would cost more but would be a nice addition. They all pack away pretty small into a little bag provided so are easy to take anywhere with you.Apart from the handles they are great and can recommend getting a set.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Kwanele Tuakli
Review:
I've got mixed feelings about this kit. I wanted to try this because I previously had a similar kit where the bands for similar to the kind of bungee chord that you might use to strap something to a bike and one of them failed while I was using it (a thoroughly unpleasant experience). I hoped this kit would be better, and in some ways it is, in other ways not so much.

The Good:
They are a solid rubber tube construction which will hopefully be more durable than the previous ones I tried. The end connections are an interesting design; I look forward to seeing how well they last. The fact that there are a selection of strengths adds versatility; you can work you way up through the strengths then combine them to further increase the strength.

The Bad:
The ankle straps are awfully designed. The attachment ring is located such that when you actually apply even moderate force to it, the velcro peels open (see photo). The resistance bands are different lengths (by as much as 5cm), so using more than one at a time is a less than ideal experience.

And the Meh:
The handles, the door anchor and the bag are passable I guess. The "user guide" is a single A5 piece of paper with a total of 8 exercises on it; don't let it sway your decision (see photo).

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Average set, ankle straps useless though.
Name: M. Babb
Review: This is a fairly middle of the road set of resistance bands, and far behind the best I've seen.The weights going from 4.5kg (10lbs) to 22.7kg (50lbs) means you can have a good workout and double them up if necessary to increase up to nearly 70kg.The carabina hooks at the ends are a bit of a let down though, as the strap is quite wide and takes up much of the inside of the hook until you apply pressure to scrunch the band down one end (see picture of ECO compared to others I have).  The hook could have been bigger or a better termination of the ends in general.The hand grips have a D ring so attach quickly.  They are soft and easy to use.  The door jam is quite soft and won't damage the frame, but it lacks a D ring, so you'll have to struggle attaching the carabina clip to it.The ankle straps have a long bit of velcro to keep them closed but the D ring is close to where the velcro joins up.  I found that when round my ankle, regardless of which angle I pulled from, the velcro just undoes straight away with force on the D ring.  It just peels off.  that makes them pretty useless, and I've not experienced that with any other bands I've had.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Decent set of budget resistance bands.
Name: The Cookster
Review: Resistance bands have really come into their own as a result of lockdown and people not being able to get into the gym.  Resistance bands are a great, versatile way of exercising at home - providing they are fit for purpose.  I now generally do a daily routine of 20-25 exercises using resistance bands.At a budget price, this is a perfectly serviceable set.  The latex bands themselves are of a decent quality, as are the carabiners.  You have to expect that some money will have been saved somewhere with a budget priced set - and with this one it is the foam handles and the ankle straps that let it down a bit.  The foam handles are a bit light on the amount of foam.  The ankle straps are narrow and have no padding at all, so while they will do the job, they are not the most comfortable.Given the shortcomings of the foam handles and the ankle straps, I couldn't give this product 5 stars - but for delivering a decent level of quality at a budget price, it certainly warrants 4 stars.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Bands that build muscle and tone
Name: Whitelilydove.
Review:
Thankfully there are more positives than negatives with this product. First the negative is, I thought they were hard plastic type bands but they are rubber style a bit like resistance bands.

The positives do make up for this. They work perfectly and are already building my muscle/toning as intended.

I love the different accessories that come in the pack and allow for use on the door for a different style exercise.

The clips on the bands are easy to use and are not too fiddly. And I love the bag it comes in to store away

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Good set but diagrams difficult to follow
Name: Mrs. A. Wright
Review: We are setting up a home gym for family in our garage .This set  seems to be ideal  because there is variation and lots of potential for progression. It comprises of 5 resistance bands ranging from 10lbs to 50lbs  which when used in combinations can give resistance up to 150 lbs.  It also comes with handles, ankle straps and a door anchor. All of these are contained in a drawstring bag. There is a small instruction leaflet with lots of diagrams but I must admit I found myself struggling i think it needs a bigger leaflet with clear diagrams The door anchor was easy but I found using the handles and ankle straps with the resistance straps difficult. Quite complicated and we are still working it out

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: L.C
Review:
This is a nice kit with lots of attachments. A lot of these kits just provide the resistance bands and nothing else so it's nice to see extra parts included
-
One big issue I had was with the velcro attachment. As the attachments were such a big plus to me I was a little disappointed to find the velcro not quite strong enough to hold during exercises and hence the 3 star review. This is still a great kit I would recommend. But this is annoying as the main worry with any kit of this type is the risk of the resistant bands coming free and catapulting towards you
-
As someone else mentioned, the weight is determined in the centre of the resistance band. so it's not like having a 22.7KG dumbell in each hand, it's technically half that. Not a fault but just something worth knowing before ordering
-
Overall a good kit that contains more than most other. Would recommended it. Price doesn't seem too bad at ¬£19

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Brilliant - but there's lot of choice
Name: The Bear Facts
Review: I've been using these on-and-off for a month for a bit of exercise - they're surprisingly good, and as a gym user a few years back who liked big resistance machines, I'm surprised by how satisfying they are.So far I haven't broken them, myself or the door, though I'm not convinced by putting so much loading on bits of random furniture for the anchors. The straps and handles feel built to a price, but then, the whole kit is built to a price - a cheap one. It takes up less space than weights and works - and can be carried anywhere. I'm sold on the concept and these are perfectly good, but as with any of these random-brand items - you've got plenty of choice. You're unlikely to be disappointed with this set.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Incredible breadth of resistance training from a small box
Name: Craig Rouse
Review:
I have always been curious about resistance bands, always felt they were a bit DIY fitness (in the sense of a ¬£5 ab roller) but I am completely sold on these bands.

I am impressed by how many different exercises you can bash out with these, I have mainly used the door anchor from both below and above the door and it allows you to do anything from tricep pull downs to weighted leg raises.

If you are looking for something to do in the morning or if you're going to miss the gym because bleh it is Sunday and it's peeing it down and who wants that, then you can take this out and get a pretty complete work out and best of all there is no monthly fee!

I'll certainly supplement my current gym sessions with these but who knows, this might replace the gym altogether if I can figure out squats!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Fitness resistance bands with carry bag
Name: cll3
Review: Set of 5 resistance bands with hand holder included, door anchor and carry bag. They are 5 different colours, each with different weight so that you can progress on your training. They come with hand holders to attach to them so that it is easier to hold on to. It also has a door anchor for variance. It's also included a guide of exercises, and they are stackable and everything fits in the carry bag. Flexible, sturdy and lightweight. You can take it to the gym, on your travels or even for home workout. You can do all sorts of exercises to workout all your body. e.g. back, arms, legs and shoulders. For core, weight training and all sort of fitness. Highly recommended.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Jordy98
Review:
iECO 11 Pcs Resistance Bands Set

Good set of bands for full body workout

Great for use at home or on the go also perfect for using whilst waiting for a apparatus to become free whilst at the gym on a busy day.

The contents of the bag are fairly lightweight and come with a useful drawstring bag so they are easily transportable, they fit nicely in my large handbag with no problems.

The bands are for various weight resistance from 10-50lbs in 10lb increments so they can be doubled if you want more resistance for your training giving a really good workout.

The bands come with handle grips, ankle straps and everything you needed for a good body workout.

I am unable to comment on price as it was not available at the time of writing this review.

I hope you found this review helpful.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Great quality resistance bands for up to 150lbs of resistance workout.
Name: Smallvillenews
Review:
This is a great quality set of resistance bands, which include a door anchor, 2 hand grips, 2 ankle straps and a carry bag. There is also a small sheet, which is a user guide, with an example of exercises you can do using the bands.

Each resistance band has a resistant weight, yellow 10lbs, red 20lbs, green 30lbs, blue 40lbs and black 50lbs. Each band has an attached caribiner at each end, so you can attach them to the hand grips, ankle straps or door anchor, so you can perform a range of resistance exercises.

You can use the bands individually to build strength at an increasing level of intensity, or you can use several bands at once for up to a full 150lbs of resistance.

The bands are strong and securely fitted with reinforced links.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Vince
Review: I consider this one of my most valuable home gym additions. You can never go wrong with resistance bands, and being able to anchor them to any door makes them that much more valuable. Every part of this set is extremely well made, from the bands to the straps to the anchors.I am currently enjoying this kit. I use the door harness which as of right now, after 5 days of use seems secure. They give me a way stay creative with my workouts and give me a full range of motion. Great for on the go too. There is a carrying bag that makes it even easier. It's nice that there is a variety of weights and they are color coded so you can tell the difference. Weights range from 10lbs to 50lbs, so it's great for every level. It provides a great weights workout anywhere!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Jony & Mary
Review: There‚Äôs very little (if anything) to dislike about these resistance bands. They are adjustable and their versatility allows for them to be used to complete a large variety of exercises. Everything from curls, chest presses, toes, and even squats. The major determining factor for me was being able to adjust the weight up to 150lbs. Not only that but it comes with ankle bands and a block that allows you to attach to your doorway to get even more exercises. They even include a pouch if you want to take them with you on the go!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Sloppy snakes
Review:
This review is for the iECO 11 Pcs Resistance Bands Set - Stackable up to 150 lbs, Home Workout, Perfect Muscle Builder for Arms, Back, Leg, Chest, Belly

Think re really good quality resistance bands. Before I got these I was planning on getting dumbbells. But am I glad I did not. These work really well and super easy to store. You can change the weight by adding and removing bands. I have used for a couple days and will defo continue using this for my arms.

Come with a little bag to store it all.. perfect!

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Great set, ideal for bringing your own gym wherever you want.
Name: Barbara Fava
Review: I have been training with bands for a few years but I never owned my set.I saw this one and it is complete: it comes with the five bands, with different resistance, two ankle straps (which are not the best as they are very thin but I substituted them with another pair that I found here on Amazon), two handles, a door anchor, the travel bag, the instructions.It is the most practical thing if you want to train like at the gym while you are traveling or when you're at home.My husband is already aiming to start "stealing" this set from me to also be able to train at home and he is a professional athlete so great quality product.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Mostly good. Feel a little bit like they may snap, but they haven't yet.
Name: Mike
Review:
A pretty good set of resistance bands.

You get a nice bag to hold them in, carabina connectors for the various handles and different bands with different resistances that relate to weights.

The connections feel secure and the handles feel strong, but I can't help but feel like the bands may snap. I haven't noticed any tears as of yet but it just feels like they could go at any time.

Hopefully they don't and if they hold up then 4 stars out of 5. I will update if they do break at all.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Banjonic
Review: Great bands for exercise, I found these bands put less pressure on my joints, and exercises you can do in the comfort of your own home. They come in different strengths to suit your needs. The whole pack comes in a bag with a little exercise sheet.They seem strong and sturdy and you can anchor them over a closed door with the included attachment. You can use them individually or pair them up for more of a challenge. To sum these up, they are a great product and good value for money.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Adam
Review:
These will be good for when you‚Äôre stuck at home, maybe unable to go to the gym.

The quality is good but I've seen better. It comes with a cheap bag, nothing special but it‚Äôs okay.

The latex is very stretchy and you can group them together to get more resistance.

This bundle comes with a pad that hooks behind the door to help with anchoring. I‚Äôve actually found this quite useful.

It‚Äôs an okay bit of kit really for the price.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: SO
Review: I enjoy doing Gym at home and I don‚Äôt have a lot of space not fancy equipment to do my daily workout. I have never used resistance bands but since I have this set I discover how much I enjoy to use them and how much I can improve my exercises. I‚Äôm not a experienced working with resistance band but I can say it was the missing puzzle pice from my workout, so no experience is required. Nothing hard to do... and the exercises are fun with excellent results. Very easy to be used, flexible and the quality is good. For my daily home exercises those resistance bands are perfect and I‚Äôm happy with this resistance bands set

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Good quality, let down by lack of instructions & limited exercise information
Name: Stevie Robinson @johnnyutah66
Review: These resistance bands feel great to use. High quality. I wasn‚Äôt worried at any stage about the breaking. The grips are smooth and feel comfortable in your hands. The only let down was the lack of instructions. I still have no idea if I‚Äôm using the door anchor correctly and the exercises sheet included is hard to read it‚Äôs printed in such small print. I would like l to have seen a more detailed guide to the types of exercises you can use these great pieces of equipment with. It shows only 8 overall and doesn‚Äôt explain those very well. Overall I feel a little let down. I feel if I knew what I was doing properly with a bigger range of exercises these would be exceptionally beneficial.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Great for a complete home workout without all the gym gear and price tag
Name: Amazon girl
Review: The iECO Resistance bands come boxed and inside a drawstring bag for more mobile storage. It is clear once the bands are out of the bag that the strengths of each band are colour coded. They all feel really durable and well made. The door anchor, handles and ankle straps have the same strong and long lasting feel.After only 10 minutes of working out with these bands on a medium resistance level, I feel that these can offer a real full body workout from home with just this one set.Also, because of the thickness, I don‚Äôt feel the fear of the bands pinging into my eye or swinging at me. The grip is good enough and the bands are stretchy but not springy.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Mrs. A. Wright
Review: Good quality set.. Come in a rather nice box which neatly holds a good quality drawstring bag., The  set  consists of of 5 resistance bands with of various resistance from 10 to 50lbs .Combined resistances 150lbs There are  2 ankle straps and 2 padded handles  that have  rings attached. A door anchor is a good addition and easy to use.  Can be  used at home or gym. Come with an instruction leaflet. .We are in the process of setting up a home gym in our garage, an improvement on the makeshift one used  during lockdown and this is not the first set we have tried and though I find them a little difficult to use the rest of the family love them

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: SL
Review: These are a good set of resistance bands and come with everything you need. There are so many different options with these bands to work all different parts of your body so really are useful to have! They aren't the best ones I've seen but definitely better than others and for everything you get I think they are really good value

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: JFE
Review: used these for a whiel and the wife too, they work well nonthing crazy over the top but are helping out and i hate the gym feel like your being watched and judged to much at least i can do this from the comfort of my home.the handels and ankel strapes have been good and comfy enouugh too.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Home work out on a budget
Name: Adam James Winch
Review:
Brilliant little full work out kit all in one bag
5 bands included 10lb 20lb 30lb 40lb and 50lb
But you can clip more then one at a time tot he handle
Ideal for working out in small spaces where a full gym kit isn't possible
I have been using these around a week and they seem very well made and of good quality
All comes with and fits back in to the included bag

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment

Review:

The drawstring bag is also handy to keep all the bits together

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: karen
Review: I was pleasantly surprised with the versatility of these bands and how much they suited my needs. I am 6ft 5 and 19 stone and these bands suited my training regime and how well they stand up to my physical al sizeWouldn‚Äôt hesitate to recommend the product.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: Overall useful as you can use several at the same time. Not quite the rated resistance
Name: jdc
Review:
Pros
These are the same length, so you can add them together to increase resistance.
Good bag to carry in.

Cons
It probably doesn't really matter as you can stack them, but the 22.7 Kg band, when doubled up, gives only around 10 Kg of resistance, which is significantly different to the claim.
Ankle strap is useless and velcro will undo
Door anchor is good, but in general door anchors are not safe.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Title of Review: A good addition to the home gym
Name: El Jay
Review: The product came in as described. There was a carrying case which helps to store the item after everydays use. I don't know how accurate the weighing measurements are marked there but they are indeed different from each others proportionately. It is true that these resistance bands cannot replace the gym equipment but definitely help to stay fit for those who don't want to go to gym.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: Ces Kutz
Review:
I have always been a bit suspicious about using this just in-case they decide to snap but, these seem to be built very strong.
Easily attached to the top of my door.
The different weight suspension is very noticeable.
The carrying bag is a nice touch.

I personally feel the cords could be a bit thicker but, thats just me.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: TheNamelessReviewer
Review: Great compact kit which has a bag for easy storage.Does include some exercise graphics which if you need some ideas is a great start.Has handles and straps which are interchangeable on carabiner style clips.If you want something compact to start you off this is a nice set, be aware though the resistance levels are not very high.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment
Name: karina willett
Review: You get 5 band's, each band has it's strength printed on the end. The band's are stretchy silicone. I love can use these by using the door attachment.Very happy great set of band's I would recommend.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment

Review:
Loads of variants available to keep you from getting bored.

Good way to get back into exercise instead of joining a gym.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment

Review: With covid being annoying as it is, this was a great way to keep in shape. They feel very sturdy. I would think these cost much more than what they cost. Highly recommend these.

Review: Bought these at the beginning of lockdown 3 knowing that access to any sort of gym would be weeks if not months off. These fit the bill perfectly and are easy to store with the bag provided. The product is durable and there is endless exercises that can be done with them, all without the need for any dumb bells. Would definitely recommend and will continue to use in the future when COVID-19 is a distance memory, when too short on time to visit the gym.

Product: Resistance Bands, Exercise Bands Set w/ Handles, Door Anchor, Ankle Straps, Carry Bag, Workout Guides for Pilates, Yoga, Physio, Home Workout Equipment

Product: Foam Mats Interlocking Foam Floor Mats 20 Piece Large Gym Mat Exercise Mats Gym Flooring Floor Protector for Floor Mat Workout or Gym Equipment at Home Foam Rubber Mat Foam Floor Tiles 30 x 30 x 1cm
Name: Alice
Review: These mats are a great product and very good value. Perfect for me to do my online dance classes and kids to do their martial arts to keep ourselves healthy during isolation. I bought one set and went back for a second so I could connect both sets to make a really large one. It comes in a handy zip up bag so it's easy to tidy away. The Jigmats company were super helpful and acted above and beyond when I had some issues with delivery.

Product: Foam Mats Interlocking Foam Floor Mats 20 Piece Large Gym Mat Exercise Mats Gym Flooring Floor Protector for Floor Mat Workout or Gym Equipment at Home Foam Rubber Mat Foam Floor Tiles 30 x 30 x 1cm
Name: Paul Green
Review: I started with Jigmats, and massively underestimated the floor coverage space meaning I had to wait for a while for more to be imported during COVID.The mats themselves are exactly as it says on the tin. Out of 9 packs, I've probably had 4 faulty tiles, so that's not a bad statistic. The more recent batches have more of a chemical smell to them than the first lot - could be because they're fresh out of the factory and haven't been in storage as long, or maybe they're using more aggressive rinses as they come off the cutter.They do exactly as they say on the tin, they provide padding and I've got some fairly weighty gym equipment on them - I reckon it'll permanently indent over time, but that's what you expect with EVA foam.  Only thing I would say is be careful with measurements - whilst they are technically 30cm square, if I'm not mistaken about 10% of that is overlap on each edge where they interlink - I've probably thrown away 10% of the foam that comes in the packs as it's all removable edging strips.

Product: Foam Mats Interlocking Foam Floor Mats 20 Piece Large Gym Mat Exercise Mats Gym Flooring Floor Protector for Floor Mat Workout or Gym Equipment at Home Foam Rubber Mat Foam Floor Tiles 30 x 30 x 1cm
Name: P. Henniker
Review: I bought the mats to protect the floor from damage when using exercise equipment. 20 mats 30x30cm is enough coverage for one machine ie bike or treadmill etc. A second set was needed for general exercise with weights or video. The mats seem of a more dense material then the larger size (1x1 metre). When they are all connected together with the machine mat they are non-slip. A good buy for home gym workouts. Recommend.

Title of Review: This is a sturdy little set of mats
Name: Zee
Review:
The pack measures a total of 1.86 square metres coverage. The sides are jigsawed out so you can either have the side flat or joined to another piece, so the outer edges look neat and straight.
Each tile is 30cm x 30cm and a centimetre thick. One side is bumpy for grip, whilst the other side is flat.
I will be using these in my garden in summer for my grandkids to have somewhere soft to sit and play but have laid them out in the living room and they all fit well. They will also be used for my son to use his weights on until summer, so it really is a bargain for me getting a few uses out of them for a very good price.
I have tried to show how they interlock, the edges and the thickness in the pics i took. Hope this helps.
Would definitely recommend and will probably be buying more for my shed in time. (p.s. shed is not a tardis floating somewhere in time.. i am very good with words you see...)
Seriously though they are very good quality and i'd definitely say worth the money. Hope this helps.
Arrive in a handy little carry bag, well packaged and on time.

Name: Scott McD
Review: I find it hard to go out on the bike when the temperature is below zero....so I bought a smart turbo trainer and put it in a spare bedroom on the white carpet. To protect the carpet I needed a mat. So after checking the reviews on Amazon I bought this one.The pack of mats comes in a neat carry bag (I guess if you wanted to take it part and take it about).The edges come off so that you can interlock the tiles. The edges aren't all the same so its a little bit of a fiddle to get the last few edges right to get a tidy perimeter.The foam is soft. Its not a hard plastic mat. I found this helps to keep the noise transmission down.The foam marks quite easily(see photo, with groves from front wheel support after 2 weeks use) ) but hey, my carpet is fine  and that's what I bought it for.

Product: Foam Mats Interlocking Foam Floor Mats 20 Piece Large Gym Mat Exercise Mats Gym Flooring Floor Protector for Floor Mat Workout or Gym Equipment at Home Foam Rubber Mat Foam Floor Tiles 30 x 30 x 1cm
Name: Darkstar
Review: These are good mats, once laid they are quite non-slip but to be sure I used double-sided tape on the outside line.As other reviewers have mentioned, you should reckon on losing around 10% of the area coverage due to the interlocking edges: I calculated for 3 boxes and had to buy an extra box of which I used just over half. The interlocking system works well however, and all the tiles I purchased were fine, no duff ones at all.The cushioning is good but not so soft that it affects your balance or stability. They seem to wear well but I haven't had them long enough to give a proper opinion. Mine were laid on plywood flooring and there was no problem covering the joints or slight irregularities in the floor.I am pleased with this purchase and would recommend them. 5 stars.

We put laminate floor insulation underneath the tiles as we are working in a garage.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Name: PrincessPanoulie
Review:
There are a few things I don't like about this tower which I will list in order from most annoying to least annoying:
‚Ä¢ There is a horizontal support bar at the bottom of the structure and because the bar you hang off is almost directly above that support bar it is very likely you will kick that bar when doing pull ups or chin ups
‚Ä¢ The grips for both the dips and the push ups are made of a very uncomfortable hard plastic which resulted in me having to modify them by wrapping them in some foam padding (it's worth noting the pull up bar is comfortable as it is already coated in a foam layer)
‚Ä¢ The arm rests used for the captain's chair have already split in the very thin layer of fake leather they are made from and have needed to be completely wrapped in duct tape to stop them falling apart (I've only been using this tower a month)
‚Ä¢ The pictures on the product show a completely different product to what you will get. The actual product is far less sturdy looking. It will hold your weight fine but it does creak quite a bit even when the bolts are well tightened. In general it feels much more cheap than the picture portrays
‚Ä¢ When I initially bought the product the wrong thing was delivered to me, however to their credit the sellers did dispatch the correct item immediately after being informed.

Other than these problems the tower has been functional and getting used several times a week for just over a month now and it works okay for its intended use. If I were to buy again I would buy a different tower and probably try to find one with a better structure such as a stronger one without the kick bar (but like I mentioned the pictures are misleading for this product so beware)

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Name: Trouble
Review: Product never lined up, so. I could not put it together

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Title of Review: Decent, but not without its flaws.
Name: Bhupinder S
Review:
Not a massive reviewer, but thought it worthy to give the average person‚Äôs outlook on this...

Ok so I took the plunge to buy this power tower with lockdown 3.0 coming into effect and well I needed some extra motivation shift the festive indulgences, with the ambition to get traction on doing pull ups and dips.

**Positives and negatives - Broadly categorised **

*Price*: Let's start with the price, I paid ¬£145. Seems reasonable, yes there are a few cheaper units out there though pay particular attention the metal fixings and supports. I felt this structure and extra supports beneath the dip‚Äôs arms are vital. The dip L-shaped design is actually welded to the main arm each side, with nice even welds.

*Material*: The metal is tubular, or more oval "0" shaped and feel thin, a little too thin. but having said that once it is assembled seems sturdy. Easy to move which is a bonus.

*Stability*: This isn‚Äôt bad. Yes, granted it isn't a solid unit and hangs together with nuts and bolts, which incurs some degree of flex but even with that it is a slight wobble at best. Technique will prove to be the clincher here. Once you get into good rhythm it is hardly noticeable. *I haven't been able to test out the pull up action, as you'll soon come to find out why below :/*

*Padding*: Not terrible but it will do.

*Quality*: Mine came with a few subtle flaws and well a terrible one.

Minor ones: Plastic moulding for the feet came squished and malformed. Makes it incredibly difficult to squeeze on without damaging the plastic (see pictures). Perhaps pre-soaking them in warm water might make this task a little easier, but it is an inconvenience. One of the supports bars came bent, needed some persuasion to try and flatten out, still not 100% but ok.

Terrible one: The pull bar does not align. The bolt hole which is pre drilled is out of alignment making it impossible to attach the top bar without drilling out the hole. Not good when you finish assembly and probably the last thing that you'll attach.

^ This is raised back to the seller, still awaiting an outcome ^

Word of caution on the nuts and bolts they are M8 diameter, but the lengths are fractionally different. Best to lay out the bolts at the beginning as it is easy to pick the wrong one up if you scramble around in the bag. The nuts are plain nylon lock nuts so won't wobble loose.

I hope this give you an idea of the type of tower that you'll receive.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Name: warwick bergin
Review: The product is as described. I am not unhappy with it. Disappointed with aspects. For dips, the grips aren't great. In fact, none of the grips are partuculary great. Hard and slippery and can hurt the hand. I weigh 90 kilos and the frame wobbles somewhat when I dip. However, for the price, a useful bit of kit and I don't regret the purchase.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Title of Review: For the price a good item
Name: Oliver Edwards
Review: Biggest bugbear was no assembly instructions included, only a YouTube video which didn't show which screws / bolts went where. Figured it out after a bit of trial and error. Looked at numerous options and went with this as I thought for the price it would be a good compromise as you can spend anywhere up to ¬£400 on similar items. A month in its doing the job fine. A bit wobbly on using the dips bars but nothing concerning. I'm 14 stone and it feels sturdy enough so as long as it lasts I'm very happy with it.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Title of Review: Not good if your a big and heavy
Name: j.kay
Review: Suitable for slim people - it‚Äôs just not sturdy or strong enough for heavier people. They should give a weight limit in the sales pitch. I‚Äôd pay more if they had a heavier one

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Name: P. Winchcombe
Review: Instructions are clear although diagrams are small and all the bolts come as a single package, so telling which bolt goes into which piece is a challenge. Don't tighten anything up till you have fitted all bolts.  Do not fit arm rests till the dip bar is fitted as they get in the way of the bolts for tightening.  One bolt pulled itself out of its thread but since there are 3 other bolts holding the dip bar am not concerned. Platform is stable in use. The pull up bar central covering is soft foam, would have preferred the harder better wearing plastic of the other pieces but does make it comfortable.  Overall I think it is a well fabricated piece of gym equipment, now I just need to work on my strength!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Power Tower - Multi Function Pull up Station for Strength Training - Dip Stand Workout Fitness Bar - Push up Equipment of Home Gym Exercise
Name: Adrian Daniel
Review:
Serviceable home gym equipment
All of my family can find their favorite exercise on this power tower. It does help us in health improvement and strength training with little space.
1. Come with easy instruction and it is very handy for assembling which makes it a great power tower for lazy and busy people.
2. Height adjustment, comfortable materials and sturdy construction let my family take more exercise than usual.
3. Easy to use, and storage. I was worried about workout but this power tower makes me confident in keeping exercise.
4. Good customer service which solves my problem quickly and give me useful advices about every aspect of this item. Such a nice shopping experience!
If you want to buy a great multi gym power tower, this item is a real help.
And it is also worth to buy for your family or send as a gift.

The pads on bottom probably suit a more flat non cushioned surface. On carpet I don't know how much they add and finally it can wobble but it is till sturdy.

Name: David

Fortunately our landlady who rents out rooms is deaf. How we came by her is a long story. However, having been assured that she was a petite breed. We took our pet home.)  The vet recommended an exercise program. We fear eviction if discovered. Great product.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Title of Review: Cheaper is some times the best way to go
Name: Samantha Carter
Review: I have to be honest I searched around for a while looking at various Hanging Abs Straps. As usua,l there were all sorts of prices, but then I stumbled across these. They weren't necessarily the cheapest but they were definitely in the lower price range. However, when I looked further there were loads of positive reviews on Amazon and I mean loads. I decided to give them a go and I have to say I wasn't disappointed. The straps themselves are very well made with thick straps and  strong carabiners. The parts which support your arms are made from a strong neoprene type material (could be something else) which has a soft inner to it, so it doesn't rub on your arms or clothing. I absolutely cannot fault this item. It is strong yet small enough to put in a gym bag and a really good all round purchase. Best of all it does just what it is supposed to and brings a greater challenge to any abs workout.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Title of Review: Quality gear at a fair price.
Name: ryan james
Review: Haven‚Äôt really used these a great deal yet, but the quality in the product is obvious.  I‚Äôve never used Ab Straps before and it takes a few attempts to get your positioning right, but once it is you can really get a good core workout without fear of your grip giving out.If you‚Äôre worried about finding some quality straps to trust in supporting your weight then I would choose these as the quality of the product is second to none.  I weigh 80kg and feel well supported.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Name: joe
Review:
These are fantastic , good quality and a great way to train abs and core without putting strain on the lower back the way floor / bench Based ab exercise can..

As somebody with a recurring femoral nerve pinch and tight piriformis muscles these are a god send , they will allow me to strengthen abs and core without risk of aggravation to my lower back...

Spent just 10 minutes with them today , enough to tell they‚Äôll likely be my go to ab trainers ,

A great addition to my home gym and hang nicely on the power rack, quick and easy to remove and the carabiners look solid.

At this price it‚Äôs a no brainier.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Name: Anon.
Review:
These do exactly what they are supposed to, comfortable, sturdy (I'm 15 stone and have, after a little trepidation, trust in them), and well made.
I don't have access to a pull up bar to hang them from but have improvised by using an adjustable pull up bar as used at home and placed in a door frame, but instead of using in a door I use across the loft hatch in our garage.
The only 2 potential downsides I can see have been pointed out previously:
1. They are short (I'm 5.7 so usable for me, but anyone taller might struggle)
2. The carabiners are not the strongest and a little sharp at the catch point.

Overall however they are a perfect for my needs so I would recommend...

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Name: Johnny
Review: These work well, they seem sturdy but I did replace the clip as that did not look like it would last, and I did not want it to fail whilst I‚Äôm hanging around.You can get a great workout with these, my only major issue is the size, they could be bigger. The pads you place your arms onto is too small and you can quickly find you need to pause between reps to adjust if there is the slightest movement, or it becomes uncomfortable. Also the clip location on the strap is too close to the hanging point so it doesn‚Äôt sit correctly and keeps wanting to ride up over the bar and cross loading the clip.These could be great, but they are just ok due to design flaws.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Name: FMcS
Review:

I have a pull up bar in my garage and these pull up straps are now attached.

Their sturdy, effective, good quality. My fear when buying them would they suit my size. I am 6'5" long arms so I thought they might be short or ineffective.

Not the case their perfect for people with long arms.

I would highly recommend if your thinking of this product.
