One thing that may need looking at is that this type of metal spring action closure attachment device allows rapid fitting and removal and that is great. However, these do have some sharp edges due to the design. So they do catch a bit on the webbing loop over a long time this may start to tear the webbing. I may add a climbing rated metal loop so that the metal on metal avoids this. Like a decathlon ¬£2.99 quick link or something.

Product: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Knee Raise Straps Gym Equipment for Men and Women
Title of Review: Superb straps, a genuine game changer for abs workouts
Name: Mark

Right now coughing hurts, that good hurt - really shows how with straight hanging raises you're not isolating the abs as well as you think and your grip and forearms prevent you from reaching real failure. Love them!

These items are cheap, nasty, dangerous, imported, plastic toot. If you train regularly, do NOT expect them to last more than a matter of weeks.

They were an acceptable temporary replacement during lockdown, when everyone decided they were going to start training at home, and prices for legitimate high-quality gym kit skyrocketed.

Name: RussDouglas222
Review: I've had basic hand-grip strengtheners before, but this adjustable one was new to me and I was already after one of the rubbery 'band'-style strengtheners too.This five-piece kit arrived promptly and I already love it, no instructions supplied though common sense seems to be working.Only the 'Trumpet'-style finger exerciser feels a little shaky, but no complaints for this excellent price-point.

Product: AOMEES Hand Grips Strengthener Exerciser Equipment, 5 Pack Hand Finger Grippers Exerciser Strengtheners

Review: I bought these strengtheners to help me strengthen my grip after I broke my wrist. They have definitely done that and the whole set is an absolute bargain! Delighted with results.

Product: AOMEES Hand Grips Strengthener Exerciser Equipment, 5 Pack Hand Finger Grippers Exerciser Strengtheners
Name: Naveed Khan
Review:
This is a very decent piece of kit that comes with a variety of ways to help with hand excercises. As a pianist, the finger stretcher is working well for me in loosening up before playing. The excercises give your hands a real burn as well, which is great if you want to practice while not actually on the piano.

The adjustable grip trainer has a surprising amount of resistance to offer. The fact that it is adjustable is great as you can increase the resistance as you get stronger over time. Of course, time will tell how durable the kit actually is. But for the time being, it feels sturdy in it's weight and feel, which is always a plus.

Overall, great kit. Does the job it advertises to do.

Product: AOMEES Hand Grips Strengthener Exerciser Equipment, 5 Pack Hand Finger Grippers Exerciser Strengtheners
Title of Review: Easy to use exercise tools for hands and fingers
Name: Pete
Review:
In the past I suffered a serious compound fracture to my right wrist, which had a pretty devastating effect on the strength in that hand. The only thing I was given at the time to exercise my hand and fingers was a squooshy ball, okay it had a smiley face on it but still.

I found a couple items in a local sports store that I bought, one of which the foam handle decayed and fell to bits within 12 months and the second was lost on our third house move, annoying as that was a much better item. So a couple years later I went looking for a replacement and found this.

Now this thing is interesting in several ways. I've never had a finger exerciser before not like the rubber band contraption in this thing, and I was actually quite surprised how weak my fingers were in relation to my grip, and how difficult it was for me to expand my fingers. Hopefully now that I have something to exercise them this will change. The egg is very similar to the squooshy ball I had, and the ring I'm uncertain about. Not really sure what that achieves that the other items don't. Oh well. The best part of this set though is the adjustable grip exercise tool. My old one was a simple spring loaded tool which you squeezed. It helped to strengthen my grip and work my forearm muscles, again, improving grip. This one is much better. The tension is adjustable to quite a fine level, so easy to set up for myself and then adjust down for my wife. I should have looked around ages ago to see what was available rather than just carrying on with the old one. Perhaps losing it was a message....

Anyway. I'm very pleased with this purchase. I suspect the egg thing will decay and turn into a sticky mess after a couple years, that sort of material seems to always do that. The elasticated finger tool may last a bit longer, but using that as a template I can probably make my own out of thick packaging elastic bands, or just buy a new one. Depends how stingy I feel at the time. The biggest seller here though is that adjustable tool. No perhaps I can really work on my old injury and get some strength and flexibility back in.

Delivery was quick, the whole thing was wrapped up nicely and it comes with a small bag to keep it all together. This is ideal for a regular exercise regimen and a good accessory to exercise following injury as long as you don't overdo it.

It‚Äôs easy to assemble and took me around 30 minutes on my own. Once assembled it‚Äôs very sturdy and the height is easily adjustable thanks to the screw locks.
The elbow bass and back bad are very cushioned and comfortable.
Overall I am delighted with this Power Tower workout system and for the following reasons I have decided to rate it 5 stars:
Easy to assemble
Very sturdy
Made from quality strong materials
Easy to adjust height
Easy to move

The handles and cable have been good however the pulley-wheel bearings are grinding and about to fail after only around 30 uses. Was bought in Jan this year.

The max weight I have on there is 45kg and the max published load is 100kg so it's not a case of coming even close to it's max load. Sad as the window to return is closed so am forced to spend an additional ¬£14 on a new pulley.

I still use this but also ended up buying the Hardcastle celing mounted pulley as that is just a tad more expensive but allows you to do back pulls without the weight swinging into your back. Overall, it is pretty good for basic weight pulls.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Russtafarian
Review:
I decided to write a review because I'm probably coming from a different perspective than most other users.
I'm 72 and used free weights with a workout bench, barbell and dumbbells at home for 30 years. A few years ago I decided it might be dangerous to stress my body to that extent because of my age and stopped using them. However I wanted to keep toned to maintain my independence while avoiding the risk of maybe being trapped under a heavy weight if I lost control of it because I live alone so there's no one to spot me. During Prime week (October) last year I spotted these resistance bands and decided they would allow me to limit the resistance to my actual strength safely. They are cheap and easy to store when not in use so I thought it was worth a try.
I have to say I am very satisfied with them. I have used them with and without the door anchors and initially just tried to replicate the free weights exercises which was fine but I found full body workouts that made better use of their properties by looking around on Youtube. I tend to use 70lbs for workouts - a combination of 50+20 with handles and 40+30 without so I can wrap them round my hands if I need a little extra tension. I'd advise workout gloves for that. For squats I add the 10lb band. I've also changed from doing 4 sets of each exercise twice a week to 2 sets for 4 days a week because I have Chronic Fatigue Syndrome so stamina is a problem, which is why I also bought en electric bike. I'm frankly surprised to find that not only am I maintaining my muscle mass, I'm actually gaining some in all areas and It only takes 20-30 mins per session which is an important factor for me. I guess I chose an effective workout routine.
Obviously it would be easy to increase all of the factors I've listed about my workout to achieve more gains but that is not what I am after.
Finally, the bands and extras are not showing any appreciable deterioration after a year. I found that the velcro on the ankle straps didn't hold hold very well so stopped using them pretty quickly but I haven't really needed them. A minor irritation is that the bag for storing them burst along a seam in a short time but now I just hang the bands on a supporting strut of a set of shelves when not in use. I do all the exercises in a fairly small space in my living room so there's very little disturbance to my day to day living routines.
I hope this will be useful to someone considering these.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Mr Martin Bromley
Review: I had a set of quality resistance bands that I bought from amazon.co.uk many years ago.  I won't mention the brand because I don't want you good reader to wonder if I am promoting it (I am not), but suffice to say their product was great.  I used this other set heavily during the pandemic as I was unable to go to the gym.  Eventually I decided to quit the gym because I realized I could do pretty much everything I needed with my resistance bands.  (OK I do still miss the squat rack and being able to do proper deadlifts, but still, I had enough.)From my previous set I mainly used the strongest 2 bands, labelled 30 lb.  For some exercises like hack squats (or my attempt at them using resistance bands) I used 2 30 lb bands together.  This provided a lot of resistance.  They were great.  But eventually one snapped.  I have no issue with this as I gave them a lot of use, so I looked for replacements.Unfortunately the product I had bought previously was only available as an US import from amazon.com, so I thought I'd try to find an alternative.  And seeing all the good reviews I picked this TakeMirth product.When I tried it my feelings were much more of annoyance and intense disappointment than mirth.  The clips are small, rubbish, and awkward to use, and the bands themselves offer little more resistance than the elastic holding up my shorts.  All 5 combined (including the one mirthfully labelled 50 lb) did not offer the same resistance as the 30 lb band from my previous set.I have lifted weights regularly for many years but I am not particularly strong - 182 cm tall and about 75 kg - my demands are not extreme.  This product is utter junk, I strongly recommend you do not buy it.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I gave one star because I don't think I can enter 0.Flimsy and poor quality. The stated tension ratings are way off, I don't think even combining them all (which would be difficult as the hooks etc are so small)  you would get the 50lb rating. I sent them straight back, not fit for purpose... DON'T BUY!

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Wayne Richardson
Review: I have multiple sclerosis and my muscles are weakening , I am also now a big lad due to lack of mobility, I was really impressed with the quality and durability for the price , I‚Äôve managed since having theses for a few days started to notice  core strength arm strength and leg mobility is starting to return , if you take your time small reps then slowly build it works fantasticalso can be used sat down in a wheelchair or a chair

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: JAnker
Review: Made for an exciting workout - one caribiner broke on the blue band while under tension and the red band bobble that should keep it in the webbing loop to attach to handle etc went right though the hole again under tension, I have had to tie several knots in it to make it usable. Not best quality, wish I had spent a bit more on a better set

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: KenH
Review: I'm a 30 year lifter so have a few issues to work around - keeping rotator cuffs healthy etc. I'm also a long term home trainer having had my power rack at home along with barbells and plates for over 20 years. These bands fill a gap for me in terms of some mobility and joint health whilst also being a handy item to take with me when I travel for work. I've no idea re the markings for kg/lbs but the bands can be swapped about to sort everything out that I need. Nothing has torn or stretched on me yet and given I squat 180 -200 kgs for reps and bench 125+ I think I'd have found weaknesses by now. My one minor criticism is I advent found anywhere to but a couple more of the strongest bands individually as that would let me get resistance to bang on for some exercises if using them in a hotel on an overnight stay. Other than that, great product, well executed and priced.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Chris C
Review: Ordered some as i have been re-habbing my rotator cuff and bands are excellent for that. Was surprised at how good they are and have ended up using them a lot more than for just light band rotator cuff exercises. I have been using for tricep extension, face pulls, lateral rasies and even tricep and bicep work. So good i actually bought a second set to give me more options with higher resistance to do things like crossovers and glute raises. Already recommended these to a friend at work - really good value for money and came really quickly.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Title of Review: Strong bands but guide is not good
Name: Amelia
Review:
I bought the 150lb version and the bands seem well made and strong.

However, one star deducted because the little leaflet "resistance band kit workout guide" is no good.

The images are so light and tiny they cannot be seen properly at all.

This needs to be bigger and clearer.

Now I am left hunting the internet for a guide I can actually read.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Title of Review: Good alternative to gym. Will save your gains through this pandemic
Name: Randolf
Review:
I'd like to say how quick the service was rather quick despite the COVID lockdown.

TO CONSIDER BEFORE BUYING: It'll take sometime to get use to it especially if you have been using normal weights. The rubber themselves are sturdy but you will feel anxiety of something snappy at the beginning until you develop your confidence with them. You will also have to accept that the tension will be varied throughout the rep. This will be an advantage and disadvantage depending on the workout. It will be up to you to figure how to adjust the reps.

PRO: very compact. Perfect for small spaces and travelling. I've been using them to workout in the park and it made my workouts more fun.

Really good for isolations, not too bad for compound movements.

CON: remember this are still rubber bands and they will lose tension as time goes. By that time you may have already got your money's worth.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Matthew Moule
Review:
I have owned a number of resistance band sets and bought these because of the higher weight rating. They also appeared in a GQ article on the top 5 resistance bands.

On the very first repetition the bands stretch and then lose the vast majority of their elasticity. This renders them pretty much well useless. With so little stretch and resistance left in the band you have no range of motion (imagine trying to use a rope to perform a bicep curl).

They appear to be made of a material that is entirely unsuited for the job they are supposed to do.

I‚Äôm surprised these have not been withdrawn and Amazon continues to allow their sale, let alone have the status of a recommended product.

Highly disappointing.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Bobby Meakin
Review:
I only have a few point s with this product and ill go through them, pros and cons.
Pros: They are easily portable in a compact little bag and so far seem and feel very durable, Easy to use and comes with a guide of exericises you can do with them, Everything you need for a quick home work out or when youre out and about

Cons: The handle grips fabric rubs on my hand and starts to hurt/irritate my hand which is annoying but hardly the end of the world, Sadly the door anchor fits under the door but not at the top, my door is just to tight sadly (more of a me problem but could affect others)

All in all for ¬£20 its a definete buy

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Title of Review: 50lb Band Snap in less than a week
Name: MR F.
Review:
I bought these bands based on the advertised durability after my last set failed within 2 months. Annoyingly, on this set, the 50lb band sheared / snapped within less than 5 sessions.

The failure occurred whilst doing a normal door
anchored chest fly using the equipment as designed.

There was no forewarning such as a nick or tear in the band, as I had with my previous set different manufacturer). The failure of the 50lb band happened suddenly and unexpectedly during the first week of use.

This leaves me with little confidence in the product and I am now awaiting the next failure.

If you‚Äôre going to make such bold statements in your sales pitch, you‚Äôve got to make sure the product stands up to the customer promise!

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Title of Review: Perfect for when I can‚Äôt get to the gym.
Name: Smiling Face
Review: These appear to be robust enough at the moment. As with all rubber material they will perish over time. But the handles. Hooks. Clasps. Straps. Seem fairly durable. I‚Äôve used a couple of bands together And it‚Äôs held up well. No sign of tearing or over stretching.I wouldn‚Äôt pay too much attention to the weight markings as these should only be used as a guide.The soft roller end that fits under and over a door is very good. I wasn‚Äôt expecting to use this but it very useful for over head pulls and for pulling from low to high across your body to work on your oblique and core muscles.They are not a cable machine replacement, obviously but are great to pack into your bag or use at home when the gym is too much of a hassle to get to and you just need a light weight workout.

Product: Resistance Bands Set Exercise Bands, Resistance Bands Set Men Home Workouts With 5 Fitness Tubes, 2 Foam Handles, 2 Ankle Straps, 2 Door Anchor, Carrying Pouch-Yoga, Pilates Physio Home Gym Equipment
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Listen, if I'd have wanted a really high quality product then I wouldn't have bought something on offer through Amazon. As it happens, I just want something that will do the job and these resistance bands will do that.
The ankle straps are a bit of a joke. As soon as the d-ring is pulled with even a small amount of force it instantly comes undone. A small amount of consideration would clearly demonstrate that this design isn't going to work. The d-ring ought to be separately installed in the middle of the strap to give the velcro the best chance of staying on. But am I really ever going to use the ankle straps? No.
Like others I also found a couple of the clips to be a bit defective but once closed they don't fall open so, again, I don't really mind.
For the price (¬£13.99 in the offer) I think they're good value but I wouldn't pay the full price for them. I'm sure that you can get a higher quality product elsewhere for that.
If I have any other issues with them in the future then I'll be sure to let you know.

EDIT: so it turns out I hadn't properly read the instructions for the ankle straps and when you use them properly they do work.

Review:
The two main struts do not fit together flush. This is fine if you‚Äôre doing flat bench exercises, but if you apply too much weight to the upper end (such as with an overhead tricep bend) then it will bend suddenly in the middle. When this happened to me I severely damaged my rotator cuff. Physio said it will take months to recover.

Make no mistake - this is cheap rubbish. I returned the first one but the second one also had the problem and gets worse over time.

If you have any respect for your body, then do not buy this item. Amazon should remove this seller. If I could sue I would.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: Build quality isnt bad, folds up well, not great for ab crunches, longevity: time will tell!
Name: Steve McC
Review:
First impressions review

I've been a gym goer since my teens and now into my 30's. I bought this and some adjustable dumbbells as after having a child found it hard to get into a gym routine.

The bench came well packaged and speedy delivery thanks to prime. The quality of the bench is a bit of a mixed bag. Looks really sturdy and has enough weight to suggest is was quality, so isnt a light weight cheapo bench you can get. Where it lacks is the stitching of the 2 fabrics on the back rest, it looks stretched already so unsure if this will stand up to regular usage, I'll update one I've I had it a while. One of the support bars for the back rest had a small tear in where the bolt goes through to connect to the bench itself, i cant see it being an issue but was really sharp.

It took me probably 30-40 minutes to build, likely take less time as I was fiddling in between.

I bought this particular bench as it has adjustable seat and foot bar so you can do ab crunches. Theres quite a significant design fault, the bench declines and you can adjust the seat BUT they are not level so your butt ends up in a lower position than your back which is really not comfy, theres then this massive gap between the seat and back rest so you then end up being partly supported by the frame of the bench, so metal frame in lower back.

It feels relative sturdy with minor wobble of mats. I've got 32.5kg dumbbells and would have no issue in believing this bench couldn't support this weight and myself in a number of the positions available.

It folds up well, but fiddly as no where really you can grasp onto but not a big issue.

I probably wouldnt buy again and may get a better know brand for similar money. As stated this is an initial review and will update once used a good few times.

I've scored 3* due to some of the build quality aspects I've mentioned and the fact after doing a set of 20 ab crunches you probably wouldnt want to do any more due to the discomfort it leaves you in.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Johura
Review: I brought this Winnow Adjustable weight Bench as I wanted to do regular exercise to lose some Body Fat especially around the Stomach. It is a great exercise Tool. I like that it has six different exercises that I can do.  I am happy with this product.

Review:
This bench is so versatile. I use it for a few different reasons in my garage gym I am putting together.
The bench requires very little assembly and folds down to a handy size for when you want to save some space.
The quality of the bench is very very good with a good level of padding to the seat and back rest area.
It can be used flat or on various different incline levels so you can use it as a bench for pressing or as a seat/rest for different exercises.
It‚Äôs very sturdy and does not move around or creek when lifting heavy weights.
Hi befall I am delighted with this multi use weights bench and for the following reasons I have decided to rate it 5 stars:
Easy assembly

Versatile
Well made
Sturdy
Looks great

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: geoffrey otway
Review: Awesome

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Jay collins
Review: This item was bought during the second covid lockdown and at the time it  was an amazing price. It was a realistic and at the time very cheap purchase. I do feel that it maybe a bit higher price for the quality of the bench. The bench is comfortable in itself to lie on or sit on. However I am not fond on the seat as the leather curls over the end with no support so if I lift it up for an inclined push up it flops round and is quite uncomfortable. It has started to show some wear and tear as the leather seems are quite poor quality and the staples keeping them together are coming out. I am also disappointed with the declined aspect of the bench as it goes way to far down to do declined bench press. Im not sure if it is me but it feels high when I try and attempt Hip thrusts. However for the incline and flatbench aspects which is what i mainly use it for its wonderful. Id recommend it but i would also advise to look for a cheaper and more appropriate alternative before hand.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: It‚Äôs OK but agree with other reviews
Name: Andy
Review:
Build quality of the steel frame is good and overall I‚Äôm fairly pleased with it and there is a but‚Ä¶.

Some of the trim fitting with staples have gone through the material at manufacturers and a couple of staples were loose. I repositioned them with the help of a small light hammer. Some of the stitching does look substandard but time will tell. It does come with a 1 year warranty so hopefully I won‚Äôt need it.

As a workout bench tho, yeah can‚Äôt complain. It‚Äôs comfortable when pressing your back into it and has most of the positions I require.

Folds down enough although not flat like with some others but good enough for me.

I think I might have got lucky with my order compared with some of the reviews so hopefully they‚Äôre trying to improve the build quality.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout

Review: This bench was not what  I expected  it looked really good  in the picture  but was not good  it was faulty  the metal  was not fixing together  the bench was easily  scratched it was very  difficult  to fix the position bar was weak it felt as it would  fall off  at anypoint  I would  not recommend this  bench to  any one if paying for this you  can  get something  better.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: Good solid bench, but disappointing decline setting
Name: SMitch
Review: This is a good, solid bench with several convenient settings for incline workouts.  However, there is only one setting for decline workouts. The backrest angles down to touch the floor. Whilst this may be suitable for sit-ups, for me it is too low for most decline dumbbell exercises.  I solved the problem by placing some weight-plates  on the floor and positioning the backrest on top of them. This gives a much better angle for decline workouts.  Although it is not ideal to need a workaround, it has solved the problem.  In conclusion, I think the bench good value for money (¬£89 September 2020).

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: Good value for the price, but not for die hard gym goers.
Name: Shira Clarke
Review: This is a good piece of kit at a reasonably low price. It was relatively easy to put together and generally comfortable to use with nice padding. However it is quite light weight so not very stable for moves such as supported rows (front) or hip thrusts.I brought it out of necessity when the gyms shut last time around as it was one of only a few available and it was quite cheap. If the gyms stay shut for much longer I would be looking to upgrade to a more expensive and sturdier model.Good value for the price though.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: You get what you pay for!
Name: Josh
Review:
I bought this as we are going into lockdown for an extra 6 weeks and I don't want to loose my strength. Anyone who actually trains in a gym will or should tell you that the build quality is pretty bad (bad stitching, cheap fabric and low quality cheap metal). This is fact. If you have used a proper bench before, it's easy to see that this is cheap and not well made, in terms of the material anyway.

However, I only bought it as it is cheap and I'll be back at the actual gym in 6 weeks, so all I care about is if it will hold me and my weights and after seeing some of the reviews here, it seems it will hold up (I'm 80kgs and will train with max 40kg dumbbells and max 100kg bar, so 180kgs max). However, the user rating is 110kgs and that's all they provide, so based on the build quality I wouldn't be surprised if that meant max weight (person + weights), but like I said, the reviews say it holds up for max weights heavier than mine, so be cautious and be incremental with your weights.

This is NOT a professional nor even near standard bench, so big and strong dudes, please be careful.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: If your stuck for space, I can safety say this is the best bench!
Name: Mat
Review: Great product! I‚Äôm honestly not the best at putting things together.. so I probably took longer getting everything together than the average person. This was even WITH help ;) But hey! It‚Äôs super sturdy and asides from struggling with attaching the seat.. everything fits nicely. There‚Äôs two pins included for setting an incline or decline, which is exactly what I needed for a good chest workout. Box weight is around 15KG with everything in there included! Looks great too and I was really impressed with the foam covers for the bottom. Super thick and comfy on your legs :) Glad I went for this! Done a lot of research into it since I have limited money and space. This the best I found and I stick with that opinion, despite my terrible instruction following skills ;)

Review: I weigh 87kg and the stitching on this has come away after around 8 uses of light working..Be wary about these top reviewers who claim this product is fantastic, you have been warned.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Title of Review: Ok for the home user but better benches out there.
Name: Paul Causon
Review:
The bench was easy to put together for the most part, but I could not get one of the bolts, for the backboard, to screw in. It looks like the holes for the bolts at the bottom of the backboard were just a fraction too close together. This meant that I could not line up the holes in the frame with those in the backboard. I tried lossening all the other bolts and the frame to line it up better, but after spending more than half an hour trying to get it in I gave up.

Also, there is a lot more movement in the frame when you pick it up than I would expect. It bends backwards very slightly when you pick it up and move it. That's not really a problem, because when you put it back on the ground it straightens back up again. It was just unexpected and made the bench feel slightly more flimsy than it is.

Overall I think it is sturdy enough for home use, but I have been bodybuilding for many years and I can tell you there are much better benches out there.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Price is reasonable.  Easy enough to assemble.  However, i'll admit that it's disconcerting when the bench moves at the folding point when doing some exercises.  It's handy to be able to fold it and store it, but not at the expense of having the bench feel like it's going to collapse when using it.  Although, it won't buckle completely when in use, due to the locking pin, but any sort of play when you're lifting weights is worrying.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Catr1na

Review: One of the worst amazon purchases I have ever made. The quality is terrible and the stitching is hanging on by staples. Looked past that and thought I'd build it anyway. The bolts will not screw onto the screws they just go on and no more.

Hoping they will see this review and send me a new top piece, once received it can have it's full 5 star review as it's really nice bit of kit for the money,

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Probably the most important factor for consideration when purchasing a bench is - ‚Äúwill this bench suddenly collapse in the middle of an exercise when I have 300lbs of weight hovering above my neck?‚Äù

The answer with the laughably designed Win Now bench is - ‚ÄúYes. Certainly‚Äù

It is designed in such a way that if the slightest amount of pressure is exerted towards the front of the bench then the back of the bench instantly collapses into its decline position!!! So‚Ä¶ imagine your benching pressing and by mistake your bum rides forwards a little, this bench will instantly collapse into its decline position and unless you have the strength of a lion and instinct of a cat, there is only one place that bar is ending up

It is unbelievably dangerous and for sure someone will kill themselves using this bench, if they haven‚Äôt done already.

I have no idea how a manufacturer can put this on the market and accept the liability that at some point someone is literally going to die.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout

My husband was stupidly excited to receive this item after having gone through 3 other benches he hasn't been happy with..

I'll start with the assembly, amazingly smooth! All parts and tools provided! He said the instructions were clear and concise. It took less than ten minutes to assemble and do ten situps ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è he then folded it with beautiful ease and moves it from my living room in to my garage where it now lives.

We've both had a go at doing weights on it and it's lush, the whole thing is adjustable so where he is 6'4 and I'm 4'9..ish initially accommodates the both of us.

Very impressed with this product. Thank you x

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Trebor
Review:
I‚Äôve been enjoying using this and learning all the different ways you can use them; I definitely feel more motivated to work out when I‚Äôve got the proper equipment! It came packed nicely in a mid-sized box and setup was very straightforward with easy to read instructions. Each of the parts were easily identifiable and the nuts and bolts were organised and labelled very well on a shrink-wrapped piece of card. It took around 35 minutes to build by myself taking my time to do it properly.

Once built, the bench feels very solid and doesn‚Äôt rattle or move around. Both the base and back are made from easy to clean PU leather and are surprisingly comfortable with plenty of cushioning. The foam rollers on the leg hold down are thick enough to put pressure on without feeling the bar inside. The back has 6 adjustments and the seat has 4, both are easy to move and firmly stay in place when set in position. The whole thing collapses into a more compact size that should fit under your bed; just fold the back down, pull the seat and frame pin out, unscrew the leg hold down and fold the unit together which takes less than a minute to do altogether.

Overall, I think everything about it is good quality and it was easy to build with a good set of instructions. There loads of exercises you can use it for, and it would make a useful addition to your home workout collection. I feel its competitively priced for what you get and I‚Äôm very happy to recommend this item!

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: M
Review:
I've not owned a weight bench before but I've used plenty when going to the gym where I made the most of them.

This arrived in a large box and was quite heavy to move.

As someone who likes to assemble things, this weight bench took me about 15 minutes to fully assemble while trying to read the instructions at the same time and getting distracted by friends who thought they didn't need any instructions!

This feels very sturdy and is capable of withstanding a lot of weight on it - it won't collapse on itself. When on the weight bench itself, it feels comfortable for the most part and when I lean back onto it, my back feels supported.
However, the quality is noticeably different from the ones at the gym - it's not as good but still does the job as best it can.

As mine is on carpet, I have little worry about it slipping but there are rubber grips for added security - it can be set up on different types of surfaces such as carpet, vinyl, wooden floorboards etc.

It is adjustable which allows it to be used for a variety of work outs - making it easier to stay fit in your own home. From setting it up at an incline to having it completely flat, this weight bench is definitely suitable for this.

One thing I love about this is that it folds up - as these weight benches take up so much space (which I don't have much of), it is a huge relief that I can just fold this up and store it away. When it needs to be used, I can unfold it, use it for as long as required, then store it away again - allowing me to make the most of the limited space I have.

Perfect for those wanting to set up a home gym - shake the dust off those dumbbells and barbells and start getting that summer body!

If this was helpful, please tap that helpful button below - Cheers!

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: Mrs. Hatter
Review: I've used this for a couple of weeks now within my new year efforts to keep up with my fitness and up my game a little now I get to spend much less time at the gym and it;s been a great motivator. My partner put it together for me, one because he's much better with these things and 2 because he uses all sorts of different benches at the gym, but I helped and to be honest could easily have done it myself following the instructions. It's good quality overall and pretty solid once put together and tightened and certainly solid enough for my lighter needs. I can adjust the position easily and when using it there's no worry about it moving or falling over as it stays in place very well. Although we haven't had to put it away yet it's great to know it's easy to fold up and move out the way when we need the space for something else. It's pretty much what I expected for this kind of price and I think a great option at this budget end of the market.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench Foldable Home Exercise Gym Workout Bench Incline Decline Flat Bench Press for Full Body Workout
Name: techpuppy
Review:
If you‚Äôre a reasonably adept flat-pack assembler then putting this WINNOW Adjustable Weight Incline/Decline Bench together shouldn‚Äôt be too much of a challenge. There‚Äôs an illustrated step-by-step guide included and it‚Äôs reasonably straightforward and takes about 20 minutes. Once together you‚Äôve got a sturdy and quite well finished incline bench that wouldn‚Äôt win any design prizes but is stable and functional. The padded seat and back panels are comfortable and have a decent vinyl covering. The back of the panels is less well finished with a non-woven fabric just stapled in place, but you don‚Äôt see that in use (or the photo‚Äôs) so maybe it‚Äôs not a big deal.

You can adjust the back through a wide range of preset angles, including dropping it to get a decline bench for ab‚Äô work. It‚Äôs easy to change the angle by just moving the prop from one retainer to the next and there‚Äôs no lock or key needed. The seat and padded leg brace are also adjustable but more awkward to set and you have to either use a push-in rod or a screw-knob to lock them into place. The bench folds more flat when not in use so you can slide it under a bed or put it into a cupboard. You‚Äôll need a decent amount of clearance around it when in use, probably about the same area as a king-size bed, but it‚Äôs not hard to slide it into a corner when you‚Äôre done.

Overall it‚Äôs a solidly-made decent piece of kit that‚Äôs flexible enough for a good range of exercises. It‚Äôs nothing special but seems pretty competitive compared to other incline benches and the decline option gives it an extra bit of functionality that some don‚Äôt have.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Title of Review: JX  Fitness Power Tower. I'm very satisfied with the product and I would definitely recommend it.
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Last year I bought a gym membership but most of the time the gym was packed so this year I decided to buy the power tower and workout in my own room. After using it for three weeks here's my review.
Pros:
-It's relatively easy to assemble even with little or no experience. I never assemble anything and it took me only three hours to put it together. Since I did it all by myself, I would assume that two people would assemble it in under an hour.
-It's very stable and sturdy. I'm actually surprised by how strong it is built. It shakes just a little when I use it but not enough to interfere with my workout and much less to fall over.
-It doesn't take much room. I'm a student and I keep the tower in my room.
Cons:
-Design could be better. The only design flaw that I can think of is how the push up bars are a little close to each other even for an average person. Your hands should be shoulder-width apart for an ideal push up. For a bigger person or someone with broad shoulders, doing push ups using this tower can be very difficult. However, I don't care much about this issue since I bought the tower mainly for the pull up bar and the dip station, plus I already have a pair of push up bars.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: AJT
Review:
Really really happy with this dogs nuts product, don‚Äôt usually do these reviews, but thought let‚Äôs be avin a go then shall we!

So instructions, top notch... assembling, piece of piss... tools, bolts etc.. lovely jubly ahhh.

Just the whole set to me is a solid 9.5 I say that cause the only poxy encounter I came across was a tiny glue mark on the pad, but all that requires is a little 99.99 killing antibacterial wipe and let‚Äôs be avin it. But kept the cool didn‚Äôt go carlo

Genuine review, I‚Äôm satisfied big time! Sturdiness is a tiny bit shaky, but that‚Äôs completely expected if it‚Äôs not bolted into the floor and that‚Äôs it.

Just have patience when you assemble this beauty.

Hope all who are reading are well, if you didn‚Äôt accomplish anything today, bladey well, give it‚Äôs some umpf tomorrow and chase your dreams!

Peace!

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Title of Review: Great product, but needs better screws
Name: S. Jones
Review:
Update: I've taken my review down from 5 stars to 4 stars due to the quality of some of the parts. Such as the screws. I wanted to remove the pads from the frame so that I could create space for my body to go into during calisthenics training. It's almost impossible to remove the alankey screws due to them being rounded off as soon as you try. Had to get a screw driver to turn the screws and even that's shredding the the inside of the screw hole to bits. Going to have to source new better quality screws. Not ideal if you need to dismantles for any reason such as moving home.

Still a great product for the price

Oringial Review: Really great product for the money. Well worth the investment. Its very study but can have a slight wobble when doing some more advanced exercises, such as pulls up when extending to one side. Although, I have no fear it will fall so its all good.

There were a few minor scratches but nothing to concerning. Especially considering its going to banged and dings by other weights alot.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Title of Review: Possibly the worlds best assembly instructions!
Name: Gordon
Review:
From the title you can guess what I was most impressed with and although it sounds mundane I just liked the attention to detail. It was mostly the shadow board approach to the nuts and bolts of which there are quiet a few varieties. Each bunch of nuts and bolts were separated on a shrink wrapped sheet with the size next to them. The instructions themselves were clear and logical.

Anyway, the actual frame. It certainly is sturdy enough although I'm pretty light but it seems plenty strong enough. The build quality was pretty good and I was impressed with the welds and parts matched up almost correctly in most cases. There were a few holes that weren't exactly right but once it was all tightened up it was fine.

The location of the bar makes pull ups odd if you're facing the back rest pad so you need to do them facing away in order to not bump off of anything. Personally I'd prefer a larger overhang so I could face the back but maybe that's just me. Dips are fine as are leg raises as you would on any tower. The grips for leg raises are good but I don't know why they didn't put any for the dip grips. There is a knurled pattern for the pull up bar but I'd prefer proper grip so I just used grip tape which is fine now.

The pads are nice enough and it's been outside for a few weeks now and I will cover them if it rains. As it weirldy hasn't rained in weeks now it's mid-April I can't comment on how well it stands the weather but as there's no exposed metal without a good thick layer of paint my guess is it'll fare well. I would have it in the garage but I've run out of room with kids bikes etc there now.

I got this just before the COVID 19 lock down pretty much on a whim and now that we're stuck training in our gardens and fitness equipment is in high demand I'm really glad I have it. It helps me to have easy access to just jump on and do some pull ups so I'm getting them done little and often and keep ticking over.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Kaan Akkaya
Review: Arrived well packaged without any damage. Unpackaged it straight away and got under to assemble it. Clear instructions and came with the tools necesssary to put it together. Had all the bolts numbered so there were no confusion where went to which hole. Assembled it all in about an hour and 15mins by myself. Fantastic quality for the price. Been using it for just over a week and already some progresion as i was just able to do 2 pull ups and now i can do about 10. Loving it. Used it everyday and definitly no different to a gym product.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: thomas robert hope
Review: So this is day one of the power tower, if it fails I'll update.Dead straight forward to assemble, I did it myself in around an hour, could be done quicker but it's holding you up so best to take time, as always the tools given are cheap and would work but I use my own for more purchase but you can manage fine without. Looks sturdy enough and feels solid I just did some pull ups/dips and leg raises then went round the whole thing adjust the bolts again to avoid and loosening. I will be keeping mine outside so we shall see how weather resistant it is over the next few weeks. It has some lateral movement on pull ups but I think it's reasonable and it doesn't feel unsteady more importantly. The arm pads are fine and fit for purpose so all in all a well machined piece of kit that hopefully stands the test of time.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: M G
Review: The item was delivered faulty. I built the majority of the power tower following the instructions (realising early on that the push up handles did not align to the base frame) and when attaching the upper vertical frame (pull up element of the tower) to the lower vertical frame it was evident that the lower vertical frame opening where the upper vertical frame should slot in, and move up and down as required for adjustment, was bent and out of shape, as per photo 1. This means that the upper vertical frame on one side does not fit and the frame is useless. I can only get a refund by sending the tower back to amazon, which means taking it apart again and sending back a 15KG parcel, which is not economical. Avoid.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building

If you are methodical & take time it is fine to put together and all the items fitted. Also seems fairly sturdy when at full height so far, and especially like the dip bars and extra vertical supports. All in all it‚Äôs very good value. It does seem it would be quite compact width wise if you were a bigger bloke, but I‚Äôm really happy with purchase and it‚Äôs part of everyday workout now.

I notice this less now so I think the body compensates for it as you spend more time on it.I would ideally have like some parallel handles for pullups as well as the standard bar, though notice that competing products also generally don‚Äôt include these - I assume due to difficulty attaching these with sufficient sturdiness to support body weight.Dip bars feel about the right distance apart.

Name: Mathieu Comarmond
Review: I have owned many pullup towers in my life and this is the best one so far. It came very well packaged. All the nuts and bolts were well packaged. The instruction manual was very detailed. This was easy to assemble and although it's recommended to be assembled by two people, I was able to do it on my own.In regards to assembling, I strongly advise you to properly read the instructions and pay attention to the diagrams.Finally the equipment itself is of high quality and very sturdy. I'm 6ft 1 and weigh 112 kgs and this equipment bears me very well. As you can see by the video and pictures. I highly recommend this if you want to get fitter and stronger.

Review:
Great exercise machine to have at a very reasonable price. Had some trouble assembling since a couple of screws were dodgy, but the seller replaced them quickly after contacting them.

Could be sturdier as some of the crossbar pieces slightly misalign, causing 2 of the corners to have a bit of a tendency to lift off the ground, but it‚Äôs not generally a problem.

Overall would recommend.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Iain
Review:
Well packaged product arrived in very good condition, a few small marks on certain parts of the frame work but nothing bad at all.
Instruction are very clear and precise and easy to follow.
One or two people to build easy to build.
Left and right bars to attach pads were labelled you would think left to right as you save the product but this was not the case for mine, the bars and handle should tilt inwards slightly, if they tilt out the way swop over to other side.
Unit moves slight when using but very stable and strong over all.
When setting the heights on the extending bars keep on the lowest setting until you fit the top pull up bar.then set to the height you want.
Delivery was between the 8th and the 12th, goods were delivered on the 8th great service as always by courier company and by Amazon overall.

Company that sells this product have been around for a while and specialise in gym equipment.

Overall great product and ticks all the boxes, price is excellent for what this home gym equipment offers.

The only downside is the pull up bar handles are quite corse and can hurt your hands and cause them to blister. I would recommend purchasing some cross fit type gloves with this.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Dee
Review: It was really easy to assemble this by myself. I have not used it yet to its full capacity, however I can say from sight and feel that it is sturdy and will allow me to do what I need. The design is also minimalist and in my opinion takes up not too much space in my living room, which works for me as I have a busy life so I need for this to be somewhere where I can access it when I have pockets of time during the day. I have put interlocking foam under the two legs as I have wooden floor boards and I need to protect this. The unit does not rattle or feel unsteady at all for me when I am hanging off it.

Review:
Rounded up to the nearest inch; this is 42 inch wide (based on the pull up handle bar), 41 inch front to back and 85 inch at the highest setting for the pull up bar.

The ceiling height in the room I'm using it in, is 100 inch - enough room to get my chin and the upper part of my chest above the bar. The dip handle bars are 50 inch from the ground.

I built this on my own and it took no more than 90 minutes using the tools supplied. The build quality of this piece of equipment is sturdy and I feel confident using it. The instruction booklet is excellent and made building easy.

This is a good piece of exercise equipment and I'm glad I bought it. It is something I would use most often when going to the gym. I've given 4 stars because of the hand grips on the chin up bar. The grips are etched into the metal frame and offer little comfort when chin ups are performed. It almost feels like holding onto cheese graters.

I like this piece of equipment and bought it because it was being sold at a fairly affordable deal price, but, now I have it I wouldn't buy it again. I would spend a little extra for comfort, for performing chin ups.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Soundararajan Kannan
Review: I have recently purchased this for indoor use and it's easy to assemble, sturdy construction with very well balanced support ( no fear of toppling or bending ! ), great ground support, easy height adjustment ( though the screws can be made better, but still good ), easy to assemble....good for all types of requirements, strongly recommend !

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Abi Thampi
Review: Set this up in my garden and I've gotta say this is great for home workouts! It was reasonably easy to assemble, you just have to be a bit careful when choosing bolts and reading the instructions.Its very stable too; especially if you're careful with your form and dont swing around much. One annoyance is that you cant actually do above the bar exercises such as muscle ups as your knees end up smashing against the supporting beams.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building

Review: We were worried aout what we might get for the price of this, but are really pleased with this power tower. We got it for our son. It took about an hour to build, but very straightforward. It is a strong and solid piece of kit and perfect for what we needed. It also allows you to adjust the height, which is good for many ceiling heights! Great buy.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Name: Neo
Review: I could happily give this 6 stars for ease of assembly. All nuts and bolts was on a shrink wrapped card,each part numbered. Straight forward to assemble on my own. Never swore once in the whole assembly process.The closure of gyms over the lockdown periods have swayed me to purchase this power tower and I'm really pleased with it's quality and design.I'm just under 6ft and about 13st and was concerned if it would be stable enough through a vigorous exercise routine. But it's extremely robust and sturdy. With adjustable hight This is ideal for a complete upper body workout. Chin up,dips,leg raises,leg hold raises and press ups with ease.This peice of equipment doesn't take up to much room and i Would recommend the power tower as valued investment for a home workout in these unpredictable times.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building

Name: Danc
Review: It is a good power station for hundred pound sincerely, very stable, easy to assemble and if you are creative and have a bit more imagination you can upgrade it :)). It is good especially during these times. I really recommend it.

Name: Adamski
Review: Latest addition to my home gym, bit worried before it arrived as I am 6ft4 inch and weight 264 lb, but it is up to the task, unlike many others I looked at it has the extra added two bars support under the front of each arm rest, which is why bought it, No regrets good purchase for the bigger framed guy like myself...only took and hour to build as all items are clearly marked in in sealed packages..

To assemble and unpacking take me about 45min.Very firmly and sturdiness and not making any noise when doing pull-ups, dips or any other excersice (I'm 88kg).Good quality.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building

Review: Well built product. Easy to assemble. Looking forward to using it.

Product: JX FITNESS Power Tower Adjustable Dip Station Pull up Bar Push Up Workout Abdominal Exercise Home Gym Tower Body Building
Title of Review: Woman living alone, easy enough to put up
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
This is very heavy and I struggled to drag it through the house.

The instructions for putting it together were straightforward and although it took an afternoon to put together, I managed it alone despite the instructions saying it takes two.

It's nice and sturdy once together and looks really good.

Exercise with shoes on like the instructions say, the cross bar underneath hurts if you stand on it with a bare or sock-clad foot!

People complaining about the harsh feel of the top bar but I've got calluses from climbing and I don't mind the bar. I guess they help.

Don't forget to use the Alan key and the wrench at the same time to put the nuts and bolts together or it will just keep spinning endlessly (maybe this is obvious to most but I puzzled it over for ages ha)

Review:

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version
Title of Review: Great bench, ticks all the boxes for my home usage
Name: MR I.
Review:
First day review:
I wanted a bench since the gyms are closed during the lockdown. I am by no means a gym rat, more a recreational gym goer but I was pleasantly surprised with this bench. It has everything I wanted from it.

- Putting it all together was pretty simple, no power tools required, just a wrench for three bolts (bolts and wrench all provided), and 5 pins (also provided) to slot the bench pieces together. Took about half an hour to put together on my own.
- it feels stable enough for me (6ft2 200lbs) yet is surprisingly light for its size
- Adjustable back to make it both incline and decline which was important for me.
- Comfortable to use, things feel like they're in the right place
- aesthetically pleasing to look at so that's a plus for a home exercise bench.
- folds away which is also important for me. I'm glad they added the new video to show how it folds without having to unwrench the bolts and disassemble. (to fold for daily use: remove pins, front support rotates anticlockwise and tucks under the seat, back support rotates clockwise and tucks under the seat as well and wraps over the front support)

Some measurements that might help:
100cm height, 140cm length when fully extended
30cm height, 70cm length when folded for daily use (could make it more compact by removing a couple of bolts for longer term storage)

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version

Review: It collapsed from horizontal to decline position while in use. A 28kg adjustable dumbbell landed on my chin slicing it open almost breaking my jaw in the process. I'm now sporting a big scar where the hair doesn't grow. I had to go to hospital to get it glued back together again

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version

Name: maryo2002
Review: What a bench easy to instal instruction not that great but we figured out ..strong bench great for all exercises highly recomended its worth  the üí∞...

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version
Title of Review: If you want a weight proper weight Bench, don't buy this.
Name: Mike
Review:
What's good about it :
- It's fairly easy to put together
- back is pretty comfortable

What's very poor about it:
- the bench locking mechanism is terribly unsafe
- the balance on the bench is really unsafe with any kind of load
- when attempting to use for back extensions, whole bench lifts off ground.

In reality if you want a bench for lifting any weights and you don't weigh more than 20kg in body weight, this is not the bench for you. It's collapsed on me a few times even working within the weight limits advertised.

I'm not even going to resell due to the dangers I've experienced with it collapsing mid bench press.

Spend a little more money and buy a proper sturdy, reliable, locking bench.

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version
Name: PeterPool
Review: Nice looking bench and in some respects you get what you pay for in terms of quality‚Äî however what isn‚Äôt acceptable is how unstable it is: no matter how I adjust the feet, there is a significant wobble, all four feet only remain on the ground whenever you‚Äôre lying flat on the bench. In other words it‚Äôs not a particularly safe bench to use. I‚Äôll be planting heavy things at each leg to hold it down, but as I say, this is not only inconvenient but simply not safe, the bench feels like it could topple quite easily as a result.Putting the bench together wasn‚Äôt difficult, no instructions for folding it back up but I think I got there. Padding feels good too and folds into a reasonable space.You pay ¬£60-70 and you don‚Äôt expect wonders, but you do expect something that is functional without unnecessary risk, and unfortunately I can‚Äôt say this feels safe to use at all.

Product: PERLECARE Weight Bench Adjustable, All-in-One Durable Gym Bench for Full Body Workout, Weight Up to 350kg, Foldable Exercise Bench with 7 Back Positions, 7 Heights, Two Exercise Band, Upgrade Version

Buyer be warned, Amazon customer service with absolutely no help implying that I had to pay for the return before they would consider a refund.
Constantly repeated themselves and and didn't accept my photos even after several attempts to send on on proof club damage.
Anyone else I would suggest never buy from the third party seller as Amazon do not give you a refund after faulty damaged item.

Being in Ireland this would have cost me 40 to ‚Ç¨60 to send back nearly the price of the item which Amazon didn't appeared understand.

This experience has really sullied my opinion of Amazon as a company.

Title of Review: This snapped in half with not even half the rated load
Name: Andres Correa
Review:
Absolutely worthless as a product.

From the moment I unboxed it, I felt it was a bit flimsy. One of the foot rests was literally detached inside the box (they're supposed to be tac welded!). I let that slide, as I needed it for my routine and I wasn't willing to wait for a replacement.

After about 1 month and a half of use, it literally snapped in half, with a load of 30kg + 81kg myself. It also dug a huge gouge in my floor, which I very much doubt the manufacturer is going to compensate me for. Luckily I was only winded, as the weights landed on my belly, but it could have been so so much worse, potentially fatal (imagine I had 80+ kg doing chest, with the weights over my shoulders, it snaps and they land on my wind pipe????)

Pictures are attached. Do not buy this, it is literally hazardous.

Review: I bought this and Arrived on Tuesday 15/12/2020, I've being using it from the next day and today Sunday 20/12/2020 it's already ripped. Awful quality, not worth it!. Pity that I can't give you 0 star.

Title of Review: East to set up and multifunctional.
Name: Amazonoholic
Review:
Got this unusual weight bench to help with belly exercise. Came in box, needed assembly, which was straight forward.
I like the extra support part which can be lifted up and do exercises on ads.
When doing abs exercises it locks back of the legs so can be worked with heavy weight.
Legs of the unit well protected with soft rubber plastic makes unit quite and shocks absorbent.
Back support can go up or down, seven different angles, angle can be changed with in seconds.
Overall very easy to use and multifunctional unit, it supports upto 350kg weight which is quite a lot for normal home use.
So far quite happy with it.

Review:
I don't normally write reviews but I am on this item as I feel it is dangerous in its design.

Basically going to have to scrap this as it's now to late to return so not as good value as I thought!

Name: Jonathan A.
Review: Overall it‚Äôs fairly rickety and a lot of play in the pin retained moving parts. Do I feel safe when using it? No, not really and of the possibly thousands of items I‚Äôve bought on Amazon, this is my only review so that others don‚Äôt make the same mistake to buy it as I did.The are plenty of design faults like the feet being so loose they fall off but the worse two problems are the sharpish metal brackets sticking out right at the bottom of where your hand is when doing bicep work (pic 1) that hurts if you forget.And second, The centre retaining pin to fold the equipment away is blocked to go in straight by the frame (pic 2) it‚Äôs tricky to get it both in and back out - you have to kind of twist the frame to get an angle.

Overall it‚Äôs pretty good for the money.
Shame about the build quality as it rattles a bit, it‚Äôs too easy to accidentally knock the bench to a decline (which hasn‚Äôt actually happened while on it, just getting on or prepping for an incline bench press etc) and the weld is loose attaching the screw hole to secure the preacher bar.
Seriously, if you need a preacher bar for your workout this isn‚Äôt the bench for you, as the screw hole to secure the bar pulls away instead of locking the bar tight.
It also doesn‚Äôt fold down for storage as I seem to recall was advertised in the description. Even to fold it down enough to fit through a door you need to pull out at least 3 pins, 1 of which is a different size (good luck remembering which one is the different sized one).
If you want to tuck it away under a bed or something you‚Äôd need to totally dismantle it.
