Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Charlie C
Review: After watching so many reviews for the weight bench, I chose it finally. The price is quite fair and the delivery is fast. It can adjust different angles suitable for difference exercise. I put in the corner it doesnt occupy many space. I can practice for quite a few minutes everyday that‚Äôs important by turning bit times into quality exercises. Im feeling much fitter after doing bench press as if my muscle is growing already just by looking at it.¬†Good Luck and enjoy it!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Adam
Review:
I bought this having read some decent reviews : however , I was extremely disappointed with it and now wonder if those who are raving about it have actually ever done any weight lifting before because for my experience - it‚Äôs dismal.

Firstly the elastic cables have virtually no resistance whatsoever and are way too long. You would need to be 12 feet tall with a 4 meter wing span to get anything from them . I took them off from the get go.

Thinking it would be ok as a bench , the main reason I bought it I set it up . Construction was simple enough but the built product is useless.

It‚Äôs billed as able to recline and decline into 7 variants respectively . Firstly - it doesn‚Äôt go into a flat bench . Well it does but literally the weight of my little finger is enough for it to come crashing down . It inclines ok into 2 positions - but anything below that (including flat bench and decline) and it collapses- the ridges on the back pin do not sit safely into the corresponding slots so any weight at all - gravity takes over and it collapses . Common sense evaded the makers when this was designed . It simply isn‚Äôt fit for purpose .

It‚Äôs billed as safe for up to 330lbs - I weigh at most 215 and whilst pressing a moderate 15kg reverse fly (which is around 33lbs) - it collapsed sending me crashing to the floor with the bells in hand . Thank god it wasn‚Äôt the bar bell loaded up because they would have had law suit on their hands

Avoid like the plague if you are a serious lifter . This is not safe .

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: scott carty
Review: nan

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: SamD
Review:
Honest Review:

Positives:
1) Good Bench- feels good enough quality to last long
2) Good quality padding
3)Very sturdy
4) Storage- Folds away to some extend, not as neatly as shown on pictures
4) Assembly- Very easy to assembly and reassembly after collapsed

Negatives
1) Very high off the ground
2) Doesn‚Äôt fully straighten for shoulder press
4) All the same width throughout- would be better if it narrowed near top of shoulders
3) Price- they are continuously increasing the price. I paid ¬£100 which I think was overpriced. Reasonable price would be somewhere in the ¬£60 range max
4) Would be better if the the mechanism to raise the bench was as per standard gym benches I.e. bracket with holes in to adjust

Overall: Good bench, worth a purchase but you get what you pay for in this price range. Probably the best of the bunch in terms of what is available right now. Considering gyms not likely to open for a few months yet worth if you have the money and need a bench that will store away go for it! It‚Äôs not gym level standard but it‚Äôs better than nothing!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: This is a great weight bench.
Name: Spoony
Review:
This is a cheaper weights bench that‚Äôs packed with some very cool features. It looks and feels closer to something you‚Äôd pay much more for and I have been using it every day since purchase. Assembly was extremely simple, you can start using it right away and it's positions are quick and convenient to modify. It looks fantastic with it's red and black color scheme and feels like a premium product which will last a long time. I have no doubt that it is suitable for beginners to skilled and qualified home trainers.

Feels very comfortable.

Sturdy and maintains the position effectively.

Very good quality considering the price.

Solid construction.

Can fold away.

Easily movable and completely adjustable

With all that said, I'd highly recommend this product.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Just about does the job - but don't buy it.
Name: Will Pedley
Review:
I bought this bench recently and have used it a number of times. Easy to set up - takes all of 2 minutes.

The problem with the bench seems to be who it's designed for - and I'm not sure it's normal sized people. The seat element is really long and, due to that, the back support is short. I'm 5' 11" and when I sit for incline bench press there is limited support to the lower back because of the longer seat and the top of the back support comes to midway of the back of my head. If I sit upright into the back of the seat, the bottom of my head rests on the back support.

Whatever you do - DO NOT - use this for decline. The seat is too long, so if you're settling in for a decline press you will break your back. I nearly did. I repeat, it is not even close to suitable for decline and just about okay for incline.

It's not particularly stable at all, so it's also not ideal for anything you might want to do from the side.

It's slightly taller than your average bench, so if you use the back support for bicep curls, this will feel just about okay, but not as comfortable as a bench you might find in your local gym.

So, the dimensions are all off and it's not stable. Why would you buy this.. to be honest, you wouldn't. I wouldn't recommend it. I'll use mine because I have it now and I can't imagine the ballache of sending this back - but spend the extra ¬£50 and get something more suitable.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Ex Royal Marine - Bear
Review: This has to be the best buy I have done so far as this seat does everything and it is built to last, it's built for punishment and you know I love this seat as I do everything and it hold's me and my big weights ideal for sit ups ideal for butter fly's etc. I would recommend this weight training bench because it is a lot better than some of the more expensive one's you get on the market, but it saved me money and it is a good design as I do a lot of power training and weights and this seat/bench takes a hell of a punishment. Thank you to the Seller for fast delivery and to Amazon saving me loads of money through Prime. I also wanted to say this is a great bench and the seller is always there to advise you how to use it safely without hurting yourself that to me is a added bonus and it is free advise. I have seen other benches but nothing is like this one sturdy, solid and yet easy to use when it comes to sit up it does help your back, try it out for yourself see the difference in makes in your physical training. Good luck to all and be safe in training.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Starmaker2001
Review: Do not buy if you are not very light and lift more than 10kg!!! Had this for a few months and today the whole bench started bending whilst I was using light recovery weights. I weigh 90kg, so this should not have happened! Major safety issue!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Adjustable weight bench value for the money
Name: Naka
Review:
I prefer to work out at outdoors, but on the one hand it's always raining on weekends and busy at work, going out to work out can be a bit tricky. I already had spinning, so I decided to add a weight bench so my husband could use it. Luckily, the arrival time is very fast.

Package Content:
As i didn't take pictures, so i write something for reference.
This product is well packaged and a little heavy when received. This bench looks great. Weight table foam is good, medium hardness - not too soft or hard. Accessories are well marked to identify the whereabouts of the parts. The assembly was simple and only took ten minutes. All you need to do is use the three pull-on parts provided and install them into the corresponding holes. It's easy to adjust and position your abs depending on what you're doing, because I've never used this type of device to do abs before, so it's a bit tricky to get the abs in position. The two rubber bands provided can be used for biceps, triceps, and more. Note: this sport strap will break but can be easily replaced by any compatible sport strap.

I put it against the wall when I don't use it. The storage and move is easy. You can slip it under a bed, be stored up against a wall, or storage into a closet

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Norman MacPhail
Review: Don‚Äôt think you are buying a premium product by paying ¬£100 for this. After 4 weeks this product is unsturdy, unsafe, 6 screws missing, angle dimensions bent badly when doing sit ups see photo extremely dangerous  and only one hand stretch instead of two. I‚Äôm guessing whoever was on the production line thought it would be funny to send me this.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Nicole Ally
Review:
Brought this for my partner a few months ago.
Gave it a few month before I left a review and WOW!!
I was a bit nervous to buy due to some reviews but thought I‚Äôd give it a go.
My partner is 6ft 4 and very big built. He loves the chair and used it most night during his workouts. It‚Äôs nice and strong and can hold any weights your doing.
He mostly praises the back drop of the chair and says it‚Äôs great how it back seat has lots of levels to adjust it to depending on the type of workout your doing.

Very happy customer! Thank you!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Customer B
Review:
When i received the Bench it was easy to assemble. It takes 5 mins to put together. There is 3 or 4 push in pins. It looks good and seems strong enough.

I did notice the Poor quality of the back board from behind was not good. Staples hanging out, the cloth not pinned down correctly. Staples could be sharp if you caught yourself on them. (Just knocked them back in, job done).

Within 2 weeks the foam started sliding off the pegs. However they slide back into place and stay there.

There was a manufactured screw jammed in the hole, not screwed in (which I wrote to them about and they replaced within two weeks, because the thread had gone. This screwed straight in).

Affordable and sturdy for a home bench. More than adequate for a home work out. It also looks nice. I‚Äôm 6.1 and does seem slightly high off ground but it works. Incline and decline is a good range too.

Overall its good for a home bench, with regards to the craft man ship i could of just had a bad one of the batch.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The only good thing I can say is that it arrived four weeks earlier than quoted. Although really only being cosmetic problems for the price it should be perfect,one of the legs had quite a lot of paint missing off it so instead of finishing it properly they touched it up with a different colour black which makes it stand out even more,and also the back pad has been fitted not flush,straight with the base so it's not straight,really poor workmanship for the price of the item,would not recommend.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Features of a much more expensive bench
Name: Still Don't Know
Review:
I bought this bench along with a set of dumbells to get some basic weight training in at home. I was able to set it up on my own with the tools supplied in around ten minutes and right of the box I was impressed with the quality for the price.

It has a good range of adjustments from upright, incline, flat to declined positions which make the range of exercises possible more than enough to cover a full body work out. Its very stable with very little wobble and takes my weight with a full load of weights without complaint.

The padding is not luxuriously deep but more than deep enough to make daily work outs comfortable. The surfaces wipe clean and the foam bolsters at knee and ankle height are great for both ab work outs and reversed face down positions. The supplied resistance bands clip onto the front foot securely and give a nice option if you don't have any weights to use.

It folds up to a compact size for storage but the bench itself is small enough that I haven't bothered and as I use it every day I'm not tempted to.

Great bench and great value.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Puchowska
Review: This bench arrived almost fully assembled and needed minimal additional assembly which took about 3 minutes (previous different bench I bought took me the best part of an hour to put together and was more expensive and nowhere near as good as this one). I can adjust the height of the back within 2 seconds which cuts down on faffing around between sets and it's slim enough that it barely takes up much room in my bedroom without me having to fully fold it down. There were a few small tears in the fabric on the rear of the back which aren't noticable unless you're looking closely and they don't bother me at all. Overall this bench is fantastic value and I wish I'd bought it first, instead of wasting nearly ¬£100 on another one that claimed to be more fancy but was just a complete ball-ache. 10/10 would recommend.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Far too high off the floor and seller attempted to avoid refund
Name: Andrew
Review:
I bought this bench to use while the gyms were closed. You can tell it is a cheap bench, as in it doesn't feel as rock solid as the benches you'd find in a commercial gym but this is understandable. I did like how it was easy to fold away and it felt stable enough for its light weight. However, it has a deal breaking flaw, in that it is far too high off the ground. I'm 6 foot tall and when I lie on it, only the tips of my feet can reach the floor. This makes you feel way too unstable if you bench press any kind of heavy weight. Someone shorter than me may not be able to touch the floor at all with their feet.

To make it worse, when I tried to return the product for a refund (I even offered to pay the return postage), the seller claimed that their warehouse cannot accept returns due to the pandemic, so only offered me a partial refund of less than half the price. I checked with Amazon customer service who confirmed to me that I am entitled to a full refund and if the seller refuses I can claim this through the A-Z guarantee. Funnily enough, when I passed on this information to the seller, they accepted the return.

So I guess this bench is only suitable if you are either very tall, or have no plans to lift any heavy weight.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: 5 mins and we were using it
Name: Deemi786
Review:
My son recently bought some weights and we needed a small make shift bench that didn't take up too much space.

This purchase was perfect, easy to assemble, instructions made sense, works great, to be honest if it didn't I would be upset, it is after all, just somewhere you lie down on.

The stretchy thingy ma jigs are useless, you may as well tie some rubber bands on there but it didn't make any difference to me.

If youre looking for something that folds up easily then this is the one for you.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Abererch
Review: There are dozens of similair benches for sale at roughly the same price. A buyer will often look for certain additional features to make a decision. In my case it was the ability to quickly and safely fold the unit up for storage. This bench just won over its rivals partly due to good reviews. Worryingly, recent disclosures in the press have cast a doubt on some reviewers veracity. However, and its a big however, the bench is assembled by two bolts and three pull pins. To fold it you have to take all three pins out, the bench then folds but not into a stable fixed conformation.Carrying it is then a two handed effort and you have to store the pins for reassembly or refix into the folded frame.The bench is otherwise OK but perhaps flimsier than I would have liked.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Meh!  It's OK, I'm only not returning it because it was cheap and I can't be bothered with hassle
Name: Jonny
Review: So firstly good points.  It's easy to assemble and easy to adjust.  It's not difficult to fold, but a little fiddley (you have to turn it on it's side and remove 3 pins to fold - not the end of the world by any means).Now the bad points.  Firstly he resistance bands that it comes with are just a waste of time.  The resistance is next to nothing and they are ridiculously long.  Next and my biggest bug-bear is that it is just a bit too high off the floor, probably by about an inch or so; this may not seem like a lot but when you're used to "normal" gym equipment, it feels weird.  This can be resolve by placing your feet on the bar that act as the feet, but means you always need to have a close stance as opposed to open stance when exercising.  Thirdly, the back does go completely flat, there's either a small incline or small decline when in the closest positions to being flat; again not the end of the world, but a little annoying.  Lastly, although I've not come across any problems so far, the "hooks" that keep the back rest in place (inclined/declined) don't feel very secure - it doesn't feel like it would take much for it to slip and end up with a face full of barbell....All in all, I use this piece of kit, it was cheap compared to the others available, but I wouldn't get again if I was to buy another - I'd probably go for a better quality one

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: umut beker
Review: Been using it regulary and hasnt even been a month and the seating had ripped already and the only thing i placed on the seating is my bottom. The rip is getting bigger each use. Im so disappointed. Made with such poor material. I was tricked into getting it by the high 5 stars however the quality of the bench is really below standards.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: quality is not as good as price. during chest exercise, the holder moved and i had an accident twice, since then i am not using it. and i have thrown away. dont trust this product. I would rather buy something branded. i was using 20kg each side for chest and all came on my head and body while the hook slipped. was very scary. I am strong which saved me otherwise it would have created life threatning position for me. AVOID. i cant return it either as its been few days. I didnt used it int he beginning for 20 days or so then started using it and now i am stuck with teh product.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Loubylou
Review:
Just done my first dumbbell workout on the bench. I love it!!!
Delivery was fast, assembly was very easy and the bench is very sturdy and comfortable.
I can‚Äôt touch the floor with my feet when lying down though (I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2) but the foam foot support means I can put my feet on them and work out okay.
It folds up for easy storage by simply pulling 3 pins out.
I‚Äôve been wanting a bench for a while and researched different ones. This is an excellent choice for the price.

The resistance bands supplied are very thin but can be replaced easily and it‚Äôs a great addition to the bench.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Dee W
Review: Bought as an early Christmas present for hubby, he loves it and uses it often.It was easy to set up and the instructions were clear. I've had a go on it myself and it's very comfortable. Folds away for easy storage which to me is the best feature about it as I dont particularly want it in the way when not in use. Great for a home workout since the gyms are shut. There are loads of tutorials online showing how to work different parts of the body and how to utilise such a bench.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: RogerB54
Review:
I thought that I would have to build from scratch but all you have to do is insert four bolts as the core framework has already been assembled. The bench itself is solid and does not wobble when exercising.

I use it for general fitness and so the 330lb capacity is not really a problem for me but can imagine that if you are a true body builder, then this may not be the bench for you but then would argue that this is reflected in the price.

Overall, very happy with product and delivery was within five days - even during lockdown.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Shelly
Review: I am super impressed with this weight bench.  It is a little bigger than I thought it would be as well as sturdy.  I am looking forward to working out in the comfort of my own home.  The only issue I had was with the delivery service who failed to deliver as per their tracker and delivered 3 days later.  I had a response from the seller the very next morning which I appreciated.  Highly recommend the weight bench but not the transport company Yodel.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: A well designed, well constructed, and robust peice of gym equipment.
Name: Patrick Campbell
Review: I find this weights bench from Yoleo to be a bargain buy with added benefits. It feels and looks a well designed quality bench and is being put through its paces here. It was quick and easy to assemble and is fully and easily adjustable. It looks sleek and the stitching is good quality and I consider it a top class keep fit aid. Aswell as a novice like me, I'm sure experienced trainers would appreciate this well constructed piece of gym equipment. I find it soft enough to make it comfortable, yet sturdy enough to sit on. Storage wise, this is foldable too so we're happy to put it in a corner when not in use. Well done, Yoleo. Recommended.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Cheap in price with poor build quality
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
What I liked:
Width of the bench

Ease of adjusting height

Colour

Padding is firm, however after using it twice it has already started to leave a mark, only time will tell how long it will last.

What I disliked:
The band as useless as they are very very poor in quality, seems like a gimmick sales tactics.

The leg padding has not been fitted properly see picture

The bench is not sturdy and moves too much

Metal used for the structure is very thin

Only time will tell how long this will last.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Brian
Review: There are only really 2 issues that bring it down to 3 star but they are not massive problems at all. 1) The bench is too high. It's about 2-3"/4-6cm higher than the normal gym benches and it does make a difference but you work around it. 2) the back doesn't come unto 90 degrees. Like I said, not really bad issues but putting the weights down after dumbbell press; you expect the floor to be there earlier which just strains the muscles as you put them down. All in all, good value.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Fold up weight bench saves space
Name: Office work
Review: I was intending to join the gym. Instead I purchased the weight bench and some dumbbells. So far my exercise is going well. The weight bench is easy to set up with 3 pins and fold away again. It also comes with a spare pin and another spare bolt. The bench also can be adjusted to incline and decline positions. It comes with some pull cords which are good for warm up exercises.  The only issue I may have is that the bench could be a bit high off the ground. It is my first bench so I do not know if this is the case and decline exercises are bit more difficult due to seating position. All in all it is very useful so far for home work outs and my exercise with weights are improving.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: D James
Review:
Bench arrived sooner than expected. On opening it was quite compact.
Once out of the box, it requires minimal work to get it set up although I struggled with one of the pins and had to adjust one of the fixed screws in order to get the pin in.
I‚Äôve been using it for a couple of weeks. It‚Äôs relatively sturdy however when using it for dips or anything else requiring gripping the edge of the long part/back rest, it does not feel as strong as it should and there is a degree of give.
The finish on the product was ok. The covering has only been stapled in a few places so there are gaps around the edge.
Overall, not a bad bench especially for the price.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
I'm a feather weight at just over 23 stone and I feel safe using this bench, it is a strong design and comfortable to use. The bench also sits at a great hight for myself (5'10)
The round pads to hook your legs in are soft but firm and comfortable against my legs leaving no marks when I am done.
This bench has made doing crunches easier for myself and am really enjoying working out again.
Down side
The resistance straps that are included are quite weak but would suit a beginner, however a set of good straps can be found for as little as ¬£15 depending on your level of fitness and strength.
Overall am very happy with the product and would/have suggest it to friends and family.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Mrs S Edwards
Review: It‚Äôs easy to collapse and reassemble. It‚Äôs quite light weight so can be moved easily but on the negative side it feels a bit wobbly. When your lying down on it it‚Äôs fine but when using it for split squats it wobbles. Overall a good product and would recommend.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Not as advertised but good to use
Name: Aditya V
Review: I am using its for over 2 weeks now. Its not actully as shown in photo ad. Because the cover is not very comfortable, thick and not curve as shown in the pictures. Its very light weigh, so I find it risky if position of excercise is not good it may harm. Its easy to use and fold. But I feel that they should use some heavy steel to give weight to maintance and good connect with surface. You cant use the strings, kind of low quality resistant for show off only. I dont found its worth paying this price for this quality of product.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Affordable and durable option for users of ages
Name: Declan w
Review: My free time is not much due to my heavy work. Gyms cost too much time to go there. This economical adjustable weight bench enables me to enjoy a full-body workout. And more importantly, i could do bench press and sit ups at home.This adjustable weight bench is simple to adjust into 7 different positions, making it easy to perform a variety of exercises. It offers confortable foam rollers that will help my work out comfortably. This workout bench is sturdy enough for my 198 lbs weight. Expertly crafted from premium materials for long-lasting versatility. It takes my workout regimen to new heights. Highly recommend it for anyone, wanting to do weights and crunches and prevent sub-health.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: It isn't stable or solidly build
Name: Omega
Review: Item isn't stable or solidly build, it wobbles and no use for some exercises. If I knew, I wouldn't buy it.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: mr r j burbeary
Review: Positives are its very lightweight.Negatives, terrible build quality, not sturdy. Not suitable for anyone using weights above 80kg. Decline doesn't make sense and therefore isn't very useable. Your at a terrible angle, very painful for lower back. The whole thing feels like it will break at any moment. I will be throwing it out and replacing. Rather pay double to have the safety.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Marcus
Review: Works great for a non proper gym bit of kit. Perfect for home during the lockdown. Getting very creative with it and it's a godsend. The bungies are utterly useless but i knew they'd be crap anyway, I've replaced with gym latex bands.I saved myself a few quid by not paying the extra for the bench whose backrest goes to 90¬∞, by using a block of wood for when I need that.Genuinely very happy with it and grateful to get it before they sold out!!Thanks x

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Wez
Review: This bench is nicely made, with good firm padding and a sturdy metal frame. It's advisable to take note of its dimensions, to make sure you have enough room for it, and also the maximum weight load, as those who are lifting very heavy will probably have to look for something structurally different. However, this bench is great for beginners and intermediates, and it conveniently folds up, so you don't have to leave it set up all the time.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: MartynK
Review: For a budget price bench that folds flat (¬£60 pre-lock down price), it is an excellent piece of kit.Obviously at this price and requirement to fold - there are compromises.  The back rest does not incline up to 90 degrees, or anywhere near.  The bench will take my weight (100kg) but is a little flimsy  The included resistance bands are of no value due to the total lack of resistance.If you really must have a folding bench due to space requirements, then this bench is a great choice

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Lee
Review: What a lovely bench.  It's made well and feels nice and stable when I'm on it.  It has loads of different functions for workouts.  I like the bungee handles they do help to complete my workout.  A good added bonus is that it folds away fairly flat considering the sise of it.  It came with easy to follow instructions to put it together too.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Poor quality - has warped out of shape!
Name: MR P.
Review: Liked the look of it.  Unfortunately, over a period of less than 3 weeks, it has warped, meaning that the back rest is slanting to the right!  Terrible.20200817: Am revising my rating to 3 stars as the customer service I received from Yoleo store was amazing. They understood the problem and offered a replacement or a refund.  All companies should work like this!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: CJ
Review: Great bench! ! nicely padded, plenty of range on the seat back positions. Some benches dont go up to upright but this one does! Sooo easy to put together...took about 5 minutes! It arrived earlier than expected and i was delighted to get to work on it straightaway. I weigh about 9 stone and its pretty sturdy. Overall i am delighted with this product after spending quite some time looking at various others which were dearer. Excellent value for money and no fees for postage!!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Title of Review: Worth every penny!!! So so easy to fold away.
Name: Liam
Review: Brilliant product at a very competitive price. Does everything it should do. One of the main factors that made me purchase this product was the fact that it easily folds away. I didn‚Äôt actually think it was possible to have something that is so simple to fold away and put out again. It has 3 pins which you simply pop in place when the bench is out and when you are done you simply pull them out and the whole thing folds up. Used it a couple of times so far and I‚Äôm very very impressed. Good strong build and super comfy. Helped me do my daily sit ups to work on my core, plus a variety of dumbbell exercises.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Hawk Eye
Review:
Bench is well made and lovely.
Good quality and value for money.

Not sure about the bands though, good idea but definitely look at the design of band mounting for stronger bands and add better higher resistance bands.

Gripes...

Bands are way too soft.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Vic
Review: This is my worst money spent on amazon, and looks like impossible to return item. Seller makes too many excuses.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: This bench is mostly perfect for what I ordered it for.I like to do mostly dumbell workouts and for that purpose, this works mostly fine, but it's a little too lightweight for certain exercises, where it moves too easily on the floor when i'm trying to get into position.Other than that, the build quality is excellent. - they even give you extra screws...

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Merve

No matter Freelancer or office worker, this office exercise equipment is suitable. Small body, Big energy. Hope the incline bench reviews helps you!

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Review: Great foldable bench which only takes up minimal space. Seems sturdy enough for medium to heavy weights. Has a slight decline setting which many do not have, which is a big plus.Looks stylish with the red trim and is easy to wipe down after use.Great customer service.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Review: i ordered this for my boyfriend during lockdown with the intention of selling it once gyms re-open but hes so impressed with the quality and sturdiness especially for the price that hes decided to keep hold of it, would highly recommend

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Andrzej Brejski`

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym

Title of Review: An unstable squeaky source of frustration
Name: Abigail
Review:
It doesn‚Äôt look like the pictures. It‚Äôs too big and clumsy. The materials are cheap. It folds in a really awkward way and does not store more easily than a regular-sized bench.

More importantly: it‚Äôs incredibly wobbly and unstable. It‚Äôs a lot higher than your average bench so forget about leg drive if you‚Äôre on the shorter side. (Although you need your feet to touch the floor more for stability than anything else with this bench) It makes a squeaky noise when benching (because of how much it wobbles!) that frankly made me want to throw it out of the window by the end of lockdown.

I would not recommend getting it. I have no idea how it got so many positive reviews, they‚Äôre the reason I bought it, but this bench is a recipe for injury and frustration.

Name: anzeli4ka45
Review: Brought weight bench for me and my husband. From March im staying home for covid and become more fat husband little bit as well. So u need to loose my big belly and i thinking this vench its very good for that. Also you can build your body ss my husband lifting his weight on this bench.  I use about 2 weeks now few weeks i didnt use from purchase and i see the results my belly become smaller will continue use it everyday.  Definitely value for money.  Good for all body. Very easy to essemble i did by my self without instruction.  Very easy to hold. And its sturdiness. Very happy i brought it. Hope soon have nice belly.

Product: YOLEO Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Weight Benches for Full Body Workout, Foldable Incline/Decline Bench Press for Home Gym
Name: Henry
Review:
I have a mixture between what I like and dislike which may not be the same as your own views if you buy it....

On arrival it was almost completely built. It only needed the foot bar and locking pins put on/in. That is better than a flat bench I bought a while ago when I had to build the whole thing.

What I like...
The incline has 30 degrees which is what I wanted it for.
It is well paded and feels good to sit and lay on. It can be collapsed to save on space as it is not full size and in the way. When in decline all the way to last setting you can sit on the floor and use the back rest as in incline without hassle. It feels sturdy when in use with it flat and incline when sitting on the seat part. It doesn't wobble in decline. The hooks to attach bands to is handy to have and I tried them with my set of tube style ressistance bands. Hooking them on meant my bands (not the ones that came with the bench) were too long. So instead of using the clip, I threaded the band through untill the bands half way point. The locking pins are a tight fit when bench is in position for use, so no fear they will fall out. It had anti slip feet caps to protect carpet from being damaged. (Not used it on laminate) It is easy to change it between folded and in use even with the pins being quite tough, then back to folded is easier than setting up. In theory this shouldn't take up much room. I had an extra locking pin and an extra bolt. I did check twice to see if these had somewhere to go. But the list of items in the instructions list how many there should be. So I have a spare of those.

What I don't like so much..... it can't be extended with a preacher curl. That would have been a fantastic feature! The bands that came with it are elastic not tubular, so if they snap they will injure. But these can be swapped out. The existing bands are also very week. Once folded down it is not secured in any way. So you can't pick it up without it unfolding . I have ordered some velcro straps to see if that will keep it together when folded down. There is no point having a space saving item if it can't be moved and stored let alone in a space saving way. I tried to see if there was a way of using the locking bolts but no. Maybe it should be improved by having a way to lock it folded or should come with a velcro strap the decline has a very slight option which is not enough for what I want, but the next option down is a severe drop to the lowest position possible for this bench, which is way too far down for what I need. That may be perfect for someone else but I needed an inbetween level. No matter I shall use the slight decline if that is what it offers. The stapled backing is not the best workmanship and may be wise to add some more youself or use glue right from the off rather than wait for early wear and tear to highlight it. In incline you can't lean chest first against the back rest as the bench requires the weight of the person sitting on the seat or it just lifts the front off of the ground and you nose dive face first to the floor. The backrest is too long for exercises that require you to lean chest down on the inclined back rest so you can't get high enough to have your head above the top. The max I managed having stacked weights on the seat to stop it lifting up was to have the back rest top edge dig into my under chin quite painfully. I haven't tried standing on blocks to raise myself as I have already have the bench tip me flat on my face once. So that is an issue for me. Putting heavy weights on the seat helps but it doesn't stop it happening completely.

I haven't used super heavy weights. I used various weights up to Max 10kg and my bodyweight of 70kg. I am 5ft 6". I would imagine I could get away with chest first on an incline if I were a few inches taller. I used a 9kg tubular resistance band and not the bands it comes with. I protected my bands from accidental chaffing damage by wrapping electrical tape around the bench loops as this is designed for a metal clip to be attached. I threaded the band itself through until its middle and clipped both ends to one handle. I did that for both sides and it worked well. The bench is light but not super light, like you can knock your knee on it and the bench won't really move but you'd get a bruise. Yes I am a bit poorly sighted so did that!

It arrived the very next morning after being dispatched in the afternoon. I did make contact to ask about the possibility of a preacher attachment and got a reply very quickly to confirm it doesn't allow for that. Shame but I have tall backed dining chairs and we used that layed backwards like a preacher pad. That worked better than expected. The bench on an incline can be a preacher platform if you stand up behind the bench.

Product: ACTIVE FOREVER Steppers for Exercise 3 Levels, Aerobic Step Board, Adjustable Height 10cm/15cm/20cm, Steps Equipment for Home & Office
Title of Review: Great value for money, a reliable & sturdy stepper
Name: Aibh√≠n
Review: Very sturdy and easy to take on and off the height adjusters. It's a great size and the grips on the top give it a more secure feel for certain exercises, e.g. fast feet, mountain climbers etc. Each of the adjusters has rubber grips on the end which makes it very steady. I've tried it on carpet, lino and tile and it doesn't budge when training. It's also light enough that it's easy to carry around. I've used professional gym steppers and this is easily as good. Definitely a great purchase.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Excellent exercise but not for the faint hearted
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Very simple to put together. Solid piece of kit. Warning - unless you have used an ab wheel before take your time in getting it right. There are plenty of videos you can view. Results do not happen over night and unless you are in a calorie deficit you will not get rippling abs. I purchased this wheel has I had used it in the gym I go to. This ab wheel is smaller than another one I own as I wanted progression. I can honestly say it‚Äôs harder I do already have a strong core but even so after several reps and sets I was struggling. If you persevere with it you will notice a huge difference within the first month. I have undergone four back operations over several years so I am living proof that if the exercise is performed correctly it won‚Äôt hinder any back issues. For anyone who is starting out it is a very cost effective upper body workout but make sure you don‚Äôt over do it or make sure you have some paracetamol to hand. Your core will be extremely painful for the first week or so but grit your teeth and work through it and it will subside. Stick with it and you will get abs of steel.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: So effective Optimus Prime is impressed.
Name: SecretlyOvert
Review:
Strength and Conditioning coach/Fitness instructor here. Firstly I want to rant that I have seen plenty of ab wheels when I worked in the gym. It makes me furious to see reviews here stating a lack of "stability" or "why does my product have a gap in the middle?". How can I take reviews seriously if you do not even take 5 minutes to fiddle with the product? Below I have attached pictures of why you have a gap in the middle. There is an extended piece of plastic which creates a gap when you put the handles on. This is not a failure in the product, this is just you not realising that there is an extended piece of plastic. If you wish to have the wheels together, simply have the extended plastic facing away from each other. Hypothetically, by creating a gap you should have more base of support making the exercise easier, however I do not believe there is any research on this matter or that the gap is significant enough to cause a massive regression in the exercise. Additionally, the whole premise of this exercise is to challenge your stability. This is exercise is more than just your core and it is incredibly unfair to put off other customers simply because you do have the core stability to perform the movement pattern. I believe that even if you are not strong enough to do slide outs, you can use this product. However, you need to sure that do not over extend in the movement. Slowly but surely work your way out and learn the movement pattern. Athlean X has some good technical models and instructions on the ab rollers. Learn the technical model first before you attempt to try the product. It can be a serious piece of equipment in your program if you use it correctly.

Now for the actual product, this is a simple ab roller that you may find in a commercial gym. It is simple, light and can be taken apart for travel. It is sturdy and simple. I could not ask anymore from this product. Yes it is small for an ab roller, but I believe that this is a personal preference and has no effect muscle activation. I would advise that this product will pick up anything you roll it on such as chalk which is to be expected. However, a simple dust off will clean it. The product comes with a small pad that is similar to gym mats so that you can slide comfortably without putting impact on your knees. I find that it may be useful for travel if you do not wish to bring your gym mat with you.

In summary, I do not regret purchasing this product and I find similar to others I use in the gyms. I have taken the time to write this review as I feel that it is unfair on H&S that customers are unaware on how to use their products. Maybe this is H&S's fault for not touching base with their customers. Moving forward, I suggest that they have an instruction manual as a guidance on how to perform the exercise correctly and how to make the exercise more difficult for instance. This is to avoid bad reviews that come from lack of knowledge on the subject.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Siltone
Review:
There's now an innumerable amount of different ab rollers available in the marketplace, I guess because they've become a tried and tested way in which to effectively strengthen and build those abdominal muscles. So, I spent a very long time looking at the pros and cons of those being sold on Amazon, before eventually deciding that for my money, this one from H&S was the best available. Now that I've had it for a few days, I'm beginning to realise this one was a wise choice.

It arrived nicely packaged in a shallow cardboard box. Inside were two wheels, two handles (one with an inner metal tube). These components simply slide together on that chromed tube in a matter of seconds. A nice feature is that, for travel purposes, they can just as easily be disassembled to lay flat in a suitcase. You also get a decent rectangular floor mat, which is essential for protecting those knees.

By the way, there is no 'magic' exercise/machine to give you that sometimes elusive six-pack - using a variety of stomach exercises is key (and doing them in strict style) together with a 'clean' diet, and the ability to burn off those calories if you are prone to easily gain weight. The idea is to try and subtly build those abdominal muscles, but at the same time reduce the layer of fat covering them, so they become prominent - giving the washboard effect.

I train in a gym four times each week, and use a stomach crunch machine plus old-fashioned sit-ups at the end of each workout. I bought this wheel primarily to do extra abdominal exercises at home during my days off.

I've found this to be an excellent ab wheel and is, in my opinion, better than the ones they let us use at my local gym. I've tried it on differing flooring and have found it to have a surprisingly good grip on any surface - I've used it on carpet, vinyl, laminated flooring and ceramic tiles. It is VERY IMPORTANT to use this correctly though - that way you'll avoid potential injury and also achieve optimum results. The supplier sensibly directs buyers to the wikiHow website (ref: Use-an-Ab-Roller) which offers easy-to-understand instructions. There are also many good videos available on YouTube (where would we be without it?) - the two I can recommend are: Ab Wheel Extension by Bodylastics and Ab Wheel For Beginners by Minus The Gym. Use it the right way, and use it regularly and you may well find this is one of the best (and cheapest) investments you've ever made. If you have found this review of use please be sure to click on the 'Helpful' button below üèãüèΩüí™üòä

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Ian Fields
Review: Arrived promptly and as described. When used properly this product works well. After only 5 uses, I could feel my abdominals had torn the way they need to. Added into my regular workout I can tell the results I'm after will begin to show within a month. Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Review: If you're in to the whole 50 Shades movement and you haven't got a kinky partner, buy this. It hurts. It hurts sooo good.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: There are loads of ab rollers on the market from really cheap and shoddy to designer jobs for those with more money than sense. This is all I wanted to pay and it is value for money in my opinion. I watched a few videos on technique to avoid lower back injury which is important, as you can do yourself a nasty quite easily. Top tip from youtube is roll against a wall to stop you over extending before you are strong enough then get gradually further away.

I‚Äôm glad to have a refund from Amazon. Honestly go look at Decathlon‚Äôs ab roller for ¬£5.99 and you‚Äôll see it‚Äôs so much better.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: InTheDark
Review: I've used one of these at the gym and have to say that this is a sturdier version to the one that the gym has in place.  The roller is easy to assemble and is robust once it has been assembled.  The movement in the wheels is smooth and the grip is firm.  Recommended to anyone wishing to train their abs/core.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Mr L G Bayliss
Review: Prompt shipping so no issues there, the Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat isn't really, maybe 1cm thick, but the foam does seem quite dense, having said that, after 3 sets of 3x10 reps, it hasn't returned to shape and knee indentations are evident.The wheels seem robust and roll well and the grips on the pipe are quite comfortable, as to longevity, don't know, yet.My main concern is the pipe/axle, on initial inspection it does not appear to be the thickest piece of mild steel tube which, if you are no lightweight like myself, leads to no small reticence  and I await the day where it collapses and I land flat on my face.If it is all still going in 6 months time I'll update this review

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Sanj Rai
Review: I‚Äôve only used this twice, I‚Äôm not at the stage where I can ‚Äògo fully all the way‚Äô. To be honest, I never realised how difficult this was to use, I need to build up my back/shoulder muscles. I guess I‚Äôm doing a half workout at the moment. But it‚Äôs so cheap and can be effective if used properly. Worth a go for anyone trying to get in shape and build up on your abs!

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: anubz
Review: Received quickly and in good condition.  Very simple do put together.  I'd advise checking on YouTube for a starter guide guides r this so you don't injure yourself.  I've started slowly and it feels right.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Don't get me wrong, I am happy with the purchase, but the other half can't use it as it is not sprung and she does not have the core strength to pull herself back from a full extension (she has been attending the gym 4-7 days per week for 4 years). Suitable for men with a decent amount of core strength and women who are more muscular.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Review: The product it self is okay, but beware the price advertised is not accuracte ended up costing more than expected. Don't think it is going to last long as not really sturdy. Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Excellent stable basic ab wheel for beginners
Name: Miss KF Preedy
Review: this does what it says on the tin - a no frills functional ab wheel which is easy to put together, reasonably robust and is comfortable to hold. It is quite small so easy to transport and means you can stretch quite a distance out. The wheels are a bit of a distance a part making it more stable which is good for beginners, but also harder to move out at and angle which is not so good for more advanced people.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Easy to use and you can feel the burn
Name: Jetage
Review: I was pondering one of these for a long time, and after glass of wine (ironically) decided it was time take the gamble.  There was a bewildering choice of options for Ab Rollers, but I chose this one based on reviews and price.Ultimately I don't think it really matters which one you get as long as it rolls.  The roller comes in a few pieces that need putting together.  This takes a few seconds really.  Slide the wheels onto the bar, then slide the handle grips one either side of the wheels.  The grips are friction fit, so no tools or issues to get up and running.Having 2 wheels is good for me as it provides a little more stability when using.  The pad for your knees is useful too, as on a hard floor the ab roller will be quite painful on your knees as you rock forward and back.So in use, you can really feel how hard this thing makes you work.  Starting on knees and rolling out to a good outstretch, for me its really evident how hard my core is working.  Subtly different when rolling back up, but after a few sessions of 15-20 reps, the next few days gives me quite a bit of residual muscle ache.  This is something I don't get much from situps, but do from planks.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Review:

3. It does not roll smoothly
4. Barely holds my 12 stone
5. Misleading images
6. The "knee mat" is pointlessly small
7. Entire product is not fit for purpose

Rubbish

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Review: nan

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Good bit of kit. Light weight. Easy stowed.
Name: F E Holden
Review:
My son opened this today for his 18th birthday and really liked it.

We both had a go. He thought it pretty good and I could certainly feel it on my scar tissue (after mastectomy in 2015), so will need to build up slowly. I think this will help me more than my son. You can go on wikihow to get a how to lesson with pictures. It's quite a light weight piece of kit and could be stowed away easily when not in use. Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Jimmy the Fish
Review: THe only issue with this (as a lot of negative feedback ahows) a lot of people seem to have trouble poutting this together. If the handles are not pressed on properly, it leaves a gap. A couple of thumps with a piece of wood and/or hammer closes the gap and locks on the handles.Works well on carpet and very strong. It has a hollow bar but as any engineer will tell you, hollow tune can be as strong as solid bar. Spokes really robust. I don't see how it's possible to break it. Great price and the kneeling mat is fantastic. No sore knees. I'd recommend it - if you are willing to build it correctly. Don't know how good on a wooden floor. Wheels are plastic and no rubber/latex 'tyre' but I think it woiuld probably be ok.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Mr Crisp
Review:
Saw an exercise video and the guy said he only uses an ab roller so I was sold.

Quickly looked on Amazon and this one had some decent reviews for a reasonable price so I ordered. The item comes in a much smaller box than I expected. It took about 30 seconds to assemble it, you do need to have some strength to push the components together.

Once assembled it's small size doesn't work against it at all. It's really effective. It also comes with a small foam knee pad to save your knees.

I did 20 roll-outs and the next day my upper abs were definitely engaged as I could feel it, the good pain you get when you know a muscle group has been worked effectively.

Only one caveat is that I wouldn't use it on carpet as it seems to quickly flatten it into a groove. Hard floors only.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

The product isnt crutial to an abs workout so if you were looking to use it to get started I'd stick to other exercises before buying this.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Probably the best (worst) way to torture your lower abs. I hate it.
Name: Dan
Review:
On my first time using an ab roller at the gym I wanted to do 4 sets of 10 reps. I'm fairly fit and was already doing regular core exercises so it couldn't be that hard. The first rep of the first set was tough but OK. By the third rep it was really starting to hurt. By the fifth I was in agony. By the 8th rep of the first set I had given up and was curled up in a ball crying.

Obviously I immediately bought a roller of my own so I could have the same experience at home.

There is nowhere to hide with this exercise. Your arms won't help you, it's all down to your abs. The wheel is fairly small but robust enough. The included foam pad is vital to avoid sore knees. You won't enjoy this equipment but you will benefit from using it.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

I‚Äôm not sure what ‚Äògap‚Äô people are talking about but I‚Äôve had no issues with this.

This is my first ever ab roller - I grew a bit of a happy belly during lockdown - and together with a clean diet, I expect to see a strengthened core using this over the next few months. Will update then!

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool

Name: Phill Rahman
Review: This is a new Spin on Ab Exercises quite literally it seems, so a welcome addition to the other Workouts out there and not as hard as it may Look...... Good Luck with yours!!!!!!!!  Sorry I‚Äôm way too lazy or still out of shape to offer you a Midriff Shot to confirm it‚Äôs effectiveness as I have not been using it as readily as I should but I believe a combination of all that I have mentioned could firm me up (could), you‚Äôd think that would be enough motivation!!!!!!!!!! Never underestimate the potential Laziness of another individual........ Matt provided Generally thick enough if you are worried use a Cushion!!!!!!!!! Less difficult than you expect but after a few you do feel your Abs have been targeted........ As Spring arrives I‚Äôm expecting a New Lease of Life between the Beers Ha Ha!!!!!!!!!!

Name: ca√≠tr√≠n

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
The mat that comes with it was a bit smaller than expected, and a bit flimsy, but it serves its purpose.

The wheel is good, although it was very stiff to get the handles on after you've put the wheels on, which is good when you are using it as it feels sturdy. However, you won't want to have to keep taking it off and on, so I wouldn't recommend this if you are planning to travel a lot with it.

Overall, a good wheel, serves its purpose, and feel sturdy when you use it. I'll definitely look to purchase more gym equipment from H&S in the future.

Review: This product will seem a little flimsy and light at first should you have used similar products at your gym which are likely to be bigger and sturdier. The product quote of an "extra thick" kneeling pad is borderline laughable given how thin it is, but I use mine on a padded gym mat or proper foam pad which works a lot better for these more "mature" knees of mine. Perhaps a slight question over longevity, but used extensively for a couple months now and I would recommend overall.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Sam
Review:
First of all, this product is very self-explanatory that your grandma could assemble it.
Grips:
It's hard to see but the grips are slightly concaved making for a nice ergonomic feel. They are also made from a smooth foam for extra comfort.
Wheels:
The two holo plastic wheels are ideal for anyone new to using an ab roller as it provides almost no weight to pull back. There is a nice half a centimeter gap between the heels and the grips to ensure the wheels don't lock due to friction.
Tube:
All of the roller parts are supported by a single metal tube which was enough to ensure me it was sturdy enough for me to use.
Foam pad:
I don't use the foam pad as often anymore but I used it on a smooth tiled floor fully expecting it to move with the roller but the bumpy underneath prevents this from happening.
Overall, I believe that if you are a beginner to using an ab roller and don't want to spend a lot of money to try one out that this product is perfect for you.

Name: sam
Review: In all honesty, I can't see why you wouldn't save yourself over a tenner and just do some sit-ups. I've left it too long to return it (my fault) and the product came with no instructions on putting it together (it's not difficult but I had to find a picture of it online and then guess but nevertheless...) It also comes with no instructions on how to use it. Again, this isn't that tricky but I had to look it up on YouTube, which I don't think I should have to do; I think instructions or some kind of diagram (anything) are a prerequisite when buying a fitness product. I do sit-ups anyway and just wanted to try something more challenging; this is not it. Perhaps I'll buy another and make a go-cart for my kids. Otherwise, for me, it's just pointless. Sit-ups and press-ups work your abdominals more than this and you don't look like you're rolling out a piece of pastry on the floor.

If you‚Äôre thinking about getting an ab roller, I would recommend this one as it‚Äôs on the cheap side, but still good quality!

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Too bad you can't get abs laughing at your own bad jokes!
Name: MR
Review:
You want to challenge your abs but you‚Äôre tired of/dislike doing crunches and planks are not your thing or they‚Äôve become too easy for you.

Although the above are great at hitting your abs, for me those exercises ‚Äì especially crunches ‚Äì can bring in too much hip which steals the tension away from your abs once you become a little fatigued and cheat your reps a little!

Cue the ab wheel. Done properly, it puts a serious amount of tension on your abs and is a challenge. If this is easy for you then it‚Äôs because you‚Äôre not doing them correctly.
Quick Tips: Remember to keep your arms extended otherwise the tension is taking away from your core. Also initiate the roll-back of the wheel using your core and don‚Äôt just pull the ab wheel back with your arms!

The product itself is well built for what you pay (¬£13.99) and is better quality than what you have at the gym thanks to the soft grip handles which makes it nice to hold onto. The wheels are sturdy and it‚Äôs easy enough to put all of it together. My only gripe is with the knee mat that‚Äôs provided. Do not underestimate it because it looks small and flimsy but it protects your knees from even hardwood flooring but it‚Äôs just a bit small for what you need ‚Äì especially if you‚Äôre a taller person or have thicker quad muscles.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: KEDDR
Review:
I‚Äôve always been a big fan of Ab rollers because it‚Äôs something that actually works.
Absolutely amazing that this little thing gives such a good workout, it does wonders for my abs and arms.
It also comes with a knee mat pad.

‚Ä¢ Pros:
+ Easy to assemble
+ Lightweight and portable
+ Comes with a knee mat pad

‚Ä¢ Cons:
- No complaints at all

Can't go wrong with the price and quality.
I definitely would recommend purchasing it.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Title of Review: Perfect for strengthening your core! Ideal for beginners
Name: Rachel Di.
Review: Many years ago I purchased one of these as I had an obsession with having a flat lean stomach and I could honestly spent hours a day using it. Years on since having had my 3 beautiful children my core is terrible and my stomach muscles are either non existent or lost in the mass of my belly!! I also suffer with a bad back which is why I have always been so cautious to not exercise incase I do more damage than good to my back. However I remembered from my younger days having one of these and remembered how easy it was to use so I decided to bite the bullet and re purchase another. I'm definitely not as good as I used to be with it but I've only been using it for a matter of weeks and already I can see a noticeable difference in my stomach area. It feels like I have finally muscles there which are slowly strengthening by the week. Ive also lost an inch off my waist which is amazing as that's never shifted in years. So through perseverance and time this can really really help so like me you have nothing to lose by trying it and for the price you really can't go wrong.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Keith bridges
Review: We have two of this exact model in a gym I use. They have had daily use over the last 6 months and are still like new. One of the best pieces of fitness equipment I have used. Really good for core strength and abdominal‚Äôs.You won‚Äôt get abbs if you don‚Äôt eat healthily with a good diet. You just get fantastic abbs that you cant see.Highly recommend this equipment.The gap in between the wheels is because the handles are not fully on, they are very tight. Once they are on they are not coming off again.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Dave.T.
Review: I use the wheels every morning as part of my exercise routine, I have made one modification to them as you can fit the wheels on the metal tube in two ways, one way pushes the wheels against each other which makes it too narrow and a bit wobbly the other way allows the wheels to wander a bit on the metal tube so I have cut a bit of plastic tubing to a 1inch/ 25mm length and put it between the wheels which makes them about 2inches/50mm apart which I find is much better and more stable.

Product: H&S Ab Abdominal Exercise Roller With Extra Thick Knee Pad Mat - Body Fitness Strength Training Machine AB Wheel Gym Tool
Name: Winkle76
Review: I‚Äôve started to try and work off the lockdown pounds and bought this and a few other bits to work out at home. I doubted myself in being able to do even one after many years away from the gym but surprised myself by doing ten straight off with pauses at the full extension. The next day or so I couldn‚Äôt use it as my lower abs seem to have been awoken with a massive hangover and whilst no overnight difference in appearance (shocker I hear u say), I believe with regular use my abs will shake the hangover off and get used to them for more of the same and increased core strength to boot üëç

Product: KATIX Training Equipment Grippy Handle
Name: Davy Jay
Review: Used this to overhaul three big Biomaster XTA 8000 reels and four normal baitrunner aero GTE 8000s, its the real deal. It is slightly heavier grade than what shimano put in their reels to begin with but ive since used the reels in -8deg weather and the grease did not thicken and stiffen the reels action up like the standard or cheaper stuff does, i can 100% vouch for that as it was what i was scared of. It stays well seperated from the bearing oil and simply will not mix with it so contamination resistance  wise its bob on. I would estimate maybe a 3000 size baitrunner would be the smallest reels i would use it on before it would slow down the action due to thickness. I applied it heavy at first then quickly stuck the reel cover and handle back on, then i reopened and removed the excessive grease and oiled the new bearings... worked an absolute treat and every one of the reels felt a good 20% smoother. One of my  big pit biomaster reels felt a tad grindy due to a slightly worn brass worm drive and this stuff has somehow stopped all grinding and it feels identical to my other two now. All the reels i have used this stuff in have been used hard and i even tested them vigorously after reassembly, i have even dabbed this stuff on my upgraded carbontex drag washers and it maintained the clutching capabilities as well as taking away the tiny bit of grab they had on the hardest setting. Good gear 100%

Product: KATIX Training Equipment Grippy Handle
Name: Chris
Review: I have used this to grease an old mitchell 300, this is a very thick grease and I find that the temperature affects the viscosity and subsequently the ease at which the reel can be turned. On a hot summers day this will be no problem but in subzero temperatures this may be an issue. I think I will stick to tf2 lithium cycle bearing grease which will be far easier running when cold and a lot cheaper.

Product: KATIX Training Equipment Grippy Handle
Name: Anne
Review: Bought these for my grandson as a keepsake but he has other plans.  He wants to use them now.

Review: All my reels have benefited from this great product

Title of Review: Great product for the home or when you're travelling
Name: Nadeem Mohammed
Review:
I was looking for exercise equipment that wouldn't take too much space in the home and that I could easily take with me while travelling. The TRX is ideal. It's so versatile that you can pretty much do most exercises with it and it's so light but strong that you can slip it back into the TRX bag and throw it in the suitcase. At home, you do need a hook to attach it to. I bought the following from Amazon and attached it to a beam:

https://amzn.to/3cfp7YL

With all these types of equipment, it's a case of just doing it and you'll get the result. Diet obviously plays a bigger part than just exercise. So if you are looking to tone up and lose weight you'll need to consider a lifestyle change to get the results you want.

Name: Liz
Review: I ordered this after two failed deliveries of a TRX waiting over 3 months from elsewhere. So cancelled other ones and ordered this. Delighted that this arrived so so fast, in two days and using straight away. Fab book and great and easy to fix from door or otherwise. V happy

Product: TRX All-in-One Suspension Trainer and Bundle Kit - Home-Gym System for the Seasoned Gym Enthusiast, Includes TRX Training Club Access
Name: chloe b
Review:
whislt the suspension trainer is good quality and easy to set up/get to grips with.
I have had a huge problem trying to access any content/workout plans that was supposedy included.

I tried to register the straps in Jan 2020 (purchased in early Dec 2019) customer service took a week reply, only to tell me that the serial number was not on their database. still awaiting updates two weeks later.

also the official TRX mobile app is incredably poor. despite me registering an account i cant never log in meaning again no access to any official content.

All this means that as i have to find unoffical workout plans online, instead of using the premium I purchased with this product!

you expect to have the security of customer service when you buy official products at higher cost. at this point im thinking I might as well have bought a cheaper alternative
