Product: The TRX PRO3 Suspension Trainer -¬† for Professional Athletes and Coaches, TRX Training Club App
Title of Review: "You need to purchase a new one every 12 months to ensure is it safe"
Name: Mint Condition
Review: SERIOUS SAFETY FLAW - Brought Original TRX Commercial Grade Suspension Training Kit for low (Personal Training Gym) use. A client (light weight) was using the TRX for simple reverse pull-ups and the CARABINER literally sheared and our client fell backwards onto the floor jarring his neck. We were in shock and after hospital checkups, fortunately he is ok.We contacted TRX directly and were advised that the Warrantly is only for 12months after which the TRX item is not guaranteed to not fail. They advise ALL consumers to purchase and replace with a new one every 12 months!That gave us NO confidence in the product and we removed all TRX trainers from our gym and will not be purchasing again. I am certain no gym currently using the TRX are aware that after 12months TRX do not expect them to be safe and could fail. Is every who purchases the TRX aware they need to replace the TRX every 12months? Does your gym? I really hope this raises awareness and prevents such incidents happening to someone else.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: A great buy and fast delivery
Name: Quality Enthusiast
Review: Sturdy, solid bit of kit, seems more so than Ive previously owned. Easy to assemble. Haven't tried incline yet but regular bench press, and dumbell flys works great. It is bigger than I imagined so check dimensions if you're tight on space. Price is about ¬£10 more than an alternative option on here but since gym equipment is at a premium during covidvtimes, this was a fast and next best option, so all in all, a good buy. Already feeling a difference.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Good home bench - for beginners / intermediate
Name: Mr D Tomlinson
Review:
OK so Ive been using Gyms for 15yrs+, and since lockdown I needed a home bench.

I settled on this one for cost, and availability. Overall, if you want a basic home bench to get started with weights, or maintain where you at then this is a good bench. If you are already lifting heavy and really want to push yourself, then this aint the bench for you.

Im 6.2', 90kgs, and benching 70-100kgs and its all fits / works fine - the hand grip position is the main issue as covered below.

Pros'
- very easy to build, took about 30 mins.
- Sturdy, it doesn't wobble or shake when in use like other home benches I've used.
- Dip handles are a nice addition
- folds away easy to save space
- Quick delivery - was about 10days faster than stated on Amazon.

Cons
- The support bars for holding the barbell, are in the exact place you want to hold the bar, meaning that you have to adjust your grip once you have lifted the bar. This is not great, and prevents you from going to your max weight.
- One of the support bars was damaged - the metal is bent, its only cosmetic, but looks like a factory defect and is a little annoying.
- Overpriced - though not as much as most. With covid 19 all gym equipment costs a bomb now, I have seen similar benches to this online for ¬£150 - ¬£300. Really I would say that this is worth ¬£40-¬£50 but given the circs, I was happy to pay ¬£80.
- The 'incline' mode is a little poor. Rather than the end of the bench where you head is being raised, you just drop the end of the bench where you but is, meaning you end up half on the floor. Not ideal, however until the gyms reopen it will do for now.

Ultimately it is an average HOME gym bench, that I don't regret buying. However if you are expecting the kind of bench that you use in the gym, this is not it. Dont expect to be lifting more that 100kgs on this... however if you are new to weight lifting then this is a great starting bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Neil
Review: Can‚Äôt fault it really for the price.  The delivery came very quickly, the packaging was very professional and everything was very well laid out within in order to assemble the product.  I didn‚Äôt really struggle to put it together on my own and they include all the necessary tools to do so, however they do recommend 2 people and it probably would have been easier with an extra hand.  The product itself is good, it‚Äôs very sturdy.  I couldn‚Äôt see it in the description but within the product it says 120kg max person and 200kg combined max weight.  If I had any complaint it would be as others have said that the barbell rack is right where you would want to grab the bar making it a little awkward.  Also the foot straps on the bench itself (if you wanted to use it for inclined sit ups) isn‚Äôt adjustable or elasticated so I have no idea how you‚Äôre supposed to get your feet under it!  Those small things aside I think this is very good value for money as an entry level weights bench, it in no way feels like a cheap product.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Good value for money and purpose. Only few silly design faults
Name: AB
Review:
I've had this bench for over a day so far and I love it. Don't let be fooled... this bench is good what what it's supposed to be which is for exercises. It's great value for money and looks solid. It took 20 mins to set up.

However, I did notice a bit of silly design, thought it's the only reason why its a 4 start. Basically, when the bench is closed (upward position), you wont be able to fix the barbell with pins. I tried reversing the metal panel but then you wont be able to close the bench.

Neverthelerss, it's a good value for money and definitely worth for home gym!

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Surprisingly sturdy with some major issues!
Name: neatesha
Review:
So I wanted to love this considering the price and the overall build quality, it feels extremely sturdy and could definitely take the max weight of 200kg. It is also great at a variety of things, the incline isn't too bad if a little unspectacular due to how low you are and the dip bars are sturdy as well.

Unfortunately that's where the good ends, the actual stands to hold the barbell are extremely narrow and it feels like created by people who have never lifted before.

The narrow stands cause many issues, the first one being the fact that if you put a bar on there, as soon as you put weight on one side it'll try to flick up. The second issue and the biggest is that the narrow stance means that your hand are where you would put them if you were to bench, which is hugely problematic. I've caught the sides of my hands in-between the bar and the stands when trying to place back onto the rack. This is fine when you're working with lighter weights but as a more experienced lifter who benches 100kg, it feels quite unsafe as I can't just slam the bar back onto the rack. If you were a new lifter I'd also say this isn't great because you'd be practicing bench press form from the wrong starting position.

TL:DR
Pros:
- Extremely sturdy
- Dip bar is great.
- Different heights for rack.

Cons (and why I can't recommend this to anyone):
- Incline is a little low or on the floor depending on incline needed.
- The bench rack/stand position is exactly where you'd put your hands if you were to bench, making this basically useless or promoting bad form (too wide or too close hand position).

Unfortunately I just can't recommend this despite how good I could see this being with a slight amendment. If you're paying around ¬£100 I'd save more and buy a proper bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I found it easy to put together. Take your time, unpack it all first and read the instructions... It's not hard.It is surprisingly light and easy to move. Folds nicely and is good if, like me, you have limited space.It's quite sturdy and well made.One downside. If you're tall/very big I'm not sure this is the right bench for you. Being 5' 8' it's OK for me. I bought it for my chest workout and it's great for that.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Excellent quality bench for flat bench exercises.
Name: AmazonSolider
Review: The bench arrived very quickly (next day) and is a good solid bench; not too difficult to put together, and for the money a great bench. However, I was looking for a bench that can be adjusted to an incline position, which I found this bench couldn‚Äôt do correctly. There‚Äôs 2 hooks for an incline bar to go, but this is nowhere near enough room for my head to go below the barbell. For this reason I will be returning.The bench in general though can‚Äôt be knocked; for the money it‚Äôs very good value. Unfortunately incline is a necessity for me, but if you‚Äôre only looking to flat bench, this is the bench for you.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: M.E.
Review: I‚Äôm 6‚Äù and weigh 100kg. I find this bench too small and uncomfortable to use. It‚Äôs manageable but not ideal. No different to a cheaper bench my brother has which he purchased for ¬£50 on eBay. I payed the extra money for this bench because of the description stating heavy duty etc. It‚Äôs not any more sturdy than my brothers bench. The incline position is useless, I don‚Äôt have any space for my legs in this position! The barbell racks are too close to each other, they‚Äôre in the natural place you would want to grip the bar when benching but you can‚Äôt so you go for a less comfortable close or wider grip.I wish I had just purchased a proper professional rack and free standing bench. There are too many compromises with this bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Easy to assemble and no issues with size (5ft 1 female)
Name: J.Lou
Review:
OK, so I almost didn't buy this because of some of the negative reviews which is what's prompted me to make sure I leave my own review.

For context, I'm 5ft 1 and female, which is likely why this product worked for me and not for those who've had a negative experience.

I've lifted weights at home for a few years now but have never had a bench. I'm not a body builder, so I'm not lifting huge weights.

With this in mind, I've found this great. Its the perfect size and given that my shoulders are proportionately narrower than most, I don't have an issue with the hand placement in relation to the rack which is something a few other reviews have mentioned.

For me, at my weight, it's sturdy and well built (which I was able to do easily enough by myself with the instructions provided).

I don't use the incline function at all so I can't comment on how well that works or not, but for a basic bench for use at home it's great. Again, I'm short, I'm female and not lifting huge weights, so bear that in mind.
I could imagine that anyone taller/heavier than me wanting to lift really heavy would perhaps find this a bit small and not as sturdy as they'd like.

In terms of storage, it folds up and is kept in place by a a key/pin (not sure of the term!)

There's also pins to keep the barbell in place when not being used but they're actually narrower than the holes they're supposed to go through, meaning they easily slip back out so again, bear that in mind if safety is a huge concern.

Overal, glad I've purchased but would only recommend if I knew the person buying was similar in weight/size/height.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Bill
Review: This weight bench is by no means a professional gym item, however, it‚Äôs ideal for a beginner, with a medium build, who wants to do some general exercise at home. It‚Äôs sturdy and easy to assemble. It doesn‚Äôt take up much space and can be folded away after use, which is great for storage. I have a 55lbs barbell which this entry-level bench holds well.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Ended up a solid decision for a solid bench!
Name: Rugby Coach
Review: Nealy spent an extra ¬£40 on another product, glad I didn't really strong and solid, easy to assemble. It is far stronger and more substancial than i expected. I'm amazed at the price and I take a bit of pleasing usually :) buy with confidence. If there was a negative, its made in China so perhaps I should be supporting UK manufacturers but its a really good value.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: It's ok. Just don't expect too much
Name: Max Common
Review:
Instructions were ok, I'd like some clearer markings on the different pin types, not really clear which way round the legs go and I missed the small L & R stickers to begin with as theyre not mentioned in the instructions.

Comfortable back pad but does move around somewhat if you need to reposition yourself during exercise. The bench pad is held on by four small bolts attached through the support beam but this does twist under use. Doubt this will last very long under good use.

Mine had damaged parts out of the box as shown in the pictures. Not a game changer but does leave a bad experience overall.

Stable base for doing dips, feet do not move at all. Love the small footprint when folding the bench up

Pros
* Looks good
* Bars for dips are good
* Stable overall
*Small footprint when folded

Cons
* Poor quality parts in places
*Needs extra bracket under bench pad
*Broken / damaged parts

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: chris rowe
Review:
The reviews are misleading, think they should specify their height and build, at 6‚Äô2 and wide I have no issues with hand position on an Olympic bar, it‚Äôs fine, maybe a shorter more narrow person or smaller bar it might be an issue. Whilst I think it‚Äôs great value there are 2 big issues.

On the bar rests it‚Äôs almost powder coating and when you insert them you hear it peeling off, same if bar scrapes on them so I assume after good use unless silver underneath it‚Äôll look awful.

Secondly the main feature of folding is a nightmare, you have to take the bar off to fold it up, my solution was to rest the bar on the dip handles but even then it‚Äôs a stupid design flaw.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Good for the price but barbell holder is very narrow.
Name: random guy 21
Review: I didn't look at the dimensions when I purchased this but I was surprised at how narrow the barbell holder was. I am 5 foot 6 inches and I have to grip the barbell on the outside of the holders for it to feel comfortable when I lift it off and when I have finished a set I have to carefully watch my hands in order to avoid pinching them between the bar and the holder. The construction is solid enough but don't expect it to survive heavy or punishing use. One annoyance is that in order to fold up the bench portion I cannot do so while the barbell is in place so I have to use a chain to tie it to the barbell to keep it up. The base of the weight bench needs to be weighed down or when putting on plates or the whole thing will topple to one side. It comes with all the tools but I recommend having a socket wrench set handy. Overall its good if you have very narrow shoulders and are going to use a fairly light weight but for bigger more experienced weightlifters you are better off spending more money for something more robust.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: A bit on the expensive side
Name: Mishal Patel
Review:
I bought this bench so I could exercise at home during the lockdown. My initial impressions after opening the box was that the instructions were easy to follow and the assembly was quick.

Once built the bench felt very sturdy and of good build quality. However I feel that there are two drawbacks to buying this. Firstly the price. I feel that the product is overpriced. My next and biggest dislike of the product is that every time you go to pick up the barbell the holder is positioned exactly where you would grip the bar from.

Other than this the bench does the job and is easy to store as you can put it up flat against a wall.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Carl Ford
Review:
I bought this bench to use at home while the gyms are closed and to avoid the mad rush after they re-open.

The bench was easy enough to put together and feels sturdy.

The main reason for me only giving it 3/5 stars is due to the placement of the beams which hold the barbell.
Unfortunately the beams hold the bar exactly where I'd grip the bar, meaning I have to use a wider / smaller grip on the bar and reducing the amount I can safely life, due to having to adjust my grip.

The poor placement of the beams also make it difficult to put the bar back down, since I have to adjust my grip again beforehand. If I had to put the bar down quickly, I'd be unable to do so without crushing my hands between either the proper holders or the little black fixed holders designed to catch the bar if I dropped it on myself.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Josh Sobczak
Review: Easy to assemble with little to no effort. I would recommend having a second person assist with it however, some parts are tedious to assemble. Overall the build is very solid and can easily hold a number of weight. I use mine daily and only noticed some minor scratching from where the weight is set upon (it has textured grips)

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Ragdoll Radio
Review: For ¬£100 this is a very good deal. It is reasonably sturdy, you will need a 6ft plus barbell to use comfortably. It folds up nicely, so that you can store it away, saving space after use. I am totally happy with it, it is a good little fitness investment. I almost forgot, it was very easy to assemble, took about half an hour, I did it alone. Does not have an incline press capacity, which is fine, because I don't do incline presses. If you do, you'll need another bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: I wouldn‚Äôt buy anything from this company again...And here‚Äôs why
Name: Adam Robinson
Review:
Firstly, I tried to put the measurement bars in and the left one wouldn‚Äôt go in (supposed to move up and down easily). On inspection, the first thing I noticed was how rusty the inside of the tubes were. Secondly, there was small metal nodules that were sticking out from where it had been welded. I‚Äôm now going to have to find a file or something to sort this out myself.

I then lay on the bench and realised how un-sturdy it was. I could push back easily and the feet came off the floor. I can only put this down to the pin locks which have LOADS of play in them. When you move it in the folded position, the bars wobble around so much that it clacks constantly.

Overall, I‚Äôm really not happy with this purchase but I don't have time to send it back. Disappointing.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Charmz
Review: Just received this bench to replace an old Weider bench and was pleasantly surprised that this bench is bigger and better than expected. It probably took me about an hour to assemble and comes with tools but it is very sturdy indeed and folds to save space. I have done some flat/incline barbell bench press on the bench and you can incline the bench as well but it is not a big incline. Only downside is like most other reviews is the hand placing on the bench rack, I am having to use a wider placing than normal when doing barbell bench press. There are many exercises you can perform on the bench with a barbell and dumbells and the dip bars are great. Thumbs up for this bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Very sturdy and high build quality considering the cheap price. I am 98 KG and it had no problem supporting me and my brother who was 70kg the bench had no issue with him to and we use alot of weights on the bench.

Pros:
Nice colors the black suit's the silver racks very nicely
Very sturdy
Adjustable
Not to small
Not to big
Comfy for the price
Does not slide on the correct flooring
Easy to assemble
Easy to store away

Cons:
The racks could have been very slightly wider apart for a smaller bar.
Does work with a 5"5 bar but 6 plus is ideal.

Overall value for the money is a 9/10 very happy :D

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: kenny barnes
Review: bought this due to lockdown and gyms closed , for the money this is value for money, do not expect a high level gym standard weight bench for the money but i am 120kg and my bar weighs about the same and this bench handles it no problem , very easy to asemble and was delivered quicky

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Easy to put together no problems
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Really good bench well worth the money.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Andy B
Review: Full honest review. I ordered this bench for ¬£85 with delivery, great value an it arrived in 2 days so very quick delivery. Easy to assemble as all tools included and instructions easy to read, it to 20mins to assemble on my own and it looks great, very solid. Only issue is it seems more narrow than a normal bench as im not very tall 5.6 and i rub my shoulders on the bars an wrists hit the supports when returning the bar. Could be wider but over great product and im happy with it!

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Sturdy, folds up easily, good price
Name: Mad Badger
Review: Was a bit apprehensive about purchasing this "blind" amongst dozens of similar products I shouldn't have worried. It's really sturdy, good assembly instructions, and folds up neatly. The handles for dips are well positioned with no wobbling of the bench in use, good adjustability, and comfy too. Only drawback, it's quite compact & your hands are quite close together for bench presses, overall a great product.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: John
Review: Small improvements, which would make a big difference: the board extending further back to support the head whilst lifting, for me it's too far forwards, I'd prefer to lift the bar straight up from my chest at a right angle; rubber/plastic cover in the grooves to hold the barbell because I think that over time the metal on metal will chip my barbell bar; the supports being wider so I can widen my grip on the bar.  Other than that, I'm using the bench twice a week and I love it.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Alex
Review: The rack is far too narrow and ends up being exactly where you want your hands to be, forcing you into a wide or close grip which isn't ideal. The incline option offers no support whatsoever and forces you to keep yourself up whilst using the bench this way. Not sure why they didn't just attatch a seat. Would have been alot better to have taller back rests for the bar so that you don't have to slot it back into place perfectly after a set and instead just lean it back until it hits the metal. Very overpriced for a product with so many flaws in functionality. However, its compact, easy to assemble and can be used as more than just a bench press.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Michael
Review:
Pleasantly surprised.
Very solid, easy to assemble. I think great value for money.

Only one criticism is it‚Äôs a little narrow so can‚Äôt position hands where I would like in bench press at high weight‚Ä¶ but dimensions are clearly labelled so I guess I should have known.
Can still do nearly max weight and/or lots of reps at medium weight.

In summary, very good. Sure better products exist, but at a lot more cost. I would recommend

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Very good bench - works for me
Name: Mr. M. D. Latham
Review: I only gave this a 4 star because I'd like the bench to be just a few inches wider, but thats being picky. I'm 6'2" and 95KG, fairly wide, and the bench just about fits me on if I get in the perfect position, which I always do now after using it for a couple of months. Its very study, was easy to set up, all in all, a great purchase.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: The OP
Review: I have a home gym at the back of my house that gets a decent amount of use, however my son has recently wanted to join me and so I needed a second bench to sit beside mine that would work nicely in keeping with the rest of the equipement, thus one is plenty sturdy enough for both of us to use (one at a time of course) colours are nice of course but the cover on the padding itself feels reasonably durable, I would leave it in a commercial setting but it's plenty good enough for home use

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Joanne W.
Review: Bought this for my Son great piece of equipment, received the next day

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Michael Shankleman
Review:
Couldn‚Äôt be happier! It arrived nearly two weeks before estimated delivery date, nicely packaged with no scuffs or marks.

It took around 20 minutes for my partner and I to put it together. It is sturdy and easy to adjust. The dip station is perfect width apart, just be careful not to pinch your hand when lowering the bar back down at the end of a set.

Could quite easily do another two months of lockdown now I have this!!

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Lewis
Review: Assembled it in 25 minutes myself was pretty straight forward. Very sturdy also.Problem I have using this is when you have loaded a bench the actual 2 bits holder the bar are shoulder width part so you have to go close grip or really wide to lift then adjust your hands to your normal benching position. Pretty dangerous if your training alone. And to make it incline you actually need to fold the leg right away to actually get a good incline on it. As the one setting you have can‚Äôt feel it in the chest.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: B121
Review: Arrived just 3 days after I ordered so delivery was much quicker than expected.Instructions to build were straight forward and so was easy to assemble. It‚Äôs well built and very sturdy and is great if you have limited space. The price is good too as I did look around but found this to be best priced for what I was looking for. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who needs a home workout bench.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Ian Copp
Review: Bench is sturdy enough and I use an Olympic bar with approx 60-70k of weight. The only downside is rack is too narrow meaning you have to lift weight off with a narrow grip...fine if doing manageable weight but awkward if doing heavy. Otherwise it's actually good value, folds up nicely and quality of bench is very good. Dip bars are a bonus too.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Max User Weight: 120kg Max training weight: 80 kg
Name: Colin
Review:
the words Heavy Duty are misleading big time !
I already reached the maximum capacity.

compromised solutions (in case you already bought it):
- once you pass the threshold buy a REAL heavy duty bench which can hold you and the weights (good options above 500 pounds weight capacity)
- use the arms as weight support... ??? more than 120 kg ???

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Littleneil
Review: I'm only a small bloke 5'9'' and 11 1/2 stone so no size issue for the bench which is comfortable. Easy to put together. I can get my grip on the bar with a tiny amount to spare without it being uncomfortable. A little broader in the chest and then the supports would be in the way and I'd need to go for a wider set on the bar. You get what you pay for and at the price I can't find fault.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Shazza
Review: Bought this for my son. He said it was easy to put together, and its very sturdy. He only has a small room, so this was perfect to store when not in use. Great value for money. It even came a week earlier than expected.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Karanjit Sahota
Review:
Overall the bench is good especially for home use (whilst gyms are shut). Easy to assemble and fold away so you can easily store it once used. However i do have some negatives for the bench:

- Not wide enough. The rack itself is not wide enough meaning your actual grip of the bar is quite narrow.
- With it not being wide enough, when racking the bar, i feel my hand is close to getting caught with the bar rest which can be quite dangerous. I have resulted in wearing gloves.

Overall solid product, could do with some improvements on the width of it. Overall 7/10.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Yasmine
Review: Very good and sturdy item. My 16 and 14 year old sons managed to put this together without any issues in about half an hour or 45 minutes. No issues whatsoever with anything. Nothing missing. All tools included as well. Doesn't take up too much space either with it being foldable. Good value for money as well and Next Day Delivery with Amazon Prime. What else could anyone possibly ask for? ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: KS
Review: Ever since COVID, I knew I had to invest in some quality gym equipment! No more long ques waiting to use the bench press in the gym! Or feeling like someone is standing over you, waiting to use it next. I've quit the gym and in the long run, I'm to so save so much time and money with my own gym at home.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Mr Christopher Kennedy
Review: It‚Äôs a great bench for the price, I‚Äôm 6‚Äô2 and I just about fit, just! Easy to assemble and fold away. The one thing stopping me from giving it 5 stars is it‚Äôs too narrow, my hands on the bar are too far apart, which is not good.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: David P
Review: I use this for sit ups and bench pressing and various weight uses, i am not a light person, but it is a very sturdy unit and i like that it folds up nicely and securely to reduce the space it takes.Did have concerns about the weight it could take but given the cost of this and others, i have to say this was well worth trying out.Easy to fit, took only  10-15 minutes.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Gillian
Review: Bench arrived much earlier than stated, it was easy to assemble, instructions were clear and parts labelled. Sturdy enough bench and foldable, making storage easy.I was lucky enough to buy this on one of the prime days offers, having an extra ¬£30 off the price has made this bench a bargain. I look forward to many happy hours maintaining my strength and fitness.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Arron Dow
Review: Great weight bench you can use for multiple purposes. Bench press, dips, sit up and whatever else you can think of. Easy to assemble and folds away. You need a good space for it although it doesn't take up that much room.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Price YES build YES happy YES
Name: kyle thom thom
Review: For the price I had my doubts but had faith in my fellow reviewers. I was pleasantly surprised from the moment I opened the box. Greeted with instructions that made sense, bolts and screws labelled to a point where my 5 year old could follow it. The finished product was better than I thought and just what I needed for my little home gym. If your after a solid item that won't let you down look no further.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Christopher neilly
Review: Was very pleasantly surprised with this bench its really strong although well above the recommended limit I bench over a 100 kg on this regularly and it holds no problem not as much as a creak really happy with this and it folds away in the corner when not in use.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Excellent,high quality product.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The bench took hours to assemble, it isn't sturdy enough when I do chess presses and other exercises, it also doesn't have a seat to help positioning of incline chest presses. I regret buying it, wanted to return but was really sick with covid so lost my return window. Regrettable.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Isabella
Review: Husband delighted with this. Folds up easily and safely. Sturdy, feel safe using this. Good clear assembly instructions and there is a YouTube video of showing how to assemble too.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Dazzling Dale
Review: You can lift weights laying down especially when you have a low ceiling. Obviously good for the chest as well as the arms. but the only main drawback is the width you can't have your arms  further apart when lifting. as for quality the metal seems sturdy and the padded bench at first impression looks a bit cheap looking but as for durability only time will tell. But overall i am happy with product.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: Adam Henson
Review: Absolutely terrible. You can‚Äôt put the rack back as the Jcups get in the way of your hands.Total safety hazard, you get what you pay for as they say.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Title of Review: Great value and welcome addition to my home gyn
Name: Kevin

Title of Review: Rack position is awkward (not too wide not too narrow)
Name: Khaulah S
Review:
When re-racking the barbell, I have to move my hands further out otherwise I would pinch my hand where the barbell is going to be racked. I've caught it between the barbell and the rack a few times and it's very annoying/painful.

Of course you can imagine when you're re-racking a weight that is challenging for you, moving your hands wider whilst holding the bar is not the easiest thing to do.

That is my only complaint, otherwise a very sturdy product and I think it's great value for money. Easy to assemble (may be a little bit difficult for a beginner, but 2 people should be able to fix it)

Name: Travelnat
Review: Easy to assemble, I‚Äôd use a pair of grips to assist the with the bolts and nuts. There‚Äôs a minor fault in the fact if the floor is not level the back stand ends up balancing on the bolts, this is easy to rectify with taping packers onto the rubber feet.Perfect for bench press, dips and the use of hand weights.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench
Name: s sadler
Review: Arrived 2 days earlier than expected,  very quick to assemble,  instructions were very clear and easy to follow, took me about 15 minutes but I used a socket set instead of supplied tools, bench is very sturdy,  no wobbles, I weigh 100 kg and total weight limit including user is 200 kg so that is more than enough for a home gym, it folds up nice and compact to sit against a wall when not in use. Downsides of the bench - the barbell supports are too close together,  they are positioned where you want to put your hands so you have to make adjustments when lifting the bar, not easy if pushing heavy weights,  can't lock the seat in folded position if the barbell is in place,  the bench lowers at the front so the incline isn't great as you end up with your bum on the floor, it would be far better raising at your head end instead,  overall a good sturdy bench for a home gym, if it was slightly wider it would be ideal.

Product: WINNOW Adjustable Weight Bench with Dip Station Folding Heavy Duty Weight Lifting Bench Home Training Gym Multiuse Workout Bench

Review: I think this bench is good value for money, the actual bench itself is passable at this  price bracket for comfort  and i think the frame work of the bench could be used for a more exspensive bench i cant find fault with that and also the two bar racks lower down could save your life if you cant push the bar back up which is a good thing.I didn't have a problem with holding the bar either side of the bar rests it seemed a natural position for me to hold the bar and the two bar securing clips stops the bar tipping up as you put weight on one side.I do weights for fitness and im not a big bloke perhaps somebody wide would find the bench a bit narrow.

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Title of Review: A strong and reliable fitness product.
Name: Leigh
Review: I have always used TRX suspension training products and have been very pleased with the. However on this occasion both of the handles arrived damaged due to the overly-tight cable tie that they arrive packaged in. This has left me disappointed as they now have lasting indents. This is a definite flaw in the packaging system used for this.

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Title of Review: Great piece of equipment that does what it says.
Name: Chris Aitchison
Review:
Never tried TRX training before. Bought this on a whim and have not been disappointed.
A very sturdy piece of equipment. I use it via the attachment to my garage, internal door. I weigh 92kg and have had no problems at all in it supporting my weight. The garage door seems to be OK too.
There are a lot of workouts for this on the YouTube. So there‚Äôs plenty of options to explore.
You are provided with an access card to a TRX website for a series of training videos, provided with the purchase. Haven‚Äôt tried these yet.
The equipment is easy to pick up and is easy to learn. However start with the basics. Build up to things like the Pike. I tried it for a laugh but don‚Äôt bend in the middle very well. It didn‚Äôt end well for me. Positively it wasn‚Äôt too far to fall and it hasn‚Äôt put me off at all.
Down point don‚Äôt pull too hard on the way up as meeting the anchor point, or in my case the door is possible.
I was used mainly to free weights and cardio. I can confirm TRX lives up to its promises. Some of the videos can give you quite a workout in 25-35 minutes. I recommend you try these as the trainers are in general excellent at helping and guiding you what to do. That way you‚Äôll get the most out of the TRX. If it helps you can burn up to 400 kcals in a more vigorous workouts and no less than 200. For fans of calorie counting.
It really works you core as promised. You can feel it tense under the exercises. Even doing the basic stuff as a beginner like me.
Overall it‚Äôs really good fun. It‚Äôs a bit like being on a swing as kid, well that‚Äôs what I think.
Another top tip, learning the hard way as per usual. Best not to use every day. I got a bit carried away and ended up with brachial radial strain, after a 7 days worth of sessions. Maybe that‚Äôs an age thing.
Combine it with your training and most of all have fun. Hi
Cheersüëçüèº

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Name: Andrew
Review:
So I've bene considering a TRX for a while now and took the plunge when I saw the GO version on offer.

I've picked this up for myself and my son who uses it during his physio.

The system is essentially a lighter weight version of the full TRX system and comes well packaged and presented. It all goes into a handy bag for transport and would be ideal in a gym bag, travel bag or around the house.

So inside the box is the mesh carry bag to house the straps, indoor/outdoor anchor, training poser and a card that gives you access to two digital workouts. You dont need this, head on over to the most popular video sharing tube int he world and you can find something to suit your needs, from Army sessions to personal trainer and everything inbetween.

Once you have found your workout get stuck in! Its surprising how much of a workout you get from bodyweight and to be honest a lot of functional gains.

Really rate this edition

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Name: Pmoo
Review:
Having used another brand of suspension trainer and needing to travel for work with it, I realised the other whilst good was just not compact enough and quite heavy.

Whilst rather pricy, this lightweight TRX version Really is that. Much more compact to fold up and very light weight, I would guess this weighs less than a kilo when packed up., where as my old one weighed double that. This TRX Feels sturdy enough and well made, I am not a small lass.

I found the TRX team very helpful when I used chat to ask for help when I could not sign up to their web site (you get a free start up membership in the TRX).

The only thing missing in my view is the ‚ÄòDo not disturb TRX training in progress‚Äô door knob card, that would be very handy for when I am in hotels using my TRX and trying not to scare the house keeping folks!

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Name: J
Review:
Like the versitiliy and range of exercises.

Sometimes the strap can be uncomfortable on the top of foot or heel.

Changing length depending on exercise gets annoying but once you know what you are doing it's all good.

TRX subscription is quite pricey in my opinion. Loads of stuff on YouTube

Product: TRX GO Suspension Trainer System: Lightweight and Portable | Full Body Workout, All Levels and All Goals Includes a poster with first steps, 2 training instructions and anchors indoors and outdoors
Title of Review: ----PERSONAL TRAINER REVIEW - LYING ABOUT ITEM - PLEASE READ----
Name: MR T A PETTIT
Review: I am a personal trainer with years of use and experience with different TRX items. I purchased a TRX GO system from Amazon a couple of months ago from this same seller for a client of mine. It has a grey TRX branded strap and is good quality. It cost ¬£108 which I think is good and worth it. I purchased another one (this one) listed as the same item but 'black' which has just shown up from this same seller. It is not the same item. If you check the TRX official website this is the TRX Move system- a more basic TRX which that website sells for ¬£80. This is NOT a black version of the GO system, it is a cheaper product, the Move system. They have claimed it is a black version and are selling it for the same cost (almost) of ¬£107. I do not think this is honest, or that this version is worth that money, and I will be sending mine back.

I either use it attached to a door which is fine, or also I have some overhead grills in my hall which I can also use, which are definitely preferable as you can move both sides of the anchor point.The TRX app is not great for exercises,  as it is quite limited. however, there are many great YouTube videos available which are good for all levels of fitness.I'd definitely recommend this TRX gear as an alternate to expensive classes. I haven't taken it on trips away as yet, however, it is very light so would work well for those who are regularly on the road.

Name: Kindle Customer

Other than that I would say just plain avoid the black synthetic rope. Stick to the natural one they have on offer, it's cheaper and more reliable. Just my 2 cents.

Name: SallyE
Review: I use them in my classes and my clients ‚Äúlove to hate them‚Äù üòÇ Brilliant, but just wish they had burpees on it. In fact, if it lands on the black logo, I get them to do burpees anyway. üòÜ

Product: Phoenix Fitness RY1051 Exercise Dice for Workout Fun - Fitness Decision Dice - Switch Up Training Routines, HIIT and Exercises - Home and Gym - Orange
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Excellent piece of kit and great fun. Description doesn't say what is on the dice so I'll fill you in:
Dice 1: 10 Reps, 20 Reps, 30 Reps, 30 seconds, 60 seconds, 90 seconds.

Dice 2: Jumping Jack's, Press Ups, Crunches, Lunge Walks, Squats, Phoenix Fitness Logo

Me and my wife use these for circuit training taking turns to roll them. Makes it easier to blame the other one if you end up with 90 seconds of your least favourite exercise.

If it lands on the logo we rest for the length of time the other dice lands on or do burpees if it lands on it too early in the workout.

We are both into our gym and fitness and a 30 minute workout with these is very hard work and leaves you very tired and sore the next day (though I guess it depends how hard yu work...). I also use them as a 10 min warmup before doing something else. Save me having to think about what I want to do or "cheat" and give myself something easy. It's up to the dice.

I did think they might lack versatility, but you can switch it up by thinking "if it lands on press ups I'll pick up some dumbells for arm curls" etc.

I would definitely recommend these.

Product: Phoenix Fitness RY1051 Exercise Dice for Workout Fun - Fitness Decision Dice - Switch Up Training Routines, HIIT and Exercises - Home and Gym - Orange

I bought them to give away as part of a prize on my running group and the winner actually said they have helped her to actually do more as any exercise lasts no more than 1-2 mins so she rolls them once every 2 hrs during her working day.  I have now bought some for myself. Really great, even my 14yr old boy and 4yr old daughter use them .A fun but actually brilliant gift.
