Product: Phoenix Fitness RY1051 Exercise Dice for Workout Fun - Fitness Decision Dice - Switch Up Training Routines, HIIT and Exercises - Home and Gym - Orange
Name: Adeel Khan
Review: Excatlly according to expection

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Yavit Tudu
Review: What a brilliantly designed bit of kit. This really does the job for me. Its fairly easy to put together (15 minutes or so for me and I have dodgy knees and hands), and is surprisingly light to carry. The instructions for assembly are very clear and good I found; minimum tool usage. These are included and they're small and very good.I've found it very effective for legs, arms and stomach, but it can be used for other areas. The illustrations and pages of photographs showing it in use by real people (muscular models of course) are a big plus and for me made it very easy to get started. At first I found the exercises a bit lightweight and easy, but after a few minutes started to realize the method was working and I now after 3/4 weeks find it good, effective and very importantly - SAFE.I would recommend this if you're looking to get back into some form of fitness or starting on weight-loss. I'm doing both and its working well for me.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Richard
Review: I found this very easy to put together. As well as the chart with images of the various ways to set the machine up for different excercises, those excercises are demonstrated very well on a handy DVD, easy to follow along to for making sure you are doing them all propperly. The only concerne I have is that the clips connecting the hand grips to the rowing section are plastic. I would have thought metal ones would do a better job concidering the strain put on them. All in all, this machine complements the gym equipment I already use / treadmill, upright bike, recumbent bike, upper body ergometer and weights. I'm 66 by the way

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: As a female DIYer, it took me about 40 ...
Name: london
Review: As a female DIYer, it took me about 40 mins stopping and staring to assemble. Positive: abdomen ached whenever tummy exercise is undertaken, thus it does the job, but the hollow of my back hurts when I do the stretching -only because i cant put a support there.Negative: if you are greater than 5ft 6in, it wouldn't suit you well.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Good for beginners, wide range of workouts
Name: matthew cresswell
Review: This product is great for beginners and beginners only.  I bought this for exactly that reason but for experienced trainers, even though it can still be used for basic exercises, I think they'll be generally disappointed . If you want something to use if you can't make it to the gym, then this is up there. It works the whole body and comes with a booklet with loads of different exercises. It's really easy to put together, with easy to follow instructions and doesn't take up too much room either. A good all round product and good variety of workouts.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Est51
Review: Having given up horse riding [worn out knees], I needed something to exercise my midriff, arms and shoulders. This is the perfect tool for the job. Keeping toned muscles is all about repetitions and you can easily build up to seriously large numbers of sit-ups, arm curls, etc with this. It's also quite compact, so fits into todays microscopic bedrooms without having to be folded away each time you use it [which would mean you'd be less inclined to use it].

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Valentinius
Review:
This is an awesome bit of kit, makes exercising a lot easier.

Gives a nice bit of variety and provides you with a sheet of suggested exercises (also i think a dvd but I havent used or seen where it has gone since I opened the packaging).

I hated doing situps on the floor or a cheap version of wondercore 1 I had, this makes them much easier and yet seems to make for better results.

Love the rowing addition as well, although the cables could do with being a bit stiffer to provide more resistance they give a lot of additional workouts to the unit.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Hobbs100
Review: After being out of the hardcore exercise game for 6 months i ordered this to start getting back into it and it does everything you could need, So the pro's: Locking the back rest in a half locked position and doing 30 minutes of sit ups leaves you feeling like you have been sucker punched in the gut for the first few days but it quickly goes and you can up the amount you do, The rowing system does work very well and you feel the burn on your arms as there are atleast 6 different ways to use them to completely work out the lower arms upper arms shoulders stomach cheat and back with these, The cons: with the rowing system is i would like to see a tension adjuster on it to up the difficulty as after a while it becomes to easy doing one thing. Same as the rowing i would like to have seen an adjustment ability on the back rest to give more tension for situps i prefer half locked so the second half of sitting up is all me but i have seen this on other similar products and that would be a big improvement,  it would also be easier to do straight situps it the seat had a lock on it as it tends to move to the left or right which can become irritating after a while. The only other con is the central lock on the frame is not the best making it quick wobbly could be improved. Overall a great machine for anyone from novice to experienced with this type of exercise i would advise anyone to try but with the adjustments noted above this would be a 5 star all rounder.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Bee Payne
Review: Though I am enjoying this product using 2 - 3 times a week, I have become aware of the limitation for me which others would not have.  Health issues restricts my work out, but hopefully in the coming months, my health will improve enough o use it to its maximum.  Probably not suitable for people with the same health issues I have (heart).

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: ... and I have lost a stone and toned up nicely. The machine is quite sturdy and easy to ...
Name: David Williamson
Review: I have been using this for a few months now along with my exercise bike and I have lost a stone and toned up nicely. The machine is quite sturdy and easy to use and the exercises are varied. If I had a gripe it would be that you have to take the springs off after use, but this is a minor inconvenience.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Rob
Review: Excellent. Also doubles up as a convenient clothes horse for my wife !!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: MarkT
Review: Allows you to do lots of things, but none of them to the level you might wish.  Easy to assemble but a bit rickety when you get there.  Not enough/any flexibility in setting higher levels of tension at either end of the machine.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: A great piece of home exercise equipment.
Name: Sommeguy
Review: Superb piece of fitness equipment . Ideal for a home user who is not likely to visit a gym. I have used it for a month EVERY day and can certainly tell the difference. A lo g way of a six pack but certainly you g up, The DVD showing exercises is a really good addition. Three modes of exercises. I can now manage the boot camp version.I do not think a regular gym user would be to impressed, bit for the arm chair fitness guy it is IDEAL.100% satisfied.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Nicky
Review: With all the gym closures, due to obvious covid reasons, I was in the market for a bench. I stumbled across this while researching and I'm glad I did! This primarily is to help with the core physique of the body, don't be fooled, just using this won't get you the body that you see in the pics and videos BUT for under ¬£100, it's a bargain! The sit-up range of motion is great! And the resistance bands are of good quality and can aid a good warm up. The great advantage for me is I double this up to use as a bench, which when I've coupled with weights, can actually get a massive range of exercises. It's light and easy to put together. Good small footprint so doesn't use too much space in the room and folds up easily to store (even though I just leave mine out). Would recommend 100% it lives up to expectations

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Good for the right Sized Human
Name: DBG
Review: Just a wee bit small for a 6 footer... But I bought it so...  Well enough made and looks great as a spaceship crash couch for a younger person:)

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mona
Review: I Have had this a few days now and my 15 year old son put it together for me with no problems at allI brought this machine to keep up my fitness in the absence of my gym because of the worldwide Covid-19 virus situation and I love this machine it‚Äôs great for the price . I am thoroughly enjoying using this and am now developing abs which is a bonus  This really Helps me tone my arms with my own body weight as resistance.  I do between 30 to 45 mins a day and no longer miss the gym as much! Great piece of equipment for home use while watching TV The only negative is that to use certain parts of the equipment as in the seat you have to disconnect the springs which can be a bit fiddly but it‚Äôs not really a big problem  the grand scheme of things

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: A great workout machine for the home, if you are under 5.5 feet tall
Name: John Taylor
Review: This is a great addition to the home gym, we have the previous wonder Core and still use it, this machine gives additional features for working out more areas of your body.However, if you are over 5.5 feet in height then you will struggle to use this to it's full capacity, I am 5ft 10", and struggle to fit in to the machine for some of the exercises, a bit disappointing, but I'm sure there is an engineer out there who will create a bracket to extend the length of this and we can all get to use it fully, or can WonderCore come up with something?

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Good product as long as you‚Äôre not too tall
Name: Marcus
Review: Overall very pleased with this home gym , great resistance for a beginner like myself , easy to assemble and pretty comfortable to use . My only gripe is that it‚Äôs not really suitable for taller people , I‚Äôm over 6 ft and the gap between where my knees go and the seat is not sufficient which means that the back of my knees don‚Äôt end up where the supports are .

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Maria W
Review:
This little unit has it's uses but i think it is not suitable for larger people!
If you are over 6ft you may find this a little....well, little!
Comes in a small box and took around 10 mins to unpack and assemble. During the process it was dawning on me that this was going to be a little smaller than expected and so it proved!
Once assembled it looks a resonable bit of kit (remembering how little it costs!) but as mentioned if you are a 6ft guy you will quickly wish you'd have spent more on a bigger bench!
It's good for what it is and if you are 5ft-5ft 10 say it's probably going to be ok but i we bought it for family use of all sizes so should still provide usable service! Having used it now for a few months i can report it is totally not suitable for people larger than around 5ft!
It has multiply uses so you can use some of it's features but the dimmensions for most will prove far to small.
Shame as it's not a bad effort quality wise but if like me any many men you will find this sized almost for children only.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Don't expect to build up power or muscles like in the videos they are promoted in
Name: Kawika
Review: Don't expect to build up power or muscles like in the videos they are promoted in.. not enough resistance or weight work load.. its good as in the name for your core muscles to wake them up from their slumber.. We like the product seeing as we're not hard core Health Fitness freaks.. we just wanted to burn some calories slowly and gently... So this is good for the job. anything more like a six pack.. I don't think this will get us there for it.. its help stretch some old muscles which haven't been stretched for decades... We like the fact its small and compact.. don't need to take a whole room just to use it.. can work out in from of the TV or in the Garden when the sun is out.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Tracy Jayne
Review: Easy to put together, easy to use, we don't look like the people on the tv advert yet........ living in hope!!!!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Jamie
Review:
It‚Äôs okay for the price but I should have probably paid a bit more to get a better machine.

Like others have said, its a bit awkward to use if you‚Äôre tall and the rowing feature doesn‚Äôt have much resistance but it will probably do the job for a few months.

Also mine was missing the assembly instructions, meal planning and work out DVD. Likely I managed to assemble this using the photos on Amazon, but no idea if I‚Äôm using this properly.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: anwuli
Review: Not suitable for tall people

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Not enough resistance but good for beginners
Name: Arthur
Review: The resistance is not enough for average Joe like me not sure if it‚Äôs because my core had already gone through its initial pain for using roller. Lots of great exercises you can use this  for like getting extra ankle straps to exercise your hamstring, you can put your legs on the back support pushing it down and up to work that stubborn lower abs.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: good buy
Review: For me this was a fantastic buy . Since I got it I'm never of it I have lost a lot of weight by used this wonder core in was 19stone and now I'm 16stone  I'm glad I bought this

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Silver Sleeper
Review: I like this a lot. Its sturdy and well made and doesn't take up too much space.I have been using the DVD that came with it and have tried each workout on the disc. The workouts are good and demonstrate all the excercises you can do with the wonder core 2. There is, however, an assumption that you are not an absolute beginner and each routine lacks modifications for those of us who are. I have been sitting out some exercises as i just dont have the core strength to be twisting around with my legs in the air just yet.I dont know if this will help me lose weight but i think it'll definitely help with toning and sculpting. Its early days for me at the moment but I'm enjoying it so far.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: tlives
Review: Great piece of equipment however the only thing I can‚Äôt do is use the part for the arms, the people on the dvd must have different elastic in as I find it impossible to extend to there range as the are sore strong/tight. I think you would need to be the world‚Äôs strongest person to extend to the range they do, as I can only extend a few inches!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: i have been working on it and its great. it works all aspects of the body
Name: raymond brown
Review: got the wonder core 2 delivered before delivery date. i have been working on it and its great. it works all aspects of the body. i am 55 year old and i find its a good work out for all ages.i love it and i am getting fitter by the second.. thank you Amazon... well done.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Truly amazing product. So easy and comfortable to use
Name: Yvonne Hart
Review: Truly amazing product.  So easy and comfortable to use.  Fantastic

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Natalie
Review: Found it easy to build.. find it easy to use.. I struggle with sit ups .. so this helps.. I like how you can use the resistance bands while doing the sit ups .. I suppose it would be nice if it folded away.. but not a great issue.. am putting together work out equipment so that I‚Äôm able to work out at home and this is a good addition.. just need to spend some time trying out the different exercises you are able to do

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mike Boia
Review: Honestly, i was looking for a multi function fitness product. This one came out and I was skeptic comparing it between all of the choices out there. But the price was so good I couldn't pass. And I do not regret it. I've been using it and it does it's job properly. Amazing fitness machine. Cardio and muscle build/tone, fat loss exercises can be performed at the same time! And it comes with a diet plan, DVD, exercises guides... For this price? Grab it while you can! You won't regret it. ( That's coming from someone that kept spending trying to achieve results at home)If they come up with an upgraded version where you can adjust the difficuly/power levels even more I'd buy that one as well.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: 'the prof'
Review: Pleased with this purchase personally as more resistance training and sit ups than grunt work which at my age I don't need or want. Nice size though bigger than six feet and you may feel a little cramped. It hasn't made me fizz with exercises every day but what would.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Great machine at a good price
Name: A Margaritelli
Review: Great for sit ups and for lots of arm exercises.Really is helpful having the seat swivel round so you can do exercise on all parts of the machine.  It‚Äôs lightweight and easy to move around but feels very sturdy when put together and easy to adjust for different exercises

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Lynette C.
Review: I'm sure this item would be amazing if all the parts were inside the box!  Someone has clearly had this before then return it. I recieved my wonder core with a damaged box (hole in it) on opening the box the item smells of someone else's cooking (curry) it was part assembled with all the plastic in one corner of the box and the wonder core has been used and is full of marks and bolts are missing! Not impressed at all! Amazon you are slacking terribly!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Glynis Freeman
Review: An excellent piece of exercise equipment.  Doesn't take up a lot of space, and it does give you the opportunity for a decent exercise.  Also, it can be stored away when not in use, again not taking up a lot of space.  Ideal for those lockdown workouts.  Thank you.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Nicholas H.
Review: you wont need the gym with this machine,very solid easy to assemble,instructions are perfect...just put it together and away you go..i keep it in spare bedroom,use it everyday.who needs the hassle of going to the gym,buy 1 and stay at home...you even get a diet plan with it,,,

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Donna grant
Review: Amazing delivery came on time easy to build and what a topper off a body it gave me I have my 8 pack that I needed a help with I recommended this machine to all veiwers

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Tracy Shayler
Review: The Wonder Core 2 arrived very quickly and was packaged extremely well. It took me around 10 mins to set it up due to directions being very easy to follow. Very happy with the product especially when doing sit up's as the back support is excellent. Highly recommend!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: D. L. Gahan
Review: This has been a godsend, really struggled with sit ups because the base of my back would hurt but now even after a few weeks of using daily I can really see and feel a differce in my belly. Very well built and takes up little space. Would fully recommend.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Steven Lloyd
Review: Excellent piece of equipment works very well good quality very easy to assemble makes sit-ups very easy taking the strain with out to the pain but still feeling the results

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: wave
Review: Box was damaged but product seems ok.  Son is over the moon with this. Pretty easy to set up and use. Feels a bit wobbly though where the size adjustment is. Great for sit-ups. We are 5 8 and I am not sure this would suit people much bigger.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: cfires
Review: I‚Äôve been training for a week easy to use and setup and easy training methods spend 10 min workoutFollowing guideThe resistance on mine is high so some thing take a bit of effort but once use to it it get better

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Susan
Review: Easy to assemble and very sturdy good for exercises

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: This really is a fantastic bit of kit for toning your abs
Name: Hevs
Review: This really is a fantastic bit of kit for toning your abs. Can't recommend it highly enough. Great fast delivery service. It does a great upper body workout.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: but like everything else you have to put the time and ...
Name: Mr Derek J Walker
Review: This is well worth every penny, but like everything else you have to put the time and effort in, had the unit for a month now and the difference is amazing.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Good for someone with an average height.
Name: Nathan lavin
Review: I am 6‚Äô5 and I find this product is very limited in terms of what it can do for me. My dad, however, is 5‚Äô10 and uses this product on a daily basis, with the product extended as far as possible.Overall, I‚Äôd say if you are over six feet tall this product will have limitations.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: ChroRo
Review: I'm a bit disappointed with this machine. I find it uncomfortable and the springs are noisy, it's also a bit of a faff when changing the exercise positions. It doesn't feel very robust so I'm not sure how long it will last.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Clare
Review: Excellent in every way.my son is a heavy weight lifter and he says its great for abs stomach and he can feel it working on his legs .

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Andy Dale
Review: This product is amazing. It absolutely works. It's easy to set up and doesn't take up too much room at all. I have been using twice a day for the last 4 days and can already see a difference.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Very versatile and sturdy product. Bought for someone who is a competitive swimmer so trains a lot. Does the job for the upper body particularly but not so much for the legs. I would definitely recommend this product

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Ian Baird
Review: After a few months of moderate use (300 sit ups 5 times a week) I noticed the seat started to wobble. A couple of month later the metal tore where the seat plate joins the swivel mechanism.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: The home work out in one keep one in shape nice
Name: mr k j kenny
Review: Been trying out this wondercore 2 for some weeks now and try to use each day love this work out unit and I use it as the to on real cool to use top marks for this I give this 5 stars hope to get a real good stomick in time not seen a lot of change so but then do have a bit of a Tum at this time do as I lose the Tum a hope to see more of a pack lol means working hard but will hope to get there will keep all know how I am am doing but so easy to use and doing over 50 sit ups at a time in different ways on this wonbercore I do feel more better as I go along so thinks wondercore for this make 2 . Good to have in the home for all yo use top marks I give

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Charlie99
Review: Excellent product. Compact and lightweight it is easy to move to different locations and comes with guidance and exercise sheets and CD.  It offers a range of exercises working on different muscles and it works!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Sonia
Review: I am starting some exercises after years of sendentary life. My shoulders, back and neck are the ones in need for more workout and this is perfect for it. Recommended!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Waste of money, using it for 2 months and nothing. I now have a sore back as the seat swivels when doing sit-ups. Waste of money.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: BIG CLIFF
Review: I have been using this bench for about 4 weeks now and have found quite a good variation of different workouts, have not used every workout position yet but I am working towards that, I am very satisfied with my purchase so far.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Must have at home! Star buy!
Name: Top Down Trading Ltd
Review: Very happy been using it for months! Such a multi function product and most importantly all functions works perfectly, great job!!üëçüèª

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Get your beach body for summer :-))
Name: old nick
Review: Apparatus easily assembled. Looks a bit small at first but proved to be fine when in use. (I'm 5' 10").Supplied with assembly instructions, DVD and illustrated exercise sheet.At the price I believe it's a good buy.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: RB
Review: Fast delivery. Item is as described. It is very well made and comfortable to use. You won't get big muscles from using this but you will get fit. Used it for a few weeks now and feel tighter around the abs.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Sandra rivers
Review: This is good  but I just personally like something easier to use.. this is my personal review.. my friend has one and she uses it and loves it.. I am sure I will get used to it

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: A Good Bit Of Kit If You‚Äôre Looking To Tone Up.
Name: darkknight1501
Review: Had it a couple of weeks and used it quite often. A good bit of kit. Easy to assemble. Comes with an exercise guide and dvd to help get you started. Feeling the difference already. Would be 5‚≠êÔ∏è But I want to see how it holds up to wear and tear after a few months of use.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Love it, only had it one week
Name: andrew gaskell
Review: Love it, only had it one week, and starting to feel the benefits of the excersies i'm doing following the guide that comes with it,Its easy to do, excersise at your own pace, time, and limit, obviously starting slowly and building it up gradualy,

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Great product, but elastic cord snapped after a couple of weeks
Name: Phil E
Review: My wife has been really pleased with this as its easy to do many stretching exercises with it. However experience was ruined by elastic cord breaking after about 2 weeks of use. Can't see how it can be fixed either without replacing a pre-assembled part that costs another ¬£20.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: wertolas
Review: Awesome ! Doing what it says on the time , if you want muscles of a god then you won't get them with this but great for the core and toning üåû

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Dan
Review: I didn‚Äôt realise when I ordered but this is really low to the ground.  Other than that it‚Äôs easy to assemble and easy to use.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: really enjoying this machine, and seeing and feeling some good results
Name: simon h
Review: the rowing gizmo along the back support really helps with sit ups, i found both these together massively improves your ability to do sit ups and get more of them done and you do feel afterwards that you have had a good work out. I am really enjoying using this machine so far.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Howard Grimshaw
Review: Alright if you are the size of a midget.The cables offer very little resistance for exercise,even olive oil would find this machine too easy.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Great job if you are a dwarf ü§ô

Review: Great product if your 4 foot tall, not worth the money cant adjust tension on springs.very disappointed.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Paul Kerrigan
Review: Needed a replacement for my old one due to the spring breaking, pity they haven't brought out a new version

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: This is a great buy. Though, I bought the like new item, I got the brand new one. It's just the box that has a little damage which does not affect the product at all. It's worth the money for its cost. Easy to assemble and safe to use.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mr. Ronald L. Alcock
Review: great it sure gets your belly down.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mr. D. M. Timothy
Review:
Looking at the videos , they are enticing,
However the demonstrators probably didnt get fit by using the wondercore 2 only.
Out of the box it looks good ,well built and works well and the prime purpose for me was to aid rehabilitation from surgery..
Its not rock solid due to the locking pins for storage, but in use it is very stable.
I was fairly fit, 5'8" and 70 kgs.
its a good size for my frame , but a taller person may find it not so convenient. morer adjustments for height and legs would be handy.
In use:
The springs are not strong enough to assist you up and could be stronger to aid and provide more support during the sit up reclining and returning movement ,especially if you lie back( its not easy to get up, and i slid off , to the laughter of my wife). I have to add resistant bands to to the springs to give better support otherwise one is snatching the sit up, which defeats the object.
The pulleys for the arms are really good and effective in both up right rows , kick backs, flies , tricep and bicep curls etc ...upper body workout is very good for light/ medium resistance with high reps.AND will get you a good CV workout .we do like it and its stylish so will use it ,

Would i but it again?
if they improved the spring strength or put more springs on it and made it more sturdiness, yes .
hope this helps .

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Agata zmuda-trzebiatowska
Review: Amazing

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower

Name: Robin Ansell
Review: Great little Workout tool.  OK so its not a real gym but if you just want to tone your body you wont find better !! I have had this for two weeks and enjoy a session each evening and i can feel the difference My son who is a gym junkie laughed when i got it saying it was a waste of money!!! Yes youve guessed it He now uses it also

Review: The  Wonder Core  certainly makes  your muscles work,  it took a few hours to get used to  sitting with my  knees and toes so enclosed, once in  position, and a minor adjustment to the bars close to my rear which  were uncomfortable till I followed the advice of a previous buyer--- ( put a bath towel over the bars),  I was set to go,  this apparatus is worth buying, though I have to take it a little easier, due to my mature age, yes I do admit it sometimes!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: A Brilliant machine but what a let down...
Name: Richard Jones
Review: I have had this home exercise equipment for 1 week now.  It is extremely well built and, used properly, delivers an extremely good work out and muscle toning.  There is a very large issue with it though and that is that it is NOT BUILT for people over 5ft 9in tall.  The length/distance from the seat to the knee support is adjustable but, the distance from the knee support to the ancle support is NOT.  This makes it impossible for a tall person to use properly, safely and comfortably.  This is such a shame as this one thing lets this otherwise well built piece of equipment down.  A little bit of thought Wondercore and many more people could benefit.  I expect the next generation of Wondercore2 will have this issue sorted...

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Broken plastic hook on new item.  Returning for replacement.
Name: TonyR
Review: This items appears to be well made, except for 2 small plastic hooks that are part of the rowing attachment.  These hooks are used to connect the resistance bands.Unfortunately, after putting the whole machine together I discovered that one of the plastic hooks has broken clean off!  I am having to return the item for replacement, however, I do expect these hooks to break again as they are plastic and stick out in such a manner as to invite them to be knocked off.  They should be metal.  I regard this as a serious design flaw.Also worth noting is that when unpacking the item I suspected it was a customer return, some of the plastic straps were broken or cut and the box seemed badly taped up.  After discovering this broken hook, I‚Äôm even more suspicious of this.Poor show Amazon.

Review: Great product easy to assemble and have a lots of things to do in it xx highly recommended

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Joanna N
Review: Great workout machine. Arrived 2 days earlier than expected and very easy to assemble. Haven't had a chance to try the DVD yet, but experimenting with the machine has shown that various exercises are supported. We've mainly been using the Wonder Core2  for sit ups and leg presses. The equipment is great for sit ups, especially, as it supports the back and give you a little help getting back up. My mother, who has trouble doing sit ups normally, loves this and uses it every day. The resistance on the rowing attachment is quite good, but there is also an extra resistance option available for when the standard one becomes too easy. Although I haven't been using it long enough to show "results", you can definitely feel it after working out! It is also fairly lightweight and easy to move around the house.Would definitely recommend for exercising at home.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Ideal for Those Reluctant or Resistant to the Gym
Name: heretic666
Review: The unit is substantial without being heavy. I thought I had a couple of items left over when I assembled it but these were bolts etc used for locking the back piece in place.The trick to this is to start gently on the minimum settings before you get carried away by how easy everything seems. It leads to a false sense of secuity and pain the next day in my experience. There is a chart showing the different exercises which can be achieved with this machine.There is also a chart with nutritional information; my nephew, a fitness instructor advised me to bin it as being out of date according to current beliefs, or obvious to the meanest intellect.After he went through the various exercises he judged it to be perfect for thos who wan to improve their overall fitness but especially the quoted core if you are reluctant or resistant to going to the gym.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: I like it but not as much as I could, due to design.
Name: Dazzaaa
Review:
It's compact size make me value it more despite it's issues.

The pro's
It's small and light
It's comfortable
The back springs are not too strong so it allows you to gain the benefit
The overall freedom of movement of the rowing function is brilliant and there is a 9 Kg pro upgrade set that I already bought seperately.

The con's
Although it doesn't tip over... the overall design is not very sturdy.
The rowing band handles are way way too small and causing friction on the hands (had to buy a bigger pair of resistance band handles from Amazon)
The back piece is not very comfortable when leaning back more than half way.
There is no attachment to allow leg curls.

Will need to lift extra weight if one wants to improve the ABS

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Suitable for light toning and general fitness
Name: Miss. K. Fortnum
Review: Great for sit ups as it‚Äôs always difficult on your coxic bone. I have strong legs as I already do regular exercise so the springs for crunches are rather weak as your legs are doing the body of the work. Fairly easy to put together but the instructions aren‚Äôt great. Not easy at all to half fold away so not worth the effort, just keep it fully assembled. It would be better if an exercise book was provided, a small sheet is provided with exercises but its the obvious exercises and 9/10 are only arm exercises they show, if you‚Äôre supposed to be able to do 30 or something there‚Äôs no way of knowing unless you google and hope to find decent instructions to do soothe rowing for arms is good and has more resistance than the leg springs. This machine wouldn‚Äôt be suitable for already muscled people as it is only a lightly resisted machine, not for body building only light toning and general fitness. Also the springs make a loud click every time the back bit with the rollers go up and down, its pretty annoying and very loud, tried lots of things are nothing improves it...

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Lucylou
Review: It arrived very well packaged.  I checked and all of the components there.  Easy to assembleWatched the DVD first and then had a go.The seat is comfortable.  I am 5'7" and found it comfortable to put the length of the legs on the first hole.The trainer is very good and supportive comments for beginners throughout were useful.  I slowed when it was uncomfortable as suggested.I am a 62 year old unfit grandmother with a dodgy hip.  I struggled with grabbing the rowing straps from behind and trying to do should stretches. and swivel and lift your leg above the back base.I completed the full 30 minute workout if a little slowly but will continue to persevere.  I had worked muscles that must have been redundant before. 24 hours later I was a little stiff in the shoulder area.  I am writing this after completing day 3 and still feeling the benefit and I can now reach behind me and do a little of the shoulder stretches and lifting the legs with the swivel.  Overall it will get easier I am sure.Overall I believe this to be a good investment for the benefit and cheaper than when purchased on the TV

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: The reason why I want people to read it is because I read some many negative reviews about this product (there are lots of good
Name: Badger
Review: I wanted to write a 5 star review but thought people might be more likely to read it if I did a 4. The reason why I want people to read it is because I read some many negative reviews about this product (there are lots of good ones too) that I felt compelled to put some stuff straight. Firstly, dont believe the hype! This machine will not turn you into a 6 pack demon. A full on gym and diet regime is the only way to achieve that. Everyone has abs, you just need to reveal them. Saying that I have bought this as an addition to my Gym and diet regime and I am sure even the hardest workout snob (I am one) would be very impressed with this. You can just jump on and do 50 crunches but the best part is the back support mechanism, I suffer from back issues and it is just amazing. You really dont need to be so warm also etc so thats brilliant.Next thing is... I am 5.10". I have read so much stuff about you have to be vertically challenged to use this thing...rubbish. If your 6 foot it might  loose its edge but the average male height is 5.7"  so...Then I read about build quality not being great. Rubbish, it is far better than most workout kit I have bought. If you are extremely heavy, no it is not for you but I am 15 stone of fat and muscle and no problem. If you are very overweight in terms fat this machine won't do anything for you anyway as it won't burn the kind of calories you would need in the first place. Diet and cardio is what you need. If you want a really good way of working your core in addition to a good gym regime or if you just want to maintain a healthy core strength... buy one

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Deeps
Review: I absolutely love this machine! The number of resistance exercises are quite phenomenal. The machine is well constructed and afapts to your style of exercise thus making it so versatile. The seat is well cushioned, the resistance bands are robust making you feel like you can push it that extra mile! The ab aspect of it is a godsend which allows your core to extend fully backwards making you work going down and then coming back up. No more hard sit ups struggling to get up as this machine will keep your posture correct at all times.You will notice the results soon if you keep to a schedule. I currently do 15-20 exercises every other day lasting between 30-45 mins which is making my core stronger and giving me that defined shape. I would highly recommend people try this machine and see how resistance training suits them as if you are willing to adapt to a new style of training the results will follow.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: OK workout kit for light usage. Adults will need the optional torsion upgrade
Name: AitkenNick
Review:
Bought for teenage children going through fitness phase. It works for them, but as others have mentioned the strength of the 'elastic' is quite low and therefore an adult should factor the cost of the optional upgrade belts into the purchase price. I'm not fit in any way but find the resistance too low, so anyone who does regular exercise will definitely find it too easy.
Overall the kids like doing their exercise routines on it, but when you look at it analytically it is basically a metal stand with a swivel seat and a hinged bit with a couple of springs. The exercises available are very much variations about how to use a small number of items in different ways, rather than a device with lots of options and ways to configure it.
However, that being said, the instructional DVD is the usual cheesy trio of leader and one male, one female accomplice grinning inanely while they try and make what for their muscled frames must be a trivial set of exercises look like a workout. They do a good job of showing lots of ways of using it, but just be aware that there isn't anything really for legs.
As usual for this sort of thing there are some rods to lock bits into place that need to be used with care to prevent trapped skin, but it's not that bad that I won't leave the kids to do it on their own.
The advantage for me is that it is collapsible and easily put under a bed in the spare room when guests need to use it. The assembly and disassembly takes only a matter of seconds.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: B. Knee
Review: My husband and I use this exercise machine every day and we are both benefitting from it, without having to strain ourselves as the machine takes the strain, so for light weights like me, it's just the job! Wonder Core is not the cheapest on the market, but we previously had another, cheaper make that only lasted 2 weeks, unlike this one, still going strong after 2 months, so I guess you get what you pay for. Quick, efficient delivery, great service. Recommend.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Arrived on time great item

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Lee
Review: I bought mine years ago, it has been sat collecting dust, seem as though I was going to the gym weekly. With whats going on now the gym is not an option so I'm making good use of it. Well worth the money, the dvd its comes with is useful, not that every time I use it I watch it. It helped me set up my own routine though.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Love it

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: It's good for me but for my husband it dose not ...
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: It's good for me but for my husband it dose not do any thing so if you are girl best products to buy but if you are man I say no

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Simon B new wondercore ll user
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Really impressed with my wonder core ll, I have it in my loft conversion so its so easy to pop upstairs and have a blast on it, Ive had it three weeks and have lost 5lbs just by 15 mins every other night or sometimes in the morning before work, that gets me motivated for the day, I feel so much better and am watching  what I'm eating more and have had some compliments already so am even more enthusiastic about getting fit

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: AMB1972
Review: Overall, very good. The seat is a bit uncomfortable and the exercise guide isn‚Äôt overly clear. Apart from that, easy to build and great to use.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: ER
Review: Not sure about this bench. I thought being an older guy the springs etc. would help me but I cannot find a comfortable sitting position. The bar that goes the knees doesn't feel comfortable to me. Having said that the springs etc. do work well.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Easy to put together and a nice home workout
Name: fiona bell
Review: Received after 3 days of purchase. Easy to put together and a nice home workout. Well worth the money

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Excellent  "Wonder Core II" - Great for Core strength & Upper body too including arms! Excellent!
Name: rs oliver
Review: Excellent!! -  Does what it says it does even down to the DVD plays! Perfect despite my disabilities!!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: I love this, easy to put together
Name: Bailey
Review: I love this, easy to put together.  I'm 6ft and had no problems fitting in it. It does look small looking at it, I can fit in it. It's a great way to work out, I wish there was a way to fold it, to store it. It's small and light and easy to use.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: 5 foot tall you may not find it easy to exercise on
Name: P . smith
Review: Its strong & wel made ,I personally think its a bit small & compact, If your a person over 5:5 foot tall you may not find it easy to exercise on ,depends on how fit & wel you are to start with !  build quality is good ! I try to be as honest as possibly in all my reviews hope this helps you

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: smith
Review: I have been very impressed with the Wonder Core 2 it very well put together and just getting back into some much needed excercise all seems very good so far.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: darlingd76
Review: I have tried for several days to set this up but the instructions are not clear.  I am disabled so my dexterity isn't great but my mind is just fine and I cannot figure this out.  Maybe 2 people trying to set it up would help.  However I have now asked to return it instead.  I'm waiting on a reply but don't see why this should be an issue due to their 30 day guarantee so we will see if they stick to that.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: carleton c blackwell
Review: Bought this for myself and the wife. Im 6'1" and find the leg poles quite crampted to get my legs in when doing the situps .The build quality is good but no built for taller people

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: I have found this machine amazing so far
Name: Blink182bfs
Review: Very fast delivery ordered early hours on the Friday and it arrived next day on the Saturday. Fab machine I have numerous physical health conditions including muscle and back problems and struggle finding exercises I can do and because I can only do small bursts at a time and alot of exercises can cause me to be in severe pain and possibly bed bound for a few days after. I have found this machine amazing so far, still early days but i enjoy doing the different exercises on it and the exercises are quite adaptable to you as well, you don't have to go all the way back, or pull the arms all the way back if you cant at first. So I can do more gentle exercises and build my way up, Set up was pretty easy, especially if your like me potch around with it first then look at instructions not too hard to go wrong as they include a quick set up and more detailed instructions in the booklet,  would defiantly recommend for anyone who is generally a beginner or who is scared of doing too intense at once (just wants to build it up) just waiting for my abs to kick in now ;D

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: jacqui
Review: Everything it says and more

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: N. C. Lindores
Review: sent it back. couldnt see how i could benefit from it at all

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Fantastic for abs and toning the whole body
Name: james haslam
Review: The wonder core 2 is one of the best situp machines I've ever used I do 200 situps I can see the changes in my abs its 10 out of 10 from me def

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: mike rowe
Review: put together haven't tried it yet looks ok, also shorter than I thought.mike360

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Steve Higgins
Review:
At the ripe "young" age of 66 and a few too many pints of Guinness, my stomach has grown somewhat...so I took the plunge and bought this machine a few weeks ago...and yes, I still have the stomach, but I think that by doing some 100 sit-ups a day (not all in one go of course!! Sets of 25 each time) it will work.

I've not really tried the other bits to it, like the pully's ...but I will in time.

Is it worth the money? Yes, it really is.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: PorkedPie
Review: My 16yr old son is 6'3, the bench is a little short.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower

Review: I love it!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: toby davis
Review: Ridiculously uncomfortable on your back and legs

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Me and My husband love it, My husband uses when he's watching his ...
Name: Nisha Patel
Review: Me and My husband love it, My husband uses when he's watching his football or his favourite programmes so he gets to do a good workout and I use it at least 3 times a week. When using it I don't get neck and back strains anymore like I use to when doing my situps on the floor. it's easy to use in so many different ways so you can get to exercise all different part of your body.  I've made a good choice in ordering this product.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Easy to assemble, easy to use
Name: leonard M
Review: Bought for my girlfriend  , She is rreally pleased with it

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: excellent quality and good value for money.
Name: Neil
Review: This is a very flexible and compact piece of equipment. I found it very easy to assemble and light weight enough to carry. The rowing accessory is very easy to use and does give enough resistance to feel with the right number of repetitions. It gives a good number of different exercises and overall I would rate as good value for money. The only thing is don't expect much by way of documentation, the DVD's are ok, but what I would like to see with this is a graduated series of exercises in a book form with some decent illustrations, the poster and book that come with it are barely adequate and the nutrition guide a waste of time. I am most likely to take a mix of the exercises from the DVD and poster and put together my own routine. I shouldn't have to think about it that much.Overall though excellent quality and good value for money.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Geneve
Review: This arrived very quickly and was easy to put together. It's a good bit of gym kit with quality parts unlike other home gym stuff I have bought before. The only negative is a have bought for my son who is 6ft and it feels a bit small for him if it was height adjustable that would have been better for him.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mr J W Turner
Review: Hi, arrived ok, but DVD does not work, how do I get a replacement dvd?

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Easy and safe to use with a well presented DVD ...
Name: Diane
Review: Very well designed piece of kit. Easy and safe to use with a well presented DVD showing a good variety of exercises you can perform on the Wonder Core. It arrived on time, well packaged and undamaged. A great addition to my home gymnasium.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Sophie
Review: I love this, it's easy to use takes up very little space and does what it says, very happy customer indeed

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: ... and within 5-10 min it was put together very easy, most of it put together mainly the pads ...
Name: dan 12
Review: Came well boxed and within 5-10 min it was put together very easy, most of it put together mainly the pads and springs you have to put on. Now I'm 6ft 1 found it very easy to use, great for sit up as I have bad back and gave me no pain, great for abbs and working on core and great for arms. Hope it helps and looking forward getting good work out on it. Well worth the money.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Wax lyrical
Review: Very pleased with the Wonder Core, both with the quality and the performance. It's robust and feels well made, and so far there's been no problems with any of the parts. The seat and moveable back rest are ideal as a bench for lifting free weights too, as part of a routine, with the back rest giving just the right support. The video is a very useful extra to start you off with your own routine.  Whilst the exercises are aimed to tone they certainly aren't going to give you the muscle definition the presenter has! I would say the Wonder Core is a great start to toning and increasing fitness but for advanced exercise and building muscles it's an ideal portable bench to use with free weights combined with a routine.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Fantastic, what a piece of kit this one is
Name: Big T
Review: Fantastic, what a piece of kit this one is.If you don't get one you will regret it. After two sessions you can feel the difference, great training DVD comes with it. üëçüëçüëç

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: JayceeB
Review: I really like this. I wasn't too sure when I bought it, but it's ideal for me. I was a little scared of doing the full sit up as it's counterintuitive to go so far backwards, but in three days I could do it and it provides a good stretch as well as crunches. For the first week I did fifteen minutes morning and night and I can feel a difference.Easy to assemble, even for me who is rubbish at assembling things. Plenty of online advice about exercises and there are several levels to go at.

Name: Wesley Woodhead
Review: People say that this product is a con IT IS NOT. This really does work, the wonder core 2 really tones your abs and i have noticed a difference already using it for 2 weeks and its a really cleaver idea really recommend!!!!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Iain
Review: A great item, after being told by physiotherapy that my back problem was being caused by poor core, i tried normal sit ups but wasnt very succesful.This contraption has certainly helped, i am feeling muscles that i havent felt for a long time, i am still a beginner with it but follow the dvd that goes along with it, and after just watching it the first time i thought it looked as though it was to easy and wouldnt do that much, how wrong i was, muscles ached the next day, but continuing with it each day i am finding it easier, going to look to see if there is anymore videos for when i get a little more advanced at it, i actually look forward to doing the 30 minute workout  each morning.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: it does everything goes straight back locks with a support ...
Name: Joe C.
Review: it does everything goes straight back locks with a support bolt the vidoe will show you everything that it can do brilliant

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Worth price, high quality, ABS is awaiting!
Name: Saiology
Review:
I have seen an advert of this machine on the TV and it makes me curious of it. I never trusted stuff from TV but after reading reviews and researching about this item I found that it might be a perfect tool to improve my physical condition and work on my ABS as well as muscles. After a while I decided that I will give it a try as I never liked going to the gym.

After using this machine for a while I must say that it's definitely worth the money. It's very durable and made with high quality material so it will last for a long time. It's very easy to store and most important, I can see the difference already!

If you want to look great, have amazing ABS and be healthy go for it! I would defenetly recommend it to anyone who want to achieve these goals.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: ... perfectly honest I can't see this making me look like the model on the video (six pack and all) ...
Name: malc
Review: To be perfectly honest I can't see this making me look like the model on the video (six pack and all) but I really enjoy my workouts on this. I bought this for general fitness and to help rid my back pain issues and so far seems to be working fine for me. Comes with a 30 minute demonstration video in multi languages, easy to assemble (tools included) and can part fold away to store in the corner of the room out of the way

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: jfcmagic
Review: i have not tried it yet but looks ok more updates to follow

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: marie
Review: As someone with severe arthritic issues (at only 20) who has always been reluctant to exercise because of the pressure it puts on my joints this is an absolute dream. It allows me to exercise without straining myself even with the simple moves but still feel the benefits where I should. I love it I've gone from a single swimming session every week to a small daily workout thanks to this.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower

Review: bought elsewhere, although thought I would review on here, great piece of kit for core work and upper body toning and conditioning.if you are looking for cardio workout this ain't for that, I have used everyday for past week, I do Muay Thai boxing and I can feel a difference in my core and upper body with toning and conditioning. This is gonna get well used, I also bought the increased resistance attachment which works for me.
