Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: I dont usually buy gimmicks like this but a friend persuaded me and i love ...
Name: Orange Blossom üçä
Review: I dont usually buy gimmicks like this but a friend persuaded me and i love it i now do 200 sit ups daily as i only needed it to sort my stomach region and its ao much more preferable to doing them on a flior mat üòä the only reason i didnt give it 5 stars is because sometimes the metal in between the pads hurt my lower back but i just cover it with a towel.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: j seal
Review: excellent

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Good Value for ¬£89 you have your own home Gym
Name: Chris D
Review: I was going to buy the basic Wonder Core product then I saw the WC2 product for just ¬£10 more which looked like better value.  No complaints so far.  Product was delivered on time.  Easy to Assemble.  Although no customer number instructions if people do struggle. Frame is fine as I'm only 5'8, and 9St.  If I was taller or heavier may not have bought this product. Product dismantles for quick/easy storage.  I would like to know where to get spares when parts start wearing out ?  It comes with a useful DVD and you can also watch demos on youtube to make the most of it.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: June kimmance
Review: Don't think much of it , wouldn't buy again

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Duchess
Review: Amazing piece of equipment, stomach is killing me. Sturdy, great work out. Worth the money.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mr. French
Review: It's a good machine and you can really feel it working when exercising. One point I will make is I'm 6ft 3ins and when doing the sit ups my shins were pushing into the frame through the padding. In my opinion Id say it's not much use for the taller person.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Dave
Review:
Seen the wonder core on teleshopping a year ago and decided to buy here is my opinions.

I keep reading about people saying is it scam - no it isn't a scam however it is a great piece of equipment it isn't a miracle cure you need you eat right while using it to get the full results.

I started off the wondercore quite abit overweight and if I'm being honest was very skeptical if I was going to get the results I had hoped for.

My goal was to simply lose weight and lose my beer belly and tbh the results are amazing. I didn't buy this expecting to have a body like some of the people on the the advert - as being honest they probably had bodies like that before using a wondercore.

I stuck to the DVD did it everyday for a month and I have lost quite a bit of my beer belly and toned more than I thought possible. After a month I started using the wondercore for longer then 20 minutes i.e I started adding more reps and variations to my workout to make it longer and more enjoyable.

I have had the wondercore for over a year now and can honestly say it is the best piece of equipment I have owned and highly recommend it.

I do agree with the comments about being too tall I do think it would be hard to use the wondercore if you are over 6ft.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: peter kerridge
Review: Great product, seems fairly well built, and if we can use it everyday I'm sure we will see results. I must remark though that Wonder Core's other product seems really expensive in comparison!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Enterprising
Review: It is NOT a total body workout, as the ad promises. It does NOT train the leg muscles. front thighs, which are also important. If the springs could have been fitted to the leg support, and this would be unlocked and movable, and lifted up so the legs reach straight outstretched position, the machine would have been perfect. Please improve this missing function!

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Arrived on time, easy to assemble. Pleased with my purchase, great for a work out on cold wet days

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: carl richie
Review: Provides a comfortable seat for eating my McDonald's on.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Mr. S. Barnett
Review: Firstly the service from High Street TV was excellent, no complaints. The product itself is also well made and, if you are a beginner to this kind of exercise it would indeed provide a useful form of workout. However, if you have been working out for 45 X years as I have then it's probably not for you. I bought it as a potential method of protecting my back as I get older, but for me the benefit doesn't outweigh the negative. I will still us it as a back up, maybe on none-ab days in the workout cycle, but it can't provide what good old fashioned crunches etc do.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: IT NOW FITS A 6FT 2INS BODY COMFORTABLY WITH MY ADJUSTMENTS
Name: E. Kelly
Review: I'm a smidge over 6ft 2ins tall and when I first took delivery of this apparatus several months ago I found that my seating position, with legs behind the shin pegs and the adjustable (telescopic) length bar at it's full extent, was a little too tight a fit. I gave up using it for a while, but have just taken a gamble and drilled an extra adjustment hole 3cm further along the length adjustment bar from the edge of the last manufacturers adjustment hole ( any further would crucially weaken the design structure ). I now fit the apparatus and do not think that the strength of the structure has been compromised by my actions. I'm surprised that the manufacturer cannot add this extra hole as that then makes the 'Wonder core 2' definitely suitable for people up to 6ft 2ins tall, which covers a whole lot more of us without causing a weak point in the design.Eamonn

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Is the Wondercore really a wonder?
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: It is fiddly, as you have to keep on adjusting the screws for different postures, which breaks up the flow of the exercises. A dear friend came to help me assemble it, as it was a real puzzle, they expect lay people to be able to assemble the machine from inadequate diagrams, it is not easy at all.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Golddust79
Review: I bought this after seeing it on TV. I'm 6ft and got it to tone up my stomach. So far I'm quite pleased with it. I like the fact that there are many different exercises you can do on it. My favourite is the tucks with legs raised as you can really feel it on the obliques. I'm marking a star down as I don't think it has much resistance in the bands or for the sit-ups I'd like a setting which is a bit more challenging there is also a lot of fiddling with pins. However a nice bit of kit and I'm pleased I got it.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Animegirl
Review:
I don't understand why this has so many 5 star reviews.
It's stupidly small. I'm only 5'5.
It really hurt my back after only one go.
The rollers are rock hard and very uncomfortable.
To top it off one of the pins got stuck and we couldn't remove it for 15 minutes!
It's definitely going back

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Kerry Fletcher
Review: Great fir lockdown fitness

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: C. Ambrose
Review: Bought this not from Amazon set it all up went to do some sit ups back tipped right back despite the springs and caused a nasty shoulder, whiplash and back injury this bit of equipment is dangerous I,m only 5, 6 I am with in their weight guidelines,

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Osa
Review: So happy, got it very fast

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Wioleta
Review: Very good

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Dapsy70
Review: Good equipment for keeping fit especially when you feel lazy to go to the gym.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Ade
Review: Not so good

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Dr A
Review: Designed strictly for midgets. I am not tall, only 5ft 9ins, yet this product is WAY too small. I would estimate it is useful only for people less than about 5ft 2ins.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Title of Review: Built for a 7 year old girl. NOT FOR ADULTS
Name: Alex Johnson
Review: It is not unisex it should say that it is for a 7 year old girl. I think it has so many 5 star reviews because it makes people feel strong. Some people must be so obese if this is making a difference to them.

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Kish
Review: Amazing product and well worth the money

Product: Wonder Core 2 with built in Twisting Seat and Rower
Name: Ian R. Hall
Review: I think if not used to exercise program this is a reasonable piece of kit. It is well made, takes a little time to put together, the other stuff exercise chart, nutrition chart pretty basic. The DVDs is dreadful most of the exercises are warm up not even using the machine and by a over enthused gym bunny who wouldn't go anywhere near this in real life I'll wager. I work out regularly and was looking for a bit of variation on a tried and tested regime but remain disappointed by this machine. I bought the wonder core II with the rowing attachment which is so weak it really is only for beginners. Very disappointed with this machine I'm  afraid.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: TDVF10
Review:
Good packaging, very well made, which is should for the price retailing at nearly ¬£30
I can say that these are worth the money, these will last years.
My local gym has new equipment installed with new bars that are taking the skin on my hands.
Out these on and firearm activation, is there straight away, also you have to actively grip the bar as before you could just rest in your palm.
I found that my wrists got a good working too on the bars, initially I had to drop the weight on the bench as I got used to gripping them.
Dumb bells too they work great on, I felt much more muscle connection than before.
After 5 sessions of using these I fully recommend them, they add an extra dimension to my workout that I've not had before and look forward to strengthening my grip, wrist and forarms along with the better mind muscle connection.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: SalehFam
Review: Wouldn't workout without them now. I was skeptical at first, as I have no doubt everyone looking at buying these would, and should be. I bought these based purely on customer reviews, and didn't really question the "science". When I used them for the first time, I was pleasantly surprised to find them ergonomic and in some ways a refreshing change from the metal, but most of all, that they worked! I was expecting a big forearm burn which I didn't really get, instead my biceps were in a state of DOMS that they hadn't felt in a long time. Took nearly 5 days to recover. Since then I questioned whether it was increasing the blood flow due to more of an open hand, but after looking on the official site they had absolutely nothing much to say about it except it works the forearms more. Whatever it's doing, it works. I have seen much better forearm and bicep growth since using them, not much if any noticeable difference to the tricep but have always found that an easier muscle to grow. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Hope this helps.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: A worth while investment in gaining a full workout on your arms
Name: Dave
Review: After reading the different (mixed) reviews I was a little bit unsure about whether these were any good or not, so, after some research I decided to buy the medium "Pro" gripz.I was fully prepared to struggle with my normal weights during my workout routine and thought I would have to reduce the weight but, I was able to complete my workout with the same weight. However, I did find the workout more challenging using the fat gripz and I was VERY impressed with the fat gripz and how the unused muscles were now getting worked on aswell.I am really impressed with the fat gripz and enjoy the challenge they give me to complete my workout routine.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: A.B.
Review: Amazing product, been bodybuilding for 4 years and was amazed at the difference using fat gripz. I use them for all exercises except barbell upright rows. That is the only exercise which is extremely difficult to do with fat gripz. Everything else it works great. Some people have said you will have to come down in weight when using fat gripz. To be honest I haven't needed to do that. I'm losing 1 or 2 reps in my sets due to fat gripz but I'll soon make that up as my muscles get used to it. It targets muscle groups much more effectively, not just arms. Delts, pecs and back all receive a better work out. Don't wait buy today. Thank you fat gripz for adding a whole new dimension to my training.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Hevs
Review: Brilliant product, I am a newbie to weights and lifting, however the new dumbbells that I got had too narrow of a grip on them. Being 5'11 and having quite big hands I needed something with a nice wide grip and these were absolutely perfect. All the other benefits that come with using fat gripz is a bonus for me. I love them and so does my partner. Not the cheapest but a very valuable investment. The product its self looks and feels high quality and so far so good. The personal emails from the company was a lovely touch especially giving hints and tips and even some suggested exercises. Brilliant fat gripz thank you.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Matas
Review: I was looking for equipment options to help me with improving my forearm training and making it all round more variable, and when I came across this it just hit me, this will be perfect to work the sections of my forearms closer to the wrist due to a wider, more claw like grip, since I have rather weak wrists and I'm looking to improve my grip all round for different things like the benefits of more confident and conscious-minded grip strength when I'm lifting and pulling weights, strengthening my wrists to prevent injuries from punching hitting bags, minimising stress from more extreme loads and stretch angles like handstands and such, and just improving general size and functionality of the forearm, because it's just such a complex multi-dimentional set of intertwined muscles, with an impressive number of directional movement angles and should definitely not be overlooked by any bodybuilders/athletes etc. I could feel its effectiveness after my very first power set of curls, because my forearms were more tense than after any previous forearm curl routines, or bag punching sessions. I honestly felt like a clawed beast with that pleasant tightness, as if I could simply rip someone's throat out with one snatch of a hand. This truly works, not I'm just curious as to how quick the growth, strength  and mobility are going to improve, since you can virtually use these with any gripping equipment in the gym, except for I suppose most machines due to their custom made rubber grips attached. They felt sturdy and quality made, didn't slide around or anything, but can easily be adjusted on the bar by simply prying it apart a little with the fingers and it then slides around quite easily. Quality product - 5/5

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Kindle Customer
Review: I have three sets of dumbbells, two barbells and this product does not grip any of them securely. Not too much problem for barbell work but slippage on barbell work dodgy. Hammer curls and similar plus overhead triceps work, zottman curls cause problems with dumbbells shifting position, product and inch shorter than dumbbell handgrip space. Not safe. Product is going back.Found interesting substitute, 60x22cm pipe insulation cut to size works well. Somewhat cheaper and may be worth experimenting with before buying these or similar. Also measure your bar diameter carefully!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: An interesting addition to your training equipment.
Name: M. J. Richards
Review:
These Fat Gripz are an interesting addition to training.

They work on the premise, that it is more difficult to hold a weight with your hand not completely closed, which in turn means that you need to utilise more muscles in your arms to control it.

It does work, but isn't suitable for all exercises.
I personally can't see the point in using them on heavy lifts, such as deadlifting, as your arms will always fail first and too early.

There are smaller diameter Fat Gripz (the black coloured ones) which are more suitable for heavy lifts. I Use them for shoulder pressing, where they work well, but they do seem to be very difficult to obtain at the moment.

I have quite small hands, so these Fat Gripz take real effort for me to hold them.
The forearm pump that you get is extraordinary, but you will have to considerably drop the weight you use.

The Fat Gripz themselves are very well made. They are real substantial lumps of rubber, with each one weighing in at 300g.

They fit a 1inch bar, but turn a little too easily, so I wrap a layer of hockey stick handle tape around the bar, this gives good friction, and stops the Fat Gripz from moving.

Overall, I would recommend these, but be aware of how to use them.
You can't just stick them on your bar and expect to train as usual.

They need to be used on some exercises, but not on others. A mixture of on and off for the same exercise, with the corresponding change in weight is probably the way to go.

I hope you found this review helpful.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great for Building muscle but also avoiding Injury
Name: Alexander V.
Review:
I'm a men's physique athelete and Champion
I've trained for over 9 years. I can safely say this product is great at what it does.
What we tend to do during training for example during bicep curls or a dumbbell press is grip the bar way to tightly and what this causes is the muscles in our chest, shoulders or arms to disengage which prevents all that beautiful muscle growth.
We want to make sure we put all our focus into the muscle we are working and I have found with a loser grip we can gain more focus on those muscle groups.
This is where fat grips really do there job and I couldn't recommend them more. They now also have the One Series out which are slightly smaller than the regular ones and there great for all movement not only sensor pressing motions. I love using these in the gym they do work!!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Smith
Review: I have been hitting the gym for a good 12 years and will always give something new a try just to mix it up or for that extra edge but Me and a friend have been using theses for a few month now and I can‚Äôt see or feel any difference. You have to drop the weight by a good 50% when using the fat gripz so I found that I actually dropped size because of it. No need for gimmicks, just train hard

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great tool for better grip and bigger arms
Name: Rusty
Review:
Have just resumed using these after a long time, since losing my old pair of Fat Gripz, primarily to enhance grip strength. While I cannot speak with absolute certainty as to their effectiveness in terms of improving grip strength, one definitely gets a better pump in the arms.

I like the prduct because it is heavy duty and user friendly, and I'm inclined to say good value for money due to the fact that they have the potential to literally last you a lifetime, be bequeathed to your progeny, and then last a few more.

They're a good tool to add a form of resistance to your existing training protocol, thereby making your sessions in the gym more challenging.

If your goal is to increase the size of your forearms then these should be a requisite peace of weaponry to carry around in your gym bag. They easily fit over most dumbbell handles, as well as barbell and chin up bars, and can be used in a variety of ways and beyond, just be creative if you happen to run out of the more conventional ones. If you get tired of using these then taking a break won't hurt since they're not likely to expire before you decide to revisit.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Drew Holloway
Review: I use this product on all my bars and they fit quite well and are very comfortable to hold. I wouldn't recommend them for all sets as you'll find you're not able to lift quite as much because of the extra effort placed on your hands/forearms, but I do find these add an extra level of workout when applied to burnout sets with lighter weights. I've found that incorporating Fat Gripz into my strength routine has increased my forearm and grip strength considerably, which is invaluable to intense grip exercises such as deadlifts and farmer walks. You'll notice the work being applied to your hands and forearms almost instantly and wonder why you've neglected them for so long! As for mass I've not noticed much difference but I think the additional support and strength given which becomes useful in all arm-based exercises is a definite bonus.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Carlito
Review: I was quite sceptical at the beginning but on the very first workout I found out they are the real deal. Drying ex bar curls or exercises with dumbell I could feel nice burning feeling in my forearms. The things is I can only use it on EZ bar some of the dumbells and on cable machines like lateral pulldown because Olympic bar is too thick for it and recently they replaced the dumbells at my gym with the ones with a bit thickets handles so Fat Gripz doesn't fit there properly.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Really good idea to purchase these
Name: D.Holly
Review: What a simple solution for noticing a difference in muscle contraction. Really good. And it feels like it‚Äôs taking some stress off my elbows. And it‚Äôs made me aware, I need to do a few workouts on my forearms. For me. At the moment. It‚Äôs really helping me with my dumbbell press. These Fat Gripz really do get my muscles firing. (Obviously you still need to concentrate on the muscle your working on) I already want to try the other sizes! I have the blue ones. Which is the medium. Red ones are next

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
I can't vouch for any boost in development (Ive been working out for 20 years so any development at all would be a miracle), but got a kick out of using these, at the moment just for presses and pull-ups. Perhaps its a novelty thing but I felt like I had much more drive.

As the exercises I use them for are perpendicular to the ground perhaps its not ideal for forearm engagement, so may reintroduce direct arm work and see how that works out

They are pretty pricey but do appear very well constructed

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Paul D
Review: I was asked to rate these on comfort as well as other factors and almost rated them low for comfort... but it's kinda the point! Look, they are about as comfy as they're going to get - but due to the nature of them, they make holding onto weights a fairly difficult experience, particularly for certain exercises / muscle groups. They really do seem to work though. Especially on chest exercises, I felt like I was hitting parts I'd never hit before when using these.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: I feel they work great! And they look/fit great too!
Name: Stergios Zisekas
Review: I have been using them for 2 weeks. I have an average size hand, so the pro series fitted perfectly in my palm (as suggested).  I have used them with the same weights in specific exercises and I must admit that with less training volume I was feeling more pain in my arms/shoulders after training! Training harder with the same weight is safer too. Their quality is also awesome. I assume they will last for ever! They do not move or slip at all, and they fit easily and perfectly in my barbell and dumbbells. I would like also to point out that the seller send me a Quick Start Guide with several training tips that are very helpful, especially if someone is not very experienced in adapting his/her training program. I believe that it was wise buying them! They definitely provide a different way of training, and thus stimulate the body in a different way.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Sikai
Review: I first saw these on a YouTube video by Jay Cutler. Initially I thought it was another gimmick, however I did some research in to the benifirs if thicker bars. I decided to pay the ¬£20 for these Fatgripz and boy am I glad I did.I have used these for biceps, triceps and chest work out. The pump I get in my forearms, biceps, triceps and chest are insane. I want to say that the mind muscle connection with these gripz is fantastic. Since using them I‚Äôve noticed a noticeable amount of growth in the muscle and I‚Äôve ysed them for a few months now.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Review: Thought they would be a fad, but they work really well. Your forearms are screaming by the end of a workout - grip strength improves dramatically and your upper arms get a 5 star burn. They even email you after purchase with a workout plan. Just don't hold these in a suicide grip........highly recommended for serious lifters.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Only the shadow knows
Review: I‚Äôm a sucker for gadgets so when I saw these I thought I‚Äôd give them a try,well after the first few sets my arms were literally burning in an enjoyable sort of way.these fit perfectly on my muscle squad adjustable dumbbells (pic attached) and feel very secure in use,they also fit my Olympic barbell and have improved the feel when bench pressing.I‚Äôm not sure about having to go lighter on benching but you definitely do have to go lighter with the dumbbells.I‚Äôve ordered a second pair so I don‚Äôt have to keep swapping over.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: mark
Review: A great addition to my home gym, instant 2.5inch thick bar. The fat grips are heavy, thick and robust. Bought after my PT used them for curls in my workout, amazing how much they brought my biceps into play.They look and feel like they will last a long time and for once, a gimmicky looking training aid actually feels like it is useful and works.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Also works with Bodylastic bands and kettlebells
Name: Vic Serotonin
Review: For some time my upper body workouts have been in a plateau with very little gains in my arms despite trying various methods to improve. To be honest when it came to arms I never gave my grip and forearms the attention they needed. All my arm work was concentrated on biceps and triceps. So after doing some research and reading a lot of reviews I thought I would give Fat Gripz a try.Well, the effect of changing to a wider diameter grip on all push and pull sets on my arms has been brilliant.  I cannot believe such a simple change could make such a big difference so quickly.  I have been doing resistance training for many years and these Fat Gripz has revolutionised my upper body routine. You can feel the difference in every exercise.Another good thing about Fat Gripz it how versatile they are when it comes to fitting them to equipment. Not only do they fit all my dumbbells and bars; they also fit my chin up bar, kettlebells and most importantly, when I am away from home, the handles on my Bodylastic resistance bands.A word of caution if you buy Fat gripz; as said by other users,  take it easy at first. I thought I could do my usual high swings with the Fat Gripz fitted to my kettlebells. Unfortunately I did not realise how quickly my hands was fatiguing and lost my hold on one and it flew out of my hand nearly hitting the family TV. I only missed `Daddy ruined Christmas' by about four inches.Many thanks to Fatgripz.com for the access to the extra routines and advice on purchase. Especially a big thank you goes to, Franco, at Fatgripz.com who would reply to my emails with a personal response and not with automated reply or the copy and paste answers you get from other companies.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Review: They work, despite my not large hand size. Very easy to understand instructions. Simple, even. Vital to stick to the instructions otherwise possible (hopefully unlikely) mishap whilst in use with equipment. Used with modest-weight dumbbells. Big difference in effort spent in the arm (and partly) the shoulder department. Very pleased. Apart from my qigong dumbbells which have a narrower grip. Doesn't matter about them though. Still very pleased. Cheers 'Fat Gripz UK Official' (Seller) & Matt. Looking forward to vast arms.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Axel P
Review: I read some studies a long time ago about ‚Äòfat‚Äô grip training approach but I was fooled by my own assumptions. Several years later, I purchased fat grips and holly-molly it works! I‚Äôm impressed.If you have a decent training plan, then you‚Äôll notice a difference in less than 4 weeks.Great product, durable and yes, some curious folks will ask you questions if they see you wearing them on your dumbbells.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Damien
Review: I am a back therapist using the ASMI machine: the Advanced Spinal Mobilisation Instrument, it is super effective in fixing even high end bad backs. It is used a lot in USA VA & Military hospitals, but it is hard work on the wrists of the therapist, so I am forever trying one wrist strengthening gadget and technique after the next.Up to this point power-giro balls had been my favourite, but this Fat Gripz is now in top place, I only bought it on an "ah go on, doesn't look up to much but you never know" basis. I use it on dumbbells that I have weights on only one side to strengthen my wrist rotational sort of muscles - and Fat Gripz makes a big difference and so a makes me a much better back therapist - just what I was after after years of looking for something that worked. Thanks !

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Review: I have held off leaving a review until I could give these gripz a real trial and I personally wouldn't be without them now!What a difference these gripz make, it literally intensifies the workout engaging muscles that may of been harder to hit on a standard bar.As soon as you pick the barbell or dumbell up with the Fat Gripz on you can feel the difference. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Adds a new dimension to your lifting!

Review: Enjoying the product, adds a degree of difficulty to my lifts which definitely work the arms more. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Name: Mr. D Ashmore
Review: I have found the Fat Gripz very good, but I had to move to use them very slowly, as I have a few damaged knuckles on the one hand getting the wider grip was more of a pain than a Ache!! Comfort in a gym, I don't ever feel comfortable, somethings usually hurting but these really made me notice progress in my arms and a benefit while using them.I have cleaned these using normal washing up liquid and they don't seem to be drying in any sort of way.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Rhys
Review: I bought these fat grips about 3 weeks ago and it's a great investment, I have pretty big hands so holding on to a regular dumbbell or barbell handle isn't that good, I like the fat grips because the burn I get in my arms are crazy and the pump is ridiculous I would recommend these to people with larger hands as you will be able to feel the squeeze a lot better than a regular sized handle . Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Wraps nicely around once inch bar but lots of dumbells are 1.25-1.33 inches, this leaves a gap bigger than you buy, always keep that in mind, fat gripz should say this at the top of the description in my opinion, i almost got the extremes and now im glad i didnt as my dumbells width with the grips on is 2.65 inches, id have been over 3 with the extremes and i have pretty small hands.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Review:

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Craig Steele
Review:
Really solid material with no worries of damaging them.

I have used these on a pullup bar and the impact was immediate. I went from being able to do 12 reps down to 6 due to the increased strain on the fore arms and i'm currently building myself back up.

Highly recommend for anyone looking to keep their workouts interesting or looking to test themselves.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Si
Review: I have only had them a short period though I have incorporated them into some sets I do, I have noticed on the sets I have used them with greater activation in forearm and they are more challenging to grip, which is what I wanted. The grips are very versatile.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: woody
Review: Well, thought I would give these a shot as my forearms always seem to be weak and lacking any definition. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: jon
Review:
excellent product, however probably best used only if youre a reasonably experience lifter.

These grips are excellent for building forearms and grip strength; attach them to any bar or set of dumbbells and massively increase the workout on your forearms.

the only drawback is that perhaps they put too much strain on your forearms, so much so that the weights you can lift for major lifts will be decreased; meaning less work for other muscles.

However if you use these simply for the forearm concentrated workouts, and go back to normal bars for major sets, then they are an excellent investment.

Like i said, probably best to use if you have some experience with lifting weights, as your grip is compromised meaning the weights are potentially going to slip if you dont prepare for this.

Overall a great product, would recommend to anyone.

Name: DJ
Review: I've had these for 6 months now, and I wouldn't go back to lifting without them. As many reviewers have pointed out, the Fat Gripz are split along their entire length and clamp onto a standard 1 inch bar very securely. What I haven't seen written here is that once in place, the Gripz don't close completely: there is a gap of about half an inch. This gap should always be kept uppermost when using them, in case the bar should slip through with the pressure of the weight. You probably will need to drop how much weight you use when you start using these.I bought these to improve the strength of my grip & my forearms. And it has made a difference. It took a while before I was back up to the weight I was lifting before I bought the Fat Gripz, but now that I am, I'm glad that I bought them. They do add an extra dimension to your workout, and are a great addition to your equipment. I've given them 5 stars- they are a bit pricey, but they are very durable and they're no pricier than another set of weights

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

One thing I enjoyed, and really made them for me, was the ease I felt going back to my Olympic Weightlifting, after using the grips for deadlifts and presses. Really made me not worry about my grip and allowed me to focus on the rest of the lift.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Kindle Customer
Review: I bought these grips to use with mostly pull up bar and the dip bar. I have been using these with the pull-up bars for a couple of weeks, and can attest to the effectiveness of these grips; these will seriously challenge the forearms. I can barely do 6 with these, while without, I can manage about 11 pull ups, with good form, and I feel a real burn in the forearms after using these. I cannot comment on longer term effectiveness, yet. Overall, the grips are smooth, appear seem well built, and will hopefully last (they had better, given that I paid ¬£34 on Amazon for these, including the 7¬£ shipping to Sweden!).For those who plan on using these with mostly body weight exercises, I have a quibble:The grips can be attached to different bars by simply widening the opening provided, and there is a small gap between the two halves after they are affixed to a bar (at least, in the case of the ones I have). I find when doing pull ups that this gap is quite an annoyance, and sometimes (not always) puts me off my form.  I then have to carefully "find" a place to grip that does not impair me. Insufficient for me to not recommend purchase, but definitely enough to dock a star for getting the halves not closing fully.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Old bald dude
Review: A word of caution about using these. They get good reviews pretty much across the board, not just on Amazon. General consensus is that they aren't some fitness gimmick like so much rubbish out there. HOWEVER, I would advise anyone thinking of purchasing them, my opinion is that you should have a good fitness level, with a good amount of forearm strength, and don't use them if your a beginner. My reasons for the caution - shortly after starting to use these, I developed tennis elbow. Now, I can't say with 100% certainty that these were the cause, but, when I read up on the causes of tennis elbow, I can't pinpoint any other reason. I'm reasonably fit, but I'm no bodybuilder with arms like Popeye. This has severely limited the amount of exercise I can do, with considerable, and probably fairly long term, pain.If you've reached a plateau in your workouts, and you want to move up a gear, then these might be worth considering - they are expensive for what you get - but I wouldn't recommend them if just starting an exercise programme. It's only fair to say that an internet search of Fat Gripz didn't show much which would back up my experience, in fact there are recommendations for using the product to treat elbow pain, but they haven't done me any favours, and I believe, have caused the tennis elbow.

Review:
I guess its time to write a review having used the gripz since november 2013. They take a bit of getting used to if your grip is weak. Luckily my grip is good as i do a lot of bouldering.
What you will find is your bench weight will drop while you get used to the gripz, but when your arms start getting used to them you will notice you have pains in your arms that you never experienced before! Popeye arms!! I use them a lot when i do german volume programming and this is where i notice the biggest gains!
Worth the money!? Yes, definitley, i have them almost a year and they still look new, no signs of wear and tear.
Would i recommend them? Yes, For me they have been awesome and some of my mates have bought some whilst the others have borrowed mine after they saw my gains.
I have bought a lot of crap over the yrs but these have one of my better purchases! :)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: M. McDermott
Review:
I could, of course, make all kind kinds of lewd remarks about how I already have an all natural fat grip of my own, but that would be juvenile. I do though.

Anyway, these things do place an intense demand on increased grip during pulling motions, you can really feel it in the forearms, in a good way. I used them on the sets moving up to the heavier working sets, having to remove them as my grip was going, in order to fully work the targeted muscle groups. My weak points were really highlighted.

My primary reason for purchase was to strengthen grip and alleviate tendonitis, which is working well so far. The cost of these is roughly one trip to the physio.

In short, I thoroughly recommend these to anybody looking for grip strengthening or perhaps overcoming plateaus in training.

A good buy and delivery was really quick too.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: PNH
Review:
We all know that the fitness industry is plagued with massively overpriced gimmicky products, making false claims, preying on people's ignorance and desire to improve themselves...
So, like most people reviewing here I was sceptical about the claims made about pieces of rubber!

Just a quick background on my interest in the product (bear with me...): I've suffered from relatively weak forearms which can lead to strains and injuries when lifting heavy weights. I was always told that forearms catch up with the strength of other muscles just by default, but I have found this to be untrue. The weight required to properly train my shoulders (lateral raises etc) and biceps are sometimes too much weight for my forearms to safely lift without risk of a muscle strain.

Obviously I understand that a thicker bar is harder to grip and therefore works the forearms. That's common sense. But, developing the whole arm and body better while using less weight than usual? Again, I was sceptical.

After using the product for a short time (just 2 full cycles of my usual training routine), all target muscles are aching a LOT more (not just forearms) and I'm using less weight which is necessary when first using Fat Gripz. For example, my forearms are aching 2 days after training biceps but the biceps themselves are also far more sore than usual... Lifting less weight.
Fat Gripz seem to force you to 'control' the bar more than you usually would (time under tension increases). It works secondary and support muscles far more effectively than a thinner bar, not just the target muscle. It's a very simple but effective idea.

We all see guys in the gym lifting weights which are far too heavy, throwing them around. Well, Fat Gripz makes that almost impossible to do as you have to concentrate on gripping the weight and controlling it correctly.

So in conclusion; Definitely not just for those looking to strengthen the forearms. I'd recommend this to anyone who trains with weights as it will improve your form and control under tension, which as we all know are critical in development.

¬£20 well spent.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Slav O
Review: The quality of this product is very good and you really need this if you want to hit your forearms. Even if some people say it's the same as using a towel around a bar it's not. These things fit very well most of the bars in your local gym and feel very stable and robust. I definitely recommend this product although the price could be much lower (I paid more than ¬£30).

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Abs
Review:
Being my first time buying Fat Gripz I was skeptical as to whether to purchase gripz over ¬£20.After purchasing Fat Gripz I realized that something had always been missing from my workouts. Implementing these excellent gripz helped bring more contractions to the muscles I was working. For Instance when doing a bench press I could feel my chest being contracted a lot more with Fat Gripz then without them. Ultimately every workout I perform, has to have Fat Gripz. I also noticed when performing skull crushers there was a lot less stress on my elbows, these Gripz really make you work hard and are perfect if you are looking for quick results. My forearms as well as my biceps have benefited a lot from the Gripz. Although they are slightly expensive they are worth every penny. They are also perfect if you don't have an Olympic bar they make your bar as thick as one! When I opened the box I surprised to find their own workout program on top of their Fat Gripz. The fact that they are so versatile also makes it a must for any gym enthusiast or any one that ones to build muscle. They fit on your pull up bar, dumbells, barbells and even most gym machines, like tricep pull down, row and lat pull down. These Gripz were delivered in three days, very quick for an amazon delivery. Fat Gripz may just seem like two pieces of rubber but they are more than that, they are military grade and are really durable, they don't feel cheap at all. They also fit well on virtually any bar and are easy to take off. My first workout with these Gripz were punishing. I felt my forearms and biceps burning on every rep when curling, and I woke up sore the next day, after consistently using these gripz over 4 months I have managed to reduce imbalances between my arms and have a more prominent bicep peak, not to mention my huge forearms. Buy these Fat Gripz and you will not be disappointed, they are better than other Bar thickeners and are great if you don't want to buy an expensive Olympic bar and besides they fit on pretty much anything. I can not wait to buy the Extreme Fat Gripz, I must emphasize that you use standard Fat Gripz before using Extreme as when I hit the gym before buying these Gripz my friend had the Extremes and I was struggling to get a grip on them! After using the gripz for a few months I could get a firm grip on them.

Durability- 10/10

Price - 7/10

Shipping- 10/10

Overall use in workouts-10/10 (I use them for every exercise now!)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: vanvanvan
Review:
Take an EZ-bar with the same weight you usually do your biceps curls with and do 8-10 reps to remember what that feels like. Then, put Fat Gripz on, keeping the weight the same, and try to do another 8-10 reps... what you'll feel is your arms instantly tensing up in their entirety, using muscles which you didn't even know existed! After a couple of sets you'll be thinking "what happened, I could lift this weight easily?", well no son, the proper way to lift this is with FatGripz! You say you can do 25kg concentration biceps curls? Try doing it with FatGripz!

Basically this product kicks ass and makes your training much more efficient. The best test to see that this product truly works is to try and do your whole usual arm workout - with FatGripz and feel the difference the next day! The only thing I regret is that I found out about this only now...

That said, nothing beats hard work - FatGripz gives you the edge and motivates you to work even harder!

Thanks a lot for the product Matt!!!

Ivan

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Trev Stiles
Review:
I am a 54 year old man who has lifted weights on and off for years without really changing my body shape. I have always been skinny, except that now my waistline has expanded!
I am now in my 4th week of following the training plan with my Fat Gripz and am genuinely surprised by the results. My arms and shoulders have never been so big & my fiance has noticed how much stronger i am. Whilst my arms are by no means worthy of a magazine shoot, they do look bigger & make me feel better.
I will admit it hasn't been easy, but when you see results so quickly it is worth persevering.
I will be recommending Fat Gripz to my 25 year old son who likes to lift weights and punch a punch bag, but not until my arms are bigger than his!
I will also be putting Fat Gripz on my Christmas wish list, so i don't waste time swapping them over from dumb bell to bar bell whilst training.
I always read product reviews before buying & have never posted one myself, but i am so impressed with this product, as they work!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great for shoulder rehab & more too
Name: Huw B
Review:
Interestingly these were recommended by my S&C coach after having a shoulder operation. The idea was that they would create more instability when lifting without the need to increase weights beyond what my shoulder could manage, and help the supporting muscles around the joint build up (in addition to helping build muscle at lower weights). I must say it's been really useful and I've noticed a significant improvement since I started using these. I don't actually ever do specific 'gun exercises' (arm curls etc). so I've been surprised at how much muscle I've put on my arms and upper body. Grip strength has also markedly improved which is great for rugby - tackling / holding the ball in one hand to offload etc.

Now I'm using them more and more and they continue to deliver benefits so I'm definitely sticking with them. They are really tough too, so no worries about them splitting or breaking and the surface is grippy enough so you won't slip-off.

Really genuinely impressed at how good they are, especially given they are a small inexpensive bit of kit.

Title of Review: I have been an avid gym user for some 20 years and these are up in my top 3 training accessories.
Name: K Alford
Review:
My Arms are 3/4" bigger since using these - there, thats what you really want to know, but that is not all.......
My grip strength is also up and my wrist straps are somewhere in the bottom of my gym bag as I no longer feel the need to use them. I also rock climb and have felt my grip strength help progress my climbing grades.

As mentioned in other reviews these are great in most all pulling exercises, yes you will need to reduce the weight used a little at first but you will also feel most every muscle fiber engaged from your fingers through to the rest of your body.

I also really like them on chest day and I feel they have helped improve my bench press technique, I have always struggled with bad rotary cuffs and found flat bench press painful across my palms right through to my shoulders - with Fat Gripz everything feels more aligned and the movement more ergonomic. Great on the dip station also as I find the handles to thin on most commercial dip stations.

I have been an avid gym user for some 20 years and these are up in my top 3 training accessories.

For the average price of a tub of protein I would recommend the investment.

Fantastic product for increasing grip strength. I would mostly use these while performing arm exercises and quite often with rows/pullups as it adds a new dimension to training. Fat Gripz are a great addition especially if your going light weight as it literally makes the exercise 5x harder to perform than normal as you try to cling on to the grip. As a result of fat gripz training I have gained strength in my fingers, forearms and hands at all angles as they help to unlock these muscles. As with all exercises the new stimulation of a varied grip will hit all muscles being trained in a slightly different manner which can aid in growth.

Opening up the grip with fat gripz can also lower niggles and pains in elbows and shoulders by taking the movement away from the joints and into the muscles.

All in all a great purchase for any gym bag (as long as you're not embarrassed about lowering the weights!!!)
