Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Expensive, but worthwhile in the long-run
Name: NotaBene
Review:
I bought these in November of 2015 and have been using them fairly regularly since then.

From first use, it's impossible to deny the effects of using Fat Gripz: the burn says it all. As other users have said, it's a good idea to start with lighter weights than you may be used to using because these will ramp up the challenge significantly. They aren't an essential part of a workout, but they can make a workout a lot more efficient - especially important for those who may be training with time limitations.

The grips (gripz) are reassuringly weighty and seem well made. They are quite easy to fit them on and off bars or dumbbells, and the bar's thickness doesn't seem to matter as long as you hold them in accordance with the instructions.

I originally got them during the Black Friday sales for just under ¬£20, which I felt was pretty expensive for what they are. In fact, I ended up splitting the cost with a gym buddy. They are pretty simple in concept and it's hard to see how the price can be justified; having said that, they have not suffered any wear and work just as effectively now as they did when I bought them.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: G. Wylie
Review: Keen weight-lifters will readily appreciate the rapid benefits the use of 'fat bars' bring to grip and arm development.  The downside for most enthusiasts is the high cost of buying wide-grip bars and, as not every gym stocks them, the difficulty in getting their use for your daily routines.This is where Fat Gripz come into their own.  Beautifully moulded for easy grasping, they clamp easily to normal sized bars for instant wide-grip availability.  The will immediately alter your narrow bar equipment.  No matter whether you train with dumb-bells, bar-bells, or whatever, you get the immediate benefit of wide-grip training.  And they can be inter-changed and transferred quickly to all your training gear.  They feel great to use and will last a lifetime.  Most importantly, they come at a fraction of the cost of the real thing and, as a result, are great value for money.You don't need to change your training routines.  So their use is a no-brainer.  Only thing to bear in mind is that they do cause more stress the the grasping mechanics, so, initially, you might consider reducing the load you would normally use, or cut back on the repetitions till you feel happy to push things a little.Carpe Diem!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Vincent fennis
Review: Use it in the beginning but after a while you'll leave them standing in the corner. Fast and good delivery though.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Useless for one inch diameter bars or dumbbells
Name: HAMMER
Review: Useless for one inch diameter bars or dumbbells. I have a standard size weights set, not the olympic version. I bought these gripz thinking they would tightly hug the bars overcoming the issue of the standard size bars being possibly too thin. Unfortunately the fat gripz somewhat freely moved around the bars.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: A. Wright

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Fatten the muscles by fattening the grips
Name: JP
Review:
Since the dawn of the gym people have been looking for the best ways to optimise their exercise - from crunch cradles and shake weights to suspension training and the gym free workout this is another one to add to the collection of aids that promise to make you fitter, stronger or more beautiful just in time for the new year. So what is it and does it deliver?

Fat Gripz works on a simple concept, that if you widen the bar for your weights then the bigger hands will lead to bigger muscle gains. You can try this out yourself at home to prove it works, just imagine lifting something with a can sized bar versus a banana sized one. You'll immediately see that the muscles in action change and this is what these addons for your set promise to replicate - additional gains and definition from the same weights.

The product itself is just like a rubber tube with a hole in the middle, and a slit to help you put it on - similar to what you might put on a bar to protect your shoulders doing squats. The tube itself is solid and in my experience clips on nicely to increase the size, this is a relatively basic bit of kit so there is little to go wrong here. Just make sure that if you want to try this out you've got big enough hands otherwise you may experience some difficulties.

So will the fat gripz be resigned to obscurity and cast off into a cupboard like so many fitness gadgets up and down the country? Well the benefit here is in simplicity - if you can do it and get results then why not with these, so from me they come recommended.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great addition for forearms and biceps!
Name: Lewis
Review:
Like most people, I am generally always concerned when any new muscle building/weightloss/gym equipment comes onto the scene as most of the time it promises big results with relatively little to put forward in the way of scientific proof. However, seeing great bodybuilders like Jay Cutler use Fat Gripz made me more at ease, so I went ahead and ordered them.

They are quite easy to fit onto a standard barbell or dumbell, yet I find them most effective when using the former. Barbell curlers are significantly harder than before and almost impossible to complete with the same weight I was using before. A few sets in you can really feel the burn start to hit your forearms and the pump in your biceps is great! Although I have only used them for around a month now, I can already tell they are having an improvement on my grip strength, which translates well into bigger arms in total!

I generally add them to sets with standard grips, so they have not taken over my standard grip completely, but they are more of an addition to my regular routine. Drop sets or Pyramid Sets really burn out the forearms and look terrific! I can't wait to continue to use them and see what happens next!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Sarugumo
Review:
These Fat Gripz are a simple, but effective piece of gym equipment. Fitting most weight lifting bars and chin bars, these dense, heavy duty rubber cuffs turn your home gym equipment into the thick bars as used by elite athletes. I was like other reviewers here and a little dubious of the claims of this product, but I can say that after using these for a few workouts I have noticed a difference. I did as others suggested and initially lowered the weight I usually lifted, but it felt as difficult as with heavier weights and the next day I noticed a definite tightening in my forearms that I don't normally have.

These are quick to fit and move from bar to bar and feel very solid and durable. There are instructions for their use on the company website, but to be honest they are pretty self explanatory and anyone with common sense would figure out and ensure the fitting slot is facing the opposite way to where the main force of weight is.

Overall these are a good piece of equipment that helps you train as elite athletes do, at a fraction of the cost (although they do seem a little pricey for two pieces of dense rubber, despite the high tech military grade claims). They are easy to use at home or on free weights at a gym and can easily be chucked into a gym bag as you head out the door. If your training is reaching a plateau or you feel your grip strength is weak then give these a try.

Feel free to check out my blog which can be found on my profile page.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: RedForShort
Review:
Very good quality product. Essentially they are thick rubber tubes which fit over your bar bell/dumbbells handles which gives you a wider grip. This makes your arm use it's forearm muscles more which in turn strengthens and grows them.
I can say from using these they seem to be working. I can feel the difference after a workout using these compared to without.

I must say though VERY pricey for what they are. I got them in a lightening deal for around ¬£15 and even that seems expensive. Even though they are of very high quality, they should never cost fore than ¬£10 - ¬£15 at full price.

All in all though I'm happy with them as they do what they say they'll do.

Reccomended - YES!

Watch HD video (if link below doesn't show then go to Youtube and copy and paste " NkekzCXthjo " in the search box)

[...]

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Definitely makes a difference to lifting!
Name: Mr. M. P. Duffy
Review:
I received a pair of fatgripz via the vine programme. Unless the packaging was a sample only one, it leaves a little to be desired in terms of feeling like a quality job. They were simply sealed into a black plastic bag with a sticker on it; I would normally hope for a little more for ¬£35. There were no in-pack instructions, the sticker simply points you to read the Fatgripz website.

However, for a mildly disappointing start, the Fatgrips themselves are a good item. They are much more solid than I imagined! I've read about them in magazines before and always thought they would be slightly squishy, but they're actually very solid rubber and provide a good grip. I have tried them on my gym's Olympic bars and dumbells and there were no issues with fit at all. I have also managed to successfully use them on kettle bells at home.

Personally, I found they made more of a difference to any of my 'pull' type lifts where you have an overhand grip on the bar, definitely encouraging a firmer grip and working the forearms harder. However I remain to be completely convinced on push type lifts (shoulder presses, chest press etc). The fatgripz website claims that spreading the weight across a wider area puts less pressure on the joints. I found it made the lift 'seem' easier, but certainly didn't give the instant feeling of having worked harder that the gripz do when pulling.

The nice thing about these is that they can be easily thrown into your gym bag and pulled out and used within seconds.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: A small addition makes a big difference.
Name: Jack Chakotay
Review: This is a big deal.  The more open grip on my usual weights force me to concentrate on using the big muscles instead of trying to manipulate with the smaller muscles.  I was totally taken aback that I couldn't handle my normal amount of reps.  The commonly repeated advice of reducing the weight until you are comfortable is prudent not just for the safety aspect.These come into their own in terms of lifting type activities. I didn't find too much benefit from pulling activities like the lats.I would recommend regularly dampening and rubbing down with a wet soapy sponge as the residue left behind by your hands (sweat or otherwise) leave them slick over time, similar to the grips of golf clubs  A quick rinse and drying off with a towel completes the aftercare.  They do split apart to allow affixing so while the insides don't need the cleaning, they do need the drying.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Genuine product to take you to your next level
Name: Mike
Review:
I‚Äôve never been a fan of gym gimmicks and have always keep things basic; free weights to go big and then cables to finish up at the end, but genuinely Fat Gripz are the real deal and really help push you past your limits.

I use the blue on my arm days for any free weight curls and presses. The thicker grip really burns the forearms as your entire arm has to work so much harder to maintain the grip. Tip: start lighter and build up again it‚Äôs worth the effort!

These fit around any bar quickly and easily and also on various grips for cable machines too, so for close grip v bars I‚Äôve started using them for curls or triceps pull downs, again just to feel that total burn all the way from top to bottom.

Absolutely awesome product, great price couldn‚Äôt recommend more!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: I think they're going to work
Name: Aaron
Review: I've done only one session with these so far, but my arms and grip are already feeling the difference. I never realised how much tougher it would be to try to do a workout with an expanded grip, but it really does add an extra dimension. I'd say this is going to soon be my favourite additional little tool for the gym, even more fun that the weight belt I use for tricep dips.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Woah! -Forearms like Popeye! Good if you SPECIFICALLY want to work forearms.
Name: Pallus
Review:
Yes... I would say these unquestionably work your forearms more. That is, they seem to transfer some of the stress to your forearms which explains why you may have to reduce your usual lifting weight with first use; it's as if you have to give your forearms a chance to 'catch-up' with the muscles already used to heavy reps.

So, I WOULD recommend these but only if you want or expect an improvement in your forearms only.

They are made of a very dense rubber-like substance (silicone?) which does feel very solid and robust. I don't think it's fair to write them off as just a couple of rubber tubes as they do the job they are specifically made for.

I find them easy to wash with detergent.

Regarding cost, they do appear expensive but then they cost no more than a couple of these yoga blocks

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Adds an extra dimension to your workouts at a modest cost
Name: Amazamma
Review:
As a piece of kit to add to your strength training tool box, these little grips are great. They add an extra dimension to training, to help you mix up your exercises some more so your workouts don't get stale.

Pros:
- Adds an extra dimension to workouts for intermediate and advanced athletes so they don't get stale (or, as they blurb puts it, "to shock your muscles into new growth")
- Adding the Fat Gripz doubles the number of bar exercises you can do (ie without Fat Gripz or ... with them)
- You can feel the Fat Gripz recruiting different muscle groups as you use them - it's too early to say yet what the effect will be, because all exercise takes a while to show results
- Instructions for use are on the website (link included on the packaging) together with a link to download 3 free strength training routines

Cons:
- Not impressed by the packaging - came in a black plastic bag with what looked like a home-made label on the front referring to a website. And that's it.
- Not designed for beginners (this isn't a con so much as a warning: don't buy them if you're a beginner to strength training as they designed for intermediate and advanced athletes)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Added an inch to my arms in just 4 weeks.
Name: melmacboy
Review: The world of muscle building is full of scam products. Sometimes products are simply more hype than substance. Occasionally though you find a product which is both very simple and also hugely effective at the same time - Fat Gripz is just such a product. The concept is a simple one - A FAT GRIP - what is delivers however is results! Real results, real gains and growth. If you have not seen any substantial growth in your arm size for a while then by using this product you will, from the first workout, feel the difference and within a few weeks you will see the difference too. The product is well made and can be easily slipped inside your gym back. Attaching them to dumbbells or machine handles only takes a few seconds. Using this product for just 4 weeks, without any "chemical" assistance I added an extra inch to my arms! My friends now all "borrow" my Fat Gripz - hopefully they will buy some of their own soon!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Squeebles
Review:
Having large hands (yet weak forearms) I have always found it difficult to get a good grip on weight training bars, whether it is a bar for a lat pull down machine or dumb / bar bells.

These Fat Gripz (with their trademarked 'z' spelling) fit over the gnarled parts of the bars (the grips are split on one side so they slip over rather than having to slide on from one end), and you grip them instead. They're made of a soft, yet sturdy rubber compound that doesn't add much to the weight of your gym bag. In use, the increased diameter means you have to work harder on your grip and you feel it quite quickly in your foreams, which means you won't be able to necessarily lift (or push/pull) as much as you would normally do without the grips. You could easily overwork your forearms to the detriment of the rest of your exercises. I now have a better handshake because of the Gripz.

As an experiment, I put these on my steering wheel when I drove to work the other day. Sadly I didn't get a good forearm workout by the time I got to the car park. Keep it for the gym, folks.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Kirsty at the Overflowing Library
Review: Got to say - when they arrived I was pretty sceptical.  What you receive are just two pieces of hard rubber, these are split open and and placed around your weight bars.However what a result!  By doing this the bar becomes thicker and when used places a greater strain upon the hands, rather than transferring the strain through to the arms/chest (which are more capable of handling it).My grip strength is not good so for me it is was very noticeable that I could not maintain my usual quantity of reps with the gripz attached to my bars.  However it didn't take long for me to feel a very noticeable difference in my grip strength.All in all an excellent product that does deliver noticeable results swiftly.  My only criticism (hence 4 stars) is that the price is rather steep for what you actually physically receive.  Additionally I'm not sure you would want to use these for all your lifts (which seems to be the recommendation on the Fat Gripz website) - I suspect you'd want to do an initial set/s with an unmodified bar to challenge the chest/arms then add the gripz to then develop the hands.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: David Precious
Review: I consider the price for what are effectively two solid rubber tubes a bit excessive, so I don't think they're excellent value.However, I did find them useful.  I use dumbbells at home to supplement my gym training, usually with 15kg on each dumbbell - fitting these to the dumbbells made them much easier to hold without the rough metal grip giving me callouses - but, more importantly, I could actually feel the difference in muscle effort in my forearm, wrist and hands - I did feel my forearm muscles aching more after a workout rather than just my biceps, and see a bit more definition there - so I think they are effective at what they claim to do, working out other arm muscles you'd usually miss.They feel like decent quality solid rubber, so I expect them to last a good long time - so despite the somewhat high price, I'd consider them a worthwhile purchase if you do much exercise with dumbbells / barbells.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Gym gadget with a lot of potential!
Name: Eleimon Gonis
Review:
Clearly this is something that is produced by the leaders in the market for such products.

I found that they are very portable, quite bright (!) and they do succeed in what they are destined for, with some shortcomings of course.

First and foremost, they are made from a hard rubber solution, and they fit bars and weights well, provided you are strong enough to bend them in the first place and if you don't want to take weights off bars!

Secondly, they attract dust, rust, sweat, etc. like a magnet and need to be soaked to clean quite regularly.

Thirdly, they tend to fit most bars, but not the thick ones that sometimes you get in gyms.

Nevertheless, they do the job! They are there to help you with building more arm muscle and I think they achieve it if used sensibly and consistently. Did I see any difference? My (limited due to an injury) use proved that they make the workout that bit harder, which can only be a good thing in the near- to medium-term.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: An excellent product for training at any level.
Name: Ken Stevens
Review:
Bought these a few years ago as was suffering from a nasty case of tennis elbow from work (Sports Therapist)
They arrived and stared using them for bicep curls and bench press predominatly.

They are easy to use on standard grip dumbbells and bars and with the altered grip pattern i found it took alot of the pressure off my tennis elbow and allowed me to contiune training throughout my treatment.

they are solidly made and long lasting mine still look brand new dispite being almost 3 years old and in use every session for something.

For those without injury it adds a whole new level of challange to any pulling movement and will most definatly add power to your overall grip strength.
Simple to use to great effect everyone should have a set of these in their kit bag.
Thanks for your time.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Very good - for the right users
Name: James B. Spink
Review: Fat Gripz are designed for the more experienced weight trainer and should be used with caution - if at all - by amateurs. The Gripz come with little information provided with them but you are given access to a secret area of the Fat Gripz website which gives plenty of guidance for use and safety information. Although they are well made from very high quality material they seem extremely expensive for what you actually get and I guess a large part of the price covers the R & D that has gone into the design of the product.If you are serious about weight training, and have already spent a lot on your equipment, then another thirty quid is not going to make much difference and may be a good investment. For other users I would advice caution before parting with your cash. A good product - but I have deducted a star at the current price.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Kevin
Review: Fat Gripz prove that the simplest ideas are often the best. When using these you can definitely feel your arms being worked harder, especially the forearm. I haven't been using these long, so the results are hard to measure. I am gradually increasing weights though, so must be building up. Another benefit to these is, to me, they make the bar much more comfortable to hold, the etched crosshatch style grip most bars have can be a bit harsh on your hands.The only problem I had with Fat Gripz was that they didn't fit my bars properly (they fit Olympic bars perfectly, apparently). This is easily resolved though by wrapping insulating tape around the bars first, and then fitting the 'Gripz. Totally recommend.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: solid and effective,but far from cheap
Name: Daniel Dalton
Review: These ramp up a standard bar to slightly above the girth of a can of energy drink.  This makes it harder to grip when in flexion, working forearm muscles in particular, but some of the upper arm muscles too.  This means that the exercises are a little less targetted, but more demanding on the hard to reach forearms.  My only worry about this is that the limiting factor in exercises will be grip strength.  this isn't an issue for me, but must be  factor if you are trying to really work on building up muscles, rather than general fitness.My final gripe is the cost.  These are cheaper then a whole new set of weights, but are still merely a couple of fat pieces of moulded rubber, and probably ought to be available for a little less.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: The product did more than make me stronger.
Name: Mr. Adam Jenkins
Review: Fat Gripz do a great deal to improve strength and size to your arms and wrists, but these have helped me in a way I thought wouldn‚Äôt have. Yeah like most people that will use this product want bigger arms, me included, but for years I‚Äôve suffered with pour wrist strength and pain brought on by using vibration tools, and for some amazing reason that I can‚Äôt explain, these Gripz have alleviated pain, and brought back dexterity to my hands and wrists, they have done something that they wasn‚Äôt designed for, which for me is a bonus when getting a product that you haven‚Äôt used before or know little about. So for me I will sing evangelically about Fat Gripz for a long time to come, Thank you Fat Gripz once again.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Wish I had bought these sooner! üåü üåü üåü üåü üåü
Name: C
Review: Amazing product! Been using these for over a month now and they are a fantastic compliment to any arm/upper body workout.  I've found they give me great muscle activation when doing bicep curls especially; my forearms burn after a few sets as the fatter bar needs you to grip the bar even tighter. Great for highlighting my weaker points to work on. üëåüèΩThey fit easily over my barbells, dumbells and my chin-up bar. They feel robust and the material they're made from feels like it's made to last!Very happy with this purchase, just wish I'd done it sooner! üôÇ

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great for those last couple of sets
Name: Ross
Review: I‚Äôve not given the comfort 5 stars because if there‚Äôs one thing these don‚Äôt give you, it‚Äôs comfort. It hurts like a b***h using these! Does exactly what it‚Äôs meant to. My favourite exercise using these is definitely reverse cable curls, have always felt more of a squeeze when using the Fat Gripz. They take up next to no room in the gym bag and are light to carry about, would 100% recommend.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Erdi Babili
Review:
I've had my fat grips for over 5 years now, they've been a great supplementary tool for my training.

I use them for my backoff / blood flow reps at the end of my weighted chin-up workouts. After doing my heavier reps I'll drop down to bodyweight chin-ups and use these for max reps.

They're great for getting a huge forearm pump and providing a different stimulus to your grip strength.

Would highly recommend for any strength enthusiast!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Certainly makes bicep curls and arm workouts harder
Name: H Jackson
Review: (In this review, I'm paraphrasing my partner's views as he is more of a gym-using person who wants to build more muscle)"These Fat Gripz certainly have made my workouts more intense. The first time I used them to do some bicep curls, my biceps burned for 2 days after, which hasn't happened for years despite the fact that I work my biceps at least once a week. I don't know if they have promoted any genuine muscle growth, but the fact that it makes my workouts harder and my biceps are certainly feeling much more challenged, I'd say that they are doing their job."

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Good quality, does the job perfectly
Name: Katie
Review:
These are a nice non permanent solution to add another element to your training exercises. It sure beats my sons previous method of having layers of duct tape wrapped around the bar.

These are very easy to put on the bar, and easy to take off. Can be used on both push and pull exercises and could be used in a public gym without any issues.( Most gyms don't take too kindly to you pulling out a roll of duct tape and wrapping their bars! Ha haha!).

Once on these as vwery secure, and don't move. These are a smooth dense rubber so you can still grip the bar easily.

A good inexpensive addition to your home gym

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: McColey
Review: Comfortable to hold, and definitely works muscles harder.  I am not a serious weightlifter, and only use light hand weights for toning exercises, but I can feel a difference with the wider grip.  On the downside, the price is astronomical considering what they are made of, but I haven't let that affect my star rating because it is up to individuals to decide if the price is worth paying for what they want, and I have previously reviewed products poorly on the basis of price, then found that after a few months the price is slashed, making it much better value and worthy of a better star rating.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Not quite as good as the hype.
Name: A. Cresswell
Review: Ok so these do make a difference when working out. They do make the bar a lot lot fatter and way more comfortable. They are softer than a bar but there's no give in them. They are of very high density rubber and they are split down one side. So on a plus note, YES you will definitely appreciate the better feel and grip of the bar. However it says on the side FAT GRIPZ ... THICKER BAR MORE MUSCLE .... ummm I don't think so. Certainly I don't perceive there being any great increase in muscle building or an increase in stamina or weight. Good ... just not that good. I'd definitely recommend them though.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Stress Fracture
Review: I'm not sure of the science behind them but these grips do exactly what they boast of. I was watching the latest World's Strongest Man competition on some terrible TV channel (Five or something like that) and the competitors appeared to be having trouble in one discipline because the bars were too thin. So now it turns out that thicker is harder? My mind can't take it and to begin with my arms struggled too. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: R. W. Mackenzie
Review:
The principle behind Fat Gripz is simple: by making the bars used for lifting thicker and therefore more difficult to lock your fingers round, you have to use more grip strength to hold the bar, forcing your arm muscles (primarily forearms) and grip to grow stronger. The principle is not new; thick bar work has existed in powerlifting/strongman for many years, but the additional specialist equipment is not present in most gyms or affordable for most trainees. Enter Fat Gripz. Essentially a thick, hard plastic sleeve, that you slip over the bar of a barbell, dumbbell, pull up bar, suspension training system etc, allowing you to gain the benefits of thick bar training.

Using them is simple - essentially you slip them over the relevant bar, with the slit faced towards your hand on pulling movements, or away on pushing movements. They are flexible enough to fit most bars very well, although they do not work well on curved handles of kettlebells, and feel slightly odd on one set of dumbbells I tried them on which had a curved handle. There is no tangible "give" to them, albeit that I have only so far used them up to 120kg.

They are also very effective, in that you can feel the need to work harder to grip weights, and you will quickly feel a forearm "pump" on certain exercises. Clearly, having to work harder to grip the bar will mean that you will not be able to lift all of your normal sets with Fat Gripz (e.g. on heavy deadlifts/rows, where I am already at the limit of my grip strength, I can't get a single rep with Fat Gripz attached).

The trick is to use them wisely (and this is where I take slight issue with their downloadable training plans, which suggest you need to use them for everything). So, when deadlifting, I will not use the Fat Gripz until I have completed my heaviest sets, but might then use them for the assistance work.

You also need to be very careful leaping into using them too much. Grip and forearm muscles are small, and can easily be over-trained. Overworked forearms will put more stress on your elbows, and you will lose your training benefits if you're out of action with tennis elbow. Use a bit of common sense and be guided by your muscles - a bit of an ache the day after use is fine, pain is never good. Learn to stretch and foam roller your forearms - they are slow muscles at flushing out lactic acid.

Title of Review: Do what they say - as far as I can tell!
Name: Robbie
Review:
I've been using these for the last week or so and I can definitely feel the difference. Now, I'm no fitness or training guru, but I did a bit of an experiment and they definitely do something!

Basically, I tried doing my bicep curls using the Fat Gripz on one arm and not the other. By all the measures, I could feel that my right arm (with the Fat Gripz) was having to work harder, was more tired, and found the curls more difficult than my left. And that's despite the fact that if there is a different between my arms, I would say my right is stronger.

On the bicep curls, I can feel the difference in my forearm, particularly the tendons and muscles on the inside of my arm, and in my hand.

The best comparison I can think of is the difference between carrying your shopping bags at arms length, letting the tensile strength of your arms carry the majority of the weight vs bending your arms slightly, or lifting your shopping bags a few inches from your body. Straight away you can feel more muscles at work, and it's the same here.

Obviously I've only been using them for a little while, and short of deliberately training one of my arms differently to the other, I can't guarantee they do exactly what they say, but it seems like they probably do!

Other than that, they're fairly chunky, tough things, so I'd say the price isn't too bad - they should last a few years. Added to that, they do provide decent grip, both to your hands and onto the weights - they don't slip off.

So my only real problem is the name, in which the Z annoys me... but I can live with that!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Review: I used to battle constant frustration during my workouts as my grip would give out before the muscles I was trying to work, pain in my wrists getting the better of me. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Fat Gripz - fat marketing at a fat price
Name: The Honest Cynic
Review:
The science behind Fat Gripz is that they work by wrapping round your weights in order for you to give a greater girth and force you to grip tighter, helping build muscle mass as different muscles are engaged as a result. They claim winning athletes and the armed forces use them, and they have a lot of media coverage claims to their name if their website and its hundreds of testimonials is to be believed.

This pair of reinforced rubberised grips arrive wrapped in a black bag and a notice to visit their website for proper instructions (that is, making sure the slits face the right way when lifting) and to register for a free guide on the best work out - you're re-marketed before you've even worked out!

You already need a tight grip yourself to get them on at first, as I struggled to get them on a even a broom handle at first (just testing them out, guys!), though they start to loosen up eventually, without the material wearing down - durable!

Now, I don't want to be a bodybuilder, just wanna keep strong and have definition. These are aimed at people who want to be hulks, if their Facebook page is to be believed! The additional width they give means that l lifting needed to be adjusted, so start of small before wanting to get big again - it‚Äôs an adjustment

Do I notice a difference? Not yet, though maybe after a few months, and their presence in deepening arm curls certainly feels different. They‚Äôre durable, hard wearing, heavy duty and I love the quality of their manufacturing.

The problem is with these though is that their RRP is the same in dollars as it is in UK sterling - so you're not paying a converted currency price - the same practice Abercrombie & Fitch were accused of! So you're paying more, and as mentioned before, not providing their instructions or e-book with them as added value for what is delivered is even worse for money!

Shop around for the best price so you don‚Äôt feel ripped off, try before you buy, so you know what the adjustment feels like, or, like a small section of the internet: Wrap pipe cladding round your bars and save yourself the money for new kit!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Great product, prepare to improve your game

Review: Loved the ease of use and have found my grip strength has increased 10 fold; my over over grip for deadlifts have never been stronger! My favourite exercise to add them in with is either Chin-ups or on a rowing machine for a warm up.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Ubik
Review:
I've had a set of cast iron dumbbells for a number of years now, they get nowhere near enough use. Every now and again I'll get a routine going for a month or so but then will just stop suddenly proving it to be a massive waste of time. Getting these Fat Gripz I aimed to put this right.

They are a good weight, they slide onto the handle pretty easily and don't really slide around at all, I went through the inevitable pain of over use on my first time back on the old routine and sat it out for three days whilst my arms recovered, but once I adjusted to the slightly lower rep count that these effect I am now getting a good work out on the arms and also noticing some growth in the size of the fore arms. Not much but definitely noticeable to me at least. I've had these for a month now, which I consider the minimum amount of time to review a product like this, I really don't understand how some people can own these for a day and provide good feedback.

Overall, these are great and I would say they are worth it money-wise as well. As long as you keep going you'll see a difference, even for a casual work-outer like myself.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: PeeBee
Review: I was not at all convinced that these grips would work.  I accept that the fatter grip helps to develop the forearms, but I suspected that the Fat Gripz wouldn't be stable enough.  I thought they'd squish in hand, or that they might come loose, or that they would move too easily along the length of the bar... my fears were not realised.The grips take some getting used to, especially if your grip is relatively weak compared to the rest of our upper body (mine certainly is, and I felt that this was limiting my workouts more than anything else).  The grips did require me to drop the weights down quite a little, but I was certainly feeling a lot of impact from their use.Are they worth ¬£35?  In terms of material costs, no, which is why I can't award a full 5 stars - they seem over-priced for what they are.  However, they do the job they're intended to do, and don't take up a lot of space.  If you're finding that your forearm strength is limiting your workouts, these are certainly recommended.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Pumpilicious ! Intensify your training - feel an immediate difference!
Name: chinhealer
Review:
Ignorant as I am, I never knew that hardcore bodybuilders use equipment with thicker bars compared to us mere mortals who have to manage with skinny bars on our barbells and dumbbells! So the idea of the Fat Gripz intrigued me.

Today I had my first workout at the gym (mostly delts, but a couple of biceps exercises too) using them and, I have to say, they made my muscles work harder than ever before. Maybe it's got something to do with the fact that gripping the Fat Gripz automatically tenses your muscles before you've even executed a single rep. That was particularly apparent with the biceps exercises, but I have a feeling something similar happens with the delts too.

Fitting the Fat Gripz to both dumbbells and barbells was very quick and easy. And carrying them around with me in the gym was less of a chore than I thought it would be.

They are made of a very robust rubber which provides a decent grip and I felt an unusually large pump in my muscles during and after my workout. Right now, as I write - several hours after my workout - my muscles are still feeling pleasantly fatigued and playing the guitar was a little difficult a few minutes ago as there is some residual soreness in my hands. I'm assuming that my grip will get stronger and that this will cease to be a problem the more I get used to the Fat Gripz over time.

I guess the only downside for some - and, perhaps, for many women in particular - is that unless you have sufficiently large hands, you might find the Fat Gripz cumbersome or, even, impossible to use as your hands might not be able to stretch sufficiently around them.

I don't have particularly large hands for a bloke, but I reckon my hands are larger than many women's hands. And I was just about able to use the Fat Gripz comfortably. So, until Fat Gripz come in at least one smaller size, I think they may be useless for a significant number of people!

Nevertheless, for me, on their first outing to the gym, they have proved very effective. I may update this review in the weeks or months ahead to give a better picture of their effectiveness in the long-term.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: It still requires dedication and sweat
Name: John Boy
Review: This is a work in progress review as with most sports equipment, there is no overnight magic fix.The "Gripz" are made of firm rubber with a slit on one side so that they can be fitted to dumbbells, barbells, and things like chin-up bars. They are 57mm diameter, 125mm long on the outer face and 100mm long on the inner face; the internal diameter is 27mm with the slit closed. They fitted my standard 1" (25mm) diameter dumbbells but allowed the bar to rotate as it didn't grip the knurling. I would need to pack out the dumbbell handle or consider Olympic bars. I fitted them on Aerobis Elite suspension handles for neutral grip chin-ups and there was more tension in the lower triceps and around the elbow. One of the workout downloads shows them being used on a tricep dip machine where I would have thought that they wouldn't have changed the muscle recruitment. That said, I've fitted them to press-up stands and they are comfortable as well providing plenty of grip for dropping my chest below the level of the handles.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

So for me they do work, so why 3 stars? Easy cost.  Yes they are very well made out of quality composite material.  There is no sign of wear and I have swapped them from bar to bar, well three bars, at least three times per workout, but ¬£30 for these..........personally I think at a third of the price they represent value, at this price they would not be for me.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)

They can feel a bit strange if you're used to a narrow bar - the extra chunkiness makes it feel as if you're going to drop it as you're holding onto less of the bar than you're used to - but you quickly get used to it. An added bonus is that I no longer get the skin pinching at the base of the finger which sometimes occurred during longer dumbbell sessions.In conclusion - they're a good idea and seem to work, but are overpriced.

I am glad I bought my pair and would recommend them to anyone interested in improving their arm size and functional strength whether for bodybuilding, MMA, powerlifting or any other sport where you rely on a strong grip. Name: I. B. Pitbladdo
Review: I'm no body builder, just an older geezer trying to maintain a little muscle tone as I slip into old age. To me the price seems a bit inflated when you consider that they are just a couple of bits hardened rubber. That said, they do seem to work, so those more dedicated to working out may consider them a worthwhile investment. In use I find I get the burn quicker and so can reduce the number of reps I do to achieve the same result. In conclusion, while they do what the makers say they will do, I think perhaps they are more suitable for the really keen muscle builders than casual users like myself.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Gordon Saunders
Review:
So I've been training with these for well over a year now. I had read a bit about these and a few people had recommended them so decided to take the plunge. I was a bit sceptical at first, given the price tag, but how wrong I was! My biggest regret is wasting time by reading up on these! Days of training wasted! Gains, strength and stamina all wasted!
They are fairly easy to put on and have even strapped them onto an Olympic bar. They don't close around wider bars but they don't slide off either.
Within 1 week using these for 3 out of 5 training sessions, I noticed a difference. My forearms burn after a session using these. My grip has improved and now rely less on chalk and straps.
They are durable and should last for years if you look after them.
They fit easily into a bag so no excuses!
I get asked all the time, "what are they?" And "do they work?", so I lend them out for a couple of sets and everyone says how good they are.
I use them for loads, shrugs, bicep curls, skull crushers, dead lifts (so tough!) and loads more, such a versatile product!
A must buy!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: A fellow gym goer could see that I didn't have very good movement in my left shoulder and the left hand ...
Name: Joshua silverman
Review:
The only extra you should consider buying!!!

In 2004 I had a motorcycle accident which lead to muscle atrophy (loss of muscle), arthritis within most of my upper body and the accident literally teared my Lattisimus Dorsi out (large muscle in your back).

After years of rehab, I was able to go back into the gym. A fellow gym goer could see that I didn't have very good movement in my left shoulder and the left hand side of my body was totally under developed compared to my right. He suggested I bought these..... And OMG!!!

Since using these I have been able to get the grip strength and joint stability to actually perform balanced pull ups. Consider the fact that I haven't got the major muscle that controls this movement and that's amazing!!

My arthritis is controlled within my elbows and shoulders without the use of medication.... It is absolutely amazing.

If you feel this May be far fetched just google my name and you should find info about my accident.

Not only is it good for rehab but the pump and size different in my arms using these and not using these is like night and day.

Grab these and I promise you it will be the best 30 odd quid you will ever spend!

See you on the other side soon.....

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: furry monster
Review: These things ROCK! Not only does the increased bar diameter force your hands and forearms to work much harder than with a normal Olympic bar, but for me they had an awesome undocumented feature. A couple years ago I developed "tennis elbow" (lateral epicondylitis), and it just would not go away. I tried taking a break from the gym for a few weeks, deep tissue massage, and ice, but nothing seemed to shift it. For those who are are fortunate enough not to know about it, lateral epicondylitis is a painful condition where the forearms extensor tendons are torn at or near the attachment to the bone of the elbow. Tennis players commonly get it from hitting backhand shots. I bought a pair of FatGripz to strengthen my grip whilst lifting, but after three weeks suddenly realised my tennis elbow problem was GONE! I presume it worked because with the large diameter of the FatGripz on the bar, my hands were less closed, and so the extensor muscles and tendons were correspondingly less stretched. So while the extensor muscles and tendons were getting decent blood flow into them while exercising, the stretch on them was not enough to reopen the tendon tears. And of course they crank up your gripping power, and make your forearms look more burly!

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Mike J King
Review:
My son (16) is a keen amateur work outer, using mostly weights and a chin up bar, so I asked him to review these.

Firstly, they are made of a hard, rubber like material which quickly gets quite dirty. Obviously this doesn't effect their performance but as others have noted, they are quite hard to clean. But they aren't too heavy or large and are easy to carry and store.

They look quite a serious piece of kit; if that kind of thing matters to you!

My son was very weary of them at first but in use had to admit they did seem to make a difference: his grip was a little firmer and he did 'feel' the work out more - his muscles seemed to feel the weights more.

This was especially true for the chin ups where he felt he was exerting his arms more. The grip was improved too making it easier to push up and consequently do a few more than he normally would.

With the weights he was initially dismissive as they did seem to make them feel heavier. Reading the reviews here he dropped the weight and found it much easier. But he wasn't willing to drop the weight even though he admitted the grip was better.

So he uses them with the chin ups but not the weights.

I guess its a personal thing as to whether you'd find these useful and value for money.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Keith
Review: There is no greater arm builder than Fat Gripz! They're portable when on the road, easy to use and definitely worth the investment. Thick bar training has long been known to be more advantageous in many aspects as it recruits more muscle fibres which in turn builds more muscle. Not only that, but whilst using a thick bar, you're also getting stronger! That's killing two birds with one stone. Building muscle and getting stronger at the same time. How cool is that ?! Fat Gripz also helps target the brachioradialis which is the smallest of the three elbow flexors which is often neglected. The advantageous of this Ultimate Arm Builder are endless and would be beneficial to anyone who's looking to have a stronger grip. Training with a thick bar would also translate to more functional everyday life. How often do we grip things that are as thin as a standard dumbbell or barbell ? After using Fat Gripz for more than 2 years now, I have progressed to the Fat Gripz Extreme but I would not recommend it until you've used the originals for a few months. All in all, a great product and definitely worth the investment if you're looking to annihilate your arms !

Review:
I've always been wary of gimmicky grip training tools and gained very little in the way of solid results from various wrist rollers, forearm curls, grippers, towel chin ups etc etc. So, when it came to Fat Gripz, it's fair to say I was cynical when I received them as a gift from a well-meaning relative.

Like the title of my review: Believe the hype! These really have changed the way I train and have added noticeable size and strength to my forearms, a bodypart that I have always struggled to develop.
Initially, I used Fat Gripz on almost all my push/pull lifts, operating on the principle that if you can't grip it, you can't lift it; and I ended up really frying my forearms! Now, I use them only on my warm-up sets.
The major difference for me with implementing Fat Gripz into my training regime has been the time saved by not having to devote additional time and effort to working my forearms.

Title of Review: Believe it or not, they do work
Name: Andres
Review:
My arms have always been me absolute weakest point, so after some extensive googeling I stumbled upon FatGripz. At first I had doubts, come on, look at them. It's just two plastic handles, how on Earth can they help me at the gym? But for some reason I read up on them and I decided that I should give them a try. They are reasonable priced, and there's plenty of reviews around forums etc that give them the thumb up.

What's cool about the FatGripz is that you can feel the difference immediately. Your standard 22 lbs dumbbell seem much heavier, and combine that with the workout routine they recommend, and you will leave the gym with a massive pump. Right now I am six weeks into using the FatGripz, so halfway through the routine, and I do see results. As of today, I have gained 1cm (0,4") on both forearms. Same goes for the upper arm, around the biceps/triceps. That might not sound much for some, but for me that is just awesome. Hopefully I can gain another cm the last six weeks.

From day one I always carry the FatGripz to the gym and I will continue to use these bad boys after the 12 week routine is over. Most likely I will go for the Extreme version in the future and hope to see some serious gainz.

Thank you, FatGripz, you truly helped me work these arms.

I read all the reviews and hype on the BB forums, so figured I'd try them for myself.Now don't get me wrong, these do indeed reduce the amount you can lift because of the fatter bar - but does this correlate to huge forearms, not really.  These reduce the amount you lift in other lifts to hit forearms a bit more.In my opinion a specific forearm workout is far superior to reducing all your other lifts and ultimately overtraining your forearms. Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Title of Review: Good product at a super-inflated price
Name: Nick
Review:
The issue here is not whether the product is a good one; it is.
These enlarged bright blue grips do exactly what they claim. They easily fit over the bars on existing gym equipment effectively doubling the thickness of the grip.
The effect is to turn ordinary gym bars into super-thick bars which helps activate the arm muscles more than the standard thickness bar would do.
It's too soon to say whether that translates, for me, into genuinely more effective exercise and building of arm muscle, but it certainly feels as if it will.
No, the issue here is purely one of cost. The list price is well over ¬£30. [¬£34.80]. They can be bought online for prices ranging from around ¬£20 to ¬£29.31 (including delivery). This seems incredibly overpriced. I asked some friends for their opinion as to what they would be willing to pay for these. The highest price anyone I knew would be willing to pay was ¬£15. The lowest ¬£5.99. Admittedly ¬£5.99 seems somewhat mean, but you get the drift. My view was that a price point of ¬£12.99 would be defensible, So how they can merit a price tag of ¬£30 or more defeats me.
That said, Fat Gripz are well made, hard-wearing, and effective. But that price is an absolute no-no.
So the star rating is a problem: probably 4 or 5 for what they do, and No stars for price. So, split the difference and give two stars, but even that seems a bit generous and misleading when the price is such a stumbling block.

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: Teodor Dimitrov
Review:
FatGripz - a great tool if used properly!
Starting off, the first time you use them, especially on weights over 100 pounds, prepare to be surprised how weak your grip actually is. Using it on barbell rows, dumbell rows or any other grip-intensive exercise is a great tool for any athlete that needs serious grip strenght. Your grip will catch up quick and it will transfer into your sport.
When it comes to pressing - FatGripz might feel a little weird but they do alleviate elbow and shoulder pain. I've played baseball for 10 years and had elbow problems when pressing. With FatGripz that pain was gone pretty quick.
Now for bodybuilders - here it gets interesting. The pump you get is amazing! Not only your forearms, you entire arm - from shoulder to palm - get fired up like crazy and the muscle activation is insane! The intensity of your workouts goes through the roof and it's worth every penny!
On durability and usage - they are very durable. I have used them extensively - no scratches, no tears, nothing. Pop them on, pop them out in seconds. Very easy to clean! And when you have your nickname engraved on them - kinda feels cool to know who's boss!
I highly recommend every athlete or bodybuilder to start using them and feel the difference. :)

Product: Fat Gripz Pro - The Simple Proven Way to Get Big Biceps & Forearms Fast (Winner of The Men‚Äôs Health Magazine Home Gym Award 2020) (2.25" Outer Diameter)
Name: TB_family
Review:
Firstly, you should be careful when using these grips for the first few occasions as you will have a more open handed grip which can affect the safe weight you normally lift. As a precaution you should reduce your normal weight capacity until you have grown used to it. Secondly, everyone works out differently and so you may find something that works for one, may not have the same effect on another especially if you both have different hand sizes.

The grips are quite comfortable to hold in your hand and I found the grips easy to carry around the gym and so it wasn't like they were a hindrance to have with me. They are a simple construction of a hardened rubber which are split longitudinally. You can either slip them onto a bar when the weights are off, or prise them open and let them clamp onto the bar. They seem to pick up dirt very quickly and unfortunately it isn't a simple wipe clean surface, but they will clean up well if put into some warm soapy water.

I have used these for various exercises now and for various different body part workouts to get a good feel for them. I have found in my use of them that certain exercises benefit from the grips and others not so much. For example I found great benefit when using the flat chest machine but not much benefit when I used dumbbells to work my chest. I felt more of a workout using the grips when I was performing pulling tasks rather than the pushing, the lat pull down machine my favourite and most beneficial from the grips.

My gym contains two types of dumbbells, one with a thinner grip and one with a thicker grip. The grips worked well around the thinner style of dumbbell which was great, however they didn't quite fully close on the thicker grip style of dumbbell as the inner circumference is smaller than the bar. If you have large hands then the increase girth causes you to have to work harder on your grip and thus a better exercise, but if you have smaller hands then the grip is uncomfortable and ineffective and so you may have to reduce the weight you are lifting.

Do they work? I think so, I can certainly feel a beneficial difference in the work out on some exercises and I feel that my grip is improving. If you are happy enough with the results you are getting in the gym, then I wouldn't rush out to get these. If you are looking to increase workout, energy used, muscle growth and grip then they are worth giving them a try.
