Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: For a beginner and for average height individuals
Name: David A.
Review:
Bought on prime, arrived three days later (from Germany) so reasonable.
Also got a reduced Black Friday deal!
I‚Äôm 70, so need to start a small fitness regime. I bought this to save me going out in bad weather, so the rather light tension at 8 (top end) is not a big deal. What may become a problem for me is the saddle height. I‚Äôm 6 foot tall and about 33 or 34 inch inside leg. So once I got this up and running (after about an hour) - it became apparent that the highest extended point was still a tad too low for me, but having said that, I will persevere as I did not feel uncomfortable after my first short workout.
The good points:- Silent running (exceptionally so) very sturdy; wide comfortable saddle; electronics work; free iPad holder, free remote control holder, free mat.
The bad points:- Resistance 1-8 top end may not tax some fitter folk; saddle height probably more suited to 30/31 inside leg, but I‚Äôm no expert.
Generally I‚Äôm pleased with it, only time will tell.
Top tip: You need to use a spanner for the pedals, this was not immediately obvious, AND also you need to counter screw the left one.
Hope this helps.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Adele
Review: I don‚Äôt usually leave product reviews but I needed to leave one for this brand because they‚Äôve really impressed me. My bike arrived nearly a week early which was perfect as I‚Äôm quarantined and have nothing else to do but workout haha. The bike itself was incredibly easy to put together. The screws and bolts are already pre-attached to some of the components, which is amazing because you don‚Äôt have to spend time hunting for which screw goes where and also, stops you from losing any whilst assembling (done that before many a time). The bike is easy to store and comes with its own protective floor mat too. Good resistance levels as well. Overall, great value for money. Would highly recommend

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Karen hiett
Review: Please let me say thankyou for the prompt delivery. Opened it all out ,laid pieces on floor, thought nicely made, smart looking excersise bike. Then I checked list of components and realised all nuts and bolts were missing.  Normally in separate bag like all other flat pack items. After getting annoyed with yet another badly sent out product I had a cup of tea, took a long breath and messaged seller.  Then I thought maybe it's me????All the nuts and bolts are actually in place so now very happy. PLEASE SELLER MAKE IT CLEAR THAT YOU ARE PROBABLY ONLY ONE OF A FEW SUPPLIERS THAT HAVE ACTUALLY DONE THIS FOR THE CUSTOMER.Excellent.(now I've worked it out.).

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: A good basic, affordable indoor bike
Name: Expat
Review:
Getting a folding indoor bike is a compromise. It's much more convenient and affordable, and takes up less space. But it isn't an ideal bike for spinning. This one is no exception.
I was pleasantly surprised by the speed of delivery - it arrived well ahead of the estimated date.
It was super easy to assemble, all very intuitive. The castor wheels make it easy to move around, and it folds very easily, with a small footprint. It could fit in an understair cupboard or under a bed if you want to tidy it away. Also great that it comes with a mat to prevent damage to floors and carpets.
It's relatively sturdy with a basic display that tells you speed, pulse, calories and time - it would be handy if it also told you RPM.
I'm 5'5" and the height feels ok for me but if you are tall, you'd probably struggle.
I bought it to do some Apple Fitness+ cycling classes and for that, it's just about ok at an entry level. However, the highest resistance level isn't particularly high, and you can't stand in the saddle because of the forward position of the pedals. You just end up whacking your legs against the console. I'll probably upgrade eventually to an indoor bike that's better suited to spinning, despite the trade-off of the extra space and expense that requires.
If you're looking for a basic but well-made indoor bike that doesn't take up too much room to keep you moving while you're reading or watching TV, or do some beginner-level cycling classes, it's a good start.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Emma Ramshaw
Review:
I very rarely write reviews - think the typical amazon buyer, who devours reviews before purchase but is lazy about leaving one themselves - that's me. However, I really should leave one for this.

This bike has made a massive difference to the boredom experienced in my tiny flat during winter lockdown. The box was heavy and awkward to lug up the stairs but was made worth it by being almost totally put together already. Pretty much all of the pertinent nuts and bolts were already fitted, so it took me 20 minutes maximum to unbox and start pedalling. Amazing! I've got the full tool kit but didn't need any of it to get this up and running.

I'm a 5'9 female with a 31" inside leg and I need the seat set on maximum height - any taller and I think you might struggle a little. it feels very sturdy and I'm not such a wafer-thin slim gal anymore. But it's comfortable to use and it's very, very easy to sit and bash out 30 minutes or more whilst enjoying a streamed series, as it's completely silent. I live in an apartment where neighbours below complained about me Zumba dancing - you can bet your last quid they'd have been knocking on the door if this had been noisy at 11pm (which is when I usually feel like I'd like a turn on the bike after a whole day of being sedentary). You have NO EXCUSES with this bike - it's absolutely silent, even if you pedal like you've accidentally hit a dual carriageway on a Penny Farthing. I planned to fold it up and put it away when not in use as my flat is quite dinky, but its footprint is so small I've left it out and it's not in the way at all. The supplied mat is handy to protect carpets. You can do a longer session (30 minutes+) but the seat isn't the most comfortable for women (not sure for the men) I'll be honest, or you can do a crazy pedal for 5-10 minutes every advert break on TV, or every hour, and get a good sweat on doing so. Grab handweights or a couple of cans of beans and do some arm and shoulder stretches and and it's not a bad workout. It can get boring, but not as boring as just sitting under a blanket, semi-comatose, and letting Netflix or Prime just pass you by.

Delivery said nearly a month but it arrived several weeks early and completely surprised and delighted me.

The maximum resistance isn't very tough. Even though I'm now really out of shape, I craved a bit more. You know, that grid you want from going uphill. You won't get that with this. You're more likely to sweat if you leave it on max resistance for a lot of your workout and pedal at a moderate level, and then fast pedal for a few minutes without dropping it down, as per interval training. It feels like riding on the flat, even on the hardest setting. If you want more challenge then I'd suggest a more expensive bike - this one is more of a "let's do 5 minutes hard pedal, better than sitting down" kind of purchase. But I do like it - as does my teenager.

As to looks - well, mine is black and orange. It's not the prettiest bit of kit in my white and blue apartment, but it does make me look at it when I'm watching TV and thinking "I really should..."

Will post update on any fitness/weight loss progress.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Hamilton
Review: This is a very compact but reassuringly well built bike, which requires a few of the parts to be assembled (feet, pedals, seat, display). It is very easy and quick to assemble, took me 30 minutes to get it assembled and working. Only used it once so far, but the seat is very comfortable and the bike is very quiet in use and feels very solid and stable. At this price point, this bike totally exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Hilary Andrea Morrison
Review: I ordered this bike on the 7th and arrived today the 10th. Delighted with the quick delivery! The bike arrived well packaged with instructions enclosed. Simple to follow and tools provided also. The bike is easy to fold and does not take up too much room. Still early days but spent first 15 mins today.  Very happy with my purchase and so far delighted.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Alastair Meiklejon
Review: Video Player is loading.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Sturdy and good value for money
Name: Dee
Review: Arrived really promptly which was a surprise the box was damaged so immediately thought there would be damage but it was all ok.Easy to assemble, very sturdy and good exercise bike for the price. Nice and quietStrongly recommend this

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Ewa
Review: Very Happy. Have been using magnetic bike at my gym (level 4) for 60 min. Bought this one to keep up with my home workouts due to covid restrictions. Quite happy with the resistance, for sure it will make me sweat on level 5. Very easy to assemble for one person. Seat is more comfortable than the gym one which I am very pleased about. Monitor is vey basic but it shows everything you need for home workout. overall very happy, super quick delivery,  hopefully will stay stable after day by day use.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Miss S. Adams
Review: First the arrival of this bike was amazingly quick - within three days and coming from Germany. The bike is incredibly sturdy and miraculously easy to put together - believe me, if I can assemble within 30 minutes anyone can.  It does take some getting used in terms of the distance, kilos used, etc. monitor but I think that will be easy to follow. I prefer cycling in the open air but live where the hills are tortuous so I am hoping that using this bike  I will build the stamina I need to enjoy the countryside around me.  I was originally going to get another bike with Bluetooth connectivity but it was four times the cost and this bike serves my needs just as well. A great buy at a great price.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: maty8
Review: EDIT‚Äî-  Since this review in Jan 2021, 10 months later I have had to contact the company as I had a slight problem, I would now recommend the bike on their customer service  alone!  Without going into great detail all my emails were replied to within the same day, the issue was sorted out very easily and in a time frame I found quite quick. I would certainly purchase off this company again.Excellent product, far better quality than expected for the price, my husband thought it had cost around ¬£250, apparently it was very easy to assemble!  The mat is good so no movement, I have mine on carpet so I have put a towel underneath so no marks and I can slide it across the room so no permanent indentations. Good Mode settings, if you hold the MODE down it resets the counters, otherwise it just continues where you last left off. The resistance settings are good, the seat a little hard but I‚Äôve got used to it & at a later stage might buy a softer one.  Having the ability to hold my  iPad/ iPhone is great as I watch tv/ read newspaper and the time just goes so I‚Äôve gone from 1/2hr to an hour without noticing. There‚Äôs a section in the centre that holds a water bottle, very useful!  Highly recommend this product.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: k.howard
Review:
I write this review after six months of use. The construction of this exercise bike is excellent. The steel frame is accurate and welding and other assembly are very neat and well thought-out. It has been made easy to assemble, with even some of the bolts already in the right holes. It was well protected in its box for delivery, which had received a battering, but the parts were not damaged. There is a clear booklet showing how to put it together, including the left-hand thread on the left pedal (tighten anti-clockwise), which is absolutely standard for bikes, and with a good small open-ended spanner and hex bar to help assemble it all. There is a clear warning label at the one point on the frame where an injury might happen - where it stops folding out.
The resistance levels go from 1 to 8 and these do represent levels of effort needed to turn the pedals at the same speed. The range of resistance levels on this machine are fine for an out of condition pensioner, but may not satisfy an athlete. Similarly, the six positions for the saddle height only cater for average heights of people, but should be ok up to about 1.8 metres.
The screen turns on at the first turn of the pedals (two AAA batteries inserted into the box behind the screen) and remains on for about 4 minutes after all use has stopped. It is a nice clear screen with big numbers, and some little symbols around the display, which are not buttons, only pictures.
On the mode setting ‚ÄúSCAN‚Äù the display rotates between modes for a few seconds each: time, speed, distance, calories, odometer, and pulse, then returns to scan/time. If you press the mode button at any time the screen will then stay on that mode, until it turns off or you select a different mode. The distance, odometer and calories add up with the previous use of the bike, unless you press MODE for about three seconds (while switched on) when the readings return to zero, except for odometer, which always adds to the previous total. There is no reading for rpm.
So it looks nice, with lots of numbers changing to keep you interested. I cannot fault the time measurement, which counts up in seconds and minutes (and pauses if you take a few seconds rest). The speed and distance are always going to be a function of someone‚Äôs imagination, but I did expect the ‚Äúcalories‚Äù to reflect the effort made. I haven‚Äôt checked the reading for pulse, which I can measure in other ways if I want accuracy. When I noticed that the calories ‚Äòmeasurement‚Äô increased at exactly the same rate per pedal turn whether I was using resistance 1 or 8 I realised I had been hoaxed into believing it, and keeping a record of my supposed achievements. The reading seems to be linked to the turn of the pedals, but unrelated to the resistance level set. So speed, distance, calories and odometer do not reflect the resistance selected, only the turn of the pedals.
I now have a well-built very quiet exercise bike with a time counter. I suspect that most exercise bikes of this price level have similar ‚Äòreadouts‚Äô, but I will check with Songmics if the screen is just for entertaining people who like looking at numbers changing (they helpfully said it was for ‚Äúdata reference‚Äù).
As to the purpose of the machine, it seems well made otherwise. The bike also has a clip-on holder for a mobile phone, but if this isn‚Äôt needed it will instead take a few Mars bars for a mid-exercise snack. As advertised, there are brackets to support a tablet, but this would cover the numbers read-out (perhaps a good thing).
Yes, if you put the resistance setting high and pedal fast it takes quite an effort, so I must be burning calories (for real), if not necessarily getting fit. It runs almost silently, and the sellers were very quick to reply to my questions. I like the bike and the exercise, but I am disappointed by the child‚Äôs toy ‚Äòmeasurements‚Äô on the screen.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Sunny Gal
Review: Great bike....so pleased.....it's smooth and sturdy, when not in use I told it smaller but still keep it in the same place....it takes 5 seconds you just take out the pin fold it smaller and replace the pin. It has wheels one end so if you need to move it, it's easier.  Nice big country seat. I don't use the display telling me miles etc....I could never quite work it out .... I just time myself....it's got a place to slot a drink and an iPad do you can watch a movie or use you tube to watch a cycling video.I had an issue with one piece, contacted the company and immediately they sent me a replacement part. Excellent

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Wooders
Review: I‚Äôve been using this product now for over 2 months, roughly 5 times a week. It was very easy to put together - which was good as I mislaid the instructions and I had to put the bike together without them. I am amazed how quiet the bike is - my last exercise bike was quiet but this one is even quieter. The tablet holder works very well. Seems sturdy enough, as I haven‚Äôt had a problem with it yet.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Great bike at a great price.
Name: stuart rennie
Review: Bought this for my wife and she loves it.  Delivery was an issue as the date change couple of times and thought I wasn't going to get it before Christmas.  But I was kept well informed of changes to the likely delivery dates and it arrived on the last expected date.  And unexpectedly just recently I received an email from SONGMICS to say that because of the issues with delivery they were offering me a 30% discount.  This was a great gesture and although I declined their offer based on the fact the bike turned up in time for Christmas the refund was paid into my account a few days later.  Thank you SONGMICS and I would certainly recommend them.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Bad quality - broke 4 days after installation
Name: Phil Corr√™a
Review:
The bike was delivered on time and well packed. Unfortunately one of there screws was broken and it didn't one of the pedals. I contacted customer support, they were very quick in responding and very attentive. They offered me a partial refund so I could buy a screw on my local shop, which I did and the problem was solved.
Four days of use later, the whole pedal mechanism seized up which made it impossible to use. Unfortunately, I had to return the bike.

Positive:
- Installation installation is quite straight forward
- Easily foldable and doesn't take too much space
- Great customer support

Negative:
- Bad quality
- Uncomfortable if you are 5.9 or taller
- The maximum resistance is not hard at all

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Sue B
Review: I am very pleased with my purchase. It was easy to assemble and it is comfortable to use - at least for the 20 - 30 minute sessions I usually do. I like to read a book whilst exercising and this sits nicely in front of me within the little holders. I'm afraid I don't really understand how to use the readouts on the screen but I am not using the bike for anything other than to exercise my legs so the figures are not important. However there was no booklet in the box to give instruction on this and I think it would have been helpful. I am nearly 70 years old and intend using this regularly to help keep me fit.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Everything it says in the description
Name: kaz
Review: The Bike was easy to put together all the nuts and bolts where on the bike so it was a case of taking them off and adding the items. It folds up easy and does not take up much space, the bike is heavy but does have wheels to push around. It is not noisy and comes with a mat. Would definitely recommend this bike. The only feed back I would give before adding the pedals fasten the straps first to the size you want as I found it a bit difficult once I attached the pedals to the bike to fasten the straps and they were a bit awkward.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Just about ok for me but not for everyone, do your research.
Name: Jacko
Review: This took a long time to arrive, could be because of high demand from corona. Kept getting up dates on delivery times each one extended. Last update offered me a refund if it didn‚Äôt arrive.However, it got here. The central shaft was dented this made it very difficult in inserting handle bars. I managed to straighten it enough to get the handle bars in but two of the screw holes would not line up. Altogether it took me approximately two hours to assemble, but I‚Äôm no expert. It works, I wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs robust but as I‚Äôm only 9 stone it‚Äôs fit for my purpose. Folds ok and relatively light which is what I wanted as I can move it and store it without too much hassle . If your a keen, fit cyclist and you want to hammer it it‚Äôs not for you. Relatively cheap so you get what you pay.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Heather Bowen
Review: Arrived 2 days after order, brilliant service.  Super easy to assemble (and I can‚Äôt even put an Ikea  shelf together!!)  Didn‚Äôt even read the instructions until I‚Äôd finished and no bolts left over. Impressed that no bloke was required to put this together too.  (Sorry chaps!)I‚Äôm very tall and the bike is great for me as I would think shorter too (easy to move seat up or down) - posture, comfort, ease of use once assembled, all brilliant.Time to put down the cake, plan my regime and off I go.Excellent purchase on all counts. Thank you

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Lenci
Review: I decided I needed an exercise bike but I am very limited for space so a regular one wasn't an option. I looked at various bikes, but this one had pretty good reviews (but not too good to be true!) and was within my budget so I decided to give it a try. I'm glad I did! It was easy to assemble, with the screws already in the right places, plus the bike was sent with all the tools required to assemble it. Folding the bike is pretty straightforward. The bike is still quite bulky when folded (height wise) but it slides neatly into a gap I made for it. The size of the bike is okay for me (I am only 4'9" tall), I was a little worried it would be too high, but I am able to ride it comfortably. The seat can adjust but I only have it on the lowest setting. It doesn't bother me, but the bike does squeak a little which might bother others. It's not a harsh squeak, more of a creaking noise! Overall, it is a very good exercise bike and I would definitely recommend it to others.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Stephanie C
Review: It was relatively easy to put together, and I'm enjoying it, my legs aren't!  However I do have to say it's a tad hard on the bottom, when ones legs are pumping away, so I doubled over a pillow and ribboned it to the seat, and voila, comfort!  It's easy to move and put away.  The plastic mat is stiff so takes time to unfurl its curl.  I've downloaded an app which I use to give me HIT and timed recovers!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: G darmanin
Review: Good product, reasonably easy to assemble despite poor instructions. No user manual. Display unit function flimsy and pulse reading doesn't work, whilst the other apps eg distance, speed and calories work. Real pity the pulse settings doesn't work as this is an important essential part of this unit so for me this exercise bike is useless which is a real pity as otherwise a very good product is ruined. This unit really requires a replacement display unit.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The bike itself wasn‚Äôt too bad, but the display parts weren‚Äôt working correctly. The numbers for speed, distance etc wouldn‚Äôt update unless pedalling backwards! I tried contacting their customer service but they refused to allow me to send it back for a replacement or repairs, instead insisting I fix it myself with parts they‚Äôd send. And to be clear nobody had any idea where the fault was or if the part would even work. It annoys me when I say I don‚Äôt want a part and they reply to say they‚Äôll send me a part ‚Äúto save me hassle‚Äù. The only hassle they‚Äôre saving is their own! Why am I the one who has to replace the part, throw away the broken part, go back and forth constantly with them to make sure it‚Äôs all working when I could just send it in like you would any other defective product? Absolutely absurd behaviour. And they had the gall to offer a refund for just over 1/5th the price to keep it broken, which makes it equivalent of just taking an old bike and fixing it in position. They think that‚Äôs worth over ¬£100? Do not buy. Look elsewhereEdit: after a back and forth I was given a full refund and allowed to keep the bike. While this is definitely appreciated and much more reasonable, it still doesn‚Äôt excuse the faulty product and the strange refusal to take it back. Review mostly stands, keep this edit in mind

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer
Name: AntsG,Sussex
Review: A huge box arrived weighing about 25kg, it took me an hour to assemble, there are two tiny wheels  at the back which help move it around. The nuts and washers are awkward especially under the seat. The instruction booklet is quite clear. I had to work out the various settings on the digital display myself. It comes with a rubber effect mat. My first cycle was for seven kilometers. After three weeks use, I am not convinced of the accuracy of the kilometers cycled. The digital display indicated that I had cycled 85km in one week (two Marathons) without too much effort or muscle pain the next time I used it, after a break of two days. Easy to use, basic machine, that has many design faults. Good price.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: MD
Review: What can you say, so easy to put together following the diagram (but you don't need it), excellent value seems very well made and sturdy I'm 120Kg and it feels perfectly safe. I started off with 6 mins twice a day and increased slowly and after only 4 weeks I can feel and see the difference, very happy, this is the one for starters.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: S. Butler
Review: This Exercise Bike is beautifully designed and made. The display is large and clear. Its functions are controlled with a single button. This can be used to a select single feature to display constantly or to display each of the things it measures (from Time to Pulse Rate) successively. The frame is rigid and strong but not too heavy to fold and stow. The Resistance mechanism (controls pedaling stiffness) works very well and the pedals themselves look as if they will be resistant to wear. Unlike some bikes on the market, the design is free from excessive decoration and redundant parts. This is a high quality device which I am happy to recommend.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Pearson
Review: This bike comes in several pieces. I attempted to fit the head stock on first, it didn't fit as the tolleances were out. As this was the first piece it was easy enough to repack and send back to Amazon.This might just have been my bad luck and every other one is fine.But it is worth knowing that this has lots of different parts made from different materials and methods. So if a casting or a weld is out you will get issues, so don't destroy your packaging until you have it built and tested.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Truguide
Review: So far I can't complain. It works well and folds away nicely. All connections were ok and screen readings were clear.  I couldn't find any way to switch the screen off so I am doing it by uncoupling the lead connector. Is this right or am I not  doing it correctly.I have a heart pacemaker and I seem to get a false reading on the pulse. About double my normal pulse. As long as you are aware its not a problem. I observed the same problem on machines at the gym.Great piece of kit. I am sure I will get a lot of use out of it.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Overall good quality and sturdy bike
Name: CJTM103
Review: The bike was VERY easy to assemble.  It is nice and compact when folded, and turns smoothly and quietly.  The seat is adjustable, and is more comfortable than expected.  It appears to work very well, although we just put it together after Christmas.  I would recommend.  There was a small issue which I raised with the supplier, and which they dealt with efficiently and quickly, so very good customer service.  If I needed another exercise bike I would purchase from them.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Andrew Allam
Review: Opened up tonight. First product box was damaged and poorly packed. Then on opening the product it was scratched and marked and looked poor quality. Then when I started to fit this together on taking the seat out its bag this was damaged and had 2 holes in it, the seat quality was also poor and stapled together. Really upset and dissapointed as expected more for the price of the item.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Randolf
Review:
Nice bike for someone who's looking to start their fitness journey and get into shape. It wont offer much resistance for someone who's been cycling for a while even at the highest gear.

Pro: easy to assemble and easy to fold. Very light and easy to move. Perfect for apartment living

Con: beware, chain get hot after more than 40 min of cycling. I dont know if it was just my unit or fault on my bike but that was my experience.

Still a good buy for the price. I would buy it again

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Icklebit
Review: Put it together in 10 mins. Easy to fold, pretty sturdy and monitor for speed pulse distance calories is clear and easy to use. The action is smooth and it is comfortable to use. You can get a good heart rate going with this bike but didnt feel any pressure on knee joints. There is a rest lip on monitor for a tablet or ipad if you want to watch You Tube or podcasts while using. Good value for money

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Rhodesia
Review: Very impressed with this product. As an 85 year old thought I would not be able to cope but as there are different pressures it can be set from low to high. Would not have been able to assemble myself as product very heavy. But once installed and folded easy to handle. Would highly recommend for those who have been locked away due to virus and in need of getting mobilised again. Very happy I took the plunge and purchased.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: S.BELL
Review: This bike was really easy to put together. It does fold up, but it doesn't stay folded, so would have been great if there was a bungee or something to keep it in the folded position. Comfortable bike with display screen for time, distance, calories burned etc. Doesn't feel flimsy when using it. 8 resistance levels which are easy to adjust. Great bike, just a shame it can't keep itself in a folded position for storage

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Don't buy if you are anywhere near 6ft.
Name: Nigel Minett
Review: Ok. I will give an honest review. I chose this product based on reviews and attractive look of the product. It came nicely packaged and wasn't difficult to assemble. Although it was easier with someone helping. It folds up very easily and is nice and compact. I like the instrument layout that provide all excercise data. My problem with this product is it's made in China. Now bear in mind our Asian friends are not noted for their height. I'm 6ft 1in and this bike is not suitable for anyone near 6ft! I've had the height setting on max and the steel bar that the seat is attached to is buckling the hole (I've only had it a few weeks and at 13st 8lb I don't regard myself as heavy!) So Instead of going through the hassle of sending the whole lot back I decided to go to B&Q and purchase a piece of square steel tubing to fit inside the weak seat frame. Then I drilled a hole lower down (past max) and now it's the right size for me. Obviously don't bother doing all this if your anywhere near 6ft. Buy a different one that fits!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Damaged faulty and cheaply made, returned for refund
Name: Danielle
Review: Terrible no tension control sticker to show what tension your using, metal bent so could not put seat on, odometer faulty, seat has a tear,Arranging returns to refund to buy from another seller, terrible quality songmics

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Veloman
Review: This was bought for regular home exercise.  It is well made and goes together easily.  It is very stable on a firm even floor.The issue I had was that the bike received transit damage which I was not prepared to accept.  Contact with the vendor was excellent,  and this was finally resolved after communications, with the bike being replaced FOC. Could not have been more pleased and would highly recommend the Company.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Easy to assemble - comfortable ride - parts fall asleep
Name: William
Review: I don't know if it is the seat or the angle of seating, but other than the annoyance of constantly having my seating area go numb, the bike is great. It's the first bike I've had where this has been an issue and I don't know if it is in relation to the fold-up nature of the bike and how it rests, but it's the one fault that prevents  a 5-star rating. Great display and readout for tracking your habits.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Loza
Review: I am so happy with my decision to purchase this item and was little perplexed of how to assemble on arrival ( I am a 72 year old lady) but following the instructions I completed the assembly in around 45mi minutes .As I‚Äôve only had it 24 hrs I can only say after one exercise I am very happy with the performance of my 1st trial .

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Kat
Review: I've been using it for a little over 2 weeks and so far I'm pleased with it. It had some very minor manufacturing issues but nothing that couldn't be fixed. The workout you get from it is pretty good, for more experienced cyclists, however, the resistance might be a bit low but to counter that I usually just do longer sets to get the heart rate going. Overall I'd say to go for it if you are looking for a way to increase or incorporate some cardio into your daily routine, it's well worth it.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Rosie73
Review: Got this bike to rehabilitate my knee following ligament damage. For the price I love it and it‚Äôs great for what I need and was easy to assemble. The displays are clear and it has a pulse monitor too. It‚Äôs quite flimsy so wouldn‚Äôt take too much weight and if I was a serious cyclist it wouldn‚Äôt be good enough. For the money and for my purpose it‚Äôs excellent, really happy with it and it‚Äôs a funky colour too!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Mr P Sallows
Review: The handlebars to frame bolts have a very fine thread and bolt into thin metal. The handlebars easily work loose and can rock up and down slightly. The booklet says, if so tighten them. If you do you can easily strip the threads. I did this on one. The metal is not thick enough to accommodate a bolt that needs to be quite tight to stop movement of the handlebars. I solved the problem by drilling and using a couple of pop rivets. Bang goes the warranty but good solid feel to the handlebars.P Sallows

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Make sure all the parts are included in the box!
Name: Mrs H
Review: The bike arrived and my husband started to assemble it. He quickly found that the main bolts that attach the monitor and handle bars to the main frame were missing! He therefore could not complete the assembly. Songmics were quick to respond but it took nearly a month to get the missing parts.  This was very frustrating as the bike could not be used.  However, now we have all the correct parts, the bike is fully assembled and seems fine although it is early days.  It is very quiet.  It is a pity that the seat doesn‚Äôt go any lower as I have it at its lowest. I am 163 cms.  I would prefer if one could adjust the seat lower. On the whole, for the money, it seems good value for money but I just wished, it had arrived with all the parts in the first place.  Message for Songmics, you need to check all the components before shipping to customer.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Rukhsana Mir
Review:
His bike has it all!! Purchased an Espitit Bike X and although it was good, could not increase the resistance so contacted the seller and they happily took back so was very anxious about that happening again with a different bike. Read loads of reviews and decided to buy this so felt it important to write a review for others.
Regarding the tension, a 4 on this was probably equivalent to full on the other and so its resistance is very good.
Plus had so much more bonuses like having a useful place to put my phone plus mat supplied also.
I had only one gripe and that was the pulse that didnt work but the seller sorted this issue for me, no problem.
Defo buy, good sturdy bike.. very happy

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: patricia gracey
Review: It's as good as the gym bikes and is also compact.  Can be folded and put away when not in use.  My only problem is that it becomes uncomfortable the longer you use it.  After raising and lowering the saddle several times, I realised that the saddle is too far back in relation to the pedals.  I keep moving forward until I nearly fall off.  However, for the price it's pretty good and the customer service was excellent.  I mistakenly ordered the wrong colour and the seller went to a lot of trouble to get it changed for me.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: It's OK, it's cheap and cheerful
Name: Mark Gale
Review: Arrived promptly and, like a lot of other reviews, the packaging was damaged and metal parts of the bike were showing and poking through - THE PACKAGING IS NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE TO FULLY PROTECT THE ITEM.  Ours had a few scratches as a result.  Once unpacked it went together fairly easily.  When it comes to using it, the saddle mount and screw/bolt are flimsy and every time it is used the screw /bolt works itself loose.  I do not want to over tighten it as the saddle tube is not that thick and sturdy, so too much tightening will probably damage the tube.  Again, like other users, I agree the tension is not that good.  It's OK for light use and I can't complain too much for the price (around ¬£100).  if you aim to buy an exercise bike for regular/hard use do not buy this machine.  It you want cheap and cheerful for light use, this is OK but it may arrive damaged.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: A good solid machine which will do all I need without spending a fortune.
Name: Freddie
Review: The exercise bike arrived in the timescale prediction ted by Songmics.  It was easy to assemble except that the "handlebars" did not fit the downtime as the computer housing was slightly off centre.  Nancy at Songmics dealt with this for me.  I sent photo's showing the problem and she ordered a replacement part which arrived apparently from Germany within a few days.  The replacement part fitted perfectly. The quality of the bike is good, and although the plans for its construction were basic they were easy to understand and all bolts and washers were in place ready.  A spanner and allan key were provided for the build and I didn't need anything else to build it.I seem to have been unfortunate with the handlebars not fitting, but the problem was dealt with promptly, efficiently and simply, which only delayed use of the machine by a couple of days.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Seija Norris
Review: It arrived well before the dates given. It's sturdy. It's very very quiet. It works.Yes, I know it folds, but I've left it up by my bed, to inspire me. That also works!I worried as some people have had bits missing...mine had one washer missing, but luckily hubby had a spare.I love this bike!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Carlos
Review:
Overall we are very pleased with the new excersise bike.We purchased this particular model because it takes up very little room when not in use and it is not too heavy to move and also having wheels this makes the task easy to stand in the corner of our kitchen.
It is extremely quiet and well made but beware that anyone over 5'9'' would not be suitable as the saddle does not go that high.
Also it would not suit somebody that is already fit because even on the hardest setting i found the resistance too easy but my partner who is using an exercise bike for the first time finds the levels just right.

Overall a great product.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Missing pieces ruin otherwise good product
Name: Oscar G.
Review: The bike arrived a week ago and, during assembly, we realised that we were missing the handlebars and clock part of the product. Having contacted the seller through various channels, we are still yet to receive a response as to whether they could supply us with this part. This bike was brought as a birthday present and was predictably underwhelming when the recipient of the gift realised it was missing a key feature. This is a real shame because the bike itself is really easy and good to operate.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Ms S Suratia
Review: Bought this to get extra excercise indoors during lockdown & the wintery wet weather. The saddle is quite comfortable so don't need an additional padded one. It's sturdy & was pretty simple to assemble. All nuts & bolts in place already, very helpful Thanks to manufacture. A great excercise bike comes with a mat to prevent it slipping. Love the orange colour & handy wheels to help when folding it & putting it away.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Excellent product & delivered quicker than expected
Name: Gill Freeman
Review: This was delivered in 3 days which was much quicker than promised. Easy to put together & comes complete with screw driver / spanner required. Look & feels good quality with good cycling action. Top gear sufficient for me although some more athletic types may need more of a challenge. Overall a very nice exercise bike, good value and just what is needed to keep fit with Covid restrictions. I would recommend this product

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: J
Review:
Awful and cheap
Packaged arrived when stated,

Upon opening the box there were signs that the bike had been previously used.
It is missing nuts and bolts,

MOST IMPORTANTLY
This item has sharpe unfinished edges, with metal shards sticking out it cut my hand when trying assemble it.

Once assemble the bike make an awful knocking noise,
Total and complete waste of money

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Di di
Review: When i my bike arrived i was very disappointed because the display doesn‚Äôt work.I text to seller so many times.They promise to do something.But one month later my display still not working and no one contact with me

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Natalia
Review: Great purchase. So glad I bought this bike. Really easy to assemble and it‚Äôs great that it folds away. It‚Äôs very sturdy and quite heavy. The display isn‚Äôt the greatest but it shows distance and calories burnt as well as pulse and time which is fine by me.I‚Äôd recommend this bike. Great price as well.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Rebecca
Review: I'm honestly so impressed with this bike! My partner and I decided to get one to do more exercise day to day but we didn't want to get anything super expensive. Well I was worried a bike at this price point (and one which folds away etc) would be flimsy and not last very long...I was so wrong! We've had this a month now and have used it virtually every day and the bike is so sturdy, and its virtually silent! Can happily use it in the living room while watching TV with my partner and its absolutely no disturbance. It's been exactly what we were looking for. Also, it arrived much quicker than the tracking suggested! So pleased.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The monitor doesn‚Äôt work, so it‚Äôs pretty much useless.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Stable ,excellent for all points of view
Name: Gio52
Review: I use the bicycle twice a day for about an hour, it is very stable ,the seat is comfortable enough, it can be moved about after folding easily due to the anterior wheels. Yes remember when assembling it that the wheels must be positioned anteriorly .Instructions are very clear and it takes less than an hour to put together even for somebody of a certain age. The price is excellent and if you are serious about actually using it it is a great deal.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: KC
Review: The bike arrived very quickly, is more sturdy than I was expecting, it easy to store and move around, I am very happy with this purchase

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Lasted 4 weeks using it regularly. Pure crap.
Name: Jonathan Robson
Review: Video Player is loading.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Noisy after a few weeks use
Name: Claire B.
Review: Great for the first 4 weeks now squeaks and sounds like a train, makes an awful noise, requested a return

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Very well made and hopefully will last a long time. The seat is comfortable and the display panel has nice size graphics that are very useful for us senior citizens. The peddle resistance is for me ok and means I can exercise for longer within my capabilities.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Faulty bike, but excellent customer service from Songmics to resolve the issue.
Name: RJ
Review: Although the bike itself was a disappointment due to a fault in the mechanism that couldn't be resolved with a replacement part. Songmics customer service were excellent, they were very quick to get back to me with my returns options and made all the arrangements for a hassle free collection of the faulty bike.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Susanna Kirby
Review: I'm looking for an exercise bike that was lightweight easy to use and collapsible.What attracted me to this was the video of the lady showing you how to use it. Yesterday I received it and it took me about an hour to put it together and I am a total novice.It's brilliant economical and a total pleasure to use...

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Usha
Review:
Very pleased with my purchase which was delivered before the expected time frame. Lightweight and folds away easily. Has good levels of resistance for working out at home and I chose this bike because it had a wide seat, which is very comfortable.

Only small nag is that the electronic display does not work very well in that you cannot she all the numbers without applying significant pressure to unit itself.

It's simply not worth dissembling, repacking and returning it to Europe.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: This is my second folding exercise bike and the resistance-compared to other bikes-was very weak; even on the highest of the 8 settings, it was way too much of an easy ride. I returned it and got a different one that is much more challenging.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: CHRIS J.
Review: This was a gift for my wife after she dropped several hints. I did a lot of online research before deciding to go with this product. It received several positive reviews and appeared to meet my requirements. Not disappointed, ease of assembly, operation, quality and functionality all meet or exceed expectations. Very compact when folded, large, easy to read screen, enough resistance adjustment for our needs too. Seat adjustment/comfort is excellent and it‚Äôs very stable when in use. Delivery was a wee bit lengthy, however, I was fully aware of the delivery lead time when I placed the order. Highly recommended product.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Anne Allen
Review:
Very sturdy and it was reasonably straight forward to put together
Extremely well packed , I couldn‚Äôt find some bits but were in bottom of box along with instructions
Excellent value for the price .
I live at the sea and I use a traditional bike but in winter it is very windy
So I got this for windy winter days !
I notice the pedals are much more forward compared to normal bike , but it will keep me fit days I can‚Äôt cycle

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Jayne
Review: The bike arrived really quickly which was great as I was really looking forward to using it! Easy enough to assemble, the only bit I struggled with was the seat, but it‚Äôs on and all good. It‚Äôs really quiet when you use it snd the mat is an added bonus! All in all a great buy, good value for the money!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Simple basic functional Bike. Comuter function faulty.
Name: Rotate100
Review: Very easy to install. Good for the money as a basic excersice bike. The "Computer" function is crap. Does not re-set and provides random data even when battery removed/re-inserted. Fortunately this aspect is of no real need for me. Hence only 4 Stars.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: üåü Laura üåü
Review: Excellent Exercise Bike. I wasn't sure which to buy when looking for one, came across this one and it's Great. Folds away really compact and is very quiet, haven't a single complaint and have had this 3 months now, would recommend.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Title of Review: Seat very hard, but great at home work out!
Name: Kirsten Pearson
Review: Very easy to put together! I gave it four stars because the seat is hard as a rock, making extended work outs a bit uncomfortable. The resistance isn‚Äôt exactly as high as I would‚Äôve liked either, but it‚Äôs still a great at home bike!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Carolyn
Review:
I brought this bike as a gift.

It arrived quickly and only took 1/2 hour to assemble.

My partner and I have both used it and it is very accurate with the readings on the display.

Great to use especially enjoy the privacy in your own home.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Jason
Review: The bike was easy to assemble and was working fair enough. Resistance could be higher but fine for the price.Only issue is that after about an hour of peddling, the foot pedal comes off. Quite dangerous when you‚Äôre in full swing of a workout. Wouldn‚Äôt purchase this again for that reason.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Royston and Linda Walters
Review: I was so lucky, the day before I bought this machine the price had been reduced, I'd have been glad to pay the original price! I've only had the machine for a week but I'm really pleased with it, it's fantastic value, of exceptional quality with great features and would highly recommend buying it, with the caveat of course that my endorsement comes after only a short time of using. So far, first class!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: S
Review: a good bike for what you need it for. i did however find some dents in the metal upon delivery but this hasn't impacted the use of it. the screen could be a bit more user-friendly, but if you're not bothered about that then this bike is great.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Great Cheap Bike, I seen a review about it being noisy and yes it was on initial set up! Fix is to losen screws on main box (plastic box) and adjusted it cause the noise is the plastic catching on the spinning mechanism inside once you losen it all noise gone no rubbing noise anymore takes 2 minutes to fix.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Charlie
Review: Firstly, the delivery was brilliant, next day delivery without being part of the prime deal. The bike was easy to assemble and once assembled is very robust and secure. It is quite heavy but having the wheels on the frame makes it easy to move. As a novice I found it more than adequate for exercising and the ability to change the tension from 1 - 8 without the need to stop and reset makes for a smooth process. Having used it for a number of weeks I haven‚Äôt found any issues and there is no noise from it when exercising, the addition of the mat is good if using it on a laminated floor.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: becci
Review: So happy with this bike. I found it easy to assemble and set up. Folds up well and looks compact when up - my last bike was quite noticeable in the room but this one doesn't stand out. Also very sturdy when sat on and pedalling. Great price and highly recommend

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Laura kite
Review: Overall good value for money, feels quite cheap but you get what you pay for. Comfy to ride and easy to fold and store away. The only thing I will warn is that if you are buying to track your calorie burning this bike is not accurate, comparing to a smart watch warn at the same time the calories shown on the bike was about half of that shown on a smart watch. If you can afford to, I would spend a bit more money on one.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: J. M. Dean
Review: It was a bit cheap looking for the price... But dead easy to assemble and takes up little space and is super quiet.... So far, so good...

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Annette Milbourn
Review: Looked easy to assemble, there was a dent on the top and I had to use and bash the monitor part in made it very difficult and almost gave up! The left peddle was very difficult to as it was missing a groove! Just be weary you could be in for using all your muscle and might on this bike before you even begin a work out!

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Aroo
Review: Absolutely fantastic exercise bike, first ever purchase of an exercise bike and couldn‚Äôt be more happy, easy to assemble and easy to fold away after working out, definitely recommend this purchase

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: LM
Review: I've had this for over a month now. It just works. Easy enough to assemble, although the pedals are a bit fiddly. Very robust. Quite impressed with the quality. Was worried that it might be a bit flimsy as it is a fold away bike but it looks and feels very sturdy.

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight
Name: Jill Blood
Review: Really good bike , the only negative thing was it came without instructions. That said I messaged the company and they responded quickly with a link so I could easily down load the instructions, so all good .

Product: SONGMICS Exercise Bike, Fitness Bicycle, Foldable Indoor Trainer, 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels, with Floor Mat, Pulse Sensor, Phone Holder, 100 kg Max. Weight

Name: D H
Review:
Arrived quickly and was easy to put together. One bolt had a stripped head which made me think it may have been built before but I was willing to sort this myself with a new bolt.

It felt uncomfortable to ride, just a weird position nothing like our old bike. I quickly noticed that the LCD did not move from 0.00 on any of the settings bar pulse. It just flashed 'scan' and displayed 'STOP' .I Checked everything over and it was all connected correctly and there is no help what so ever in the instructions so I gave up.

I tried to contact them through their website but when trying to add a photo it kept taking me back to the beginning so I would lose everything I wrote.

I gave up in the end and arranged to return it. I will look elsewhere.

Title of Review: Great bike wish I'd got it sooner!
Name: Jet
Review: Ordered and arrived within a week of ordering. Very easy to assemble and includes instructions and tools. The instruction book also includes cooling down exercises which is a good bonus! The mat is a good addition too, to protect your flooring. The bike is very quiet when in use and sturdy. I like the fact it has the time, speed, km's etc so you can work to a goal and it gives you more of an incentive. You can clear all this down once you have finished but the good thing about it is the odometer doesn't clear, so you can see how much distance you have done from day 1 of using it. Brilliant!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Snappysnares
Review: I'm delighted with this little set of weights.  Now mid 70's I'm noticing muscle loss and strength so decided to buythese to get some exercise at home as  I don't like going to a gym etc.  These are ideal, nice grip, no rattling and come in a small cardboard box, so you can store the weights not being used in a suitable place,  a strong draw or cupboard for instance.  Apart from being more than adequate weight wise (for me) and therefore not too bulky, I was pleased to see that it comes with a short joining bar as well.  Quality seems good, the weights are painted with a grey/black finish.  Not sure whether they are chip proof or not but time will tell, they seem ok.  Indicated weights are about rightas measured on our digital kitchen scales with most being slightly over by just a few grams.  For a non-bodybuildingperson like me they are just the job, 5 stars.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I am someone that has trained for over 33 years and who goes to the gym regularly, so obviously I am used to good quality kit. As the lockdown does not seem to end anytime soon, I decided to add to my existing weights set with these. I have to say, I was truly impressed with the quality. They come all neatly packed inside a compact box with the additional bar that extends the two dumbells to make a barbell suitable for curls and light weight bench press etc. Just overall, very good kit. The collars come on and off really smoothly and it is actually a real pleasure to train with these dumbells! Great job suppliers! Nice to see someone has gone to the trouble of sourcing a solid product and getting it to market. Not cheap, but well worth the money in my honest opinion!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Danny
Review: Video Player is loading.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Review: Very pleased.
