Name: Andrea Southan
Review: Great quality product. Very classic looking weight discs, both barbell and dumbbells have a nice textured grip area. My parcel arrived with a pair of collars missing, but seller responded within minutes and sent replacement ( with an extra bar included !) which arrived the next morning! Highly recommended ... and would buy from seller again.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Not cured property as shown on pic
Name: Eneo
Review: The weights are ok but in one of the weight plates Hole is not cut properly and it doesn‚Äôt fit and is not fair that I payed ¬£50 and I didn‚Äôt get the right weights . I will provide a photo

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Kris Lawton
Review: Bought these in February 2019, decent enough for what they were. They function well enough as dumbbells for my needs, can do plenty enough combinations to get a precise desired weight. Grip is good due to the knurling.I bought them when they were ¬£44.97, a solid price. Now they're ¬£140, that's insane. I would not pay that price for them unless desperate considering how bares-bones they are. Obviously the price is higher because demand is very high at this point in time, but a markup of almost ¬£100 on a ¬£40 product is very poor.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I bought this product to increase the scope of my rehab exercises for a partially torn tendon in my arm, I am not a serious weight lifter. I chose the product as it seemed to offer a good combination of the weights I needed with the added flexibility of the extension bar for future use. The delivery arrived on time and in the package was in good condition. The box is surprisingly small and heavy-the postman was sweating trying to hold it up!  The weights and bars are compactly packed inside the box and clearly thought has gone into the production of the product. The weights, bars, and locks are all very solid and well made. The extension bar attaches easily to the two smaller bars and the spinlocks lock tight to the weights with a rubber gasket. I have used it for a couple of days now and am very impressed with the quality of product.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Francis Clancy
Review: These dumbbells are amazing and are a lifesaver in so many ways, as stated they are adjustable so you can decide if you as the user wanted more or less weight during your workout, you can also decide if you want a dumbbell or barbell workout so you get a lot of use out of this product.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: AM
Review: I had been deliberating over getting some DBs because I have a gym membership and thougt it pointless. But then the days of going to the gym were getting fewer and far between yet I still wanted to weight train. So, I got these and am so glad I did. They don‚Äôt clang around when doing bicep curls and they are solid! They also tuck away nicely on the bottom shelf. Love the extension bar for hip thrusts. I don't have a need for 50kg or 100kg type of weights so these are perfect. Plus, if I were to ever lift that level, I‚Äôd get myself a proper trainer. In the meantime,  I‚Äôll be giving up the membership when it expires and enjoy these workhorses.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Good. The independent bars have a nice grip
Name: Anonymous
Review: Good. The independent bars have a nice grip. The connecting element is useful, it makes possible to use for a couple of exercises more. Watch out, it does not become a real bar, it will be too short. I am happy with the product though.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review:
Great product and well worth the old price of ¬£45.

¬£134 is nearly 3 times the price!!!

PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness W
Return window closed on 24 Aug 2018
¬£44.97

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: A good addition to my art collection
Name: Tucker Jenkins
Review: I bought these for an art piece that I am working on and I have fashioned a beautiful collage style installation which makes a profound statement on notions of masculinity and butchness. The dumb bells are placed next to a used prophylactic and a life size picture of Jason Stateham, whom I have dressed in pinks and frills. Some viewers seem to find the piece amusing but for me the message is one of sexualised tragedy. I thank you.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Beeben
Review: Arrived promptly and well packaged. I bought these over similar sets dude to the rubber grommets on the securing nuts, this certainly goes a long way to help retaining the weights without constant tightening. Also like the conversion bar which allows you to use as a single barbell. Not much to fault here.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: katkrr
Review: No idea how it is supposed to add up to 34kg. The weights themselves are 17kg total and there is no way that the bar parts are 17 too, unless I'm doing the maths wrong. The fastenings don't stay tight for long but that's a minor inconvenience. If you want all the weights on in barbell mode, they still only fit set up like dumbbells (on either side of the dumbbell bars and then the connector in the middle) so the inside weights get in the way of front and back squats. So this set is very little use for someone who can squat higher than that (which anyone who regularly picks up their kids likely can). That said it's handy for beginners and certainly for rehab exercises and practicing form. My kids are taking an interest too, and it's good if you're low on space as cast iron is compact and the bar is short. You get what you pay for (assuming you didn't pay the near ¬£300 the price went up to during the first lockdown - please just go for a certificate Olympic set up in that case) and it's really not a bad set, you just need to make sure you know what you need and what you are buying.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Damian
Review: Very good for beginners I bought this as gyms are shut for the time being and need to get some muscle before the summer and its really great everything fits on properly no damage when delivered its the same as on the photos I would really recommend this item to everyone looking to do weight training , comfortable solid stuff. Worth the money.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: A. Page
Review:
I‚Äôll start by saying it was not my first choice. My choices were limited due to everyone thinking the same an ordering well before I did.
It‚Äôs a neat set, when dismantled doesn‚Äôt take up much space, keep the box for the other plates not in use.
It‚Äôs every thing I need but wish the attachable bar could be utilise on its own. This would support a quick change from bent over row to dead lifts as you‚Äôd want more weight for a dead lift.
The utilisation of the bar would support a quick change over when doing a class.
I use lifting gloves so have no issue with the feel of the bar.
You have plenty of plates in combination to chose from. The securing nut is easy to operate but as I‚Äôve said if you need a quick change over it‚Äôs not ideal.

Good value for money
And I would recommend to a friend
No issues with delivery
I‚Äôm made up with it as I‚Äôve never had weights or any fitness equipment at home before.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Jamie
Review:
Bought this set back in 2019, it worked really well as 2 dumbbells.

However, as a long bar its difficult to get a good lifting grip on it due to where you have to put your hands to lift (somewhere in the middle) without buying special bulky grips from a different provider on Amazon.

Overall decent right? well... the 2 bars actually rusted after a year even though they were kept in a well ventilated environment (my bedroom) and used consistently. The rust was straight in the middle. Where your hands go. Everyone I've spoken to who trains regularly all said the same thing. Cheap metal was used or they never did any precautions.

Conclusion: Good for a while, but hand grips on both bars rusted despite good ventilation. Also overpriced for the weights you get. I paid ¬£50 at the time. Now suddenly its 70+ from allegedly 129? buy from someone else. YORK are a solid brand for example.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Novicebuild
Review: I like the curve on the handles, makes for a better grip, they look fantastic. working out with 8.25K slightley over 8k on my old vinyl, but seems tougher going maybe my old set not as accurate as stated weight. Sitting on the floor they look so small. Its only when you try and pick them up that you realise how heavy they are  compared to how small they look.  Finish is really good so pleased I took the pluge and bought them.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Great, but the set contains 17kg worth of weights
Review: Great starter weight set, at a great price. I'm very new to weight training and so this set was a comfortable price and had a good amount of weight to work on my form with. I would say though that the 20kg of the title is a bit misleading, as this includes the weight of the bar. The weights in the set add up to 17kg (four 2.5kg, four 1.25kg, four 0.5kg). Now that I have realised its time to slightly increase the weights I'm using for certain exercises it's a wee bit frustrating to note that if the set had 20kg worth of weights I'd be fine for a good few months yet but as proiron sell more weights I can just invest in more I suppose. All in all I'd recommend this set for beginners like myself.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: H. C. Phillips
Review: If you have used weights in a gym, you will find these weights perfectly familiar. The advantage is that you can vary the amount of weight on each short bar and even use the connecting tube in either of two ways to make them into one barbell. After a few weeks of lockdown, I intend to start with them at about 6kg each and slowly build up through the summer. Only really strong people who want much heavier weights will find them insufficient. They arrive in a small very solid box which is difficult to carry, both for the courier and then yourself, so you need to exercise caution.If you want to do exercises that require you to swing the weights repeatedly in a lengthwise direction or to twist them while swinging them, then you would probably be better off with fixed dumbbells rather than variable ones like these because with these the ring weights are held in place with a large nut that would work loose with those movements. These are suitable for traditional weight-lifting movements, but you can still find plenty of variety of those movements available. For me they are ideal, but lighter fixed weights would allow those HIIT kinds of exercises more easily.With gyms closed down, and then the issue of whether air-conditioning is safe when they open up, I think these are life-savers. My previous set lasted decades, but I kept them in the garage and they eventually rusted away. I expect these to outlive me by a long time.Also, they were delivered very promptly, ahead of the expected delivery date, by a very strong man who warned me from his van about how heavy the box was - very sensible. I am very glad to have them.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: They do what they're supposed to
Name: Annon
Review: Have had many dumbbells etc previously, and these are just as good as my Weider cast iron ones, if not as good looking.Unfortunately weights have become insanely expensive since I last bought them. Lesson: Don't chuck out old weights. You never know when you will get back into it again. I'm 45 and wish I'd kept my old ones since you can't get that style or colour anymore. However, these have a nice feature of turning into a barbell. I didn't think I would bother with that, as it's not why I get them, but it does work, and is just the right width. Trouble is, 20kg is a little light for a barbell so I need to invest in another 10kg I think.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Hansi
Review:
A good starter set, although the weights aren‚Äôt that heavy.

The look and feel is great; oily black finish on the weights, chunky locking nut and textured bars for additional grip.

Problems are that the locking nut easily works loose during exercise and as the bars are obviously designed for more weights to be added when changing the weights there‚Äôs a lot of unscrewing of the nut.

Metal grips are good, providing good stability in use but beware if wearing rings (wedding bands especially) as the grip can scratch softer metals in repetitive use if gloves are not worn.

Only having up to 20kg when using the full bar is a little limiting, but as a starter set I guess this is okay.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Terrible set and missing parts and dangerous
Name: Zahra
Review: Terrible item. I should have listened to the reviews. The item was send to me looking used.It was missing 2x 356mm handle fumbles bars and the screw things the hold the weight. Am not a gym expert but when I looked at the image it should have it it in box. The weight were sharp and small Prince when in my gunfire when I was tweaking out box to check content of the box  and was painful and small and took me so long to remove from fingers. Very very unsafe and now I know why they only company have this item in stock as the real version and better quality that is cheaper is much better than this. Avoid please as you will suffer the 2 weeks of return and refund,

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Good product but dangerous metal shards
Name: Daniel
Review: The product itself is very good. However, health and safety seems to have been overlooked. The product was covered in extremely sharp tiny metal shards. Now, I am no health and safety expert, but they should not be on the finished product! I had a bunch of these micro-shards lodged into my skin after a workout session. Imagine if I breathed them in or got them in my eye! This is a very real possibility considering they are so small and light and the weights will be above my head whilst doing some exercises. I strongly urge the manufacturer clean up their operation immediately.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Sean.
Review: DO NOT BUY! So I bought this product and I had items missing etc the 4 dumbbell weights, the bars and the extension bar! I contacted the seller to get the missing items and they were useless. So I had to go through amazon to get a refund which I have to post myself and pay the return cost which you can claim back but to return this item cost alot because of the weight of the package. I would not even bother buying this because if there is something missing from the package then it's not worth the hassle sending it back!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Ali
Review:
Great set of weights, whether you're a beginner or more advanced. Love that the dumbells can also become a barbell by attaching the bar (which is easy to screw in), which also means that a lot of space can be saved. The weights are perfect as you can add or remove them as necessary.

When my set arrived, everything was fine besides one of the rubber rings missing on the spinlock collar. I got in touch with the seller and they promptly sent out a replacement, along with the tracking number for that shipment. Currently waiting on it to arrive, but am confident that it will arrive within the time stated.

Seller was very helpful and the item was packaged well. Highly recommend for anyone looking to start or continue to incorporate weights into their workout. 5 stars!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: B B
Review: Just received this to find the set is missing 1x 2.5KG weight plate. Only 3x 2.5kg not the 4x as described in the description making the dumbbells unusable as they are not equal weight. Extremely overpriced considering it‚Äôs not even a full set

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Great set of weights for any serious beginner.
Name: ChaCha-K
Review:
Needed to do something about the belly and 'love-handles' that appeared over the past 2 years of lockdown! Was thinking of joining a local gym but... you know how that goes. So, decided to invest in these and build up towards my home gym.

They were delivered in sturdy cardboard box which can be used to store them when not in use. But, for me, these will always be out on the floor. Otherwise, out of site, out of mind!

I've had concrete-filled, plastic ones before but this time wanted cast iron ones which hopefully won't go rusty over time. The bars are chrome plated whilst the weights are finished in a hammered effect, dark-grey paint. Looks professionally finished and of high quality. Other reviewers commented that the screw-locks loosen during use, but I haven't had that problem.

Really like the extension tube which converts the two dumbbells into one barbell. Not sure if I would trust loading the full 20kg with the extension bar, though. As well as bent-over-rows, bench presses and fore-arm curls it's possible to place the bar-bell on the floor, slip your toes under it and knock out a few sit-ups.

The different weights are ideal for a beginner. Even the hand-bars alone, without any discs, are a good way to start, adding weights as you progress. I've used these daily for the past week and was ready to buy another set. There's always a 'however'. However, the price went up by ¬£10 right after I got my first set. So, just waiting for the price to drop, or until I find another seller with a similar product and better offer.

I will be buying another set, a folding bench, and a Straight / EZ Curl bar-bell, all available from the same manufacturer.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Sam
Review: I've owned these for a few months now and to say they loosen is the understatement of the year. I tightened them prior to doing thirty shoulder pressed yesterday and the lock loosened enough to fall off. If that had been a weight falling into my face it could have done me some serious harm. Apparently I'm not the only one who has noticed this issue but I wish I had read this prior. Your health is worth more than ¬£150. In my opinion you should not use these and I will be looking for a refund due to safety concerns.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: A quality product at a good price
Name: c98d
Review: I wanted something to enable me to exercise at home, as I don‚Äôt fancy the gym any more these days because of Covid.I‚Äôm very pleased. Everything fits together nicely. Even using just half the weights seems reasonably heavy to me, so I doubt I will need to buy extra weights any time soon. Plenty of room to fit more on the bars if I ever want  to though. The curved grips are comfortable and effective as I had expected.The set even comes with a nice instruction leaflet showing 20 exercises and which muscles each is for, just like on the machines in the gym. Written in good English too. Just the job.Having read some of the reviews I was worried about receiving a set with pieces missing.  I need not have been. That‚Äôs some of the best packaging I‚Äôve ever seen in a parcel.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Cameron Mcmahon
Review: Wanted to do some small workouts at home. I thought buying these for the price that they would be cheap and rubbish, but i am happy to say that i was extremely wrong! An awesome set of weights, the connector bar turns your dumbells into a bar bell and overall i am extremely happy with the quality and the feel!Would recommend to anyone looking for a basic weight set!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Dcode
Review: Excellent! Really impressed with these, very well made and I will be purchasing additional discs in the future from the same company when I need them. Great if you are just starting out, you don't need to go mad with kit, just look up some dumbbell exercises on Google and work a set of muscles for 30 mins 3 times a week until you build up strength. Do not overtrain at first, let your muscles repair themselves.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Great Weights Set BUT Don't Pay Over The Odds
Name: Mrs. J. Buchanan
Review: I bought these in May 2020 when they were ¬£66.99. I notice they are now ¬£199! I love these weights, and they are very versatile. I have used both as individual dumbbells and as a barbell and have found no problems with the set at all. The plates work lose if you bang the dumbbell on the floor, but I would expect this. I just make sure they are tight before each set. The barbell is not that long, so may not be suitable for serious weight lifters. As I am not a serious weight lifter, I am fine with this.The only downside (other than current price), is that the courier (Royal Mail) refused to deliver the item as it was deemed too heavy. I had to beg the postie to bring it, which he did. I would have expected the seller to use a courier willing to deliver to my door. I would buy again, but not at current prices.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: victoria
Review: Got my boyfriend as a Xmas present. Ending up opening just before the day coz he couldn‚Äôt wait to see and he loves it. Started working out straight away.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: James
Review: This product seemed a little expensive but had great reviews so I decided to give it a try. Upon inspection the central bar which turns the set into a barbell does not screw onto the dumbbells and it appears that the internal thread has not been formed properly. This is very disappointing as it leaves me with an overpriced set of dumbbells.Other than this, the product seems reasonable. The O-rings aren't a great fit so get pinched over the handles but the spinlock ends don't come loose very often and the quality appears OK.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: AlphaDreams
Review: I'm very happy with this dumbbell set... Well worth the money, solid build and very sturdy. Perfect to get back into training if your a older fellow like me or you're new.  10KG on each arm is a decent weight  (you can go lower) and 20KG combined barbell is a nice light weight to get you started, Then you can buy 4 extra plates if you want to progress.. which i will be doing.Highly recommend, if there is any problem with it i will be back to edit my review.. If you see nothing else from me.. They're good.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Faulty Extension Bar and Metal Chipping Off
Name: maverick
Review: If you don't go into details, it seems like an adequate set of dumbbells. However, details are annoying enough to make you consider other brands. If you're considering to buy this product only because of the extension bar and turn it into a barbell, it's a hit or miss I must say. My extension bar had faulty screwing on one side so it didn't fit properly to the dumbbell, making it dangerous in terms of health and safety. When I tried to fit the extension bar to dumbells, I also realised metal started chipping off and falling to the ground. It is not a bad product if you'll never use the extension bar and make it a barbell, but even in this case there are better products out there with no extension bar. If you really want the extension bar, you can either try your luck again and accept small metal pieces chipping off or look for other brands.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Stephen Finch
Review: Bought this just before lock down for about ¬£60 for the set. Brilliant weights, ended up buying some additional plates that also fit the bar, sold by the same company.Great for beginners and intermediate fitness fanatics, especially if you have no other equipment you can easily train all muscles in the body with the weight set although might be slightly too light as you train more, but the standard 1-inch bar allows you to add more weight.Only "gripe" would be the middle attachment is hollow so you can't load it up beyond 30kg without risk of it bending under the weight so having a solid central bar would be the only improvement but other than that great.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Jamie A.
Review: Absolutely Excellent value for money. The fact that you can get it at this price and buy extra plates to add down the line really makes this a must for beginners and Gym-from-homers üòÅ.One thing I suggest is to have a bucket filled with soapy water and sponge ready for when they are due to arrive as the dumbbell bars smell very bad. After cleaning each bar and twist cog (whatever it is) for about 10 mins they were fine. No need to clean the cast iron plates at all, but it may vary.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Good value for money as a starter kit
Name: Jackie
Review: I choose this item having read reviews of several other products and  decided that this had the best overall rating and lowest number of bad ratings in its price range. I was slightly worried having read about poor packaging and loose tightening rings but I am happy to say that I had had no problems and was very happy with the product.The only possible downside is that people with large hands might find the  space between the weights on each dumbbells a little too small.However overall I would highly recommend  this product as a good value for money starter set

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: UK Buyer
Review:
Building my own home gym having spent the last 10 years training. These are regular spin lock dumbells. The weights are not too big/wide and combine with an existing spin lock set I have quite easily. Build quality is good. Holes in plates are standard spin lock size so would not fit an Olympic bar.

I was surprised about the bar extension. Being honest I thought it would be a bit of a gimmick but it actually works really well. It is suitable for doing many exercises - so far shoulder press, tricep skull crushers narrow grip press etc. It was worked fine for all of them. Nothing heavier that a 20 kg load on each end so far but it feels study enough to take more.

Would recommend.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Montgomery Flange
Review: Was looking for a set to get back into all things fitness and wasn‚Äôt sure wether to go vinyl or cast iron- best decision was to go for these as I‚Äôve read a lot if nightmare stories of vinyl ones cracking and the centre bar to make a barbell was plastic, this is all metal and feels sturdy and safe! Which is mos important if you are throwing these about above your head and feet.What‚Äôs also great is the compact size of the box it sits in so no need to annoy the other half with equipment taking up floor space.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Took delivery today and used it after work.  It's fantastic.  It all comes packed neatly into in a box not much bigger than a shoebox.  The weights add up to 17kg.  The bar, which comes as three screw together equal lengths, weighs just over 3kg with the nuts on, so that's the advertised 20kg.  It takes moments to assemble.  It's perfect for what I need and it all packs away into the box afterwards.  For that reason alone it is worth dismantling after each use.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: AJ
Review: I am really disappointed with the product. Please see the picture attached. There were sharp cast iron flakes in the steel tube which can easily cut someone‚Äôs fingers. This needs to be rectified..I am planning to send the product back, if I am unable to remove the debris. Really dissatisfied..

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Nothing wrong with the product but came with packaging damaged and a weight missing.  Only realised that the weight was missing after unpacking and rather than just sending the missing weight I was asked to repackage for collection and then once it was all collected And returned a refund would be processed and it could be reordered.  A complete faff and didn't bother so using it with the weight missing which isn't the end of the world but not what I paid for

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Review: I‚Äôve never reviewed an item so fast. I just received this. Sunday DPD delivery. The box is tiny, and the packaging is spot on. The equipment assembled is sturdy, really strong and easily adjustable. Their are rubber washers that you can buy spare at a hardware store. These allow you really tighten the plates so that there‚Äôs not that irritating disk turning movement you can find on cheap tightening mechanism. I‚Äôm really happy and thought this merits a review. I‚Äôve been reading and reading about these due to virus. And these cake back on market and there‚Äôs no abuse of power with the valuing. Well done.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The product itself is of perfect quality, every piece of it seems durable so far. As dumbbells they're pretty great and quite affordable but the barbell aspect really puts this set over the top. The fully assembled bar is shorter than average but for a home system I can't complain. It comes packaged safely and compactly. For everything that you get with this set I have not found better, and especially not at such a brilliantly affordable price!!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Bill Zidis
Review:
These are amazing. For ¬£65 it's a great deal.
You might find cheaper on Argos(if you find them on stock) but I'm really happy with the build quality.
There are very tiny imperfections like some of the plates is slightly heavier by 20-80 grams which is not an issue, noway you can tell difference. Although all of them is above the weight advertising which is a good thing, the 2.5KG typically are 2.580 etc.
None of them were lower than advertised.
The middle connector I don't like but I didn't expect it to like it, it lock securely but there is a movement up and down when using it.
Not an issue at all, it's very safe.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Faulty item. Not fit for purpose.
Name: Velma Bryan
Review: I would like to return the item. Faulty already. Rubber on weights fell off so the bolt on the end of the weights is not secure.

Name: Ammar Aldawoodyeh

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Emergency buy during the Coronovirus Pandemic
Name: Wiggle
Review:
Bought this on Friday the moment Boris announced gym closures. Pleased I did after this morning's workout. I don't have a lot of room in my living room but managed to get a good leg day in with this set and my bands/tubes.

It's a good max weight for beginners but I'm certain if I need to go past 20kg you can get heavier plates. It's cast iron rather than plastic and sand which makes it more robust and it's comfortable to use. ¬£60 may seem steep, but considering the price of most official gym sets I think you get a good deal.

Overall, a good buy and excellent value for money.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Simple, stylish and easy to use
Name: JohnM
Review: The best indoor kit I've ever bought. I hate keeping fit so II'm really amazed how much I liked using this! Very well made, looks great, easy to use, very comfortable grips - they never slip. Not sure the extended bar format is wide enough but it's a nice option.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

For beginners looking for a set of dumbbells and weight plates this set is immaculate. First class service and a good price in my opinion for the product. Its heavier than I expected.  I did not want something plastic filled with sand. The weight set fit the bill nicely. I would definitely recommend.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Rav

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Would highly reccommend and my son loves the feel and look of them as they look really smart and professional.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Review:

These are really good. Very flexible with ability to buy extra weights.

Personally I would like the handles to be a bit thicker, but that is personal preference.

I would recommend these

Title of Review: Room for improvement, but a nice starter set.

Review:
The weights do have a nice finish, and overall the quality of them is nice.

I do have a small issue regarding the center bar when extending from dumbells. The center pole doesn't feel entirely secure, there is a small amount of wiggle, which is okay but doesn't fill me with confidence.

The flexibility of the set does allow for more uses than an average dumbell set, which is a nice positive.

You may however wish to invest in some gloves if you're going to spend any large period of time using these, as personally I find them a little tricky to grip at the end of my set!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Name: Demis Cianfa
Review: Amazing product, bought before the beginning of the pandemic for 50 quid, just noticed you are selling this now for 199 pounds, are you guys went crazy or what?I highly recommend you guys to see a psychiatrist and get a mental check done, and then straight to work again as I‚Äôm waiting a 5 kg weight plates being available since 2 months...

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Review:

My main worry was that the connecting pipe in the middle would be too flimsy, as I've used a similarly designed set before. No worries on that side whatsoever! It's as solid as anything.

My only complaint would probably be that the spinning cuffs holding the weights in place don't stay tightened enough to stop the discs from wiggling around after a while - so I'm having to tighten them every now and then (although I should add, this never happens fast enough for it to be a safety issue).

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: S√∂lmundur √åsak

I haven't been using the connecting bar yet; however, when I tried it out, it seemed pretty sturdy.Overall this product is everything it says it is, nothing more and nothing less. Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Title of Review: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set
Name: AK
Review: For the past 3-months, I've been "trying" to lose weight & get in shape, in fairness it's been going great.Now that I'd lost a fair bit, I felt now I needed to up my game (so to speak), and wanted something which wasn't going to cost me the earth (as it's still early days), did the usual research (thanks You-Tube lol), and set out my budget, and what I would need (to start off), saw a few items but this product seemed to stick out for me.  It seemed to have decent reviews (setting aside complaints for broken or damaged items - it happens), plus thanks to the people here who took the time to provide photos too, I decided to take the plunge.All I can say is, I'm really glad I did.  Really solid build, and the quality is good too, one of the things that "sold" it to me, was the middle "extended bar", which is a really good idea, but after about a week, I got tired of attaching/ removing this item, so decided to purchase some extra Pro-Iron (Cast Iron) Weight Plates, and a York Fitness Spinlock E-Z Curl Bar (5 kg) with Collars. So now I have a set of Dumbbells, and a Curl-bar.As said previously, all items are of great quality, and I've obviously bought more weights by the same reseller.Packaging for this item was really good, very compact and well protected, the box it came in is deceptively heavy (due to the small size) so much so the delivery guy asked how such a small item could be this heavy lol.Anyway, I'm starting to ramble now, all I can say is if you're in a similar situation as I was, and can't decide which Dumbell set to buy, you can't really go wrong with this, as I said I've had no problem with this, plus I bought some more weights, if I get to the stage where I move (to a larger place) then it might be that I consider looking at getting a multi-gym, but for now I'm stuck for space, and these do the job. :)

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Review: It's perfect. Can't fault it. The packaging was very good and clever, arrived intact and in one piece. Weights are exactly as I expected them to be, they're iron so no surprise there but the colour coating looks durable as well, not flaky at all. The bars are much better than the regular York ones, no rattle/suddenly-coming-loose at all. Although I did have to wrap a thin cloth around them because the grooves are a little harsh compared my Hex dumbbells (can't remember the brand) but that's a non-issue really. I usually put a piece of cloth around the bars regardless. I've not tried the connecting bar yet, but I suspect it will do the job just fine.

I bought these for my wife, who is just starting out with the lifting. I wasn't sure if I should get something heavier. I figured I can always buy more plates later, and the price was great.

I had to collect it from the delivery depot cos I was out when they came. The receptionist complained that it was really heavy, which drew the attention of the original delivery driver who came to help her and also complained about how heavy it was.

I carried it out to my car, confident it was heavy enough.

My wife likes it, and currently uses it with the lightest possible weights. I tried it with the heaviest all loaded up on the bar and I pulled a muscle in my back. I don't even lift bro.

Definitely heavy enough for beginner lifters. Well made and look smart. I'm gonna take them on holiday and use them with my shirt off on the beach.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: The weights are nice looking and work as they should
Name: Michael Reed
Review: The weights are nice looking and work as they should. As others have said, you may need gloves as the grips are a bit harsh compared to the rubber-covered ones that you get with some sets. Also as others have said, the joiner bar is quite small. This means that you can only use it for close-grip versions of exercises. The main problem is that 20kg is only a beginners set. In my case, I've always suffered from thin arms and it took me a few months to exhaust what this set offers. It was personally rewarding to get to this stage, but people who've worked out with weights before or who are just naturally strong might need a heavier set than this to begin with. Of course, other weight plates can be bought later and added as they are a standard thread size.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym

Review:
As I've started weight lifting I decided to invest in this dumbells come barbell set to get me started - I didn't want to spend too much in case I decided that weightlifting wasn't for it.
I love this set and use them nearly on a daily basis. I use both the dumbells and convert it to use it as a barbell.
Do be aware that the rubber in the spinlocks come out easily, but it doesn't bother me.
The barbell isn't that long but it's okay for me as I'm only 4ft 11, but if you're taller you might find it too small to do most of the exercises.
Otherwise, this is perfect for a beginner, would recommend!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Ion

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Alley
Review:
Great item. Excellent quality. 3 points to mention.

1)The rubber ring that is advertised (to prevent loosening of the weights) cracked after a few days.

2) The weight plates are thinner but wider in diameter than the York set. This means they seem larger. The quality of the iron is excellent either way.

3) The middle connecting piece is the clincher for me - a really nice touch. It converts the dumbells into a curling bar. This saves money and space, but has you spending a bit more time readjusting if you want to use both functions in the same session. Don't assume this is a substitute for a long barbell e.g. 6 foot. It is too short for that.

Confident 5 stars.

Thoroughly recommended
Great value!

I knew these were going to be good quality and actually worth using for a home workout when the delivery driver warned me they're heavy!

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Steve
Review: I'm knocking on for 60 in a few months and have over the past few years been on drugs for heart problem and airway disease. The drugs were making me worse and very ill, I was putting on weight as a result and was very out of breathe quickly, as a result I didn't exercise much. I got so fed up with being this way I started to research and found out about fasting ( which I did a water fast for 23 days ) and diet ( I have subsequently changed my diet ). I am now, after 6 weeks, no longer taking drugs and my breathing has dramatically changed that I now have more energy and wanting to exercise. I lost just over 2 stone in weight and purchased these weights to exercise at home, build up some muscle and improve overall strength. I am very happy with these weights, ideal for a beginner like me, very good quality, well packaged and the collars seem to do a good job, the weights as yet do not move about when on the bar. Don't really have much of a clue about weights but like everything else I do I shall research on youtube for instruction.

Title of Review: Perfect first set for any level
Name: N. James
Review:
Incredible set for such an impressive price.

You receive the Proiron 20kg set in a perfectly packaged (and I mean perfectly, not a inch of space wasted and everything wrapped) cardboard parcel.

This is a great beginner set to have around the home due to the incredible range of weight exercises you can do as there is an attachment included to change it into a barbell.

I wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone thinking of getting a small set for home.

The only downside in my opinion is the set should have included an extra 2 x 2.5Kg or 2x 5Kg weights. However you can buy these additionally anywhere else.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: Ian A
Review:
Considering the negative reviews for the York dumbbells I'm really glad I spent a little extra & chose these.

Pros
Nicely finished.
Spin locks spin ! (Unlike nylon spin locks).
Look good and are satisfying to use. So I'm more happy to do exercises & not make excuses!
'Rubber' O-rings hold discs in place and keep them quiet.
Should last for ages.
Hammerite style paint finish could easily be repainted if ever needed.

Cons
To start with the O-rings recessed in the spin locks stuck to discs when they were undone but after 2 weeks use they stay put in the recesses.
The O-rings will eventually wear out but can easily buy 3mm O-rings in 22mm & 30mm diameters. 10 of each size for total of as little as ¬£4.

Title of Review: Solid enough product, but gloves probably needed.
Name: David2411
Review:
The product as a whole is a good purchase, and it's very handy that it can double as a barbell with the neat connector, although without taking all of the weights off the dumbbells and putting them back on, it can be a bit of a pain to connect the two together.

My only real issue with this product is that without padded gloves, they can be a little slippery to hold, and the smudges left by your grip are a bit too visible, and can be a little uncomfortable to hold. If using them with padded gloves, however, I'd certainly give it 4 stars or more.

The product was packaged really neatly, too, which made it a real joy to open.

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Name: NickyOH
Review: I returned these as they were very underwhelming once opened. This was partly due to the origami packaging that made everything fit into a shoe box sized parcel. Of course this is great for the supply chain and environment but creates an underwhelming sense of emptiness like if you ordered a bike on eBay and got sent a picture of a bike. After fumbling around and releasing the jac-in-a-box it still all seemed too small and the weight plates weren't as expected. I purchased mainly for the unique connecting bar but that was a let down too and just made it more awkward so I can see why noone else has stolen the idea as it's more just a talking point than a useful design - unless you have dwarfism. The quality was good and they were solid weights with solid spinlocks rather than nasty plastic ones but I just couldn't get turnt on so I asked Amazon to send someone to relieve me instead.

Title of Review: quality not what u paid for
Name: Jason
Review: the silver coating on the surface of the bar is not exactly the quality I expected for the price I paid, it comes off, the bar is not exactly stable at higher weights so I wobbles a bit. The linking bar is also too short, sometimes the weight is at the position where my hand goes. The flexibility to change the weight is also not that great as well as the ease to change it. There is a rubber band in the iron lock and they come off, which is absolutely terrible. I would always wear a glove when using the dumbbells, the surface is not exactly comfortable and convenient. Overall the quality does not match the price

Product: PROIRON 20kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbell Set Hand Weight with Solid Dumbbell Handles Changed into Barbell Handily Perfect for Bodybuilding Fitness Weight Lifting Training Home Gym
Title of Review: Great set, good addition for beginners or experienced
Name: David Hughes
Review: Photo compares the prioron (left, grey) to my older current set (right, black). Great solid cast iron set, the screws are smooth and lock together securely with rubber seals to prevent unscrewing while in use (Did arrive in the box still greasy from production but thats not a problem, make sure to clean them so they don't slide off in use). The bar when put together is a perfect width fit for my shoulders, I am quite a slim guy, not sure how it would suit larger taller broader shoulder users.Another reason I have shared it is to show it is a smaller inner diameter compared to other brands. Well made product, recommended
